108a7(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i gsum dog dmar po bri bar bya'o/ /sngags rdzogs pa ni rtag par yang phyi rol de dang 'dra bar bya zhes ba ni phyi rol la sogs pa dang/ /lha dgod pa ni zhi ba'i ltar bri bar bya'o/ /dmar por bsgyur ba'i gos bgos la zhes pa ni chas
108b1(rgyud 'grel): gos par bya'o/ /mo tog dmar po 'am pad+ma 'am zhes pa la sogs pa ni rdzas te go sla'o/ /dbang gi sbyin bsreg go/ //da ni tshar gcod pa'i drag po'i las bstan te/ de la gdon rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ /drag po'i las ni brtsam par bya
108b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes ba ni bar chad kyi bgegs tshar gcad pa'i phyir zhes pa'o/ /phyed dang gsum 'am khru gsum 'am/ de ltar dam pa khru dgur bya/ /zhes pa ni rab 'bring gi tshad do/ /bur dang ni ldan pa la /zhes pa ni dbyibs te gru gsum du bya'o/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse
108b3(rgyud 'grel): dgu pa/ rtse gsum pa dang rgya gram pa'i/ zhes pa la sogs pa la/ dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa de'i phyogs bzhir rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang/ rdo rje rgya gram dang/ rdo rje dbyug pa dang/ rtsa gsum ba ste/ tri shu la'i mgul du mi mgos mtshan pa rdo rje dang ldan par byas pa'o/ /su khrub
108b4(rgyud 'grel): la ni dgra ste? dang/ rdo rje rtse gcig pas bskor ba'i /gzhan yang zhi ba ltar thams cad bri bar bya'o/ /rdzas ni go sma'o/ /gos nag bgos shing khros nas kyang zhes pa ni chas gos bstan pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal bsgyur zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'o/ /de nas
108b5(rgyud 'grel): de'i sdig bcom lus zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o/ /drag po'i sbyin bsreg go /mchod pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba nyi me me'i las shes par bya'o/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa zhes pa nas smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes pa'i bar gyis ni 'khor srung
108b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dam bcas pa bstan/ /gang gis brtags pa'i rgyal po zhes pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa lags so par 'chal bar bgyi'o/ /zhes pa ni rgyud kyi don 'di gang na spyod par bkur bar bgyi'o zhes pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas/ legs par sgrubs shig ces
108b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar gyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gtang nas bsgrub par bstan to// //de ni rgyud kyi phan yon bstan pa'o// /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su spyod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po sku
109a1(rgyud 'grel): gsung? gyi gtsug tor gyi rgyud las/ rgyud phyi ma'i bshad pa gsal ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon /sangs rgyas kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra ka la sha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba khyud po chos
109a2(rgyud 'grel): brtson gyis bsgrub cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dkyil 'khor spyi'i rim ba slob dpon lnga'i bzang pos mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sa d+hA ra maN+Da la pa ri pA ti/ bod skad du/ dkyil 'khor spyi'i rim pa'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur la
109a3(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par snang mdzad mnyes par bya ba'i phyir de'i rim pa ni 'di'o/ /ji ltar slar rang gi sgrub thabs kyi rim pas bsnyen pa byas pa dang/ bzlas brjod byas pas ma rtsi
109a4(rgyud 'grel): ma mthong? bas/ bdag dang gzhan 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir sngags pas dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad thams cad bsdus la tshes grangs dang/ gza' dang rgyu skar la sogs pa bzang po la/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i
109a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma blta ba'i phyir/ grogs dang bcas pas gnas de nyid brtag par bya ste/ lha? khang dang/ tshong 'dus chen po dang/ yul dang grong khyer dang/ khyams kyi shar dang/ byang du 'jum? par bya'o/ /gzhan du na 'di ltar yang bya ste/ sa bzang po snum pa dang/
109a6(rgyud 'grel): zug rdu la sogs pa'i nyes pa med par shar dang byang du gzhol pas/ me tog dang shing dang chu dang ldan par bya'o/ /yang na yid gang du dka' bar ro/ /de nas slob dpon rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor du zhugs pas sa'i bdag po la gtor ma la sogs pa
109a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin zhing sa ? par bya ste/ rmi lam du khugs par gyur na'o/ /de yang sngags pas lcib ? ma ltung paS maN+Dal byas las/ dkon mchog gsum la phyi nang gi mchod pa bya zhing/ ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la gtor ma byin la/ gzhung bzhin
109b1(rgyud 'grel): du mo sa la gtsugs nas/ thal mo sbyar te bslang bar bya'o/ /gang sa 'di la gnas bcas pa'i/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang sha za la sogs pa rnams la bslang bar bya yis/ sa'i gnas 'di la lha khang dang/ mchod rten la sogs pa byed par 'dod kyis/ khyed
109b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams yi gnod pa dang/ bzod pa yod na/ sa 'dir byad kyis nga gnas 'dir nyal na rmi lam gyi mtshan mar ston cig ces lan gsum brjod pa nyal bar bya'o/ /rmi lam du deng rnams la mi gnod gyis gyis shig ces bstan nas de nyid du bya'o/ /sa khugs
109b3(rgyud 'grel): nas phyi de zhag gi snga dro dang po la 'di skad brjod do/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sa 'di tsam zhig khrugs na lha khang la sogs pa byed kyis/ khyed rnams sems mi ? zhing bgegs med pa dang/ grogs por byos shig ces
109b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o/ /yon bdag gi zhag dang/ gza' skar bzang po'i dus su/ mchod sbyin gyis shing las srid du khru gang sboms su ni mthe bo dang mthe chung rtse sprad pa'i nang khangs pa las pur ba byas la/ mi tsam dgos pa'i pyogs dang mtshams su phur pa
109b5(rgyud 'grel): btab la/ srang bu nyid bsgrib gyis phung pa la ? bar bya'o/ /de'i dbus su rdzing bu 'dra ba'i dbyibs su byas la de'i dkyil du maN+Dal byas te/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rnams dbul lo/ /phyogs spyod rnams la yang gter ma btang la/ /thal mo
109b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /ji ltar phyogs rnams thams cad/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten bzhugs/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dag /bdag ni rdo rje che ge la/ /'di nyid du ni brtan bzhugs na/ /mngon shes can gyis
109b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon bzhes/ /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ bum pa bkra shis dang ldan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po brgya rtsa ba myang bzlas pa'i mchod yon dbul/ bum pa ma 'byor na dung phor dbul/ lha khang la sogs pa byed na gtso ba dbus su dmigs
110a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ de nyid kyi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mchod yon dbul zhing gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /kye bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchod yon bzhes nas/ byin gyis brlab cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol zhes brjod do/ /gal te
110a2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i sa bzhi de rmi lam du khugs na/ de nas khro bo'i nga rgyal du byas na/ /mngon spyod kyi sbyin bsreg byas te/ bgegs thams cad skrad la snga ma bzhin du sa'i tshad blangs te/ mchod yon dbul bar bya/ de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i ? ltar
110a3(rgyud 'grel): klu'i gtso bo la dmigs la/ sa brko bar bya zhing/ mchod yon sbyin pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de nas phyi de nyid nyi ma phyed tsam na/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su khro bo'i nga rgyal byas la/ /sngags kyi 'og tu tha mang phaT brjod cing/ khrab dang lan tsha dang/ mi dus? kyi
110a4(rgyud 'grel): ? ? mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi chags dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /g.yon pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mos sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yang phyir zhag la lus bkru zhib dri zhim pos byugs la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya ste/ bcom ldan
110a5(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyis khro bo'i ? kyis bgegs bsal zhing gnas bsrung bar bya'o/ /gang de bzhin du yungs kar dang/ chu dang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal pa la sngags lan bdun zla zhing/ sa'i tshad ni ji tsam par gtong ba byas nas/ sa'i lha mon mkha' 
110a6(rgyud 'grel): la gshegs su gsol bar byas la/ sa sbyang ba'i cho ga ni/ ji tsam 'dod pa'i gnas su gru bzhir dmigs la glu'i bdag po bsam ste bde bar bya'o/ /de la klu'i gtso bo don ces bya ba ni 'di yin te/ ston zla gsum la glo g.yas pas la phab ste/ kha lho 
110a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su bltas te nyal lo/ /dgun zla gsum la lho mgo bstan pa nub tu kha bltas la nyal lo/ /dkyid? zla gsum la mgo nub tu bltas la kha byang du blto'a/ /dbyar nA? gsum la byang du mgo blta shar du kha bltas te nyal/ de nas klu'i mgo bo dang rgyab
110b1(rgyud 'grel): dang 'phongs por nas sa brko bar bya/ mngon par dag pa'i dngos grub gyi don du brang gi phyogs su/ lkog ma dang/ lte ba dang/ pus mo tsam gyi bar du/ dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum 'dod pa'i phyir/ /g.yas g.yon du bzhugs par bsam zhing brko bar bya ste/ sa phyung
110b2(rgyud 'grel): las gzhan bzang po snum pa dang/ rdo ba dang mgal dmya? dang/ sol ba dang rus pa dang/ gyo mo dang por ba la sogs pa med par byas nas yang dri zhim po dang sa bsres/ /yang na ni dri zhim po dang chu bsres pa'i/ yi ge hUM bzlas pa'i chu dang bsreg shing 'thas? par
110b3(rgyud 'grel): bcag cing bkang la/ lag mthil ltar mnyam pa'i stang du gzhal yas khang sgo bzhi dang rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas pa/ skar khung dang dra ba can la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i nang du chud par bsam poS thams cad du sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi phreng
110b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang dril bu dang/ me long gdags rgyal mtshan bzang po gzugs pa dang bla re dam pa dre ba dang/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ras ris kyi nye bar mdzes par byas la/ gtso bo'i bzlas pa byas pa'i sman dang/ 'bya dang rin po che
110b5(rgyud 'grel): dbus su gzhug par bya'o/ /zag rdu'i nyes pa thams cad ni/ gal te byung bar mi nus na/ lag pas brtags te sngags 'di bzla/ dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur/ /khang pa chen po dang/ brag phug pa dang/ pa lang gi lha sa dang/ lha khang la sogs pa dang/
110b6(rgyud 'grel): 'babs chu'i 'gram dang/ sngar byas pa'i sa la yang sbyang mi dgos kyis 'di ltar yang bya ste/ rang gtso bor bsgom zhing khro bo'i sngags kyis bgegs bsgrad pa dang/ chu dang yungs kar dang thal bas bzlas te/ snga ma bzhin du gtor zhing/ shar phyogs
110b7(rgyud 'grel): nas brtsams te/ ba'i rnam pa ldan? byug par bya zhing/ dri chab kyis kyang gtor/ khro bo'i sngags lan bdun bzlas pa'i sman dang/ 'bru dang/ rin po che dbus su bzhugs par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi gnas sbyang ba'i rim pa gnyis su byas pas dag pa'i cho
111a1(rgyud 'grel): gang/ /de bzhin du lha khang dang/ mchod rten dang/ rgyal po'i khang pa dang/ 'du khang la sogs pa byed na yang sbyang par bya'o/ /de nas de lta bu'i gnas la nyin re 'am/ zla re'am/ lo re'i par gyis dkyil 'khor bya bar 'dod na/ yon
111a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi 'byor pa dang ci dga' bas bya'o/ /ji ltar mos pa bzhin du zhag dang/ gza' skar la sogs pa'i dus su sa gzung bar bya ste/ de la slob dpon rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ snga ma bzhin du bsgrub pa'i
111a3(rgyud 'grel): rim pas bgegs bskrad de/ snying ga nas byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khro lo las sprul pa byung bas/ nam mkha' khyab par bsams ste/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal pa sras dang bcas pa khyod rnams bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la byin gyis brlabs cing
111a4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba'i phyir bzhugs su gsol zhes bskul zhing/ snying pa'i zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje ri dbus su bsdus te bcug la gcig tu gyur par bsams te/ de nas rang gi lus rnam par snang mdzad kyi nga rgyal du byas la/ snying po brjod cing semS
111a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' skyil mo rung phye la langs nas/ mig g.yon pa la yi ge Ta las zla pa'i dkyil 'khor g.yas pa la yi ge ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ 'bras bu gnyis la yi ge hUM shin tu g.yo pa bskal pa'i me ltar 'bab pa'i rdo rje'i mig
111a6(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje gsor zhing/ g.yon pa dril du dkrol zhing bzung la/ mgo dang mig g.yon du cung zad bkur la/ a las sna tshogs rdo rje/ rkang ba'i 'og tu bsams te/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i khro bo'i nga rgyal bskyed de
111a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du blta zhing rdo rje 'gros kyis bskor bar bya zhing/ bgegs thams cad bskrad pa'i phyir ba'i skad ces brjod do/ /slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas/ slob ma che ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang/ sems can thar ma cang?
111b1(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'dir dkyil 'khor phyi rgyal po ming 'di zhes bya ba dri yis/ lha dang lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang yi dags dang/ sha za dang brjed byed dang/ 'byung po dang mkha' 'gro ma dang/ gnod po dang
111b2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ rig sngags grub ba rgan po dang/ rgan mo dang 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig /'di ltar rdo rje 'chang ba'i bka' thos nas/ myur ba nyid du dengs? shig /gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag no/ phyag na
111b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba rab tu khros pa'i bzhin 'bar ba can gyi ye shes kyi rnga rje chen po rab tu 'phar bas/ mgo po tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro ? hUM zheS lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas rang gi gtso bo las sprul pa'i khro bo grangs med shin tu 'jigs ba byung ste/ bgegs
111b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams shin tu sgrag? cing? bskrad par byas nas/ nam mkha' khyab par dkyil cing bzhugs so/ /de nas gar gyis g.yas brkyang pa dang/ g.yon brkyang pa la sogs pa'i stang stabs skabs 'dir bya'o/ /de nas mdza' yas dang/ rnam par rgyal ba dang/ sprin sgra dang/ stobs
111b5(rgyud 'grel): po che dang/ rgyal ? sogs pa phur bu lnga'i ngo bo nyid kyi/ khro bo'i gzugs 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig ba dbus su btsugs la/ de nas dbab ldan nas brtsams te bskor phyogs su/ oM be ro tsa na hUM sarba pa gyen uts+tshar ya hUM phaT/ ces bya ba'i sngags kyis phur bu rnams la bzla
111b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'od nas/ gser gyis gzhi la thug pa'i bar du gdab bar bsam mo/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings te hUM brjod cing nga rgyal bskyed de/ dkyil 'khor gyis la snga ma bzhin sprul la/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcing zhing sngags
111b7(rgyud 'grel): ? la/ de'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ nam mkha' la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya nga rgyal bskyed cing/ grogs po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir bdag nyid la gsol ba gdab par bsam par bya'o/ /de
112a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ chos kun bdag po med pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad yang
112a2(rgyud 'grel): dag spangs/ /kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol /zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung/ /ye shes spyod pa rnams sbyong ba/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi semS
112a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /de nas langs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' khyab par mthong ste/ /'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA
112a4(rgyud 'grel): gtab da band+ha? ? ka ro mi/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas langs la nga rgyal bskyed bar bya/ bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ stobs chen rdo rje can
112a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag yin/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po bdag/ phyag na rdo rje bstan bdag ste/ /bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag /byin gyis brlab cing bzhugs su gsol/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu blangs la/ oM badzra u tiSh+Tha zhes ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor rnams
112a6(rgyud 'grel): snga ma bzhin du nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol lo/ /g.yas brkyang pa la sogs pas bgegs bskrad par bya ste/ sa gzhi thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsams la/ gzhal yas khang nam mkha' la dmigs la/ rdo rje'i mig gis phyogs
112a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su bgegs med par mthong nas/ sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo phye ste/ sngags pas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje rgyu'i gzugs lto ba che ba/ dbu? bzhi pa/ rdo rje dang 'khor lo/ /pad+ma dang dril bu bsnams pa/ sku mdog ser por bsgoms te/ sngags
112b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di dang rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyab bkug la/ oM badzra maN+Da la hUM dza/ zhes rdo rje rgya nyid bskyur bas phyag rgya dang sngags 'dir/ /dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi grub par gyur te/ phyir gyis brlab par bya/ oM mahA badzra tsakrA d+hi tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi hUM zhes pa rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings
112b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ 'khor lo bzhin du bskor bar bya/ mgal me'i 'khor lo'i tshul gyis na/ /'khor lo byin brlabs phyag rgya 'di'o/ /de nas mdza' yas dang rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa lngar dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bur bu gang ba/ tsan dan dmar po dang/ dang
112b3(rgyud 'grel): dang skur ba'i rgyan dang bcas pa/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis gzung ste/ g.yas pas 'bar ba'i tho ba tsan dan dmar po dang/ me tog dmar po dang/ dar dang/ srad bu dang bcas pa'i tho ba blangs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol dbang ldan nas brtsams te/
112b4(rgyud 'grel): brdung bar bya/ /sngar bshad pa'i sgrags sam/ yang na oM badzra kro d+ha kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+raM? hUM hUM phaT/ ces bya ba ni phur ba gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM bdzra mung+ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM tho ba'i sngags so/ /de nas rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya phyogs bcur bstan cing
112b5(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bskrad par bya/ /oM A:hUM yi ge gsum gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu 'khor lo'i rim pa dang/ pad+ma'i rim pa dang/ rdo rje'i rim par bsams la/ de'i phyi rol du rdo rje dra ba dang/ sa gzhi yar rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byas la/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i
112b6(rgyud 'grel): 'ol dang bcas pa bsgoms la bgegs bskrad cing/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags dang/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo rnams bcing bar bya/ de nas yi ge lam las byung ba'i sa'i lha mi sku mdog ser mo bum pa lag na thogs pa rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/
112b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lcags kyu'i drag rgyas spyan drangs te/ dgug ba la sogs pa bya zhing tshigs bcad 'dis sta gon du bya/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sbyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par ni/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ shAkya seng+ge skyob pa
113a1(rgyud 'grel): yis ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin dag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar bya ste dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhes gsum brjod do/ /mchod pa byas la sa'i lha mo dga' ba'i mdangs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig ces
113a2(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing 'og tu thim par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje bcing ba'i phyag rgya dang/ sngags 'dis gzhi gzung bar bya'o/ /oM badzra b+ha ba hUM zhes brjod do/ /oM badzra d+ha d+ha a d+hi tiSh+Tha zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab/ 'di ni sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas dri
113a3(rgyud 'grel): bzang bo la sogs pa byugs nas/ me tog sna tshogs kyis chal mar bkram ste/ zla ba la sogs pas lha rnams ji ltar gnas pa'i ming brjod de/ maN+Dal re re bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te/ dra ba dang rab
113a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas mtshams bcad nas mchod pa dang/ bstod pa byas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ ji ltar rang gi sgrub thabs las 'byung ba bzhin du bgegs bsal nas/ rnal 'byor chen po byas te/ sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la/
113a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bsgyur nas/ nga rgyal bskyed cing sems dag par bya zhing/ der dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi bsod nams 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par/ /gyur pa bdag ni the tshom med/ /byang
113a6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dang sems gcig las/ /mi ldog bar ni bdag gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni/ /deng bdag skye ba the tshom med/ deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/
113a7(rgyud 'grel): ding bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes
113b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi ba yi/ rdo rje ? gyi dkyil 'khor bri/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni stsal du stsol zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /snga ma bzhin du bsams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du oM la sogs pa rang
113b2(rgyud 'grel): gi yi ge bkod la/ /lha 'khor dang bcas pa so so'i gnas la bzhugs par bsams/ de'i 'og tu ye shes sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas te/ dam tshig sems dpa' dang gcig tu
113b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur par bya'o/ /de nas mchod yon dang/ zhabs bsil dang/ so sor gnas la bzhugs su gsol te/ oM be? ro tsa na/ arg+haM pra tIts+tsha swAhA zhes bya ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor la mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul la/ bstod pa dang phyag bya'o/ /gser ram
113b4(rgyud 'grel): dngul lam zangs las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa bya/ de nyid dngos bo med par bsams la/ yi ge bam las byung ba nag po ra ri med pa mgrin pa ring ba lto ba che ba mchu 'phyang ba bsgoms te/ de'i nang du d+hi las pad+ma de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil
113b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ /snga ma bzhin du lha'i 'khor lo bsam la/ de rnam par gyur pa las bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar bsgoms te/ de nas dri chu blugs la/ sman la sogs pa dang ldan par byas te/ shwi ta 'bri ha ti a pa ra tsa ta d+ha na d+ha
113b6(rgyud 'grel): utpa la kaN+Da ka ri ha sa de ba la sogs pa'i rtsa ba las byas te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rtags su byas pa'o/ /nas so ba dang/ sran ma ma sha dang/ nas dang/ til dang/ gro 'di rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
113b7(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rang bzhin no/ /shel dang/ dngul dang mu tig dang/ dung dang/ byu ru ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mdog gi rtags so/ /nang gi bum pa la ni 'di rnams bzhugs par bya ste/ zla ba dang nyi ma dang/ chu dang dri dang/ bza' ba rnamS
114a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhug go /bum pa la 'khor lo'i bdag po'i mtshan ma la sogs pa lnga dang ldan par bya zhing dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ ljang gu dang/ sngon po'i ras rnams kyis mgul pa bcing bar bya'o/ /ma 'byor na
114a2(rgyud 'grel): ras cung zad cig gis spyir bya'o/ /shing 'o ma can 'bras bu dang bcas bas kha brgyan par bya'o/ /gtso bo'i phyag rgya'am rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bstan cing/ /gtso bo'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad dam brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bzhag par bya'o/ /yang
114a3(rgyud 'grel): spyi'i sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bzhag /oM badzra u taM ga hUM zhes bya ba so/ /de nas bum pa'i gzhi me tog dkar po chal par bkram pa 'am/ ras gting ba'i steng du bzhag go /de bzhin du mchod yon gyi snod gnyis chu dang bcas pa bzhag pa/ dkyil
114a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mchod pa'i zhag gi par du nyin re lan gsum du phyi nang gi mchod pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor bskor la dang po'i dbus su bzhag /de nas lha so so'i gnas su
114a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go /bum pa'i grangs ni dkyil 'khor gyi lta bu yod pa de tsam du bya'o/ /de ma 'byor na bcu las nyur ba mi bya'o/ /zhes rgyud las 'byung/ sman dang 'bru dang/ rin po che dang ldan pa ras zung dang/ me tog gi phreng ba dang/ tsan dan dang gur gum la
114a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i dri bzang pos bskus pa'i bum pa/ rang gi lha'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i rim bzhin du bzhag par bya/ de nas las thams cad pa'i bum pa la bgegs bskrad pa'i sngags bzla zhing/ sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa la mchod pa bya ste
114a7(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol tu byang shar mtshams su bzhag par bya ste/ 'di skad gsol ba gdab par bya/ khyed gyi dkyil 'khor ma rdzogs kyi bar du/ bgegs ma rungs pa rnams bsrung du gsol zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i sta gon gyi cho ga'o/ /phyi rol du song ste rnamS
114b1(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor du gnas la/ /phyogs skyon la gtor ma btang ste zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi sar zhugs te snga ma bzhin du ring nge 'dzin la gnas nas 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /oM pad+ma sa ra swatwa a pa ra ta ya sho d+ha ya
114b2(rgyud 'grel): hUM h+ri did+ha lca byin gyis brlab pa byas nas/ lag par bdug spos thogs te/ pus mo sa la btsugs nas 'di skad gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la brtse bar gyur nas /sdod?
114b3(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang brtse ba'i phyir/ sang ni dkyil 'khor bre bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de bas gnas ba mdzad pa'i rigs/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon brtse dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgra
114b4(rgyud 'grel): bcom dang/ /gsang sngags lha gzhan gang lags dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang/ /gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang/ /gang du lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag ming 'dis dgongs su gsol/ /bdag
114b5(rgyud 'grel): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /? ni dkyil 'khor bzang po'i ming/ /'di zhes bgyi ba ci nus kyis/ /cho ga bzhin du bri lags na/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs ni brtse bar dgengs nas su/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis
114b6(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa mdzad du gsol nas lan gsum brjod de/ /de nas bsam pa thag pa nas/ /bstong pa dang phyag byas te/ phyi rol tu byung nas slob ma sta gon du gnas par bya ste/ de nas lus bkru ba dang/ dag pa dang gos gtsang ma bgos la/ snyim pa me tog
114b7(rgyud 'grel): gis bka' la/ slob dpon la phyag byas ta gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa? bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bsnyen ba/ mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems ? bdag la
115a1(rgyud 'grel): stsol/ /sangs rgyaS chos? dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi/ /'di sdang? ces lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas slob dpon gyis
115a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma bos te/ /'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /khyed? mtshul ten? snod yin gyis/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul go cha ni/ /'do la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang/
115a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gang dag ma byon pa/ /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan zhing bzhugs pa ngag /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen par mtshan snad?
115a4(rgyud 'grel): bces?/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ shAkya seng+ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /rtog pa mang po legs par bsdus nas ni/
115a5(rgyud 'grel): shin tu bsam pa bzang po sngon bras nyon/ /brjed pas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob/ /de nas cho ga 'dis sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug /bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis dang/ /
115a6(rgyud 'grel): gying du bul dang yi rang ga /sangs rgyas sras sngar mchis nas su/ /de dag bdag gi bshags par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rang rgyal dgra bcom rnams kyis/ /bsgoms dang bzlas brjod bsod nams kyis/ /de la bdag
115a7(rgyud 'grel): ni yi rang ngo/ /sems bskyed mngon par sangs rgyas dang/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' chogs spyod la/ /de nas bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji lta bar/ /skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' 
115b1(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa ltar/ /de ring nyid du sems bskyed do/ /mgon po bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /ma lus bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dus 'di nyid nas 'tshang rgya'i bar/ /bla med bdag la gzigs su gsol/ /sangs
115b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rig
115b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog chen po la/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni lan drug du/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las bya shI?/ pad+ma rig mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung/ /
115b4(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchad? pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni bsdu pa dang/ sems can don byed tshul khrims
115b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ de bzhin brtan par gzung bar bgyi/ /bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas myur bsgrubs nas/ /sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams/ /bla med byang chub nyid du bsgral bar bgyi zhes
115b6(rgyud 'grel): zhus pa dang/ slob dpon? gyis slob ma la bsrung ba bya ste/ khro bo'i sngags kyis tshems shing la bzlas pa bya'o/ /so shing gi cho ga Ni 'di'o/ /u duM ba ra a shwat+tha/ /me tog bcings shing dri yis byugs/ /sor ni bcu gnys tshad du bya'o/ /ma yom
115b7(rgyud 'grel): las 'bus ma zes/ /lci bas pa yi go ba tsam/ /sa gzhi maN+Dal byas nas ni/ /srob ma de yi steng bzhag nas/ /me tog la sogs mchod pa bya/ /slb ma'i chogs la sbyin par bya/ /de nas shar phyogs kha bltas te/ /mi smra bar ni so shing bca' / /bca' 
116a1(rgyud 'grel): pa zin nas mi dags shing/ /phan tshun du yang mi dor ro/ /so shing bdun du drang por dor/ /de tshe bdag la blta ba dang/ /rtse mo gyen du 'greng gyur na/ /de ni dngos grub mchog ces bya/ /de bzhin shar du kha bltas na/ /de yis
116a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub 'bring du bshad/ /mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na/ /'jig rten ba yi dngos grub grub/ /so zhing por ba brgya zhig la/ /gal te thur du kha blta na/ /de ni nges par sa 'og gi /dngos grub de la the tshom med/ /de nas dri'i chus lag pa brgyas te/
116a3(rgyud 'grel): mthor 'thung? bya'o/ /yang oM h+ri bi shud+d+ha sarba d+harma sarba pA pa ni tsas sho d+ha ya sarba bi gal ba na ya hUM zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas pa'i chu khyor pa gsum 'thung du gzhug par bya ba'i phyir/ sbyin par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu slob ma rnams la sems dga' bar
116a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan par bya'o/ /bar 'dir chos bstan pa'i cho ga gzhan du ltos/ /de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis ku sha la bzlas/ 'og phyogs su zhog ces ba'o/ /bgegs kyi dga' i sngags bzlas bstan du yang mi gding bar bya/ /grangs drug
116a5(rgyud 'grel): mdud pa drug byas pa'i/ /bsrung sdud dpung la g.yon par gdags/ /yi ge brgya pas brtan byas pa/ /bsrung pa'i phyir ni gdags par bya/ /de nas bzhin bzang rnams longs shig /sang gi nyin mo khyad rnams kyis/ /thar pa chen po'i rang? bzhin gyi
116a6(rgyud 'grel): grongs khyer chen po mthong bar 'gyur gyis/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du mchod pa rnam pa lnga byas nas/ gtor ma gtang ste nang du zhugs nas dkyil 'khor la phyi nang gi mchod bas yang dag par mchod de/ gnas de nyid gu gu sha'i stan la slob ma
116a7(rgyud 'grel): mchod dkyil 'khor gyi 'gram du seng+ge'i nyal stabs su 'dug la/ rmi lam gyi mtshan ma blta ba'i phyir mi smra bar bsam gtan gyi sems kyis nyal bar bya'o/ /de nas nang bar mtshan mo'i mthar rmi lam gang dang gang mthong bar dri bar bya/ dri ba
116b1(rgyud 'grel): thos nas rmi lam bzang ngan 'dzem? pa med par bstan par bya'o/ /rmi lam sangs rgyas mthong ba ni/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin/ /zhis bya ba la sogs pa smos /rmi lam bzang bo mthong na slob ma la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ dngos grub rab ? tha ma
116b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan par bya'o/ /ngan? pa mthong na ba'i rnam pa lnga la khro bo'i sngags bzlas te/ 'thung du gzhug cing bsrung bar bya/ 'grub na drag po'i sbyin bsreg kyang bya zhing rtog pa bsal bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon phyag rgya chen po dang ldan par byas te/ snga ma bzhin du
116b3(rgyud 'grel): phur bu dang dra ba dang rab dang phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /yi ge gsum las ri rab bskyed/ /de'i steng du bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms te/ de las sprul pa byung bas srad bu 'dzin par bsams la/ nges par dkyil 'kho bya ba ni/ /su zhig gis ni bya bar
116b4(rgyud 'grel): nus/ /lha yi rnal 'byor rang gnas na/ /dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur pa yin zhes rgyud las 'byung ba yin no/ /de nas las thams cad pa'i bum pa bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir bzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o/ /blu dang rol mor gtogs la sogS
116b5(rgyud 'grel): pa mchod pa rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu srad bu so sor byas te/ dkar po dang ser po dang/ sngon po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu rnams la/ oM hUM traM gri baM zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru bzlas la/ rnam bar snang mdzad la sogs pa bsgoms te
116b6(rgyud 'grel): mig g.yas g.yon la nyi ma dang zla ba bsams te/ oM da bi b+hA riSh+Tha aM ku sha dza:zhes bzlas la/ lcags kyu 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin 'byung bas/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bskul te/ ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas/ 'di skad ces gsol ba
116b7(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya'o/ /kye bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa'i rdo rje srad bu stsal du gsol/ /de nas ye shes spyan gyis dgzibs nas/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i thugs nas byung ste/ lcags kyus bskul ba'i tshul du/ rang gi lag tu 'ongs
117a1(rgyud 'grel): par bsams te/ rnam par mdzad bdun du dmigs la/ oM dzi na dzika swAhA/ zhes brjod la bsgril bar bya'o/ /de nas tsan dan bzang po la sogs pa/ legs par bskus pa'i gser gyi snod la sogs pa'i nang du legs
117a2(rgyud 'grel): par bzhag la/ me tog la sogs bas mchod de/ rdo rje'i mig byas la/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis srang bu bzung la/ oM badzra be ma ya su traM ma ti kra ma hUM/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /oM aM hUM zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzla par bya'o/ /yang dkyil 'khor
117a3(rgyud 'grel): dri bzang pos byugs te/ phyi rol 'khor bar me tog bkram nas nam mkha' na bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la mchod yon phul te/ me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul/ sgeg mo la sogs pa phyi nang gi
117a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas gyur mchod/ glu dang rol mo la sogs pa ci nus kyis mchod nas/ sngags pa rang nyid kyis dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par bya'o/ /de la rim pa ni 'di yin te/ bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad rnal 'byor du byas te/
117a5(rgyud 'grel): oM dzi na dzi ka ces bya ba'i snying po ci nus su brjod nas/ rnam par snang mdzad du gyur pa'i snying ga las/ phrogs bo sprul nas byin gyis brlab pa dang dbang bskur ba bya ste/ mdun du blta bar byas nas phan tshun rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la
117a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur gyi tshad sboms su sgo'i nyi shu'i cha'i srad bu rdo rje khu tshur g.yon pas gzungs la/ phyogs thams cad mnyam par dmigs shing/ oM dza dza dza zhes bya ba gsum brjod la lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ grogs po'i lag tu gtang
117a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /grogs pos rtang? ba mdun du bsgyur? nas/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dza dza dza gsum brjod nas blangs te/ slob dpon nub tu 'dug la kha shar du blta ba dang/ de bzhin du lhor 'dug la byang du bltas la gnam thig gdab par bya'o//
117b1(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra sa ma ya su tra ma ti kra ma hUM/ zhes gnyis kas brjod par bya'o/ /snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du mtshungs pa'i thig kyang de bzhin du gdab par bya'o/ /slob dpon dang slob ma gnyis g.yas su bskor ba bya'o/ /de nas me tshur 'dug la byang du mngon
117b2(rgyud 'grel): par phyogs par byas nas/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar ngos gyi thig gdab par bya'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su gnas nas lhor mngon par phyogs te nub tu thig gdab po/ /de bzhin du 'dug la shar du phyogs te/ byang gi thig gdab po/ /yang me'i phyogs
117b3(rgyud 'grel): char 'dug la/ nub du mngon par phyogs la lho'i ngos su thig gdab bo/ /de bzhin du 'dug la rlung phyogs su bri bar bya'o/ /yang bden bral kyi phyogs su 'dug la/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams su srad bu dri? bar bya ste/ /cha bzhir bgos te phyir ni nang gis/
117b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir ni bya'i sa/ rim pa 'di bzhin du dkyil 'khor thams cad la thig gdab par bya'o/ /thig skud chad na bla ma 'chi/ /ring 'thung khyer na na bar 'gyur/ /phyogs khrul slob ma myos par 'gyur/ /nges na nan tan tshams cad du/ /thig skud las ni 'bad
117b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de bzhin du thig gdab par bya ste/ ye shes kyi thig skud kyang snga ma bzhin du mchod de/ gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas snga ma ye shes kyi skud? pa la yig 'dru ji ltar bkd pa bzhin du/ 'di tshon la yang dgod par bya ste/ de nas dkyil
117b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bri ba ni/ /lcags ni sna lnga'i phyi ma ste/ mkhas pas dkar po la sogs pa la/ dang? cing yon tan ldan pa yi/ /slob mas rin chen phye mas bri/ /rin chen lcags rnams ma 'byor na/ /sa lu btags pa'i phye mas dri/ /tshon rtsi zhib mos sngar
117b7(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa/ /'byung khungs las byung phye mas bya/ /rdo rje'i khams ni sna tshogs kyang/ /phye ma'i gor ni sbyar bar bya/ /de ltar rnam pa bzhi po ni/ /phye ma'i rgyur ni bsgrags pa yin/ /lcags rnams kun dang rin chen dang/ /'byung khungs rnams dang
118a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras btags pa/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi las rnams la/ /phye ma mngon du sbyar bar bya/ /dam tshig la ni lcags kyi shis/ /rin chen las byung dbang bskur la/ /se lu phye ma zhi ba la/ /khams las byung ba rgyas pa la//
118a2(rgyud 'grel): drag shul spyod pa khyad bar du/ /thal ba la sogs byas bar shis/ /phye ma rnams kyi bye brag gi /cho ga rim pa bstan pa 'di'o/ /oM badzra tsitra sa ma ya hUm zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis lan bdun bdun bzlas te/ de nas tshon rtsi thams cad la//
118a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i mig gis blta bar bya'o/ /de la 'bar ba'i mig gis blta ba mi 'di yin te/ rab tu myur bar g.yo ba'i mig /mig gi rdzi la 'dren ba ni/ /'bar ba'i lta ba zhes su gsungs/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs pa'o/ /mthar yi
118a4(rgyud 'grel): ge h+ri rang rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas tshon bzang por bya ba'i phyir bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs bya'o/ /bden pa gang gis sems can rnams la sangs rgyas rnams sems can du dpags pas/ chags pa mdzad pa'i bden pa des tshon rtsi rnamS
118a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar bar gyur cig ces bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam por snang mdzad kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ de'i 'og tu rdo rje dril bu blangs te/ bkrol zhing bkra shis kyi dbyangs rnams brjod/ de nas bkra shis kyi 'das pa'i bsam pa
118a6(rgyud 'grel): btang la/ 'gro ba'i don la dmigs te/ /oM badzra tsi tras bya ba'i sngags zlos shing/ rdo rje khu tshur g.yon pas tshon blangs la dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas g.yas su bskor te/ tshon dgye bar bya'o/ /de nas phyis ci bde bar bya'o?/ /tshon dgye bar
118a7(rgyud 'grel): yangs? mnyam dang ma 'dres ma ye ba/ /ba ra mchad dang g.yon mi bskor/ /sdoms su sgo ni nyi shu'i tshad/ /ra khA rnams kyang de tsam bya/ /sboms na nad rnams 'byung ba ma? 'gyur/ /phras na yang ni nor zad 'gyur/ /s+tho bar gyur na mdza' bshes 'bral
118b1(rgyud 'grel): bar du chad nam kha na slob 'chi/ /g.yon du bskor na sdug bsngal 'bab/ /de bas tshon rtsi nan tan bya/ /sngon po rdo rje'i rang bzhin te/ gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa dang/ /pad+ma ra ga'i rang bzhin gzhan/ /gzhan dag mang? gang lta bur bshad/ /dal
118b2(rgyud 'grel): bo nang du shes bya ste/ /'di ni tshon gyi rim par 'dod/ /shar phyogs su ni sngon po che/ /lhor ni ser po legs sbyar ba/ /nub kyi cha? ni dmar po ste/ /byang gi ljang gu yang dag ldan/ /dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni/ /shel ltar snang ba bla na med/ /rdo rje dril bu rtag
118b3(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag legs par bri/ /gsang sngags de nyid yongs bzlos shing/ tshon gyi thig ni yongs su dgang/ /'di ltar bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshon spyi'i rim pa'o// //yang gzhan du na dkyil 'khor sgo gnyis pa kam
118b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa bya na rdo rje shugs kyi sngags zlos shing/ dkyil 'khor rnams nam mkha' la 'degs shing/ bzhag par bsams la 'drug cing 'byung ba la sngags ni 'di/ /oM badzre be ga akra ma hUM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bris
118b5(rgyud 'grel): zin nas/ bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /khro bo'i sbyor ba byas la/ bgegs rnams bskrad pa dang bsrung ba bya'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngar dang phyag rgya bkug la bgegs bskrad cing/ rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje'i dbus su lha'i 'khor lo bzhugs
118b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bsam zhing/ oM e dye haM b+ha la? b+ha ga bAn mahA kA ru Ni ka driShtha ho sa ma ya stwaM sa ma ya stwaM ma haM zheS brjod do/ /'khor lo rims bzhin du bsgoms pa bzhin du/ phyag mtshan dang/ sku mdog dang gos dang rgyan dang ldan ba bcug cing me tog la sogs pas
118b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ lha'i sngags re re bzlas/ gtso bo'i sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ de nas byin gyis brlab pa dang dbang bskur ba bya ste/ snying ga las byung lan mkha' la bzhugs su gsol lo/ /yang rnam pa gzhan du na snying gar bzhag ste/ rnam par snang
119a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyi rnal 'byor du byas la/ me tog gi phreng ba blangs te/ oM A:hUM zhes bzlas zheng dkyil 'khor gyi gnas nyid du/ g.yas g.yon nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ khro po'i lta bas lta zhing/ dril bu dkrol la lan bdun bskor?
119a2(rgyud 'grel): te/ bcom ldan 'das la phreng ba dbul bar bya'o/ /rdo rje gar bya zhing bskol nas slar phreng ba slangs te/ rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rdo rje slob dpon mnyam par bzhag pas/ shar dang lho dang nub dang byang du kha bltas la yi dkyil? la
119a3(rgyud 'grel): lo'i sgo dbye bar bya ste/ de'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di yin no/ /rdo rje mdzub mo legs par ni/ /sbyar la bsdams te bdan nas su/ /rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni/ /sgo dbye ba'am chog yin no/ /oM badzra uta g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra ba sha ya hUM/ 'di ni
119a4(rgyud 'grel): sgo dbye ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rang gi lus gzugs brnyan gyi rnal 'byor byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang/ dbang du byas la bsgrub par bya ste/ de'i rim pa ni 'di'o/ /dang por rnam par snang
119a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyi rnal 'byor du byas la/ /oM dzi na dzika A karSha ya dza:?zhes bya ba dbug cing/ sangs rgyas kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dgyes shing nam mkha' khyab par
119a6(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par bya zhing/ rang rang gi gnas su bzhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa dang brtan par 'gyur ro/ /rang
119a7(rgyud 'grel): dang rnam par snang mdzad dang gnyis su med grogs ltar gyur/ /de ltar sgo ba sogs pa la dza:hUM baM ho:zhes bya bas dgug cing/ sgo ba rnams bzhugs su gsol lo/ /de ltar rnam par snang mdzad dang gnyis su med par rnal 'byor du byas ste/ rang gi
119b1(rgyud 'grel): snying ga nas 'od zer byung bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsal bar bya ste/ sngar gyi snying ga'i lha dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha so sor thim par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu gtso bo'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /'khor rnams kyi bdun
119b2(rgyud 'grel): bdun no/ /snga ma bzhin dum pas phyag rgya bzhis gdab par bya ste/ de tsam gyis dkyil 'khor 'grub po/ /de nas gtso bo'i snying po bzla zhing/ dkyil 'khor las 'od zer 'phros bas sems can gyi don byas te/ slar leg par rang gi gnas la
119b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs par bsgoms te/ oM baM d+ha badzra pra ti tiSh+Tha/ zhes rdo rjes bcing ba bsdams te/ oM badzra muSh+Ta'i? paM zhes bya bas brtan par bya'o/ /de nas mchod yon la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du rnam par
119b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i bum pa la sngags bzlas/ rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya 'am/ /gtso bo'i phyag rgya byas te/ me tog gi phreng ba blabs te/ sngags 'dis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa mdun du bzhag ste/ phreng ba bcing bar bya'o//
119b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni oM ma hA su kha badzra e a mo g+ha sa ma yi? ta ka sid+d+hi a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba mu kha sa ma na syama da da ku ru ku ru dza:hUM baM ho:zhes bya bas bum pa gnas su bzhag par bya/ bum pa phyi ma rnams la yang rang gi mtshan ma btab la/ spyi'i
119b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di lan bdun bdun bzlas te/ sngags ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra d+ha ka hUM zhes bya'o/ /so so'i sngags kyis btab ste rang rang gi gnas su bzhag par bya'o /de nas mchod yon la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lnga bya/ oM bai ro tsa na
119b7(rgyud 'grel): argA pA tIts+tsha swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang/ o so'i sngags lnga dang mchod pa dbul/ de nas snying ga nas 'od zer phyud ste/ lA sne? la sogs pa bcu drug bskul nas dkyil 'khor la mchod par bsam mo/ /spyi'i lha mo'i sngags ni 'di yin te//
120a1(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA hA sa lA sya ra ti kri Ta sau khya a nut+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra sAr Na sa ? hUM zhes bya ba brjod do/ /de nas las thams cad pa'i bum pa'i chus gnas thams cad gsang gtor bya/ /de nas lha bshos dang/
120a2(rgyud 'grel): khur ba sna tshogs dang/ 'bras chen dang/ btung ba'i bye brag la sogs pa mchod pa'i dngos po ci 'byor ba yi ge oM A:hUM gtso bo'i sngags kyis btab ste/ dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas oM bai ro tsa na pu ra pu ra a pa ra ta ya ho/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis
120a3(rgyud 'grel): lha thams cad labs dbul la/ /de nas yang 'byo tshad kyis bla re dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mchan dang/ 'phan la sogs pa yang mchod pa'i phyir lha rnams la dbul lo/ /glu dang/ gar dang rol mo dang/ rtsed mo dang/ dga' ba la sogs
120a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya'o/ /de nas oM A nutA ra sarba pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra ga ta sngar haM maM ga ga na khaM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags lan bdun ba byor?  pas mchod ? gyur
120a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ lha rnams gnyis shing byin gyis brlob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas nyes pa che chung rnams med par bya ba'i phyir/ dril bu dkrol zhing yi ge brgya pa lan bdun brjod cing/ dkyil 'khor lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ rts ba'i sgor stan pa'i?
120a6(rgyud 'grel): la 'dag ste/ ting nge 'dzin la khams? shing bzlas pa brgya'am sbyor ci nus brjed la brtan par bya ste/ gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ sems can thams cad gyi ngon gyi phyir/ thugs rjes dngos grub stsal du stsol/ /de nas bsgrub pa'i tshogs
120a7(rgyud 'grel): po dkyil 'khor du bzhag la/ rang nyid sgor 'dug nas khro bo 'di rgyal bskyed de/ snga ma bzhin du gtor ma btang ngo/ /de nas nyes pa rnams sbyang ba'i phyir/ rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du bya ste/ las thams cad pa'i thab bud byas nas mar
120b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i sreg rdzas kyis/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon lus bkrus la dris byugs la gos sna tshogs bgo ba dang/ me tog gi phreng ba bcing ba dang sug smel la sogs pa dri bzang po yang bca' o/ /slob dpon rang nyid dang bsgrub pa'i grong? ?
120b2(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa dang ? med la sogs pas gang dang glu dang bkra shis dang rol mo'i cha byad rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de ltar byas pas sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /shin du thugs dgyes? pas spyan
120b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes shing byams pa dang/ snying rje'i shugs kyis bdag dang slob ma'i chogs rnams la dgongs shing/ gzigs par gyur nas/ bka' drin skyob po/ /de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis lha'i rnal 'byor du byas la/ ci bde bar gnas par bya'o/ /dkyil
120b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor spyi'i cho ga rdzogs so// //de nas slob ma gzhugs pa'i cho ga bya ste/ slob dpon bdag nyid dang po dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa nas/ dbang bskur ba rdzogs kyi bar du bka' nyan? par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod par
120b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /'dod chags chen po kun 'byung ba/ /'khor lo de ni gzugs brnyan 'dra/ /slob ma'i don du grong khyer byas/ /de kho na nyid bden par brjod/ /de nas slob ma yol ba'i phyi rol tu bzhag ste/ snga ma bzhin du sdoms pa blangs la/ /gos dmar
120b6(rgyud 'grel): po bgos pa dang/ mig dang gdong g.yogs la las thams cad pa'i chus bsang gtor byas la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /ka stwaM su ra ta pri yam/ slob mas 'di skad lan gdab par bya'o/ /su b+ha g+ho haM ma hA su kha/ de nas shar? gyi
120b7(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhag? ste/ sngags 'di brjod cing phyag byed cing phyag byed du bzhug go /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bai ro tsa na pU jo pastwa nA ya At+ma naM nI ra ya ta yA mi/ bai ro tsa na a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM/ zhes byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya zhing snying gar rdo rje 'di
121a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag ste/ sngags 'di smra bar bya'o/ /oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta utpA da yA mi su ra ta sa ma ya stwaM/ a haM itd+ha? brgya? ya tha su kha zhes brjod do/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la lag tu
121a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ de nas sngags 'dis bsrung bar bya'o/ /na mo ratna tra yA ya/ oM baM ro tsan sa pa ri bA ra rak+Sha sa dra ye b+hya:stwahA/ de nas 'di skad brjod de/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur rgyas khyod kyis de ba ni ?
121a3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar mi bya zhing/ dad pa med pa rnams la yang ma yin no/ /de nas khro bo gshin rje gsheng la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bkug ste bzhag nas sbom pa 'dzin du bzhug ge der khyod ba
121a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis ngas khyod la rdo rje'i ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'grub pa thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas/ khyod kyiS
121a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba su la yang ma ? zhig/ khyod dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ta re/ snying gar rdo rje bzhag ste/ oM 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste /khyod kyi snying la rab tu gnas/ /gal te gzhan zhig la smras na/ /khyod kyi snying las 'byung bar
121a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas dur chos bzang po'am nya phyis la sogs pa'i nang du chu blugs la yi ge gsum gyis spar bar bya ste chu blud par bya'o/ /'di skad brjod da/ 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed daM tshig bsrungs
121a7(rgyud 'grel): dpe ? rtse ? ka Tha Tha Tha zhes brjod do/ de nas dam tshig brtan par gyur na /slob ma la 'di sk+kad bsgo ste/ /ded phan chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje da yin gyis/ /ngas 'di phyos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so/ /khyod kyiS?
121b1(rgyud 'grel): pa la brnyas par ma byed cig /yang bam spangs pas byas nas/ dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la/ de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bangs par
121b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor du byas la/ de las 'od zer byung bas slob ma'i snying gar yi ge raM laS me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa/ de'i phyi rol tu yaM? las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chud pa/ gru gsuM
121b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi nang du yi ge hUM las rdo rje dmar po/ /spyi bor yi ge oM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa 'khor bar bsgom mo/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bya ste/ 'di skad smra'o/ /oM a be sha tu te sha d+he badzra g+ha mA nut+tA raM zhes brjod do/ /de nas spos la yin brgya rtsa brgyad
121b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas la me la bor te/ bskor zhing slob ma'i lag tu bzhag nas me tog gi phreng ba yang byin la nga rgyal yang bskyed da sngags 'di smra'o/ /oM be ro tsa na ya bai sha d+hu na d+hu na/ kaM pA ka pA kaM pA bab ? b+hi na pa ya bai ro tsa na swA hUM?/ /zhes bya bas babs nas/
121b5(rgyud 'grel): lce la a dmar po bsams te/ kye rdo rje rung bam mi rung smos shing ces bya dang/ legs nyes kun smra bar 'gyur ro/ /oM b+ha ga bA na bai ro can a be sha tiSh+Tha badzra dri Dho me b+ha ba sha shwa to me b+ha ba h+rid yam me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba sid+d+hi me pra ya ts+tsha sarba karma su tsa me/
121b6(rgyud 'grel): tsit+taM sh+re ya:ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho:zhes brjod do/ /me tog dkyil 'khor du dbul zhing sngags pra tIts+tsha ho/ /slob dpon gyis phreng pa blangs slob ma'i mgo la stobs po che 'di long zhig byas la bcing bar bya/ de nas sngags 'dis gdong g.yogs dkrol par
121b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /oM bai ro tsan sa man ta tiSh+Tha /tsak+Shu phra Dan ta ra pa ra mung g+ha Ta ya te/ sarba ark+Sha badzra tsak+Shu a nut+ta raM/ zhes brjod la gdong g.yogs bkrol te mig la oM re re dang/ snying gar gtso bor bsam par bya/ /de ltar 'bab par ma gyur na/ de naS
122a1(rgyud 'grel): de'i snying gar hUM 'bar pa dmigs la/ /rang nyid rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi nga rgyal bskyed la/ de nyid kyi sngags kyi phreng bas dbab par bya ste/ na ma:sarba ta thA ga ta b+hyo/ oM ta Ta ta Ta/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sngags 'dis dbang par bya/ /de nas slob
122a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyis slob ma la kye rdo rje zhes pos la/ ltos shig ces bsgo bo/ /dkyil 'khor dbus nas sgo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bstan par bya'o/ /de nas slob mas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa byed du bcug la/ de nas slob dpon phyag lan gsum du byed
122a3(rgyud 'grel): du gzhug go /dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor la smon lam btab nas/ rdo rje slob dpon la phyag lan gsum byas la yon gyi mchog dbul bar bya ste/ ba dang/ ba lang dang/ rta dang/ chung ma dang/ bran dang/ gser dang/ dngul bar/ rin po che dang/ sa
122a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhi dang/ grang dang/ nor dang/ ma he rnams dbul bar bya/ bdag dang bu dang chung ma dang/ yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs pas/ /slob dpon mnyes par gyur pa ni/ /las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga'o/ /shin tu
122a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i gzhung 'di nyid/ /rdo rje slob ma gsol bya ste/ de nyid la ni g.yon gyi mchog /dam pa phul nas gsol ba gdab /ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal po la/ /rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur ltar/ /yon tan ldan pas brtse? dgongs nas/ /dbang rnams bdag
122a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ? du gsol/ /de nas slob dpon gyis snod du rung bar dgongs nas/ dad pa dang sngags mkhas par mthong nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /dang por rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa rnams las dung por ? po'i nang du cha bsdus ta/ de nas rnam par snang
122a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyi sngags kyis snying ga'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyis nam mkha' las lha mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa gser gyi bum pa thogs su 'byung bas/ dbang bskur bar bsam zhing rang gis kyang dung bor kyi chu 'dis spyi bor blugs shing sngags
122b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di brjod par bya'o/ /om badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes dru'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas dbu rgyan la sangs rgyas lnga bsgoms la/ dar dbyings dang bcas pa lag tu thogs te/ snga ma bzhin du lha mo rnams kyis dbang bskur zhing/ sngags ? la dbu rgyan
122b2(rgyud 'grel): bcang par bya'o/ /oM badzra ba ra da ka badzra ra li ho/ /de'i steng du rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags bzlas pa'i/ /me tog gi phreng ba bcing bya ste/ 'di ni dbu rgyan dang phreng ba'i dbang ngo/ /de nas rdo rje gzung la slob ma'i lag pa gnyis kas gzung la/
122b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang gis ni/ /khyod ni deng 'dir dbang bskur 'gyur/ 'dis ni sangs rgyas de kun nyid/ /rab tu 'grub phyir rdo rje long/ /'di ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo/ /de nas lag tu rdo rje dril bu blangs te sngags 'dis/ oM badzra a d+hi pa ti stwaM/ a bi Sha ny+tsa
122b4(rgyud 'grel): si tiSh+Tha? badzra sa ma ya stwaM/ zhes bya bas dril bu lag tu byin la 'di skad brjod do/ /dral bu sangs rgyas kun gyis dngos/ dkrol ba'i sgra ni shes rab nyid/ /khyod kyis brtan par gzung bar gyis/ /byang chub mchog ces sangs rgyas gsungs/ /dang sa
122b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /dam pa'i dngos bo med par 'gyur/ /'di ni bdag po'i dbang ngo/ /de nas spyi bor lag pa bzhag la dbang bskur te /oM badzra sa twaM a b+hi
122b6(rgyud 'grel): Shi nya mi ? na ma ya b+hi she ka ta/ kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ra/ /de nas rdo rje brtul zhugs bya ste/ lag par rdo rje blangs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ rdo rje sems dpa' lag na 'dug /khyed kyis rtag tu bcing par
122b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /slob mas rdo rje'i rtse mo nas gzung nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o /oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha/ /oM Sha ? d+ha ra yA mi/ badzra sidwa hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje dka' thub po/ /de'i dbang
123a1(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'i sngags pas las ci byas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'di dag kun ni rigs pa'i dbang bskur ba yin no/ /sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang sbyin bar byas te/ mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'bab?
123a2(rgyud 'grel): stsol cig /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid/ /ces bya ba'i bar gyis gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng seng+ge'i khri byas pa'i steng du ras la sogs pa'i stan pa ting la/ de'i steng du slob ma bzhag la/ bgegs gzhom pa'i phyir sngagS
123a3(rgyud 'grel): bzla zhing/ slob ma shar gyi sgor bcag par bya ste/ sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la dbang bskur ba'i yo byang rnams bsogS te/ dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas lag pa gnyis su rang gi mtshan ma 'khor lo dang/ pad+ma /dang /ral gri sbyin
123a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya zhing 'di skad brjod? par bya'o/ zhing? dang rgyas pa dang/ dbang la sogs pa dang /dbral ba dang/ gzhig pa dang/ bsad pa dang/ dbyung ba dang/ dgug pa la sogs pa las thams cad de ring phan chad gyis shig /mdor na 'jig rten thams
123a5(rgyud 'grel): cad du/ /sems ? phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyis/ /'di ni 'khor lo'i dbang po/ /de nas me long bstan la/ chos kun gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing dang la rnyog pa med//
123a6(rgyud 'grel): brdung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kyu tu byung/ /ngo bo nyid med gnas med par/ /de ltar chos 'di shes nas su/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye/ /de nas ho zhes bya bas mda' gzhu byin la/
123a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o/ /phyogs bzhir mda''phen du gzhug cing /stong 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug go/ /de nas rin po che 'am gser gyi thur ma thobs la/ slob ma'i mig gnyis su pra bkod
123b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ thur ma des mig byugs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /ling tog rgyal ba das bsal mdzad/ /oM badzra Na tra a pa ha ra pa Ta laM
123b2(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): de nas su byin la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ de ring phan chad 'jig rten la/ /skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/ /kun tu ma lus gang bar gyis/ /de nas sems dpa' i rdo rje lag tu phyin la/ ? dang ci sems can
123b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ ci dga' bar ni 'grub bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba yi/ /long zhig rdo rje grub pa'i phyir/ /grub pa chen po khyod kyi las/ bdud rnams chen po 'dul bar gyis/ /ral gri mig sman la 'og dang/ /shing lham dang ni mgu ling gi/
123b4(rgyud 'grel): lha? dang gnod sbyin mo grub dang/ ji ltar 'dod pa grub par gyis zhes bsgo/ de nas slob dpon rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor du byas la/ mdun na slob ma gnas/ sna bug g.yas pa nas nang du bcug la/ 'od zer gyis dag par sbyar nas sna
123b5(rgyud 'grel): bug g.yon pa nas phyir byung la mdun du bzhag ste lung bstan par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur g.yon pas snying gar chos gos kyi mdza' ma 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i tshul du bya'o/ /oM 'di ni bas
123b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod lung bstan pa/ /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ srid pa'i mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro dag las bton/ /kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa/ satwa sa yastwaM b+hur b+hu ba swa /zhes gang lung bstan par byas nas/ de la rdo
123b7(rgyud 'grel): rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa rang rang gi dam tshig mgrin gcig tu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su lung ston
124a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /zhes slong ma la bsgo bar bya'o/ /de nas sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la/ rgyal po'i dbang gis tshul gyis dung dang/ rnga pa Ta ha dang/ rnga bo che dang /? thams cad dag glu dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pa thamS
124a2(rgyud 'grel): cad slob ma'i ba spu'i bu gar sprul pa'i tshul du zhugs nas/ yid du 'ong ba'i glu dang/ sngags brjod cing tshig 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /rdo rje dbang bskur chen po yi/ /khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa/ /dam tshig gsum gyi gnas las byung
124a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyis stsol bar mdzad/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM su pra te Sh+Tha? badzra swAhA/ de nas bkris ? brjod par bya'o/ de nas chos go rnaMs bton te/ ? paS mchod/ /mchod phyir gang du du bcang bar bya/ /de nas bla ma bdag nyid kyis
124a4(rgyud 'grel): de yi spyi bor gdugs kyang gzung/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug /spyi po btung de phyag 'tshal gzhug /slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags/ /gsang sngags rgyud ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub
124a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis bkur 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la snying rtse'i phyir/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin//nan tan bskyed de bri bar gyis /bsgrub bya kun kyang rgyud la sbyor/ /khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang/ sems
124a6(rgyud 'grel): can kun la mi phan pa /nyam pa chen por gyur kyang ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o/ /de nas gtso bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ /phyag rgya slob ma la sbyin par bya'o/ /phyag rgya khyod la byin gyis brten par gyur cig /bdag gi phyag rgya blangs ba brtan
124a7(rgyud 'grel): par gyur/ de bzhin ? slob dpon gyis slob ma la lha'i sngags dang/ man ngag dang/ phyag rgya bzhi yan bstan cing gnyi gas sngags bzlas shing/ /slob dpon gyis 'di skad? bsgo bar bya/ /khyod kyis phyag rgya la sogs pa mi shes pa su la yang ma
124b1(rgyud 'grel): smra zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la/ phyag rgya la sogs pa bstan na/ skye bo dang pa med pas ? byas na nad kyis btab ste/ dus ma yin par shi nas dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur la/ bstan pa'i rgyus rang nyid kyang dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas /
124b2(rgyud 'grel): dbug dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste/ ji ltar zhugs pa'i slob ma rnams/ /dkyil 'khor mthong bas sgrib pa 'byad/ /de ring sangs rgyas rigs su ni/ /khyed rnams skye bar the tshom med/ /de'i 'og tu dam tshig sbyin bar bya ste/ dngos grub dam mig sbom pa'i/ /
124b3(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya /rdo dril bu'i phyag rgya dang/ /byang chub sems ni btang mi bya/ /gnod pa byed la byams sems bskyed/ /rdo rje spyan la bsnyen bkur bya/ /dang ba can la smad mi gang shlau? ni smad mi bya zhab la spyi bos phyag byas te/ /bla ma la ni yon yang dbul/ /dngos po
124b4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gang dang gang/ /bla ma mnyes phyir de la dbul/ /de bzhin bla ma de la ni/ /zad dang 'phangs pa med par dbul/ /bla ma de la brnyas mi bya/ /gal te brnyas par gyur na ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams la brnyas dang mtshungs/ /de yi rnam smin myong bar ni/ /dang ma
124b5(rgyud 'grel): yin bar 'chi ba'i rkyen/ /glen dang dgra dang rkun po dang/ /de bzhin gdon dang rims kyis thebs/ /rgyal po chad dang 'phra med dang/ /me dang chu dang rtag tu dug /bgegs dang bar chad sha 'khon gnyer/ /shi nas dmyal bar ltung bas 'gyur/ /sems ni khre
124b6(rgyud 'grel): bar ma bya zhing/ /nam yang shes rab nyams mi bya/ /bstir med dmyal ba bskrad pa'i gnas/ /de nyid 'dir ni bzlog par bshad/ /nges na bla ma smed pa bsdam/ /thams cad sdom pas yongs su bzung/ /rdo rje slob dpon chen po ni/ /gtsang zhing gus dang dag
124b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dge/? nam yang mi mnyes mi bya'o/ /rang gi dngos po de la phul/ /bla ma phung du rtag tu bya/ /gal te nyes pa byas na ni/ /che ba'i rims ni mi bzlog ltar/ /de bzhin 'gyod bshags sbyangs te bsdams/ /khyod kyis rtag tu dam tshig bsrung/ /'di ni dam tshig 
125a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa'o/ /de'i 'og du ji ltar zhugs pa'i slob ma rnams/ /bza' btung la sogs pas sems dga' bar byas ste gtang/ de'i 'og tu thab bur 'bum par snang mdzad bsam te/ rgyus pa'i tshogs mar gyi bsreg byugs brgya rtsa brgyad
125a2(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu zhi ba'i thab khung la rang dang slob ma dang/ rgyal po dang/ sems can thams cad kyi don du zhi ba'i cho gas mar gyi dgang blugs brgya phul te/ mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod de/ gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
125a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi gnas su 'dug la/ bskor pa dang mchod pa dang/ phyogs skyong la gtor ma sbyin pa dang/ phyag byas te mchod pa phul nas/ dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ smon lam btab cing/ snga ma'i phyag rgya bcingS
125a4(rgyud 'grel): shing bgrol bar bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu blangs la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol bar bsam shing/ ji ltar sprul pa'i 'khor lo rnams snying gar bsdus la/ a kA ro mu khaM
125a5(rgyud 'grel): par d+harmA dzA? /A dye nu tA ? traT ces brjod cing/ oM kri to b+ha sarba satwa ? dang tha yA tha nu ga gats+tsha tram bud+d+ha bi Sha yaM dun dbun pag zhes brjod cing/ bsrung ba bya zhing gtang ba byas tshon? rnams bsdus la chu chen por dor bar bya/ de nas oM badzra
125a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi la ya sarba kalpan b+hu d+ha b+hu rnas twen badzra d+ha ra ag ya a:hUM hUM zhes brjod bcing rdo rje phur pa 'byung bar bsam/ phyis seng lteng gi phur bu 'dis dbyung bar bya ste/ phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas la mdzub mo gnyis rtser bkug
125a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bar du bcug la dbyung bar bya'o// //de nas gtso po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dri chab bam 'o mas phur bu bkru zhing/ chu des bu ga dgang/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi ba'i lci bas byug/ /yo byang rdzas rnams thams cad ni//
125b1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon ngag gis bsdus nas su/ /bdag rang nyid kyis spyad par bya/ /slob ma rnams la bgor mi rung/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad ngag/ slob dpon bdag nyid dbang bar bshad/ /gal te slob mas spyad na ni/ dam tshig las ni nyams par
125b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas la 'dug ste/ /rang nyid dus thamS cad du lha'i ngo bo nyid du dmigs te/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba la sogs pa thams cad slob dpon dang/ slob mas ji ltar dam tshig las 'byung ba bzhin du mchod par bya
125b3(rgyud 'grel): zhig/ bza' par bya'o/ /slob dpon su ra b+ha dras/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi spyi'i rim pa zhal dang 'dra dam mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma sh+rE d+ha dra dang /lots+tsha ba dge slong rig pa gzhon nus bsgyur ba// //
125b4(rgyud 'grel): ngan song thams dang gongs su slob ba'i dkyil 'khor cher be'i sgrub thabs slob dpon thun? dgang ? pos mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sarba du ? ti pa ri sho d+ha na ma hA maN+Ta la sA d+ha no pe ka/ bod skad du/ ngan song thams cad yongs su spong ba'i dkyil
125b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen po'i sgrub thabs/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha tshogs dga' tshal rab tu yid 'ong ba/ /nor bu gser shing yal ga sogs/ /sman dang me tog bya mang skad 'byin/ /tshangs pa la sogs 'khor gyis bskor
125b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i tshos par lhan cig /gzhugs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngan song rnam par sbyong bar byed pa la sogs rtsa ba'i rgyud chen las/ btus te bla ma'i man ngag rim pa'i gzhung de deng 'dir bdag gis ni/ /mos dang gomS
125b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang gis sgrub pa'i rim pa de las mi 'gal ba/ /mun pa'i sgron ma bzhin du gsal bar 'gro ba kun la phan phyir bshad/ /nyams dka' ba'am gtsug lag khang/ /skyed tshal mchod rten lha khang sogs/ /de lta bu'i gnas dag ?
126a1(rgyud 'grel): bde 'jam glod la 'dug byas nas/ /rnam par dag pa mos pa yis/ /de yis nang gi khrus bya'o/ /spos dang ga bur gur gum gyis/ /bkrub phyi yi khrus su gsungs/ /dang por sngags pa bdag gi ngag/ dag par 'dod pas
126a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar bsam/ /mgrin pa'i bu gu stong pa la/ /yi ge h+ri las pad+ma bsam/ /lce la paM las bskyed pa yi/ /pad+ma 'dab gcig bskyed byas te/ /de steng yi ge a las ni/ /bskyed pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /hUM gis rdo rje rtse lnga bskyed/ /rdo rje lce
126a3(rgyud 'grel): spe thim byas nas/ /rdo rje lce zhes bya ba ste/ /sngags zlos mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/ /lag gnyis mdun du bzhag byas la/ /de gnyis dkyil du zla dkyil bsam/ /de steng yi ge hUM las ni/ /rdo rje rtse lnga bskyed byas te/ /shin tu mdog dkar de la gnang?
126a4(rgyud 'grel): thim pa rdo rje lag par bshad/ /lag pa'i rdo rje thim byas nas/ /phyag rgya gang yin bcing bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed nas/ /phyogs dang dra bar ba dang/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo thams cad kyang/ /mkhas par gyur pas rab tu bsgom/ /de nas
126a5(rgyud 'grel): stong dang snying rje pa nyis/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje dril bu g.yon phyogs nas/ /blangs la lag pa'i spong bzhag ste/ /rdo rje snyir rje byang chub ste/ dril bu stong pa'i bdag tu brtag /de ltar bdag gis bsam byas la/ /spyi bor bkrol te
126a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ro/ /de nas phab la lan gsum bkrol/ /de gnyis gcig gis gcig 'khyud de/ /rdo rje lan gsum gsor byas la/ /thugs kar brtan pa spyan drangs pa/ /dril bu'i sgras ni dgyes pa ste/ /de ltar bsams na nus pa skye/ /de nas 'gro la phan
126a7(rgyud 'grel): don du/ /mchog gI dngos grub sgrub pa'i phyir/ /dang por 'khor lo bzhag byas te/ /mkha' la dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de ltar byas 'og phyag lnga byas/ /spos dang me tog mar me dang/ dri dang lta bshos rnam lngas mchod/ /sdig pa bshags dang rjes
126b1(rgyud 'grel): yi rang/ /gsol ba gdab dang skyabs su 'gro/ /bskyed dang bskul dang lam bsgom dang/ /dkyil 'khor de la bdag gis kyang/ /sdog pa thams cad gzung bar bya'o/ /de 'og spos la sogs pa dang/ /sgeg mo la sogs brgyad kyis mchod/ /rgyud chen
126b2(rgyud 'grel): nang nas gsungs pa yi/ /bcu phrag gnyis kyis mchod pas mchod/ /gzhan yang lha klu la sogs kyis/ /bsti stang bla ma mchod cing brjod/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyis rab mchod nas/ /sangs rgyas pa la ni yon tan brjod/ /kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye sangs
126b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas/ /kye mang sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs/ /gang phyir ngan song bdag sbyangs nas/ /byang chub spyod pa nyid la bkod/ /de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha/ /thams cad thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /ngo mtshar skyes nas phyag 'tshal te/ /de yi med la
126b4(rgyud 'grel): ? snang 'gyur/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin rim pa 'dis/ /go rim bzhin du bsgom par bya/ /bdag gi snying ga'i dbus su ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor ni/ /nam mkhar bsgoms pa bsdus nas su/ snying

127a1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /snying gar dgug gzhug byas nas ni/ /rim pas dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /de ltar dang bskur ba tsam gyis/ /srid gsum sems can ma lus kyang/ /rgyal sras kun dang mnyam mthong nas/ /drin len tshul du mchod pa bya'o/ /chos
127a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings ye shes rnam par dag /rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /ting nge 'dzin lngar phyag rgya can/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun rig la'o/ /me long ye shes rang bzhin las/ /sems can ma lus thams cad kyi/ /ngan song cang spyod mdzad pa/ /phyag

127a6(rgyud 'grel): ? dang glu dang kar/ /thos dang me tog mor me dang/ /dri chab la sogs brgyar mchod pa/ /phyi nang lta mo phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sgo yaM khyas? sa kyin da bzhugs pa/ /byams pa la sogs bcu drug kyang/ /dang po dga' sogs sa gnas shing/ /'gro ba'i don la

127b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong/ /tshogs gnyis yongs bsags blo mi zad/ /stobs bcus yongs gnon sbobs pa brtsegs/ /mi shes ri 'joms mthu chen thob/ /gzung 'dzin kun byin ngan song 'dren/ /nyon mongs mun sel mya ngan 'joms/ /lha yi gzugs 'joms dra ba can/ lus

128a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur shA ri'i bu/ /'dri zhing lan len pa mchog rab ?/ /rdzu 'phrul rje ba mong+gal bU/ /khyim pa dang skyed 'char ga bzang /'phrul gyi spyan ldan ma 'gags pa/ /dam chos thos snga kau dzDnyi? /'dul ba 'dzin pa nye bar 'khor/ /spyod mdzes bdud
128a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dul rta thul ba/ /ting 'dzin dbang thob pa lang bdag /zham 'bring rtag mdzad kun dga' bo/ /shAkya'i skra 'dreg ming tshan to/ /bslab pa kun 'dzin nor sbyin 'dzin/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan ldan gang po/ /zhal ta'i sku bgres pa 'ong srungs/ /bslab sbyangs yon

128b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod/ /nyon mongs g.yo med mi g.yo mgon/ /dbang gi rang bzhin rta mgrin rgyal/ /phrin las rang bzhin ral gri dang/ /pad+mao bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du/ /mu ngan dkar po'i nang nas pa/ /gling bzhi po ni/
