173b6(rgyud 'grel): b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya stwa /zhes bya ba 'dis bdag po'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas dril bu de nyid gnas gsum du dkrol bar bya zhing rang gi lha'i rigs la nye bar mtshon te/ ming btags par bya ba ni/ oM badzra satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa
173b7(rgyud 'grel): mi badzra nA ma a b+hi ? ka ta/ zhes byas la/ kye dpal che ge mo la zhes ming gdags par bya ste/ de dag ni rig pa'i dbang ngo/ /de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i bum pa bzhi dang/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa lngar/ oM bud+d+ha ka la
174a1(rgyud 'grel): sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badzra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ratna ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM karma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ zhes byas la bum pa'i dbang bskur bar
174a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs ba'i phyag rgya bcas la/ oM bud+d+ha mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badzra mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ratna mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa twAM/? oM pad+ma mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa h+ri/ oM karma mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ zhes bya ba
174a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas mu tig dang/ gser dang/ pad+ma ra ga dang/ mar ka ta dang/ sbug la sogs ba'am/ gzhan yang rigs dang mthun pa'i phreng ba rnams rang gi rigs kyi sngags/ oM bai? ro? tsa na oM/ zhes pa la sogs?
174a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snying po slob dpon dang slob ma'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbu gu nas bton la bzlas te/ oM bud+hA mA la a b+ho Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badzra mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ratna mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ oM pad+ma mA lA a b+hi Shiny+tsa h+rI?/ oM karma mA la a
174a5(rgyud 'grel): b+hi Shiny+tsa a /zhes bya bas phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas slob ma'i snying gar dri'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du mchog tu gyur pa'i dri yis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam pa lnga mngon du ? las
174a6(rgyud 'grel): thig le lA sku zhing/ oM bud+d+ha d+hA ra Ni i b+ha Shiny+tsa oM/ oM ratna d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM?/ /oM pad+ma d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa h+rI/ oM karma d+hA ra Ni a d+hi Shiny+tsa a/ zhes bya bas gzungs kyi dbang
174a7(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bya'o/ /de bkra shis pa'i rdzas thams cad kyi tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bkra shis bton la rin po che'i thur ma 'am gser la sogs pa'i thur ma thogs la mdun du 'dug ste/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig
174b1(rgyud 'grel): rten ling tog gsal? ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib thams cad rgyal pas bsal zhes brjod la/ oM ni tri a pa ha ra ba Ta laM h+ri zhes bya bas mig dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas me long blangs la chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste/
174b2(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung/ /ngo bo nyid med gnas med par/ /de ltar chas ni shes nas su/ /sems can don ni mnyam med
174b3(rgyud 'grel): byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye/ /de nas dril bu blangs nas dkrol la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /chos rnams nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor gyis/ /kun mchog mnyaM?
174b4(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du gsal/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par gyis shig/ ces brjod la/ ho zhes bya bas gzhu byin la phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi dang/ steng du gcig dang 'og tu gcig 'phen du bcug la/ lha'i bu'i
174b5(rgyud 'grel): bdud la sogs pa bdud thams cad kyi snying la bsnun te/ oM sarba ma re bid san hUM zhes bya'o/ /de nas yang me long byin la/ rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid ni/ /
174b6(rgyud 'grel): ? ni snying la zhugs/ /oM badzra satwa A zhes byas la/ gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje byang chub kyi sems ni 'di yin par shes par gyis shig/ ces brjod par bya'o/ e/de nas rkang pa gnyis kyi bar
174b7(rgyud 'grel): du gser gyi 'khor lo ? bas brgyad pa bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas par dung byin te/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /ded nas brtsams te/ byang chub sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig /de ring phan cad 'jig
175a1(rgyud 'grel): rten la/ /skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor/ /chos kyi dung? ni bla med kyis/ /kun tu ma lus gang bar gyis/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing/ /'dod pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /gsang sngags sdod? pa tshul
175a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la/ /phan 'dogs drin du bzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang/ /khyod la kun nas srung bar byed/ /oM badzra tsakra pra ti barti A/ badzra b+ho? Sha d+harma h+ri
175a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas dbang bskur bya'o/ /de nas bdud kyi dpung ma lus par 'joms pa'i glangs po la sogs ba'i rin po che bdun gyi rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya ste/ oM badzra tsakra ratna a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis
175a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig rnams bsgrag bar bya ste/ khyod kyis srog chags bsang mi bya/ /zhes bya ba'i rgyud las 'byung ba'i dam tshig rnams brjod bar bya'o/ /de nas oM bud+d+ha karma a b+hi ny+tsa oM/ /oM badzra karma
175a5(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM badzra ratna karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hI/ oM bi shwa karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ /zhes bya ba rnams kyis dbang bskur la/ khyod kyis dbus su song nas ni/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//
175a6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'phul ba sna tshogs kyis/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /zhes byas la/ lag tu 'khor lo sbyin bar bya'o/ /de nas lag tu rdo rje sbyin la/ /'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji
175a7(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'dul la sna tshogs kyis/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bskor bar gyis zhes bya'o/ /de nas lag tu rin po che byin la/ lho phyogs kyi sgor khrid de/ 'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba
175b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyis/ /nor bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi sgor khrig de lag tu pad+ma byin te/ 'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs
175b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /pad+ma'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas byang gi sgor khrid de lag tu sna tshogs rdo rje byin la/ /'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs kyis/ /las kyi chos kyi
175b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo skor/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang/ /bla ma smod brtson la sogs la/ /snying rje rab tu ldan pa yi/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni bsgrims te bsang/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bka' bsgrag
175b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ de dag ni slob dpon gyi dbang zhes bya'o/ /de nas slob ma'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la hUM las rdo rje bskyed la de'i lte ba la hUM gnas pa'i sbyor bas lus thams cad la khyab par gyur pa dang / des rnam par 'gyur
175b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lus de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur gyur pa rnam par smad mdzad chen po gnas pa dang/ gsang ba mchog gi phyag rgya khu tshur dam par bcings te/ ga bur gyi thig le lnga rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa'i rtse mo las gdang
175b6(rgyud 'grel): gi pad+mar gtang ba dang/ de'i snying gar chos dang zang zing thams cad mchog tu gyur pa'i rnam par snang mdzad bsams la/ oM bud+d+ha gu hya a b+ha Shiny+tsa oM/ /oM badzra gu hya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ratna gu hya a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma gu
175b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya a b+hi Shiny+tsa h+rI/ oM ? ? hya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a zhes byas la gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ oM pradz+nyo? pa ya mahA su kha a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ oM hUM trI h+rI a/ zhes
176a1(rgyud 'grel): byas la slob ma'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes rdo rje bla na med pa'i sku rnam par snang mdzad gangs chen mtsho bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' i gzugs kyis
176a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag la yid bzhin nor bu nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa'i sbyor bas slob ma la bde ba bskyed do/ /e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje ye shes mkha' 'dra ba/ /rtog pa thams cad bral ba ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'i sems nyid sku
176a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' rdo rje bla na med med bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ g.yon pas chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du rkang pa bzhag ste/ gdugs dkar po
176a4(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i yu ba dang bcas dang phul ste/ bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs su bsgoms pas/ slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /gang khyod kyi 'dir mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas lung bstan par byas pa
176a5(rgyud 'grel): las/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rin po che'i mdzod bla na med pa zhes bya ba na/ rigs kyi bu che ge
176a6(rgyud 'grel): mo zhes bya ba zhig /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhes bya ba dang/ gsang sngags 'di dang/ dkyil 'khor 'di zhes bya ba'i mthus mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
176a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes mgrin gcig tu lung bstan bar mdzad do/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta byA ka ra Na mi twi a mu ka nA ma ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi b+ha ba tu ga ti a ti ta ra na spa zhes bya'o/ /de nas gang khyod kyis thams cad kyi bdag tu
176b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i mchog tu sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mthu nyid kyi phyir mi ldog pa yin la/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyis na nges pa'i phud po la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu des pa'i
176b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir mi 'ong ba'i sangs rgyas yin la/ dus gsum ni mnyam pa nyid yin pas na da ltar byung ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes byas la dbugs dbyung bar bya'o//
176b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje blangs la de'i lag par gtad la snying gar lag pa gnyis las byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcas pa las/ e ma rdo rje sems dpa' deng nas khyod/ /yid ni rab tu dang ba'i rdo rje yi/ /rang gi dam tshig mi bzang bde la brten//
176b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i bde ba chung la sangs rgyas ni/ /kun dang 'dra mnyam rtag par khyod 'gyur te/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bzung bar bya/ /phyug na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /
176b5(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra satwa sa ma ya tiSh+Tha ye Sha twaM d+ha ra yA mi badzra satwa hI hi hi hi hUM zhes byas la rdo rje brtul zhugs 'dzin du gzhug go /de nas gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig brjod la slob ma de nyid la sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod
176b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstor de/ bla na med pa'i bsgrub pa chen po'i chos nye bar bstan par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bcu gnyis
176b7(rgyud 'grel): yongs su dag pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byin la ston zlar ba'i yar gyi ngo'i chos brgyad nas bzung la/ slob ma rnams kyis yongs su bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can dang thun mong du byas pas phyag rgya chen por 
177a1(rgyud 'grel): yongs su bsngos la/ sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs su gsol la/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad phyags la/ snan? ma rnams gtor ma chen po dang/ mchod pa'i
177a2(rgyud 'grel): ye? byad thams cad kyis mchod la/ chu bo? chen por dor bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor las thams cad pa'i thab khung byas la/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg 'bum du tshad bar?
177a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang/ yum gyi dkyil 'khor chen bor sbyin sreg stong du tshang bar bya ba dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying pos sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya'o/ /de'i rjes la phyogs spyod ba la sogs ba sems can thams cad la yang sreg lugs brgya
177a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa brgyad du tshang bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la rdo rje srung bas yongs su bsrungs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa la bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bris nas rab tu gnas par byas nas/ /gser la sogs pas
177a5(rgyud 'grel): dkris nas mtshon skud sna lnga'i skud bas dpung ba g.yas par gdags par bya zhing/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs chen po la yang mchod ston chen po dang sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po gang bar bya'o/ /ngan song kun sbyong dpal dang ldan/
177a6(rgyud 'grel): sdig sbyor? rgyal bo rgyud kyi ni/ /dam tshig thams cad bsdus pa las/ /dge ba dri med gang thob des/ /'gro ba skye bo'i chor kun dang/ /bdag gi dri ma kun sdangs te/ /rgyal bo kun gyi skur gyur ba/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par shog/
177a7(rgyud 'grel): yul sogs ? pa'i rdo rje slob dpon chen po/ /rdo rje go cha'i slob ma rdo rje slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying bos mdzad pa/ rnal 'byor chen bo'i rgyud dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs
177b1(rgyud 'grel): so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ki re Na ka ra ba ra dang/ lo tsha ba dge tshul khyung phrags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gnyen la phab pa'o// //dpal? ngan song
177b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad spyod ba'i ro'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa bzhugs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI sarba du rga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni be ta ho ma bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ /dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong
177b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ro'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngan song kun sbyor rgyal po
177b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te/ /ngan song kun sbyong rgyud kyi ni/ /ro sreg cho ga bshad par bya/ /'gro rnams snying las chung du yis/ /shi ba'i ro? la 'bang byas na/ /de ni mtshams med lnga byas kyang/ /rnam par grol bar the
177b5(rgyud 'grel): tshom med/ /de ltas de yi cho ga ni/ /dri med rgyud rnams thams cad las/ /rigs ni rnam pa bzhir bshad bas/ /de'i dbyi ba shes byas la/ /gtsug lag khang dang skyed mos tshal/ /mchod rten lha khang kun dga' ra/ /byang chub sems
177b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i gnas rnams dang/ /gzhan yang rang gi gnas rnams su/ /bsnyen pa la ni gnas byas la/ /dur khrod 'jigs pa spangs pa'i sar/ /ro yi sbyin sreg bya ba ni/ /rnal 'byor rig dang ldan pa yis/ /sa ni byin brlab la sogs pa//
177b7(rgyud 'grel): rim pa bzhin du byas ba ni/ /mchog tu dge zhing bkra shis 'gyur/ /de la dang por rnal 'byor ba snying rje chen po dang ldan ba rtog pa'i dri mas ma gos pa sems dpa' dang ldan pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du blo bskyed la//
178a1(rgyud 'grel): sa'i cho ga la sogs pa rim ba'i lha bzhin du byas te/ stegs bu khru nyi shu rtsa bzhi brtsigs la ba'i rnam lnga dang/ dri dang 'o ma dang/ byug pa la sogs pas legs par byugs la/ de'i dbus su ? ?
178a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa/ zabs su khru do pa'i khung bu byas la/ dri la sogs bas byugs te/ de'i mur na sor bcu gnyis pa bya'o/ /de'i steng thigs gdab par bya ste/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud phyi mar gsungs pa'i rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor
178a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po la thig gi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin 'dir yang go bar bya ste/ de la dang por khru gang lte bar go bar bya ste/ sor mo bcu gnyis ni 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs bcu drug tu bya'o/ /sor gnyis ni mu khyud du bya'o/ /sor mo bcu ni
178a4(rgyud 'grel): sgo? ru? bya'o/ /sor mo bcu ni rta babs su bya'o/ /sor mo drug ni phreng ba gsum du bya'o/ /de nas 'khor lo de'i lte ba la rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i ka ba brgyad dang ldan par bris la/ de dag gi dbus su pad+ma dmar po'i lte pa la ?
178a5(rgyud 'grel): ni oM? dkar po'i 'od zer dang ldan pa bri'o/ /shar du hUM dkar po bri'o/ /lho phyogs su traM ser po/ /nub phyogs su h+ri dmar po/ /byang phyogs su a ljang gu'o/ /de dag gi shar lhor ni lAM dkar po/ /lho nub tu mAM ser po'o/ /nub byang
178a6(rgyud 'grel): du hAM dmar po/ /byang shar tu tAM ljang gu bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i snying po pad+ma'i steng du rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ hUM dang/ dza dang/ ho dang/ b+hu dang/ tri dang/
178a7(rgyud 'grel): re dang/ d+h+ri dang/ haM dang/ h+raM? dang/ g+hi dang/ kruM dang b+ha? dang/ kaM dang raM dang/ k+ShaM dang/ saM rnams bri'o/ /de bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa'i snying po gu? rnams su/ /lAM dang/ mAM dang/ gI dang/ naM dang/ b+hu dang/
178b1(rgyud 'grel): su? dang/ A dang/ ga rnams bri'o/ /rta babs kyi khams su ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bskal pa bzang bo'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa bon pad+ma'i steng du/ su dang/ sa dang/ tsa dang/ b+ha dang/ dz+nya? dang/ ga dang
178b2(rgyud 'grel): b+ha dang/ a dang/ sho dang/ dza dang/ ma dang/ ku dang/ tre dang/ du dang/ dza dang/ si rnams pri bar bya'o/ /sgo rnams su ni dza(rgyud 'grel): dang hUM dang baM dang ho/ (rgyud 'grel): rnams bri bar bya'o/ /phreng ba lung? gyi phyi rol tu rnam
178b3(rgyud 'grel): bu sor gsum pa gcig la ni/ shar la sogs pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ i dang/ ya dang/ ba dang/ ku dang/ sa dang/ nga dang/ ba dang/ ra rnams bri bar bya'o/ /de'i phyi rol gyi snam bu la ni 'gro? ba ris drug gi dkyil
178b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rtsa? drug? pa byas la/ lha'i gnas su bdud rtsi'i bum pa gsum la su dkar po dang ldan pa dri bar bya'o/ /mi'i gnas su ni shing rta'i steng du ma ser po dang ldan pa gri bar bya'o/ /lha ma yin gyi gnas su ni ral gri'i ? mo la a
178b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/ /dud 'gro'i gnas su ni ri dang rdzing? bu'i steng du ti ljang gu dang ldan par bri'o/ /yi dwags kyi gnas ni me'i rtse mo la dre sngon po dang ldan par bri'o/ /dmyal ba'i gnas su ni shal ma ri'i sdong po'i rtse
178b6(rgyud 'grel): mo la ni nag po dang ldan pa bri'o/ /de nas 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba 'di nyid du re zhig so so'i skye bo'i khyim na gnas pa nyid kyi ro bsregs pa gsungs pas na/ /bung bu'i nang du ras? dkar po dris
178b7(rgyud 'grel): ? bas bka' la/ de'i steng de nyid du stan dang sngags dang bcas pa'i ro bzhag la/ de'i steng du pad+ma ka la sogs pa'i shing gru bzhi pa'i rnam par brtsig bar bya ba nyid do/ /de yang dang por ro gang yang rung ba la sbyor ba'i dus su/ shi
179a1(rgyud 'grel): nas zhag bdun lon pa srin bu la sogs pa shi ba dang/ rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid kyi snying gar ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM bsams la/ de gyur pas rdo rje'o/ /de dag yongs su gyur pa las/ bdag
179a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid khro bo stobs po che kha dog sngon po la zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rdo rje be con dang rnga yab 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yon pa gnyis na zhags pa dang/ /sprul? gyi rgyan cha? bdun dang ldan par
179a3(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ stang stabs dang bcas pas de la gnas pa'i bgegs bskrad par bya ste/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la ha na da ta pa tsa sarba bid+h+nan bid+h+nan? sa ya u tsuSh+ma? kro d+ha hUM phaT/ ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas lag ba nas gzung nas bslangs
179a4(rgyud 'grel): nas gnas dben par 'o ma dang dri chu dang bdag chal la sogs pa la bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer bskyed de/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te sarba du rga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni rA dza a tA thA ga tA ya a ra ha te samyaka sa bud+d+hA ya/ twa? dwa thA/ oM
179a5(rgyud 'grel): sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karmA A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swAhA/ /zhes pa'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas bkru bar bya'o/ /de nas yang ga bur la sogs pa'i dris byugs la khyam? pa la ni ras dkar
179a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i stod g.yogs? smad g.yogs su bcas pas dkres? la/ de'i snying gar a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la su dkar po'o/ /de gyur pa las yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'o/ /de rnams yongs su gyur pa las lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
179a7(rgyud 'grel): byin rgyan thams cad kyis yongs su brgyan pa spyi bo'i gtsug na nor bu rin po che 'bar ba dang ldan par bsam par bya'o/ /dge bsnyen la ni ras dkar pos stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs byas la/ mgo la me tog gi phreng bas brgyan te/
179b1(rgyud 'grel): lag ba'i gal mo snying gar sbyar la de'i snying gar zla ba la yi ge mu ser po/ /de gyud pa las utpa la ser po/ de dag yongs su gyur pa las de nyid bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal sku mdog ser po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan? pa
179b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag na utpa la dang skyabs mdzad bar bsam par bya'o/ /dge slong la sogs pa so so thar pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa rnams la ni chos gos dang sham thabs la sogs pa rang gi cha lugs kyis lags par brgyan pa lag pa g.yon pa lta ba
179b3(rgyud 'grel): khung du mnyam pa nyid du bya'o/ /g.yas pa skyabs mdzad du byas te/ de'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la h+ri dmar po/ de gyur ba las pad+ma'o/ /de dag yongs su gyur pa las de nyid bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa sku mdog dmar po bd bar
179b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i cha lugs can mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan par bsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon la sogs pa'i theg pa chen po rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la mngon par dpal? dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbang bskur ba rnams na ras dkar pos
179b5(rgyud 'grel): stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs su byas te/ dbu rgyan la sogs pa rgyan cha lngas nye bar brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ de'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la hUM sngon
179b6(rgyud 'grel): po/ de gyur ba las rdo rje rtse lnga ba'o/ /de dag yongs su gyur pa las de nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo je sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po/ /rdo rje rtse lnga pa dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ston ka'i zla ba
179b7(rgyud 'grel): gang ba lta bur bsams par bya'o/ /de dag gi dbang po yongs su dag pa'i phyir ni/ khrus byas pa'i rjes thogs su shing shun nam ras la sogs pa la pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa byas la/ tsan dan dkar pos legs par byugs te/ de'i lte ba
180a1(rgyud 'grel): la gur gum gyis/ oM sarba bida badzra A ba ra NA bi sho d+hA ya ha na hUM phaT ces bya ba bris te snying gar bag? chus glan bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du mig gnyis su ni oM sarba bida hUM zhes pa'o/ /rna ba gnyis su ni sarba rid h+ri/
180a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'o/ /sna'i rtse mor ni oM sarba bida a(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'o/ /ko kor? oM sarba bida trA ta/ zhes pa'o/ /dpral bar ni oM sarba bida oM zhes pa'o/ /spyi bor ni oM sarba bida hUM zhes pa'o/ /dpung pa gnyis su ni oM sarba bida sba? zhes pa'o//
180a3(rgyud 'grel): gru mo gnyis su ni oM sarba bida a zhas pa'o/ /long bu gnyis su ni oM sarba bida tra Da zhes pa'o/ /gsang ba la ni oM sarba bida phad? zhes pa'o/ /rked par ni oM sarba bida sha zhes pa'o/ /gtsug bud la ni oM badzra a ? ? dz+nyan sa ma
180a4(rgyud 'grel): ye hUM zhes pa'o/ /mchan 'og gnyis su oM bai? ro tsa na oM zhes pa'o/ /pad+ma gnyis su oM sarba durba ti pa ri sho d+ha ni hUM zhes pa'o/ /byin pa gnyis su ni oM ratna ke tu traM zhes pa'o/ /pus mo gnyis su ni oM? shAkya mu ne a
180a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /bol bor gnyis su ni oM tA Da? A gats+tsha zhes pa gdags par bya'o/ /de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa'i bdug pas gdug cing me tog gi phreng bas so so'i cha byad ji lta ba bzhin brgyan te/ 'gro ba thamS
180a6(rgyud 'grel): cad yongs su dag ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por yon dang bcas pas dbang bskur la so so'i rigs ji lta ba bzhin byin gyis brlabs te rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /de nas sreg gang gi nang du gnas par bya ste/ de la dge gnyen gyi sreg khang
180a7(rgyud 'grel): ? ? ? shing la sogs pas kha bkang la zhal zhal gyis mthas par bya ste/ de'i steng du seng ldeng gi shir za ma tog gi dbyibs lta bur brtsig par bya'o/ /dge slong la sogs pa'i khud bu'i grwa bzhir ka ba khru ra ba bzhi
180b1(rgyud 'grel): btsugs la/ de'i steng du sor mo bcu gnyis pa'i stegs brtsigs par bya'o/ /de nyid kha khyer dang ldan par bya zhing de'i 'og tu bla re dbug cing steng du dkar po'i shing mchod rten gyi dbyibs lta bur brtsigs par bya'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon
180b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i nyes brtseg tu brtsigs la/ steng du ni tsan dan sprul gyi snying po la sogs pa'i shing la gzhal yas khang gi dbyibs lta bur brtsigs la/ bar khang du dkyil 'khor bris la 'og tu 'dzag pa'i khung bur rdul? la sogs
180b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snod bzhag par bya ba nyid do/ /de nas de'i dbus su bzhag par bya ba ni dbang la sogs pa brdzogs par byas pa'i rjes la zhun mar la sogs pas bsgos pa'i stan nang tshangs can gyi steng du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyud pa bris? la/ de'i
180b4(rgyud 'grel): steng du rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ oM tiSh+ma? badzra sa ma ya straM zhes brjod cing bzhag bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du bde bar gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad btab pa'i ras kyis g.yogs la/ sreg khang gi phyi rol du me tog gi phreng
180b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ rin po che'i phreng ba la sogs pa bri bar bya ba nyid? do/ /de nas ye shes kyi sreg khang chen bor nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bag chags kyi dri ma ma lus bar sreg par bya ba dang/ ngan song rnams gsum gyi rgyud yongs su sbyar ba'i phyir
180b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ba snying rje chen po dang ldan pas/ srog? pa'i rdzas ma tog dkar po dang/ spos kyi phye ma dang/ zhun mar dang/ til dang/ yungs kar dang/ 'o thug dang/ 'bras chan dang/ 'bras yos dang/ mngar gsum dang/
180b7(rgyud 'grel): la du dang/ de ba ta dru dag ste/ de dag thams cad la ga bur dang gur gum la sogs pa'i dri zhim pos bsgos la/ rtsa ba'i sngags gong du smos pas mngon par bsngags te/ mdza' logs su bzhag par bya'o/ /de bzhin du yi shing
181a1(rgyud 'grel): dang tsan dan la sogs pa la sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa byas te/ rtsa ba zlum por bya/ rtse mo ral gri ltar byas la/ oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga ti he hUM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa ba tsa sarba da ta ga ti he? tuM hUM phaT/ oM sarba?
181a2(rgyud 'grel): ma tha sarba tIrya ga ti he tuM hUM phaT/ ces pa'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags la bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid sems can dang tshe 'das pa'i don du sems bla na med pa bskyed de khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyams par zhugs
181a3(rgyud 'grel): bas/ oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la sarba big+h+nan ha na ha na hUM phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM zhes pas phyogs bcur bgegs bskrad cing gnas dang rnal 'byor bsrung par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer spros pas nam mkha' i bar snang
181a4(rgyud 'grel): la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa spyan drangs la zhabs bsil dang/ 'thor 'thung dang gdan rnams phul te/ phyag btsal ba dang/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi
181a5(rgyud 'grel): rang ba dang/ bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba la sogs pa bdun rnam par dag par byas nas rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i sdom pa gzung ba la sogs pa byas la/ ting nge 'dzin rnams gsum gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnam
181a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum la mnyam par bzhag? nas rdo rje lcags? kyu la sogs ba'i rnal 'byor gyis ji?(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags kyis dgug pa dang/ bzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dgyes pa la sogs pas legs pa nyid du byas te/
181a7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa nyid du byas te/ me sngar bar bya ba ni rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer dpag tu med pa nam mkha' i phyogs su sbros te/ nges ye shes kyi me lha khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba sku mdog
181b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang zad khros? pa'i cha lugs nyid can la/ phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas ba gnyis na rdo rje dang zhags pa bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis na pad+ma dang/ sdigs mdzub mdzad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can/
181b2(rgyud 'grel): zhabs gnyis kyis gang zag de'i sdig pa gnon pa/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi me dpung chen po can cig spyan drangs la arg+has zhabs bsil phul la de rang gi mdun du bzhugs par
181b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /de nas las kyi me lha drang srong chen po spyan drangs te kha dog dmar ser phyag bzhi par skyes kham pa la zhon pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis phreng ba dang/ blugs gzar 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa gnyis kyis ril pa dang dgang gzar?
181b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ drang srong gi cha lugs can spyan drangs la/ me sbar bar bya ste/ zhun mar gzar bu lnga yam shing la blugs la/ oM ti pi shAkya rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ oM ha bya ka bya dzwa la raM swAhA/ /zhes brjod? la/
181b5(rgyud 'grel): me sbar? te gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas adna ye raM raM da ha da ha shI g+h+raM ku ru swAhA/ /zhes brjod la/ mar khu gzar bu gsum blugs par bye'o/ /de nas bde bar gshegs pa rnams snga ma'i sbyor bas spyan drangs la/ /thugs rje chen po rgyan
181b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni/ /sems can thabs? la mgon byed pa'i/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs su gsol/ /zhes brjod la/ mchod yon gyis zhabs bsil te/ 'thor 'thung la sogs pa byas la/ mchod pa'i
181b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod par bya ste/ de nyid kyi lag pa na snod dang ldan pas dbul bar bya ba nyid do/ /de nas sreg rdzas thams cad ye shes kyi me lha khro bo chen po la/ /mchog sbyin ba'o phyag rgya chen pos/ oM a mri te
182a1(rgyud 'grel): a mri to dab+ha? be a mri ta bi kran te ga ni nI swAhA/ /zhes pas rdzas thams cad bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs te/ oM tri lokya bi dza ya ha bya ka bya di bya a d+hi bya shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA zhes pas lan gsum du dbul bar
182a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas dkon mchog gsum la oM na mo dud+d+ha ya sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ na mo d+harmA ya sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): saM g+hA ya sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA zhes rdzas thams cad lan gsum dbul bar bya ba nyid
182a3(rgyud 'grel): do/ /de nas me lha nyid la oM agne ye sarba bI? ShinA tha u pa da ba shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /zhes lan gsum dbul bar bya ba nyid do/ /de nas rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas bstod par byed na/ kho bo chen po bdud 'joms mi bzad pa//
182a4(rgyud 'grel): las dang nyon mongs khams sreg cing/ /ye shes gzi brjid spro mdzad pa/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa po /bsod nams rgya mtsho yon tan gzhi/ /
182a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dag pa 'dod chags bral ba'i rgyu/ /dge bas ngan song las sgrol? zhing/ /gcig tu don dam mchog gyur pa/ /zhi gyur chos la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /grol nas grol ba'i lam yang ston
182a6(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa dag la rab tu gus/ /zhing gi dam pa yon tan zhing/ /dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal bstod/ /tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras/ /mi lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /'byung po kun gyi mgon gyur pa/ /dge ba dri med phyag
182a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstos /ces yongs su bstod la/ me tog thogs te/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos sems can tshe 'das pa ming 'di zhes bya ba'i sdig pa ma lus pa zhi bar mdzad du gsol lo zhes las bcol bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du me lha'i rgyal po
182b1(rgyud 'grel): drang srong chen poS sa phyogs 'dir gnod par gyur pa'i gdon bgegs gnod pa dang/ 'tshe ba dang/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol lo zhes brjod de me tog dor bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang 'khor?
182b2(rgyud 'grel): du bcas pa rnams la mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod de/ lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg pa'i rdzas thams cad dbul bar bya ba ni/ oM be ro ce na oM sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni hUM sarba
182b3(rgyud 'grel): bA paM shan+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM ratna ke tu swa sarba pA baM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM shAkya mu ne a sarba pA baM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /oM tAta a gats+tsha sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /oM bud+d+ha lo tsa na sarba pA pa shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /oM sarba mA ma kI sarba bA paM shAn+tiM ku
182b4(rgyud 'grel): ru swAhA/ oM pad+ma paN+Da ra sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /oM karma tA ra sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /oM badzra satwa hUM sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /oM badzra rA dza dza sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra ra ga ho sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /oM badzra sa
182b5(rgyud 'grel): d+hu d+hu sarba pA paM shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ /oM badzra ratna traM sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /oM badzra sburya? raM sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra ke ru b+h+ri sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra hA sa haM sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /oM badzra d+harma h+ri sarba pA paM
182b6(rgyud 'grel): shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /oM badzra tak+Sha? sarba pA baM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra tsakra pru sarba pA po shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /oM badzra d+ha ba sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra karma kaM sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra rak+Sha sarba pA? paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM
182b7(rgyud 'grel): badzre ak+Sha kA sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra san ti ti sarba pA baM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra lasye hUM sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra mA le traM sarba pA paM shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ /oM badzra gI ti h+ri sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra ni ba?
183a1(rgyud 'grel): tya sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra d+hu pe d+hu sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra puShpe bu sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra A lo ke h+ri sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra gats+tsha? ga sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku
183a2(rgyud 'grel): ru swAhA/ oM badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra pA sha hUM sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra spho Ta baM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra sarba? ti ta(rgyud 'grel): sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM shu daM ga ma sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru
183a3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM tsan+d+ra pra b+hA sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM b+ha dra pA la sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /oM sa man+ta b+ha dra sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM dzA la nA sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM ga ga na dza ta du sti sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku
183a4(rgyud 'grel): ru swAhA/ oM badzra garb+ha? sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM a me ta b+hA sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM sarba sho ka ta nirga tA ya sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM dz+nyA na ke tu sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM akA ma ti sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku
183a5(rgyud 'grel): ru swAhA/ oM band+ha du ti sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM mi tre ya sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM sarba a pA ya dza hA sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM gand+ha ha sti sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru
183a6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes pas dbul bar bya ba nyid do/ /de nas yang rdo rje dril bu rol par ldan pas bstod par bya ba ni rdo rje snying gar gzung la/ dril bu gnas gsum du dkrol ba las/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rol pa'i phyag
183a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya rdo rje dang dril bu snying gar thal mo sbyar ba dang/ de nyid dgu dang/ snying gar gnas pa nyid kyis rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstod par bya ste/ rnam snang rdo rje chos dbyings sku/ /mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri steng na/ /ting 'dzin mchog gi phyag
183b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya 'dzin/ /phyag 'tshal rnam par snang mdzad la'o/ /brjid pa glang chen khri steng na/ /sa gnon chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad/ /me long ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /phyag 'tshal ngan song sbyong ba la'o/ /shugs chen rta yi khri steng na/ /mchog sbyin
183b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad/ /mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje rin chen la'o/ /mdzes pa rma bya'i khri steng na/ chos 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad/ /kun rtog ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /phyag 'tshal shAkya thub pa la'o/ /?
183b3(rgyud 'grel): lcing? chen po'i khri steng na/ /skyabs mdzad chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad/ /nan tan ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /phyag 'tshal me tog che rgyas la'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje las/ /rdo rje rigs rnams kun gyi yum/ /rdo rje ye shes sems ma'i ?//
183b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal rdo rje sbyin ma la'o/ /mtshan ma med pa'i rdo rje las/ /rin chen rigs rnams skyed mdzad pa/ /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur mchog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje bdag nyid la'o/ /smon pa med pa'i rdo rje las/ /pad+ma'i rigs rnams skyed
183b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ma/ /rdo rje gsang ba pad+ma'i mchog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dkar mo la'o/ /rdo rje mngon 'du mi byed las /las kyi rigs rnams bskyed mdzad ma/ /rdo rje mchod pa rab tu rtsom/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje sgrol ma la'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
183b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /rdo rje dang po kun tu bzang/ /phyag 'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o/ /rdo rje rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog /rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs/ /don yod rgyal po rdo rje gtso/ /phyag 'tshal rdo
183b7(rgyud 'grel): rje 'gugs khyod la'o/ /rdo rje chags pa bde ba che/ /rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa/ /bdud kyi 'dod pa rdo rje che/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje gzhu khyod la'o/ /rdo rje legs pa sems dpa' i mchog/ rdo rje mgu ba dga' ba che/ /rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rjes
184a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes khyod la'o/ /rdo rje rin chen rdo rje don/ /rdo rje nam mkha' nor bu che/ /nam mkha' i snying po rdo rje phyug /phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying khyod la'o/ /rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar? ba/ /rdo rje nyi ma rgyal
184a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje 'od zer gzi brjid che/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'od khyod la'o/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan sems can don/ /rdo rje mchog ni rnam dag pa/ /rdo rje chen po rin chen tog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpal khyod la'o/ /rdo rje bzhang pa
184a3(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba che/ /rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che/ /mchog tu ral dga' rdo rje ste/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje bzhad ba la'o/ /rdo rje chos rab de nyid don/ /rdo rje pad+ma mchog grub byed/ /'jig rten dbang rab rdo rje spyan/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la'o?
184a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnon po theg pa che/ /rdo rje ral gri mtshon chen po/ /'jam dpal rdo rje rab tu zab/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje khyod la'o/ /rdo rje rgya ni snying po che/ /rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po/ /rab skor rdo rje las byung baM/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying
184a5(rgyud 'grel): khyod la'o/ /rdo rje gsum pa rang rig mchog /rdo rje bzlas pa rab grub sbyin/ /mi gsung rdo rje mchog grub pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la'o/ /rdo rje las rab rdo rje'i dka' ?  las? kyi rdo rje kun grub pa/ /rdo rje nges par kun grub pa
184a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun khyod la'o/ /rdo rje bsrung ba brtan pa che/ /rdo rje ga chas bche/ /brtson 'grus mchog ni thub dka' ba/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs pa che/ /rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa
184a7(rgyud 'grel): tshe/ /bdud 'jams rdo rje mi bzad pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje drag khyod la'o/ /rdo rje mtshams sbyor rab tu 'dud/ rdo rje bcing par rab grol byed /rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig tshe/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje khu tshur la'o/ /rdo rje chags pas rab
184b1(rgyud 'grel): sgeg cing/ /rdo rje rol pa brtson byed pa/ /rdo rje snyan? grub 'gyid par ldan/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje sga? mo la'o/ /rdo rje rin chen phreng 'dzin cing/ /rdo rje dbang bskur kun 'gro ni/ /rdo rje sprin bzhin nor bu 'chang/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'phreng dag? pa'o/ /
184b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje pad+ma dbyangs mkhan ma/ /rdo rje sangs rgyas ngas par bskyed?/ /rdo rje chos don rab sgrogs pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje glu mkhan la'o/ /rdo rje gar mkhan bgying bag ldan/ /rdo rje phyogs 'dub? gzugS ldan ma/ /rdo rje las kyi 'khor lo sgrar?/ /
184b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal rdo rje gar ma la'o/ /rdo rje zla khan bod du 'phro rdo rje gdug pa bsil mdzad cing/ /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'dug pa'o/ /rdo rje me tog rab mdzes ma/ /rdo rje nor bu rdo rje don/ /rdo rje mchod pa
184b4(rgyud 'grel): bla na med/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje me tog la'o/ /rdo rje snang ba rab rib med/ /rdo rje sran ma dri med 'og /rdo rje kun tu mun sel ba/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje snang ba la'o/ /rdo rje dri ni byug dpar ldan/ /rdo rje tshul khrims mchog 'chad zhing/ /rdo
184b5(rgyud 'grel): rje sku ni rgyan mdzad ma/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje chab la'o/ /rdo rje dad pa srid pa che/ /rdo rje bde gshegs spyan 'dren cing/ /rdo rje shugs? kyis brtsun 'grus che/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje lcags kyu la'o/ /rdo rje dra ba don yod stobs/ /
184b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zhabs pas 'thug mdzad? pa/ rdo rje stobs ni 'jigs pa po/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje zhags pa la'o/ /rdo rje ting 'dzin rdo rje'i gtso/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog 'ching byed cing/ /rdo rje phyogs su rnams skrag byed pa/ /rdo rje phyag
184b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal rdo rje lcags? sgrogs? la'o/ /rdo rje shes rab mchog 'chang ba/ /rdo rje brtan pa rab tu 'joms/ /rdo rje sgra chen sgogs mdzad pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dril bu la'o/ /rgyal sras dpa' 'gro kun tu bzang/ /zla 'od bzang skyod kun
185a1(rgyud 'grel): tu bzang/ /sa bcu la ni gnas nas kyang/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rgyal sras dra ba nam mkha' mdzod/ /rdo rje snying po 'od dpag med/ /mngon dga' mchog tu dpal ldan pa/ /lho phyogs
185a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rgyal sras gdung sel ye shes tog/ blo gros mi zad spobs pa brtsegs/ /rnam dag chen po mchog 'chang ba/ /nub phyogs sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rgyal sras byams pa ngan
185a3(rgyud 'grel): song 'dren / spos kyi glang po don yod grub/ /bde ldan sangs rgyas skyong ba po/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ces yongs su bstod de/ me tog lag bar thogs te yi ge brgya lan gsum bzlas la
185a4(rgyud 'grel): bsreg rab? tu bor bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal ba zhes pa sku mdog dmar?
185a5(rgyud 'grel): sor rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'khor los sgyus ba'i cha lugs can/ skyabs mdzad kyi phyag rgya can/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa cig ting nge 'dzin gyis spyan drangs te/ ye shes kyi bsreg khang chen por spyan drangs te
185a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs su gsol la/ me tog lag par thogs te/ tshe 'das pa la snying rje chen po bskyed pas / e hye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA kA ru Ni ka dri sh+ya ho sa ma ya stwaM / zhes brjod la/ zhabs bsil dang/ 'thor 'thung dang/
185a7(rgyud 'grel): nye reg dang / gdan phul la/ mchod pa'i yo byang thams cad phul la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /bcom ldan gzi brjid 'od dpag med/ /ngan song thams cad kun sbyong pa/ /bde ba'i stobs
185b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan thams cad mkhyen/ /thugs rje chen po'i rgyun gyis ni/ /tshe 'das 'di la byin gyis rlobs zhes brjod la/ na mo b+ha ga ba te /sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni rA dzA ya a mu ka yaM badzra a d+hiSh+Tha na dz+nya na sa ma ye hAM zhes pa'i snying po
185b2(rgyud 'grel): de'i snying gar bsam par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid la bsreg rdzas thams cad la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du / na mo b+ha ga ba te sarba du rga ti pa ri sho d+he ni rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha ti samyak saM bud+d+ha ya tadya thA/
185b3(rgyud 'grel): oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma A ba Na bi shud+d+hye a mu ko sarba mA paM kle shak+Sha yaM ka ri shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyin sreg bya ba nyid do/ /de nas zhi
185b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phur bu dngul lam tsan dan dkar po la sogs pa'i shing la sor brgyad pa mgo bo rgya mdung du 'dug pa rtse mo zlum por byas te/ de'i ngos la bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa rnams bsams la/ oM badzra kI li
185b5(rgyud 'grel): klu la ya a mu kaM sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa gang zag de'i sdig pa'i tshogs la btag la / de nas yu ba can dun dkar po las byas shing mgo bo dngul la byas pa'i tho bzlum po khru gang ba byas te/ de'i steng du
185b6(rgyud 'grel): oM shaM pa te shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shi pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ /zhes pas brdung bar bya ba kho na'o/ /de nas yang me tog
185b7(rgyud 'grel): lag tu thogs te / yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod de/ bzong par gsol la mnyes par bya ba nyid do/ /de nas yang rang gi sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs skyar ba rnams spyan drangs nas rang rang gi gnas su bzhugs su gsol
186a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /tshangs pa chen po mchog gyur pa'i/ /'jig rten mgon po bdag nyid che/ /'di zhes bya ba'i sdig sbyar phyir/ /'bar ba'i khang par bsreg blugs bzhes /zhes brjod
186a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ zhabs bsil ba la sogs pas zhabs bsil la / bsreg pa'i rdza sa thams cad la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mchod sbyin chen po'i rgyag rgyas gzar bu snying gur thogs la / oM bra hA tA ye sarba u pa dra pa shAn+tiM? ku ru
186a3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /oM in+d+ra ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+ti ku ru swA hA/ oM Di Dha ri Sh+Ta ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ oM bi ru Dha kA ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ /oM bi ru pAk+Sha ya sarba u pa dri pa shAn+ti ku ru swA hA/ oM ba sh+ra
186a4(rgyud 'grel): ? la sarba u pra bra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM ? ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tim ku ru swAhA/ /oM ya ma ya sarba u pa dra pa shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ oM be ru Na ya sarba u pa dra ba shIn+taM? ku ru swAhA/ oM ku be rA ya sarba yul dra ba ?
186a5(rgyud 'grel): ku ? swahA/ /da ru dA ya sarba u pa dra pa shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ oM ag na yo sarba u ba dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ o rAk+Sha sa sarba u pa dra la shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ oM ba ya bya sarba u pa dra pa sh'n+ti ku ru swA hA/ oM tsan dra ya sarba
186a6(rgyud 'grel): u pa dri ba/ ? ku ru swA hA/ oM a nI tA ya sarba u ba dra ba shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ oM b+hu mi pa ti sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ oM re bI ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ zhes brjod pas dbul bar bya nyid do/ /de ?
186a7(rgyud 'grel): yang rang gi sa bon las 'od zer spros pa las skye ba rnam pa bzhis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad bkug la rang rang gi gnas su gzhag la ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /hUM lha klu gnod sbyin srin po mi'am ci/ /dri
186b1(rgyud 'grel): za nam mkha' lding lha min lus srul po/ /mi 'i ci dang yi sngags dur 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang dbyal ba la sogs pa'i/ /'gro drug sems can skye bzhis bsdus pa rnams/ /'di zhes bya ba'i rnam smin sbyar srung bu/ /rang
186b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gnas su lhag pa'i bsam pas mnos/ /zhes brjod de/ bsreg pa'i rdzas thams cad la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du / de'i bag chags dang rnam par smin pa sbyar ba'i phyir bsreg par bya ste / bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag
186b3(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par byas la/ sngags 'di dag brjod do/ /oM A:hUM/ a ma su ti bre na ya sarba satwa ya a mu kaM sarba karma shAn+ti ku ru swAhA / oM A:hUM a ma su ti pre na ya sarba satwA ya a mu kaM sarba kasmA?
186b4(rgyud 'grel): A ba ta NA shAn+ti ku ru swA hA/ oM A:hUM a ma su ti pre na ya sarba statwA ya a mu kaM pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsreg par bya'o/ /de nas gtor ma rnams la rnal 'byor chen po'i ting 'dzin
186b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis gtar ma byin gyis brlabs la phyogs skyong rnams la byin te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis dngos po rnams bsgyur la tshim par gyur pa dang / ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /'jig rten rnams kyi mes po mche ba
186b6(rgyud 'grel): kha dog ser po spyi lugs 'dzin/ /bder gshegs bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /tshangs pa chen po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par rgyal pa'i khang bzang na/ /mdog dkar shes rab ral gri can/ /chos kyi chab srid gsal mdzad pa
186b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi brgya byin phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shar phyogs rgyal po dri za'i bdag /mdo dak? dgu po rgyud mangs 'dzin/ /kun tu bded gshegs bstan pa srungs/ /yul 'khor bsrung la phyag 'tshal bstong/ /lho phyogs rgyal po grul buM
187a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag /mdog sngo lag na ral gri 'dzin/ /kun tu bder gshegs bstan pa srungs/ /'phags skyes po la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nub phyogs rgyal po klu yi bdag /mdog dmar lag na zhags pa 'dzin cing
187a2(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bder gshegs bstan pa srungs/ /mig mi bzang la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /byang phyogs rgyal po gnod sbyin pa dag /mdog ser lag na be con 'dzin/ /kun tu bde gshegs bstan pa srungs/ /rnam thos sras la phyag 'tshal
187a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /glang po'i steng na rdo rje 'dzin/ /shel mdog bstan pa srungs par mdzad/ /khyod ni lha yi rgyal po ste/ /lha yi rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ma hi'i steng mthong dbyug 'dzin/ /sgeg mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /
187a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni gshin rje'i rgyal po ste/ /gshin rje'i 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chu sin steng na sprul zhags 'dzin/ /khrag mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni klu yi rgyal po ste/ /klu yi 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod
187a5(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i gdan la dbyug to 'dzin/ /gser mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni gnod sbyin rgyal po ste/ /gnod sbyin 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyu mchog steng na rtse gsum 'dzin/ /thal mdog bstan pa srung
187a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ /khyod ni 'byung po'i rgyal po ste/ /'byung po'i 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ra skyes steng na hom gzar 'dzin/ /me mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni drang srong rgyal po ste/ /drang srong 'khor bcas phyag
187a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod/ /mi ro'i steng na ral gri 'dzin/ /chu mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni srin po'i rgyal po ste/ /srin po'i 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sha pa'i steng na ba dan 'dzin/ /dud mdog bstan pa srung mdzad
187b1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /khyod ni rlung lha'i rgyal po ste/ /rlung lha 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shing rta'i steng na pad+ma 'dzin/ /khrag mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni gza' yi rgyal po ste/ /gza' yi 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dang po'i steng na ?
187b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /dung mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni skar ma'i rgyal po ste/ /skur ma'i 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phag gi steng na lcags kyu 'dzin/ /sol mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni yi dwags rgyal po ste/ /yi dwags
187b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /pad+ma'i steng na bum pa 'dzin/ /gser mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni nor 'dzin rgyal po ste/ /nor 'dzin 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lha dang ?  dang gnod sbyin dang/ /lha min mi dang
187b4(rgyud 'grel): lto dbye che/ /sha za gshin rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /srin po yi dags nam mkha' lding/ /mi 'am ci dang dri za dang/ /grul bum dang ni srin po dang/ /lus srul ma mo'i gdon rnams dang/ /byad dang gzhon nu skem byed pa/ /grib gnod dang ni brjed
187b5(rgyud 'grel): byed dang /smra byed dang ni 'phra men nam/ /dud 'gro dmyal ba mi ma yin/ /gdon rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dang/ /gzhan yang skye ba bzhes bsdus pa'i/ /sems can 'gro ba thams cad la/ /mchod sbyin chen po 'di ster bas/ /sems can
187b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di zhes bya ba yi/ /lan chags thams cad bral bar gyis/ /nad dang sdug bsngal 'khrug pa dang/ /dus min 'chi dang bkra mi shis/ /de bzhin gnod pa sna tshogs pa/ /mchod sbyin 'di yis zhi gyur nas/ /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel
187b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ dbang phyug nor ni 'byor pa dang/ /lo legs bde ba rnyed pa dang/ /nang med pa dang bkra shis shog /de bzhin pha rol tshogs gzhom dang/ /dgra rnams ma lus gzhom pa ni/ /mchod sbyin 'di yi stobs kyis ni/ /bsam pa
188a1(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin 'grub byung cig/ ces brjod de / 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags brjod de/ me tog gi phreng ba dor bar bya'o/ /de nas pho nya'i sbyin sreg bya ste / de nas rang gi sa bon las 'od
188a2(rgyud 'grel): zer 'phros pas / khro po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba gong du smos pa'i cha lugs ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs su gsol/ /zhabs bsil la sogs yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su mchod de / de nas bsreg rdzas ?
188a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu bsres la / bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM a mri ta a mri te a mri tod patha? ba/ a mri ta saM b+ha be / a mgri ta bi kran te / ga ma ni/ sarba karma / kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swAhA/ /zhes pas bstan te/ ?
188a4(rgyud 'grel): 'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du sbrel te / khu tshur bsnol ba'i sdigs mdzub gnyis snying gar bya zhing/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga ti he tuM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba pra ta dan ti he tuM hUM phaT / oM
188a5(rgyud 'grel): ma tha ma pra sarba tirya ka ga ti he tuM hUM phaT / oM trai lo kya bi dza ya sarba karma A bar Na klo sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swAhA/ oM trai lo kya bi dza ya sarba kle sha A par Na k+Sha yaM ka ri swAhA/ oM trai lokya bi dza ya sarba A pa ra Na k+Sha yaM kA ri
188a6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM tai lo kya bi dza pa sarba kar A bar Na k+Sha ya ka ri swAhA/ zhes pa'i snying po brgya ? stong dam/ bye ba'i tshud dam/ yang na stong gis grangs sam/ yang na brgya rtsa brgyad pa la sogs pas de'i ming byang dang/ bsres
188a7(rgyud 'grel): pas bsren par bya ba nyer/ /don de ltar pho nya'i sbyin sreg byas nas tshe 'das pa'i sdig pa bcom pa'i rtags ni / des rgyud du gsungs pa'i mtshan ma las shes par bya ste/ /de yang sdi pa dang nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i rtad
188b1(rgyud 'grel): ni steng du drang por 'bar ba dang/ du ba la sogs pas nag chog med pa dang / zlum zhing steng du mi 'pho pa dang / dal gyis glog bzhin du mdangs gsal ba dang/ sgra la sogs pa chur bar 'bar ba dang/ yang na me lha nyid kyis
188b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du bsreg khang gi nang du gsal bar ston pa na/ /rtags de dag gi tshe 'das pa de sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i gnas nas grol te/ lha la sogs pa'i gnas bde 'gror skye bar shes par bya pa nyid do/ /
188b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po brten te / tshe 'das pa'i don du phyogs bzhir 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sbyin sreg ji lta ba bzhin bya ba ni / de nyid che dang longs spyod rgyas par bya ba dang/ nad pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa'i tshogs
188b4(rgyud 'grel): zhi bar bya ba dang/ lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gsum dbang du 'gyur ba dang/ dgra dang ma rungs pa'i tshogs gzhom bar bya ba'i don du'o/ /de dag gi rdzas la ji ltar gong du smos pa'i bstod pa byas la/ bzod par gsol la gsheD
188b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ de la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni ting nge 'dzin gyis gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ni chos thams cad bdag med pa bsgoms la /oM shU? n+ya tA sa b+hA ba sarba d+harma shU n+ya ta swa b+hA ba haM//
188b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas thams cad bsdu dang bya'o/ /de nas thal bar gyur pa dang/ thal ba bsdu pa'i tshig bya ste/ de la dang por khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs nas/ /sa phyogs de'i bgegs bskrad la/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
188b7(rgyud 'grel): ngan song thams cad rnam par spyod pa'i skur bsgoms/ /rtswa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad btab pa'i rigs lnga'i phyag rgyas rin po che smra lnga'i phye mar byed kyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas bcas la/ oM badzra satwa su saM gra ha hUM /zhes 
189a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags kyiS ras dkar po gtsang ma'i nang du bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas de nyid kyi tshe thal bar gyur pa dang sku gdung gi las brtsam par bya ste/ de la ngas por thal ba dang rus pa phye mar btags pa la/ /ga bur la
189a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i dri chul rtsa ba'i sngags kyis btab ste ba'i 'o ma dang/ mar dang/ zho dang / chu dang /lci ba la sogs pa rtsa ba'i sngags 'bum du bzlas pa'i brjis te/ de dang sa kha dog dkar po la ga bur la sogs pa'i
189a3(rgyud 'grel): dris bsgos pa dang 'jim pa legs par bsres la dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs su bya ba 'am / rang gi lha'i gzugs su bya ba 'am/ yang na mchod rten gyi gzugs su byas te / de nas yongs su dag pa'i cho ga bya ba
189a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ rnal 'byor pas sring pa par mdo'i sems can la ni/ 'di ltar bdun pa gnyis pa la ni dmyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gling bcu drug pa la ro dang zab dbu bcas pa'i dbus su gtsug tor dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa/ de la
189a5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su mchod la/ rdzing bu'i nang nas nya bton pa ltar/ rtsa ba'i stags bum pa dkar po la bsngags pas sring pa bar ma do'i sems thig le'i gzugs su gnas pa gdon par bya'o/ /bdun pa gsum pa la
189a6(rgyud 'grel): yi dags kyi dkyil 'khor gling ? ba'i dbus su gong du smos pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis bus pa la bzlas pa'i thig le'i gzugs gdon bya ba dang/ bzhi pa la dud 'gro'i dkyil 'khor gling bzhi pa'i dbus su dkyil 'khor bris
189a7(rgyud 'grel): pas thig le'i gzugs dud 'gro'i gnas nas gdon par bya ba dang / lnga pa la lha ma yin gyi dkyil 'khor zlum po'i dbus su dkyil 'khor la brten te/ thig le'i gzugs lha ma yin gyi gnas nas gdon par bya ba dang/ drug
189b1(rgyud 'grel): pa la mi'i dkyil 'khor gling bzhi pa'i dbus su dkyil 'khor bris la thig le'i gzugs dbul po'i gnas nas gdon par bya ba dang / bdun pa la lha'i dkyil 'khor gling nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i dbus su dkyil 'khor bris la / thig le'i gnas
189b2(rgyud 'grel): lha tshe ring po'i gnas nas gdon cing rnam par grol ba la sogs pa'i mtshan mar gyur na/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo sring pa bar ma do'i sems can gyi kun bzhi rnam par shes pa 'khor ba las ldog pa'i rgyas 'jug pa yin te/ /de'i tshe de'i?
189b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi gtso bo rgyal po la sogs pa'i mi'i gzugs byas te / gzugs de'i snying gar bris pa'i ming tsan dan dkar po dang dmar po bsres pa'i sbyor bas pha dang ma tshogs pa'i chul byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabS
189b4(rgyud 'grel): la dmigs bar byas la/ de'i skad cig ma la snyoms bar 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la dmigs pas yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor kyis rang gis pad+mar bcug nas dkyil
189b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du dbang bcu rdzogs par bskul la/ phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su brtags te /me tog gi phreng ba thogs nas / phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo /bcom ldan 'das
189b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su spyod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a hA sa ma yo ga twA? sid+d+hi swAhA/ oM kA ya bi ya sta ya swAhA/ a:
189b7(rgyud 'grel): pA ka bi ya sta ya swA hA hUM tsit+ta bi ya swAhA zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu gnas par bya ba nyid do/ /de nas gzugs de nyid rgyal po la sogs pa'i cha lugs su byas pas / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
190a1(rgyud 'grel): gdung ring 'brel dang ldan pa'i nang du bcug la lo bzhi 'am lnga 'am gcig gam / zla ba drug gam gsum mam gcig gi bar du / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags stong ngam/ 'bum la sogs
190a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bzlas nas der mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la/ zhag re bzhin du mchod rten gyi gzugs la bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya bcas pas bcas ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya pa nyid do/ /de nas ngan 'gro la ?
190a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'phrol bar gyur pa ni mchod rten 'bar pa dang/ gzugs 'dzum pa dang/ ga bur la sogs pa'i dril thig le'i skud pa dang/ bdug pa'i che 'od snang ba dang/ dri yid du 'ong pa tsher ba dang/ sku gdung la sogs pa
190a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phar ba dang/ sa g.yo pa dang/ me tog dang/ rgyan la sogs pa 'od 'bar ba dang/ dung dang pi wang la sogs pa'i sgra grag pa na/ sdig can gyi gang zag de ngan 'gro las grol bar shes par bya'o/ /yang sdig pa chen po
190a5(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i sems can de nyid ngan song gsum las mgrol ba ni/ rtags dang mtshan ma de dag mi 'byung ba ste / de la rnal 'byor mchog gi snying rje chen po dang ldan pas yid skyo ba med pas brtse ba chen po bskyed/ de bzhin
190a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs su gsol la/ mchod brgya chen po byas la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i rig pa 'am de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'bruM?
190a7(rgyud 'grel): phrag stong dam / yang na ji srid mtshan ma byung gi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pas bzlas par bya ba nyid do/ /de'i rjes la bzlas pa'i grangs su thim pa dang/ mtshan ma byung pa'i
190b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mo thog thag ? mchod pa dang gtor ba'i tshogs chen po byas te/ mi nyal bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyor ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i snying po bzlas pas/
190b2(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'das pa de nyid lha'i gzugs su 'od par 'gyur te/ de la rnal 'byor pas bdag gi don phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir zhi ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad bcol ba dang/ gzhan yang bdag nyid ji lta bur gyur pa'i gtam dang/
190b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig chen po'i dbang gis bdag ji srid 'jig rten 'di na gnas kyi bar du khyod kyis 'jig rten pa rnams kyi don phun sum tshogs pa thams cad bdag gi rna lam du sgrogs shig ces brjod la/ me tog gi phreng ba la de bzhin
190b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brkyang? ma ron bar bzlas la spyi por bzhag ste / oM badzra sa twa sa ma ya rak+Shan tu ma ma sarba sag dza kur ba n ti hUM zhes brjod la btang bar bya ste/ nges kyang bdag gis khyod kyi bka' ji lta ba bzhin du
190b5(rgyud 'grel): bgyi'o zhes brjod de /de dga' zhing mgu nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gal te me'i nang du rtags rnams mthong na ni /snying las chu dus / thal ba dang/ rus pa dang/ phye ma dang/ yungs dkar la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags
190b6(rgyud 'grel): stod la sogs pa btab nas / bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyi de dag gi rdul re re la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal po re rer bsgoms la/ de'i sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin
190b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i bden pa dang/ bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs kyis/ rdul 'di dag de
191a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re rer gyur nas / 'di gang du gnas pa dang/ 'di gang la reg pa'i sems can thams cad sdig pa'i lam nas grol nas/ dge ba'i lam la zhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
191a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/ gtor ma dang bcas pa rgya mtsho 'am 'bab pa'i chu bo 'am/ mtshe'u 'am /'bab chu la sogs pa'i nang du dor bar bya'o/ /rgyad kyi rgyal po dri med la/ /bdag gis ro bsreg rgyas
191a3(rgyud 'grel): bshad las/ /bsod nams rgya chen gang thob des/ /'gro nyun? rdo rje rgyal po shog/ //slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzas? pa/ ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i ro'i sbyin sreg
191a4(rgyud 'grel): gi cho ga grogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang / dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtanla phab pa'o// //
191a5(rgyud 'grel): ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor kyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon bla na dga' snying pos mdzad pa bzhugs so// */ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na nA ma maN+Da la bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor
191a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi cho ga zhes bya ba / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom a yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtso chen shAkya seng ge la/ /kun nas dang
191a7(rgyud 'grel): pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob ma la ni phan gdags phyir/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud rnams las btus te/ /ngan song thams cad 'jig byed pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga de bshad bya/ /nyams dga' ba yi sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug
191b1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /bdag med par ni lhag mos pas/ /lkog mar pad+ma rnam par bsam /mdun gyi 'dab mar a dang ni/ /hUM las zla ba rdo rje ni/ /rtse lnga bsams te de yang ni/ /lce de nyid la thim par bya/ /rdo rje lce du rnam bsams pas/ /sngas? zlos ?
191b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan par 'gyur/ /lag pa gnyis su a pas ni/ /zla ba'i hUM las rdo rje ni/ /rtse lnga? par ni rnams bskyed de/ /kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya/ /lag pa'i dbus su zhu gyur nas/ /rdo rje'i lag par rnam par bsam/ /rdo rje'i lag pa brtan byas
191b3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed nas brtsams te/ /rdo rje rtse mo mthar thug pa'i/ /kun nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /mkhas pas yongs su bsam par bya/ /kun nas yongs su rlum por ni/ /ra ba phra ba byas nas kyang/ /slob dpon
191b4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /rdo rje 'og ni bcing bar bya/ /de nas de rjes nyid la ni/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'khor lo'i tshogs dang bcas pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor nam khar bsam par bya/ /me tog spos dang mar me dang/ /
191b5(rgyud 'grel): dri dang bshos ? pas na ?/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags bya zhing/ /de bzhin bsod nams rjes yi rang/ /lam ni yang dag bsgom bya zhing/ /byang chub sems ni yongs bzung dang/ /sdom pa thams cad bzung ba
191b6(rgyud 'grel): dag/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du bya/ /me tog spos dang mar me dang/ /dri yis rab tu mchod bya zhing/ /de bzhin sgeg mo phreng ba ma/ /glu ma gar ma la sogs brgyad/ /mchod pa nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud la gsungs pa
191b7(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ /nam mkha' yi ni phyogs nyid du/ /mchod par gyur par rnam par bsam/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ /srin po dang na lto 'phye che/ /'byung po yi dags sha za sogs/ /thams cad lhag nas mchod par bsam/ /mchod pa
192a1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis rab mchod nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan brjod byed de/ /e ma sangs rgyas e? sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas pa mchog mdzad legs/ /ngan song thams cad legs sbyangs nas/ /'gro pas byang chub thob
192a2(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad/ /'dod dang gzugs khams gnas pa'i lhas/ /thal mo sbyar cing rab btud nas/ /'khor los sgyur la phyag byas te/ /de nyid du ni mi snang gyur/ /de nas de rjes nyid la ni/ /go rim ji bzhin bsgom byas la/ /snying ga'i
192a3(rgyud 'grel): dbus su zla ba ste/ /de dbus dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor bkug nas ni/ /? ngag du ni gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs kyis/ dgug gzhug bcings la dbang du byas/ /dkyil 'khor rnam gnyis
192a4(rgyud 'grel): legs bsres te/ /dkyil 'khor gcig tu bsgom par bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni thams cad du/ /rdzogs pa'i sbyor pa las byung ba/ /de yi dbus su rang gi dngos/ /shAkya seng gi bsgom par bya/ /de nas shAkya thub pa yi/ /thugs dkar
192a5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de dbus ngan song spyod ? pa'i/ /gsang sngags gzugs ni rnam bsams la/ /gsang sngags rgyal po rjes dran bya/ /skad cig gis ni sa bon spro/ /de 'og tun nas 'od kyis ni/ /sems can thaMs cad
192a6(rgyud 'grel): snang bar byas/ /dmyal ba yi dwags byol song yang/ /slar yang snang bas khyab par byas/ /de nas 'od kyi snang ba yis/ /sems can thams cad ngan song las/ /sngags kyi 'od kyis bkug nas kyang/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas bral bar
192a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /srid gsum dri ma sbyang bar bya/ /'gro bo'i dri ma bral mthod nas/ /slar yang 'od kyi snang bar byas/ /sems can thams cad bkug nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya/ /de la chu
192b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yi/ /dbang bkur ba ni rim bzhin sbyin/ /de ltar dbang bskur tsam gyis ni/ /khams gsum pa'i sems can kun/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas mthong nas/ /mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
192b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ /khams gsum pa yi 'gro kun gyi/ /ngan song thams cad sbyong mdzad pa/ /shAkya seng ge phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rang gi de nyid ston mdzad pa/ /rdo rje gtsug
192b3(rgyud 'grel): tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnyam pa'i de nyid bsgom pa yis/ /khams gsum la gnas thams cad la/ /dbang bskur rab tu stsol mdzad pa/ /rin chen gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /so sor kun rtog rang bzhin can ? chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char
192b4(rgyud 'grel): kha ? dag sems can dbugs 'byin mdzad pa po/ /pad+ma gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can sdug bsngal bsal bya'i phyir/ /bya ba rjes grub rang bzhin can/ /phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa po/ /sna tshogs gtsug tor phyag 'tshal
192b5(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /khams gsum 'od kyis gsal mdzad pa/ /sems can kun gyis 'phags pa yin/ /bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa po/ /gtsug tor gzi brjid phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan rnams/ /sbyin pas sems can
192b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi/ /bsam pa thams cad sgrogs? mdzad pa/ /gtsug tor rgyal mtshan phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag/ bcod cing bdud bzhi'i stobs bcom nas/ /sems can byang chub thob mdzod ba/ /gtsug tor
192b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsom po byang 'tshal lo/ /lan gsum 'gro ba thams cad kyis/ kyis/ /gdugs dkar gyis ni rab brgyan pa'i/ /chos kyi rgyal po thob mdzad pa/ /gtsug tor gdugs dkar phyug 'tshal lo/ /sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu /gar ma lha mo 
193a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po dang/ /spos dang me tog mar me dang/ /dri yi lha mo phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dang sogs ngo bo las byung ba'i/ /sgo yi dbus na gang bzhugs pa/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags skrog dril/ /sgo sangs rgyas rnams
193a2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgo bzhi yi ni logS dag na/ /khyams la sogs par bzhugs mdzad pa/ /rab dga' la sogs gnas mdzad gang/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /tshangs dbang drag po zla ba sogs/ /phyogs
193a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ /me dang srin po rlung lha dang/ /'byung po'i bdag po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sngags pa rdo rje drib 'chang bas/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun nyid du/ /bstod pa 'di yis
193a4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bstod/ /rang gi lus ni gang yin pa/ /bdag nyid dkyil 'khor dag tu brtag /dang por sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin ni/ /de ltar rnam par bsgom par bya/ /de nas khams gsum ma lus pa/ /stong pa nyid du rnam bsgoms la/ /
193a5(rgyud 'grel): rlung dang chu yis dbus su ni/ /gser gyis gzhi rnams bsams la/ /sum gyi sa bon las byung ba'i/ /ri rab chen po bsam par bya/ /rin chen sna bzhi'i rang bzhin las/ /gru bzhi shin tu rgya che ba/ /de yis dbus su
193a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ni/ /ngan song sbyod ba dge bsam ste/ /sa bon bruM las byung ba yi/ /gzhal yas khang brtsegs rnam par bsgom/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/
193a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa yis brgyan/ /sgo yi logs bzhi thams cad dang/ sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnaMs dang/ /gra? yi cha ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje rin chen dag gis spras/ /chun 'phyang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis spras
193b1(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /gru bzhi par ni bsam par bya/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus su ni/ /seng ge la gnas pad+ma'i gdan/ /de la gnas ? zla dbus su/ /shes rab thabs ni zhu bar bya/ /sems can don gyi rgyur byung ba'i/ /sngags kyi gzugs su rnam par bsam//
193b2(rgyud 'grel): oM mu ne mu ne mahA mu ne ye swAhA/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'di las ni/ /sgrib pa kun sel zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam dag ba'i/ shAkya'i rgyal po rdzes dran bya/ /ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /gsang sngags kyang na gsung par?
193b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /rdo khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /rim gyis rnam par dbye ba ni/ /rgya ni chos kyi 'khor lo ste/ /'khor ba thams cad gcod phyed yin/ /de yi dpe ni 'di lta ste/ /ji ltar pad+ma la chags ba'i/ /bud ba la sogs bsdams pa rnams/
193b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha bye na/ /bcings pa'i sdug bsngal las thar byang/ /de bzhin 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /srid gsum 'gro bar bcings pa rnams/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid shAkya yi/ /seng ges bcings pa las grol mdzad//
193b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas snying gar zla ba la/ /gnas pa'i sngags rnams brjid nas ni/ /rdo rje gtsug tor nas brtsams te/ /rdo rje 'bebs ba'i bar du bskyed/ /de la sngags rnams 'di yin no/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te sarba du ? ti a ri she d+ha ne ra dza ya
193b6(rgyud 'grel): ? ar ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ ta dya thA/ oM sho d+hA ni shod+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni bi sho d+hA ni/ sarbabA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bir shud+d+he/ sarba karma A bA ra ta bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ /zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya ste/ /de nas
193b7(rgyud 'grel): ge rim ji bzhin ba'i/ /rim pa yang dag bshad par bya/ /oM badzra hUM phaT/ /kha yi sgo nas dbyung ba ni/ /kun nas 'od zer lnga bar byung/ /sngags kyi 'od kyi snang ba yis/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /snang bar byas nas grol
194a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi/ /kun kyang sdug bsngal grol bar byed/ /de nas 'od zer slar log pa/ /snying ga ru ni gzhugs par bya/ /sngags dang 'od zer 'dres pa las/ /byung ba'i ku ni spro bar bya/ /shar rtsibs pad+ma zla bar bzhugs?
194a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /thugs ka las byung gzhugS par bsam/ /sku mdog dkar zhing 'od zer 'bar/ /sa gnon pa yi phyag rgya bzhugs/ /sngar bshad bzhin du thams cad kyang
194a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer sgo dang bsdu ba dang/ /spros nas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang rang sngags las byung ba ni/ /snying gnas ni bton nas ni/ /ji ltar gnas su gzhug par bya/ /oM ratnot+ta ma traM/ zhes bya bas gdon par bya'o/ /de nas lho yi
194a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs la ni/ rin chen gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ /pad+ma zla ba'i dbus su ni/ /thugs ka las ni des ston la/ /sku mdog sngo zhing shin tu mdzes/ /mchog sbyin pa yi phyag rgyas bzhugs/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i
194a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun la dbang bskur mdzad/ /oM padmo ? hUM(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas gdon par bya'o/ /de nas nub kyi rtsibs la ni/ /pad gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /a skyon lu? byung ba'i sku/ /pad+ma gtsug ter de bzhin gshegs/ /
194a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka las ni byung ste? bzhugs/ /sems can kun la rjes? ston mdzad/ /sku mdog dmar zhing 'od 'bar ba/ /bsam gtan? gyi ni phyag rgyas bzhugs/ /oM bir shwa ? ma a zhes bya bas gdon par bya'o/ /de nas byang gi rtsibs la ni/
194a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la gnas sgra dbus su/ /thugs ka las ni yang dag nyon/ /sna tshogs gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ /sna tshogs pa yi 'od ldan pa/ /'di yi phyag rgyas mi 'jigs sbyin/ /'di ni sna tshogs las mdzad de/ /'khor ba las ni
194b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can sgrol/ /oM gyi sa bon las byung ba/ /gtsug tor gzi brjid de bzhin gshegs/ thugs ka las byung mi mtshams su/ /pad gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /g.yas pa la ni nyi ma bsnams/ /phyag g.yon dkar ni brten
194b2(rgyud 'grel): te bzhugs/ /sku mdog dkar dmar 'od zer gyis/ /khams gsum par ni snang bar mdzad/ /hUM gi sa bon las byung ba/ /gtsug tor rgyal mtshan de bzhin gshegs/ /thugs ka nas na? byung nas kyang/ /bden bral mtshams kyi rtsibs
194b3(rgyud 'grel): la ni/ /ngad gnas zla ba'i dbus na bzhugs/ /sku mdog dmar zhing gnag pa la/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /'gro ba'i ser swa? rnam dag mdzad/ d+hI yi sa bon las byung ba/ /gtsug tor rnon po de bzhin gshegs/
194b4(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag /gcod mdzad rlung gi rtsibs su bzhugs/ /'di yi phyag mtshan g.yas ral gri /g.yon ma glegs bam bsnams par mdzad/ /sku mdog mkha' ltar sngo ba ni/ /pad+ma la gnas zla bar bzhugs
194b5(rgyud 'grel): kri gis sa bon las byung ba/ /gtsug tor gdugs dkar de bzhin gshegs/ /chos kyi bdag por gyur pa ni/ /dbang ldan rtsibs su dpyad par bya/ /sku mdog dkar zhing 'od zer 'bar/ /'di yi phyag mtshan gdugs bsnams
194b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de dag thams cad sna tshogs pa'i/ /bar gnas zla dkyil dag tu bzhugs/ /hUM traM hAM a yi sngags kyis ni/ /sgeg mo la sogs lha? mo bzhi/ /phyung snye mtshan sa kyi cha yi ni/ /pad gnas zla dkyil dag tu dgod
194b7(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog phyag mtshan rigs kyi yuM/ /rgyud las ji skad gsungs bzhin bya/ /de bzhin me tog bdug sgog? ma/ /mar me dri yi lha mo bzhi/ /grwa yi cha du gnas pa ni/ /go rim bzhin du dbyung bar bya/ /sngags dang gdan la sogs
195a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /sgeg mo la sogs bshad par bya/ /oM sarba saM skar? pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga gnas? mud ga te mahA yA na pa ri pA re swAhA/ /sngags 'dis byams pa la sogs pa/ /bcu drug po ni phyung nas su/ /shar

195a3(rgyud 'grel): mdog ser 'od bzang ba/ /g.yas na klur shing me tog bsnams/ /g.yon na spyi blugs legs par 'dzin/ /byams sems rnam dag 'khrungs las byung/ /gnyis pa mthong ba don yod ni/ /pad+ma la gnas zla bar bzhugs//
195a4(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog yongs su ser po nyid/ /g.yas na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /pad+ma'i spyan dang yang dag ldan/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /gsum pa khyab bdag ngan song sbyong/ /bad? gnas zla ba nyid la bzhugs/ /sku mdog
195a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar la 'od 'bar ba/ /phyag na lcags kyu bsnams pa yin/ /khyams kyi go rim ji bzhin ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi par bshad pa la/ /mya ngan mun pa thams cad ni/ /des par 'joms pa'i blo gros ni/ /sku mdog dkar
195a6(rgyud 'grel): por? dag tu? snang/ /'di yi phyag rgya dpag? pa bsnams/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten te/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung dag gis bzhugs/ /'di dag shar du bzhugs pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpar gags pa yin/ /de bzhin lho
195a7(rgyud 'grel): yi phyogs su ni/ /sdan bshad pa yi ? nyid kyis/ /bad gnas zla ba'i dang su ni/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung dag gis bzhugs/ /dang po spos kyi glang po ste/ /sku mdog dkar ljang mdzes par snang/ /'di yi phyag rgya g.yas kyi ni//
195b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag na dri mi bsnams par mdzad/ /phyag g.yon dkur ni brten nas su/ /sems can thams cad rab gril mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' gnyis pa ni/ /de mtshan dpa' bar 'gro ba'o/ /sku mdog dung dang kun de 'dra/ /phyag g.yas ral gri bsnams
195b2(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsgom/ /bde gshegs sras po gsum pa ni/ /nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba ste/ /dam pa chos kyis gang ba'i mdzod/ /sku mdog dag ni dkar ser yin/ /'di yi
195b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya phyag g.yas na/ /pad+ma la gnas chos kyi mdzod/ /g.yon pa'i phyag ni bkur brten te/ /mkha' kun khyab pa'i nor 'dzin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa ni/ /ye shes tog ces bya ba ste/ /'di yi sku mdog sngon po la/ /

195b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khu tshur bkur brten pa'o/ /sangs rgyas sras pe gnyis pa ni/ /de mtshan zla 'od ces bya ba/ /de bzhin sku mdog dkar la bzang/ /phyag rgya g.yas pa'i phyag na ni/ /pad+mar gnas pa'i zla tshes te/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten
195b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa yang/ /mtshan ni bzang skyong zhes bya ba/ /sku mdog dkar dmar dag tu snang/ /phyag rgya g.yas pa'i phyag la ni/ /rin chen 'bar ba rab tu bsnams/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa'o//

196b2(rgyud 'grel): zla dbus su/ /sems dpa' i dkyil klung dag gis bzhugs/ /de ltar rnam par bsgoms pa yis/ /ngan song thams cad rnam par spyad/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /shAkya seng ge mdun byas te/ /

196b7(rgyud 'grel): ser mo lhag ma 'bar byas nyid/ /sor mo de nyid 'bar ba la/ /gtsug tor gzi brjid phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las ni srin lag dang/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni mnyam ste bsgreng/ /de nyid mdun du 'bebs pa dang/ /de nyid mdun du bzhug nas ni//

197b1(rgyud 'grel): cad spong ba yin/ /g.yon ba khu tshur bkur brten pa/ /g.yas pa dbyug pa lta bu ni/ /gyen du bsgreng nas 'jog byed pa/ /mya ngan mun pa kun 'joms pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur lte bar bzhag /lag pa g.yas pa glang po che'i/

197b4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'od dpag med kyi'o/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur brla steng bzhag /g.yas pa'i khu tshur snying gar ni/ /mthe bong mthe chung brkyang byas la/ /zla tshes 'dra bzhag zla 'od kyi'o/ /lag pa gnyis ni snying ga ru/ /pad+ma lta bu rnam phye la/ rtse mo ngan?
