197b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhag nas ni/ /sor mo dbu la bsgreng ba ni/ /rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying bzhag g.yas/ /mi 'jigs sbyin 'dra mi zad blo/ /g.yon pa lte par bzhag nas ni/ /g.yas pas sa gol gtogs pa ni/ /spobs
197b7(rgyud 'grel): la brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten te/ g.yas pa rin chen khu tshur bya/ /kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya yin/ /'di dag ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /sngar bshad 'byin ba'i sngags rnams ni/ chos gyi phyag rgya
198a1(rgyud 'grel): yin par bshad/ /'byin pa ji ltar 'dzin pa yi/ /phyag rgya phyag mtshan ldan pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag chen gyi/ /phyag rgya chen por shes par bya/ /de las phyag mtshan med gyur pa/ /las kyi phyag
198a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya yin par bshad/ /de nas ngan song kun sbyong ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor gyin sngags bshad bya/ /oM sarba bdi badzra a d+hiSh+Tha dz+nyA nan sa ma ye hUM/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ yan
198a3(rgyud 'grel): lag rnams la rim pa bzhin dgong/ /snying ga lkog ma dpral ba dang/ /smin mtshams mdzod du sna dang ni/ /rna ba rked pa pus mo dang/ /rkang pa dang ni byin pa gnyis/ /mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi/ /gnas byin gyis brlab ?
198a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba bA baM A na ya hUM/ /sdig pa thams cad dgug pa'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bida sarba pA pi pi sho d+ha ni hUM swAhA/ /sdig pa thams cad sngar? ba'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bid traT?/ /ngan song thams cad bral
198a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bida sarba a ba ra Na ni bi sho d+ha ni mu ne hUM phaT/ /shAkya thub pa'i sngags so/ /oM sarba beda hUM hUM/ /rdo rje gtsug tor gyi sngags so/ /oM sarba bid traM traM/ rin chen gtsugs tor gyi sngags so/ /oM sarba
198a6(rgyud 'grel): ? hUM hi/ /pad+ma gtsug tor gyi sngags so/ /oM sarba bid a a/ /sna tshogs gtsug tor gyi sngags so/ /oM sarba bida oM oM/ /gtsug tor gtsi brjid kyi sngags so/ /oM sarba bida hUM hUM/ /gtsug tor rgyal mtshan gyi sngags so /oM
198a7(rgyud 'grel): sarba ? phaT/ /gtsug tor rnon po yi'o/ /oM sarba bid kri twaTa/ gtsug tor gdugs kar kyi sngags so/ /oM sarba bid mahA badzrod b+ha? ba dA na pA ra mi tA pU dza hUM/ /glegs mo yi'o/ /oM sarba bida mahA badzrod d+hA ba shI la pA ra mi tA
198b1(rgyud 'grel): pU dze traM/ phreng ba ma'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bid mahA badzrod d+hA ba b+hA? na ti pA ra mi tA bU dze h+ri(rgyud 'grel): glu mkhan ma'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bid mahA badzrod b+hA ba bIrya pA ra mi tA pU dze a(rgyud 'grel): gar mkhan ma'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bid+ha sarba a pa ya band+ha?
198b2(rgyud 'grel): na d+ha mad+ha ma d+hu pA ra mi tA pU dze hUM hUM phaT/ /da drug pa ma'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bid sarba durga ti ba ru sho d+ha ni kle shats+tshe da na puShpa pi lo ki ni pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA pU dze h+rI hUM phaT/ me tog ma'i sngags so/ /oM sarba ? sarba a
198b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ya bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA na A lo ka ka ri pra Na d+ha na pA ra mi tA pU dze h+ri hUM phaT/ mar me ma'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bir sarba a pa ya gand+ha bi nA sha ni badzra gand+hi u pa ya pA ri ma tA bu dze a hUM phaT/ /byug pa ma'i sngags so/ /oM sarba
198b4(rgyud 'grel): bid sarba na ra ka ga ta A karSha Ni hUM dza phaT/ rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bid sarba na ra kod+ha ra ni hUM hUM phaT/ rdo rje zhags pa'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bid sarba a ba ya band+ha bi mo tsa ni hUM baM phaT/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog
198b5(rgyud 'grel): gi sngags so/ /oM sarba bid? sarba a pa ya ga ti ga ta na bi sho d+ha ni hUM ho(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ rdo rje 'bebs ba'i sngags so/ /oM mai tri ha ra tA ya swAhA/ /byams pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha a mo g+ha barsha? ni hUM/ mthong ba ngon yod
198b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi'o/ /oM sarba A pa ya dza ha sarba a pa ya bi sho d+ha mi hUM/ ngan song kun 'dren gyi'o/ /oM sarba sho ka ta mo ni rga te na ma ti hUM/ /mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi'o/ /oM gand+ha ha sti ni hUM/ smos
198b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi glang po'i'o/ /oM shu raM ga se hUM/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i 'o/ /oM ga gA ne ga gA na lo tsa ne hUM/ /nam mkha' mdzod kyi'o/ /oM dz+nyA na ke tu dz+nyA na ba ti hUM/ ye shes tog gi'o/ /oM a mri ta pra b+ha a mi ta ba ti hUM/ /'od dpag med
199a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi'o/ /oM tsan+d+re tsan+d+ra bya ba lo ki te hUM swAhA/ /zla 'od kyi 'o/ /oM b+ha dra ba ti b+ha dra pA le hUM/ /bzang bskyod gi'o/ /oM dzA la ne mahA dzA la ne hUM/ dra ba can gyi'o/ /oM badzra gand+he hUM/ /rdo rje snying po'i 'o/ /oM ak+ShA ya ? du
199a2(rgyud 'grel): ak+Sha ya karma A ba ra na bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ /blo gros mi zad pa'i'o/ /oM pra ti b+ha na pra taM b+ha ne ku Te swAhA/ /sbobs pa brtsegs ba'i'o/ /oM sa man ta b+ha dra hUM/ kun tu bzang po'i'o/ /bskal pa bzang po'i sngags 'di dag/ go'i ma ji
199a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin brjod par bya/ /cho ga 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu/ /'bad pas ting 'dzin gsum ldan pa'i/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan payos/ /sgo ni rnam par dbye bar bya/ /
199a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rab brkyang nas/ /mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sbral/ /sgo dbye ba yi phyag rgya yin/ /oM sarba bid badzra ? dod g+ha Ta ya hUM/ sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so/ /rdo rje 'khor

199a6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /g.yon ba'i se gol brdabs pa dang/ /g.yas pa yis ni 'grub bar 'gyur/ /g.yas pa thal mo zhes bya ste/ /'dus pa yang ni gnyis yin te/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do/ /oM sarba bid badzra

199b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni bcing bar bya/ /'bras yos sogs dang spos chab kyis/ /mchod yon da ni zhabs bsil dbul/ /de nas mchod pa'i yan lag kun/ /spos cha gnyis ni bsang btor bya/ /sngar bshad pa yi mchod pa ni/ /sna tshogs pa yis yang dag
199b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /mchod mthar mnyam med la sogs pa'i/ /bstod pa rnams kyis legs par bstod/ /zla ba drug gam lo gcig par/ /de ltar rnam par bsgoms pa yis/ /lha yi snang ba gsal nas ni/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /sngon du

199b7(rgyud 'grel): na spyas nas su/ /sa spyad phyir ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas de rjes nyid la ni/ /ba ko tsam ni byugs pa yis/ /sa yi cha ni yid 'ong bar/ /slar yang zhi ba'i las brtsam mo/ /kun nas yongs su zlum por ni/ /ba yi lci bas legs byugs

203b3(rgyud 'grel): lo'i rgya bcings la/ /mdun du bzhugs par bsam par bya/ /de nas me yi dbus su ni/ /dkyil 'khor ba rnams bsam par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /mdzub mo mthe chung mdud ba ni/ /rdo rje 'khor lo zhes grags te/ /dkyil
203b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /sngags ni oM sarba bid badzra tsakra sid+d+hi hUM/ /de nas phyag rgya bsdu ba yi/ /rdo rje se gol brdab par bya/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ /de nas bil ba su mu ga /nag gser bri yaM kun/ /til nag dang ni nas thugs
203b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /'bras chan zhi dang bcas pa dang/ /'bras bu rnam ba sna tshogs dang/ /sbrad rtsim dang ldan pa rnams/ /gtsug tor dgu la rang sngags kyis/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni dbul bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor ba yi lhag ma ni/ /so sor bsreg lugs
203b6(rgyud 'grel): bdun bdun dbul/ /sleb? mo la sogs rnam brgyad dang/ /de bzhin mchod pa nyi shus mchod/ /dkyil 'khor pa yi sngags shes pas/ /bzlas brjod dag kyang ci nus bya/ /sa bdag slob ma zhi don du/ /mthar ni dgang blugs dbul bar
203b7(rgyud 'grel): bu/ /sems can kun la snying brtsebs/ /ci 'dod pa yi smon lam gdab/ /dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// //lho sgo yi ni sa yi chad/ /khru gang pa la khru bzhi ba/ /stegs bu legs
204a1(rgyud 'grel): par brtsigs nas ni/ /ma lhung ba yi lci bas byug /ba yi rnam lngas byugs nas ni/ /chog bzhin du yongs su brtag /tsan dan bdag po dag gis ni/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor yang dag bri/ /spros? dang me
204a2(rgyud 'grel): tog lha bshos ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dbul bar bya/ /de nas bum pa ku sha ni/ /sngo dang bcas pa bzhag par bya/ /'bru sman rin chen lnga rnams dang/ /'dab bcas lcug mas brgyan par bya/ /mgul par ras ni sngon po yis/ /
204a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid la ni mdzes par brgyan/ /de nas phyir bzlog bya ba ni/ /yungs kar gyi ni bya ba yin no/ /yungs kar me tog dang ldan pas/ /gsang sngags zlos shing brdeg par bya/ /rus pa 'am gos sam ming la ni/ /rdo rje chu yis bkru bar
204a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /sdig pa bkra? ba'i sgegs kyis ni/ /srid gsum ? bkru bar bya/ /de la brdeg pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ /oM sarba pA paM da can badzra hUM phaT/ /oM sarba a pa ya bi sho d+ha ni badzra hUM phaT/ oM sarba karma A ba ra NA ni b+haSh+mi ku
204a5(rgyud 'grel): ? phaT/ oM b+h+ruM? pa nA sha ya A ba ra Ni badzra hUM phaT / oM ? paM shod+ha ya A bar NA ni hUM phaT/ /oM dzwa la dzwa la d+ha ka d+ha ka ha na ha na A bA ra N+Na ni hUM phaT/ /oM sruM sa ra sa ra pra sar bre? sa ra sarba A ba ra nA ni hUM phaT/ /oM hUM ha
204a6(rgyud 'grel): rA ha ra sarba Asna ba ra ? hUM phaT/ /oM hUM phaT ? A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT ? Ta ya hUM phaT / oM pra ta pri rta sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM ha Ta ta Ta sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM ts+tshinda ts+tshandi de bi dra ba sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT//
204a7(rgyud 'grel): oM da ha ? sarba na ra ka ga ti he tuM hUM phaT/ /oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba pra ta ga ta he hUM phaT/ oM ma tha ma tha sarba ti ryak? ti ha tuM hUM phaT/ sngags 'dis yang dag brdeg na ni/ /ngan song thams cad rnam par 'jig /bkru ba'i sngags
204b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa ni na mo ga b+hA ga ba te sarba durba ti ba ro sho d+ha ni rA dzA ya /ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tadya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba karma A pa ra na bi shud+d+he swahA/ 'gro ba yang dag par
204b2(rgyud 'grel): lam bstan pa'i sngags gsungs pa ni oM ratne ratne mahA ratne / ratna saMb+hA ba rakna ki ra Ne/ ratna ma la bi shud+he swAhA/ /laM spyad pa'i sngags ni /oM padme padme mahA padme/ padmota b+ha be su kha ba to gats+tsha tu swAhA/ /slar yang bkra shis tshigs bcad kyis/ /
204b3(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum du ni khrus bya'o/ /de nas me tog sngos la sogs/ /thams cad kyang ni dbul bar bya/ /lam spyad pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /me tog char ni dbab par bya/ /de ltar zhag ni gnyis gsum nas/ /zhag brgyad pa yi bar du bya/ /sa ? nyi ma
204b4(rgyud 'grel): nas brtsams te/ /slob ma gzhug pa'i bar du bya/ /rab tu gnas pa'i dus su ni/ /bum pa la sogs gshegs su gsol/ /de nas de yi cha ru ni/ /sngar bshad pa yi rim pa yis/ /pad+ma dkar po la gnas pa'i/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
204b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par bri/ /de la slob ma bzhag nas ni/ /bum pa bzang po dkar bcas bas/ /sngar bshad cho ga bzhin du ni/ /'bad de dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /de nas yid la ci 'dod kun/ /phangs pa med par dbul bar bya/ /gtan pa med pa dbul
204b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /bdun pa med pa'i mchod sbyin gyis/ /kun la rnam par sbyin par bya/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis bcings pa'i/ /'gro ba rigs drug la gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bkrus tsam gyis/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur
204b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa dang na mthar ba yis/ /de yi bsod nams tshad med pas/ /dmyal ba yi dags byol song gi/ 'bro ba kun las de bzlog nas/ /sum cu rtsa gsum yang na ni/ /dga' ldan gnas su yang dag skye/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor bya ba'i cho?
205a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //dpal ldan ngan song sbyong ba yi/ /chog shAkya mgon gyis gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga ma lus pa/ /yongs su nyams par gyur par mthong/ /bla ma rdo rje
205a2(rgyud 'grel): can drin gyis/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga sbyar pa las/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pa/ /des ni sems can ma lus kun/ /kun mkhyen ye shes mnga' brnyes nas/ /sangs rgyas dang ni 'dra bar shog/ ngan song thams cad yongs
205a3(rgyud 'grel): su sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon kun dga' snying po'i zhal lnga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsArya bud+d+ha sh+rI shAn+ti dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin
205a4(rgyud 'grel): chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim la zhes bya ba slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad
205a5(rgyud 'grel): du/ sarba du ? ti pa'i sho d+ha na maN+Da? la bi d+hi kra ma nA ma/ /bod skad du/ ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
205a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su spyod ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba dang/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi cho ga dang/ /dbang thob dngos grub bsgrub pa ni/ /ngan song sbyong ba'i rgyud dag las//
205a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mtshan thob bdag gis bshad/ /thun mong khyad par gnas nyid du/ /stan bde ba la bdag gnas nas/ /lag pa rdo rje byin brlab ste/ /rdo rje'i lce dang bdag med sems/ /oM badzra hUM/ oM badzra dzi hA/ /oM badzra tsit+ta
205b1(rgyud 'grel): a/ /de nas me ltar 'bar ba bskyed/ /de la byin gyis brlab pa dang/ /sbyi nas dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /oM grih+na badzra sa ma ya hUM baM/ oM badzra dzra la a na lA ? hUM/ /a b+hi Shi ny+tsa mAM/ /oM TuM/ de nas rdo rje tho ba
205b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /khro bo rdo rje me dang ni/ /rdo rje lcags spro ba phyag rgya sngags/ /glo bur bgegs ni bsal bar bya/ /oM badzra dzwa la a na lArka hUM/ /oM badzra dzra la a na la ha na da ba tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hUM phaT/ oM badzra na hUM? band+ha sarba ?
205b3(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin bgegs ni khro brgyad bcing/ /rdo rje'i spyan gyis 'og tu bcing/ /oM badzra dri Dho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sarbaM swAhA/ rdo rje 'jigs byed gnod sbyin gnyis/ /steng du rdo rje'i gur du byas/ /oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ /
205b4(rgyud 'grel): shar du rdo rje gtsug tor dang/ /rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya/ /oM hUM druM band+ha haM hUM/ /oM badzra pA sha hI:/ /rdo rje ba dan nub bcing ste/ /phyag rgya mdzub mo mtheb chung bsgreng/ /oM badzra pA ta ke ni raT /rdo rje dus mtshan ?
205b5(rgyud 'grel): bcing pa/ /gcod sbyin phyag rgya kha la bzhag /h+ri badzra kA li du Ta ma Ta/ /rdo rje rtse mos lho phyogs bcing/ /rdo rje khu tshur ri bo 'degs/ /oM badzra sha khi ri ru Ta maT/ /khro bo gsum gyi ra ba ni/ /rdo rje las ni rgya gri ste/ /rdo rje
205b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM mdzad sngon po la/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcing ba'o/ /oM badzra karma hUM/ /badzra band+ha baM/ dang por mchod pa bsham par bya/ /de nas gnyis pas bsang ba dang/ /gsum pas gzi byin bskyed pa dang/ /bzhi pas lha ru bskyed pa dang//
205b7(rgyud 'grel): lnga pas mang por sprul pa dang/ /drug pas byin gyis brlab pa bya'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i sa gzhi la/ /tshogs gsag dmigs pa'i yul can sprul/ /mchod bshags bdun po bya ba dang/ /sems ni rab tu bskyed pa dang/ /sdom
206a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gzung nas lus dgu ba bcas/ /gzhan gyi don du tshogs gsag mchod/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas e sangs rgyas/ /aM sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs/ /gang phyir ngan song bdag cag sbyangs/ /byang chub spyod pa
206a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid la bzhag /bstod nas lha rnams phyag byas so/ /lag par rigs lnga yab yum bcu/ /mnyam pa'i thal mo sbyar bar bya/ /oM hUM traM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): a/ /sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni/ /rdo rje thal mo rab tu bya/ /oM badzra a nyi laM/
206a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bsdams pas sdig pa ni/ /snying kar yan gsum dral par bya/ /badzra band+ha tu?/ /rdo rje dbab pa dam tshig rgyas/ /a zhes bdag la dbab par bya/ /badzra A be sha a/ dbab pa brtan par bya ba ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod
206a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /Tak+ki badzra hUM/ /dam tshig rdo rje khu tshur bcings/ /dbab pa tha mi dang par bya/ /oM badzra muSh+Ti baM/ /snying gar zla steng dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor bdag la thim/ /dkyil 'khor gcig byung rtsa ba dbun
206a5(rgyud 'grel): shAkya seng ge'i thugs ka'i sngags/ /'od zer lnga 'phros pas lnga mdzad/ /dkug nas dkyil 'khor bzhug pa dang/ /de la dbang ni bskur bar byed/ /sgrib dag sras dgongs lha la bstod/ /sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med/ /
206a6(rgyud 'grel): chos dang 'dra ba'i skyob pa med/ /dge 'dun 'dra ba'i zhing med par/ /gsang sngags 'dra ba'i 'dren ba med/ /shAkya seng ge rtser gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma la /gzi brjid rgyal mtshan rnon po gdugs/ /sgeg mo phreng ba glu
206a7(rgyud 'grel): gar dang/ /spos dang me tog mar me dri/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog sdom/ /rab dka' sa bcu'i sems dpa' ni/ /bskal bzang bcu drug khyams na gnas/ /tshangs pa drag po gnod sbyin klu/ /me dang srin po klu dbang
206b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /nyi bzlas bdag tshogs ldan pa/ /ngan song sbyong mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal/ /mchod nas rdo rje dril ldan pas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun nyid bstod/ /rang lus dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /lus la lha ye shes dkyil 'khor gnas/ /oM
206b2(rgyud 'grel): sarba bing a d+hi tiSh+ThA na dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM/ gcig tu bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor de/ /thabs kyis ngan song spyod bar bshad/ /phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga bdun/ /rim pa bzhin du bskyed par bya/ /stong pa nyid kyi dang las ni/ /rlung gi dkyil
206b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chu dang ni/ /? gzhi rgya mtsho rin chen ri/ /b+h+ruM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ /gru bzhi rta babs rgyan rnams rdzogs/ /cho 'phrul bzhi las byung ba'i tshul/ /shAkya'i rgyal pos 'khor bsgrol/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra hUM phaT/ /? bud ba
206b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin grol mdzad/ /rang gi sngags sogs thugs la 'khor/ /oM mu ne mu ne mahA mu na ye swAhA/ /thugs ka'i zla ba'i lnga dang bcas/ /de las 'khor rnams 'byung bar byed/ /rdo rje'i gtsug tor sa gnon dkar/ /spro bsdu snying ga'i sngags las
206b5(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /oM sarba a pa ya bi sho d+ha ne badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra hUM phaT/ /rin chen gtsug tor mchod sbyin sngo/ /sems can ma lus dbang bskur byed/ /oM ratnot? ta ma traM/ oM sarba karma A ba ra Na ni b+ha smi ku ru hUM phaT/ /pad+ma'i gtsug tor mnyam
206b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhag dmar/ /sems can kun la mdzes ston mdzad/ /oM padmo ta ta ma h+rI:aoM bruM bi nA sha yo A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ /las kyi gtsug tor mi 'jigs sbyin/ /sna tshogs mdog can khong du 'bar/ /oM bi shAta ta ma a/ /oM druM bi sho
206b7(rgyud 'grel): d+ha ya A ba ra na ni hUM phaT/ /gtsug tor gzi brjod dkar dmar 'dog/ nyi ma phyag bsnams dku la bsten /oM dzwa la dzwa la d+ha ka d+ha ka ha na ha na A ba ra na ni hUM phaT/ /gtsug tor rgyal mtshan dmar zhing gnag /yid bzhin nor bu rgyal mtshan
207a1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams/ /oM hUM phaT sarba A par Na ni spho Ta hUM phaT/ /gtsug tor rnen pa mkha' ltar sngo/ /g.yas pa ral gri glogs paM g.yon/ /oM ha ra ha ra sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ /gtsug tor gdugs dkar phyag na gdugs/ /
207a2(rgyud 'grel): sku yin dog ni dkar zhing 'bad/ /oM sruM sa ra sar dras ? bras ra A pa Na ni hUM phaT/ /de nas de dag yo byad bshad/ /bdug spos ma dang me tog ma/ /mar me ma dang dri chab ma/ /oM sarba ba ya bi sho d+ha ni lha ma d+ha ma d+hU pa ya raM hUM phaT/ /oM
207a3(rgyud 'grel): sarba durga tI bi sho d+ha ni bushpaM bi lo ki ni hUM phaT/ /oM sarba a pa ya bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA na A lo ka ka ri hUM phaT/ /oM sarba a pa ya bi sho d+ha ni gand+ha hUM phaT/ /lcags kyu shar la zhags pa lho/ /lcags sgrog nub ste dril bu byang/ /oM sarba
207a4(rgyud 'grel): na ra ka ga te ya A karSha ni hUM phaT/ /oM sarba na ra ka ut+ta ra Ni hUM phaT/ /oM sarba a pa ya band+ha mo tsa ni hUM phaT/ /oM sarba a pa ya ga ti ga hi na hUM phaT/ /lha mo bzhin dang byang chub sems/ /bkra shis la sogs rgyas bsdus sbyar//
207a5(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba saM ? ra ba ri shud+d+ha ? te ga g.yas nu b+ha te mahA na ya pa ri bA re swAhA/ /de nas byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /gtso ba dang ni 'khor la bya/ /oM be de sarba A Ta Ni hUM phaT/ oM traT sarba A pa ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM pi tra bi tri pa yod
207a6(rgyud 'grel): du na ni hUM ?/ /de nas ngan song spro? pags nas/ /oM da ha da ta sarba na ra ka ga ta hi tuM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba tidya ga gte te duM hUM phaT/ /oM ma tha ma tha sarba dre ta ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ /bsgom pa sku ye phyag rgya che/ /thugs ka'i rdo rje las
207a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgya/ /bcings pa dam tshig phyag rgya ste/ /bzlas pa chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /oM na ma b+ha ga pa te sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na rA dza ya/ ta tha' ga tA ya/ /arha te/ samyak saM bud+d+ha ya/ /ta dyathA/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ sarba pA baM baM sho d+ha ni
207b1(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ha bi shud+d+he sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shwa d+ha ni swAhA/ /rdo rje khu tshur mdzub mo brkyang/ /mthe'u chung sbrel nas sgo dbye bya/ /oM sarba bid badzred g+ha Ta ye hUM/ /rdo rje 'khor lo phyag rgya yis/ /bzhugs pa'i rten yang khyad par bya/ /oM sarba bid oM badzra tsa kra hUM/
207b2(rgyud 'grel): ye gol brdabs? nas sangs rgyas rnams/ /byon par 'gyur te gzhan ci smos/ /oM sarba bid sa mA dza:dza:hUM baM ho:/ /bstod nas bzhegs bskrad bsrung ba dang/ /sgo bcang go bgo mchod pa ni/ /las brgyad rab tu bya ba yin/ /de nas bsgom par bya ba
207b3(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong bsgom/ /de nas ldang bar bya ba ni/ /thun bzhir byas te rab tu bya/ /zla drug gam ni lha yi gnas/ /de nas dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /dang po sa ni btsal bar bya/ /byin chen bkra shis mtshan ldan thang/ /sa
207b4(rgyud 'grel): gnang blang dang mi gnang la/ /rin stsal bden pas sgo bar bya/ /spyi dang dmigs kyis blang bar bya/ /sa yi lha'o spran bar bya/ /sngon 'byung dang ni de rjes 'jug /brtag pa ngan dor bzang na blang/ /sa yi pra brtag ro rnams bsal/ /byin gyis brlab cir dbang?
207b5(rgyud 'grel): tu bya/ /sbyang par bya zhing gter sogs gzhug /sa gzhi gzung bar bya ba ni/ /dngos grub rang gis gzung bar bya/ /gtsug tor lha mo bkra shis sems/ /sgo ba rnams la sta gon zhus/ /sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs bsham/ /slob ma gyi nag bras?
207b6(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /du shas gtsang zhing rmi sta gon/ /bsrung skud bgegs bskrad dngos grub 'chags/ /tshems shing dag dag dngos grub brtag/ rnon po bsrung ba bzhang sogs pas/ /byin brlabs zab mos dbugs phyung nyal/ /gser dngul bum pa gas
207b7(rgyud 'grel): chug med/ /tshad dang mtshan ldan rdzas kyis dgang/ /ma gul tshings kha rgyan gzungs thag bcas/ /phyag rgyas mtshan nas bskyed drangs bsgrub/ /rtogs rig tshang med sred bu'i thig/ ras bal gtsang ma bu mos bkal/ /bsangs nas byin brlabs slob
208a1(rgyud 'grel): dbon gyis/ /ye shes dam tshig ? gdab/ /rgyud las byung ba'i tshon rnams la/ /byin brlags bsgrub pa smin pa yis /thig btab nas ni phyag rgyas bteg/ /dam tshig ldan pas legs par bris/ /de nas dkyil
208a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bshad pa de/ /'khor lo 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs brgyad can/ /lte bar bcas shing mu khyod ldan/ /nang gi rim pa bris nas ni/ /lte ba'i nang du ? yi/ /bdag po thub pa bzhag par bya/ /phyag na
208a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje stobs chen ni/ /dpal po de yi spyan sngar bri'o/ /rgyab tu 'khor los sgyur ba bri/ /g.yas phyogs rgyal pa'i gtsug tor can/ /g.yon du rnam par rgyal ? bri/ /gzi brjid phung po me yi phyogs/ /dbang po'i phyogs su gdugs dkar po/ /
208a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par ? brlung gi phyogs/ /rnam par 'joms pa bden bral phyogs/ /bris nas phyi rol bri bya ste/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs dang ni seng ges brgyan/ /dpang pos lcags kyu zhags pa dang/ /lcags sgrog dril bu can
208a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams bzhag /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya/ /bum pa dang ni phur? pa mda'/ /dar sna la gri me long dag /gzungs thag rgyal mtshan dur ba'i gdan/ /ku sha rta babs mchod pa dang/ /ras yug slob
208a6(rgyud 'grel): dpon slob ma'i chas/ /de dag dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /ting 'dzin cho 'phrul bsgom pa ni/ /drang zhing sdug pa rab tu dag/ nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam pa/ /gnas ngan len bkun las grol/ /rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i mchog
208a7(rgyud 'grel): oM swa b+ha bar shud+d+ha? haM/ /byams dang snying rje las 'byung zhing/ /sems can la ni phan mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs bri ma thams cad dag/ zla ba lta dur mthong ba'i/ /oM pra ti tsit+ta be d+haM ka ro mi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa/ /dge ba'i chos rnams
208b1(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzogs shing/ /nyon mongs thams cad rab tu grol/ /snying po dbus na zla chen po/ /oM bo d+hi tsit+ta uta pA da yA mi/ sa dang sa min shin tu mkhyen/ /ye shes dag la zag pa med/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su bya lta
208b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /oM tsit+ta badzra/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rang bzhin sku/ /mi chod mi 'jigs mi shigs pa/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid las byung ba'i/ /rdo rje'i sku ni bla med pa'i/ /oM badzra At+ma ko haM/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ting 'dzin nam/ /sangs rgyas rjes ?
208b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ /byang chub sems dpa' i yi ge 'di/ /phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa yi/ /oM ya thA badzra satwa ta thA a haM/ /skye med mtshon pa'i a las ni/ /yig 'bru lnga yi 'phro 'du yis/ /nam mkha' rlung dang chu dkyil 'khor/ /sa gzhi me dpung rin chen ri//
208b4(rgyud 'grel): ? las bskyed pa'i gzhal yas khang/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan dang bcas/ /ma skyes pa yi rang bzhin las/ /bskyed pa'i byang chub bla ba'i steng/ /daM hUM tram bruM raM phaT haM sruM/ /? /hUM traM h+ra he/ hUM hUM traM tri hUM a a/ i a pa ra pa yaM/
208b5(rgyud 'grel): ? i so oM pa/ dza:hUM ba ho(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi ye shes 'bar ba las/ /sku yi phyag rgya rdzogs pa'o/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /oM dri de ta brid tra sarba A ba ra ta ni hUM phaT/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /oM tra TA tra TA sarba A ba ra naM
208b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM la?/ /rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya bcas/ /oM ts+tshinda tshinda sarba A ba ra na ni hUM phaT/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya dang/ /sngags 'dis lha rnams kun dbang bskur/ /oM hUM/ oM oM/ oM traM/ oM ? oM ha/ rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/
208b7(rgyud 'grel): ? mo lags kyu bsnol? nas ni/ /rdo rje se gal bkrol? bar bya/ /oM badzra A du pa ri bur badzra sa ma ya dza(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu zhags pa lcags skrag dra'i/ /dbyangs kyis spyan yang drang bar pbya/ /dza:hUM bo ho:b+ha ga ? e hya hi/ mahA kA ru Na ka/ /dri
209a1(rgyud 'grel): sh+ya ho/ /sa ma ya stwaM/ /dam tshig phyag rgyas 'byung rgyu bca' / /g.yas pas mchod sbyin par byas la/ /g.yon pa mi 'jigs sbyin pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings la gungs gnyis mnyam
209a2(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong mthe'u chung brgyad ba phyag /rdo rje bcings pa gung gnyis mnyam/ /tshigs bcag sor mo gzhan yang 'thor/ /de nyid mthe bongs the chung bkug /rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid 'od zer 'dra ba ni/ /gzi brjid phung po'i phyag
209a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ /de nyid spyi bor bskor ba yi/ /gdugs dkar po yi phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur mdzub gnyis mthe'u chung bsnol/ /mdun nas gyen bskor 'khor los sgyur/ /gung bgreng mdzub mo rtse sbyar bkug/ lhag ma 'od 'phro gtsug tor rgyal/ /de bzhin
209a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzub gnyis rdo rjer byas/ /lhag ma bsngams pa rnam rgyal rgya/ /bsdams pa mdun bzhag bdug pa ma/ /de nyid byen bstod phreng ba ma/ /mthe bong bsgreng bskor mar me ma/ /de nyid byug ba ltar byas dri/ /mdzub mo gnyis bkug scags kyu'o//
209a5(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo gnyis sbrang zhags pa la/ /gcig la gcig mdung lcags sgrog go/ de nyid las bskyod dril bu gnyis/ /dbral bar thal sbyar de bzhin gshegs/ /mgrin par pad+ma gsung gi phyag/ thugs ka'i thal mo rdo rje phyag /rigs rnams spyir
209a6(rgyud 'grel): yang phyag rgya'o/ /'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas dang/ /phye nang rab tu gsang bar dang/ /bsod nams dge dang dag pa'i 'od/ /bde bar tshim bar bya ba dang/ /spyi dang so so'i mdor bsdus mchod/ /dgyes pa bskyed de lha rnams la/ /zhal phyag sku
209a7(rgyud 'grel): la so sor bstod/ /chos kyi phyag rgya las byung ba/ /ngan song sbyong ba'i bzlas pa ni/ /spyi'i dang so so gang byed 'das/ /las kyi phyag rgya las la gzhug/ dngos grub thams cad gsol bar bya/ /yongs su bsngo zhing smon la gda' ?/ /de nas dri zhim
209b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs/ /rang gi lus ni bsrungs zhes? gyang/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas zhugs nas ni/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i grong khyer mchog /snying po'i dkyil 'khor
209b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ru ni/ /slob dpon khyod kyis bdag 'jug 'tshal/ /slob mas rgyun bshegs mdun pa bya/ /bla mas de la lan byin pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba chen po rigs dag la/ /gsang ba chen po 'dzin pa ni/ /bdag nyid
209b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /slob mas 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ /slob mas dbang zhu gsol ba gdab/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas ni/ /slob dpon dbang dang gnas pa dang//
209b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba'i/ /mi ldog 'khor lo sbyor bar ldan/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen por zhugs nas kyang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur te/ /skal ldan chen po bdag la gsol/ /mtshan rnams kun
209b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi rgyas gdab pa'i/ /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba'i/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /bla mas de la dam tshig stsal/ /dpal ldan ngan song sbyong ba yi/ /rgyud bzhin gsungs pa'i dam tshig rnams//
209b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di nas gzung nas byang chub tu/ /khyod kyis yang dag bsrung bar bya/ /de kyang ji ltar gnas pa yi/ /sdom pa bdag gis bsung zhes brjod/ /bla mas lha la gsol ba gdab/ /che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di/ /byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing/
209b7(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir yang 'jug par 'tshal/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta yo ga bo d+haM tsit+ta utwA da yA mi su ra ta sa ma ya stwaM/ badzra pra tha ya tha su khaM/ de nas ltar ni bskyed byas la/ /mchod pa rnams kyis mchod byas te//
210a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyod g.yogs dar gyis gdong g.yogs nas/ /bgegs skrad bdong pa bya ba ni/ /oM badzra ? kyA hUM/ /lam kyibum ba chus gang ba/ /bkrus te dbang du byas ba'o/ /de nas lag pa nas gzung ste/ /sgo bzhi dag
210a2(rgyud 'grel): nas 'jug par bya /der khyod de bzhin gshegs rigs zhugs/ /ngas ni khyod la ye shes gnang/ /de bzhin dngos grub grub? byed de/ /de lta bu ni khyod sbyin zhugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag zhugs par
210a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /oM badzra u da ka Tha/ /der khyod lha ni nga yin te/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob/ /dam tshig nyams na bsreg par byed/ /nga la brnyas par ma byed cig/
210a4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon la ni brnyas pa na/ /bde ba spangs nas dmyal bar ltung/ /oM di na te na ra ka na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /byin gyis brlab pa rgya chen nyid/ /bdag la rab tu zhu bas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la
210a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub/ /slob mas de zhus bla ma 'di/ /rdo rje bri bsgos snying gar bzhag/ 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags/ /ye shes rdo rje bla med 'dir/ /di ring nyid du 'bab par shog /oM badzra A be sha ya a a
210a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'chang gis snying gar dbab/ /'bab par byed de ma byung sbyang/ /yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya/ /legs par dor cig sems dpa' che/ /thar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /me tog gang la lhung pa de/ /de nyid khyod kyi rigs kyi
210a7(rgyud 'grel): lha/ /oM sarba bid pra tits+tsha ho/ /oM pra ti grih+na snga mi maM satwa ma hA ba la/ /de yis phreng ba mgo la bcing/ /rdo rje sems dpa' der khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed pa la brtson par mdzad/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de/ /rdo rje mig ni bla na
210b1(rgyud 'grel): med/ /de'i nyid du 'byed par shog/ he badzra ba sh+ya phaT/ rdo rjes gdod g.yogs dgrol bar bya/ /de nas sgo ba nas brtsams te/ /shAkya seng ge'i dkyil 'khor bstan/ /dbab par bya ba gang yin pa/ /de ni nye par bsdu par byas/ /de nas dkyil
210b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor shar ngos su/ /maN+Dal pad+ma 'dab brgyad pri/ /yi dam lha bsams dbang bskur bya/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis bum dbang bskur/ /oM sarba
210b3(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta a b+hiShe ka Ta sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM/ dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /rdo rje thugs su mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra a b+hi pany+tsa maM/ zhas
210b4(rgyud 'grel): sdad khams dag byed pa yi/ /dpal ldan chu yi dbang bskur bas/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /phyag na rdo rje'i dbang thob shog/ oM sarba thA ga ta badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ /phal pa'i sa ni gzhom pa dang/ /yon tan gzi brjid bskyed pa'i
210b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /rgyal ba gtsug tor rin chen gyi/ /cod pan gyis ni dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba Ta thA ga Ta mu ku Ta ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ /dpal ldan rin chen cod ban dbang/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas/ /ded bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje rin
210b6(rgyud 'grel): chen mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ratna swa b+hA bA a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ /nga rgyal khams rnams dag byed pa'i/ /cod pan gyi ni dbang bskur bas/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dbang thob shog /ratna a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM
210b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang de rang khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun tu rab bsgrub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra swa b+hA ba staM/ /chos kyi bar gsung rab dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum/
211a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms nas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje gsung du dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badzra a d+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ /'dod chags khams rnams dag byed pa'i/ /rdo rje yis ni dbang bskur bas/ /so sor
211a2(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa'i ye shes kyis/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang thob shog/ badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'bror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho ? cig tu bshad//
211a3(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi pa twi stwaM/ /dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu 'chad/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas/ /deng bdag byin gyis bslabs nas su/ /rdo rje'i lus ni mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha badzra swa b+hA ba i Shiny+tsa hUM
211a4(rgyud 'grel): phrag dog khams rnams rnam dag cing/ /dril bu yi ni dbang bskur bas/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i sku thob shog/ karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ /srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung/ /sdug bsngal chen po bsal ba'i phyir/ /shin tu
211a5(rgyud 'grel): bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ shAkya ser brtag tu bskyed/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi che ge mo a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi che ge mo a b+hi She ka ta/ /gti mug khams rnams dag pa yi/ /dpal ldan ming gis dbang bskur ba/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi
211a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyis/ shAkya med ga'i sku thob shog bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i las na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtal zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra tsit+ta swa b+hA
211a7(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa ga ta yA mi hUM hi hi hi hi hi phaT/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi phyed pa/ /gsang sngags bla na med pa yi/ /snying po yid bzhin nor bu 'di/ /skyob pa'i sngags kyis dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa
211b1(rgyud 'grel): mAM/ /slob dpon dbang bskur gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod cing gsol ba ltar/ /bdag kyang bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje bdag la gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba/
211b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba bskyang pa'i gzi brjid can/ /ji ltar ye shes 'byung gnas gtso/ /slob dpon chen po mi ldog pa'i/ /dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ /slob dpon
211b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po bdag la gsol/ /de nas dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /srog gcod rku dang 'khrig pa dang/ /rdzun dang chang ni spang bar bya/ /mi dge ba ni bcu po dag/ /khyod kyis nam yang ma spyad cig/ theg pa dman la mos pa dang/ /sems can
211b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khod ba ma sdang zhig/ lta ngan 'das la ma chags shig/ lta dang mi la brnyas mi bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ /'gongs par bya ba ma yin te/ /dam tshig 'di dag nyams pa na/ /rdo rje dma' bar 'tsher bar byed/ /de ba
211b5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig bus bsrungs shig slob ma'i lus la lha bkod do/ /slob dpon byed pa'i dbang bskur ba/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung//dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang
211b6(rgyud 'grel): bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta ThA ga ta a b+hi ya ba ra ti ka a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rgyal ba rnams kyis
211b7(rgyud 'grel): bsal/ /oM badzra ni tra a ba ha ra pa traM laM h+ri/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /bzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung/ /ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa/ /de ltar
212a1(rgyud 'grel): chos 'di shes nas su sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye/ /a dar sha a b+hi Shiny+tsam/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med de/ /bskal pa'i cho 'brul cing yang ?/ /bdud
212a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs thams cad pham byed pa'i/ /ye shes kyi ni mnga' 'phongs shig/ /dz+nyA na kA ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ /chos rnams nam mkha' i mtshan nyid/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /sku mchog mnyam
212a3(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du gsal/ /wA ga badzra a a/ /rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog ba med/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rang bzhin nyid/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs/ /a badzra satwa ci twa oM/ /'jig rten kun la thams
212a4(rgyud 'grel): cad du/ /sems can rnams la phan ba'i phyir/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul ba yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de ring phan chad 'jig rten du/ /chos kyi dud ni bla med pas/ /sems can ma lus blo rnams la/ /kun tu ma lus pa
212a5(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /gsang sngags sbyod pa'i tshul gyis na/ /'jig rten 'di la rab bsgrogs shig /'di nas brtsams nas byang chub bar/ /sems bskyang tsam gyi
212a6(rgyud 'grel): don rdzogs te/ /gser gyi gdugs 'dis sems can gyi nyon mongs gdung ba ma lus skyobs/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas kyang/ /phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang/ /kun tu byed la srung bar byed do/ /de nas
212a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gzengs bstod ? oM 'di ni khyod kyis lung bstan yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa kun tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton/ /kye de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo zhes
212b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba sid+hi sa ma ya stwaM/ /b+hu ra bu ba sbwa/ de nas rjes su gnang ba sbyin/ /oM ngo bo nyid kyi sems can rnams/ /ji lta ji ltar chags la sogs/ /gtsang mas sems can don bya'o/ /de nas bdug dbyung bya ba ni/ /oM gsang? ba'i dkyil 'khor
212b2(rgyud 'grel): dam pa 'dir/ /de rang phan ched khyed zhugs kyis/ /sdig pa kun las nges grol ba'i/ /khyed rnams der ni legs par gnas/ /bde chen theb pa rnams las ni/ /slang khyod 'chi ba yod min te/ /mtshugs pa dang mi smod pa/ /ces kyang mi
212b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /srid ba shin tu ngag ba'i phyir/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /khyed rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas nyid/ /de nyid the tshom med par thob/ /chos gos nas gzung lung bstan pa/ /oM pa yis rad ltar gung
212b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang/ /mgrin gcig rdzogs byang lung bstan mdzad/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum kun gyi rgyal po che/ /rgyal ba'i bdag por ston pa ni/ /de ni
212b5(rgyud 'grel): bdud pas rnam rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs so/ /khyed rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid/ /de nyid the tshom med par thob/ /de nas rgyas pa'i cho ga ni/ /mdor bsdu rnam par bshad bar bya/ /slob ma yongs su gzung ba ni/ /byang chub
212b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu sems bskyed nas/ /slob ma'i gdod ba g.yogs pa dang/ /dam tshig can du byin kyis brlag/ /dngos grub las ni gsol ba gdab/ /dam tshig mnan par bya ba ni/ /me tog lha la dor bar bya/ /rdo rje'i mig ni dbye bar byas/ /de nan
212b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ? tshugs te/ /lha rnams la ni mchod pa bya/ /mthong nas dkyil 'khor 'jug ba lnga/ shar lho nub byang dbus nyid du/ /cho ga rnam grangs bcu bzhi ni/ /der dag la rdzogs par bya/ /sgo bzhi dbus nas gsal ba gdag 
213a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub don la yid ches 'jug/ 'jug pa'i skal yod sgo phyed nas/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/ /snod du rung phyir phyag 'tshal nas/ /skyabs 'og tshud phyir gsol ba gdab/ /gnang bas slob dpon la?
213a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /yi ge brgya bas byin brlabs bcu/ /sgrib pa spyad pa'i khrus kyang bya/ /de la dam tshig dbog? pa dang/ /mi 'da' bar yod dam bcas la/ /mchod pa rnam lnga dbul bar bya/ /yongs su bsngo zhing smon lam gdab/ /dag ba'i rtsa ba bsngo
213a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gnas kyi don bshad cing/ /phyag rgya lha yi don bshad nas/ /rgyan dang cha rkyen bshad pa'ang bstan/ /bum pa la sogs ji snyed thogs/ /dbang bcu ci dgar bskur bar bya'o/ /sbyir sbyin byang chub dbu rgyan dang/ /kun
213a4(rgyud 'grel): la dbang skur 'khor lo bskor/ /las kyi rdo rje rgya gram dang/ /sgrib pa khru pa'i buM pa dang/ /mdzes pa'i me tog phreng ba dang/ /zil gnon bzod pa'i cod pan dang/ /'da' bar dka' ba'i phyag rgya dang/ /thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel
213a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /mi 'bral ba yi gzungs su ni/ /thun mong min pa'i gsang ba dang/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang mchog rnams/ /dbang rnams kun la mchog gyur ba/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /oM a b+hi Sh+ny+tsi a/ rin chen bdun pa rnam grags
213a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /gang gi rdzas su dper mi bzod/ /gser gyi 'khor lo dbang byed dang/ /glang po rin chen stobs chen dang/ /rta mchog rin chen mgyogs pa dang/ /nor bu 'od ldan re bskor dang/ /btsun mo rin chen gzugs ldan dang/ /blon po rin
213a7(rgyud 'grel): chen blo gros dang/ /dmag dpon rin chen rdzu 'phrul dang/ /de 'dra'i rin chen rnam phrags dang/ /byang chub yan lag bdun ldan pas/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug rkyen/ /'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa'i de yang
213b1(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod rkyen du shog/ oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ /nye ba'i rin chen ral gri dang/ /byams dang snying rje'i pags pa dang/ /'dod ldan skyed mos tshal dang ni/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong mda' gzhu dang/ /gos mchog yang dag skyabs ldan dang//
213b2(rgyud 'grel): lham mchog 'gro na stabs sdug dang/ /tshangs pa'i kha bskur bcas pa bdun/ /de yi rdzas mchog rnam grags bdun/ /rin chen bdun dang nye bar grags/ /des kyang longs spyod skyen du shog/ oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ /bkra shis rdzas
213b3(rgyud 'grel): su rnam grags pa/ /rdzas rnams kun la bkra shis pa'i/ /mthu stobs sgrub rdzas yungs kar dang/ /shin tu gtsang ba'i rtsa mchog dang/ /yan tan sdud pa li khri dang/ /bcud kyi dam pa gi baM dang/ /dan rnams gsal ba'i
213b4(rgyud 'grel): me long dang/ /chos sgra sgrogs ba'i dung mchog dang/ /gzi mdangs bskyed ba'i 'bras mchog dang/ /'bras bu smin pa'i bil ba dang/ /bkra shis rdzas kyi mchog 'gyur bas/ /de yang longs spyod rkyen du shog/ oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa a//
213b5(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis rdzas su rnam grogs pa/ /mtshan bzang kun las bkra shis bas/ /thugs kyi don rtogs dpal be'u dang/ /gzhan las dbang sgyur 'khor lo dang/ /bdud las rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshon dang/ /skyabs dang ldan pa'i gdugs
213b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang/ /skyen? gyis ma gos? pad+ma dang/ /sgrib pa sbyong ba'i bu pa dang/ /rgya mtshor shugs ldan dung mchog dang/ /thabs kyis 'phyo ba'i gser nya dang/ /sangs rgyas mtshan du bkra shis pa/ /de yang longs spyod rkyen du shog/ oM a
213b7(rgyud 'grel): b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ /dbang po lnga yi longs spyod rkyen/ /'dod ba'i yon tan lnga yi mchog/ sdug gu mdzas ba'i gzugs dang ni/ /'jam zhing snyan ba'i sgra mchog dang/ /dangs zhing zhim ba'i dri mchog dang/ /mngar zhing bcud ldan de mchog
214a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /mnyam thid 'jam pa'i reg bya dang/ /'dod ba'i yon tan lnga ru grags/ /de yang longs spyod rkyen du shog/ oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ /ma rig 'byed ba'i gser thung dang/ /chos rnams sgyu ma'i me long lhang?
214a2(rgyud 'grel): rkang ba'i 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /dud gi chos kyi sgra 'byin shog/ oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ /de sogs gzhan yang ci rigs bskur/ /lho sgo'i cho ga bya ba ni/ /stegs bu khru gang rnam lngas byugs/ /tsan dan dkar bo'i maN+Dal la//
214a3(rgyud 'grel): bum pa rdzas bcas me tog dgram/ /mtshan? cha gdugs dang smyug ma dang/ /bdag nyid/ shAkya seng ge yi/ /thugs kyi mnga' pa 'phros ba yis/ /las dang nyon mongs byed bzlog pa'i/ /yungs kar sngags kyis brdeb par bya/ mi
214a4(rgyud 'grel): da ma? bu rus la brabs/ /oM sarba a ba ya A karShaN bi sho d+ha na badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ /oM badzra bA ni bi sngo Ta ya sarba a ba ya ba? na ni bra mo k+Sha ya sarba a ba ya ga ta b+he(rgyud 'grel): sarba sa twa na sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ya phaT?/ oM
214a5(rgyud 'grel): sarba bad? A A bi sha/ /oM bde tra Ta tshind+ha a/ sa ra Na ni hUM phaT/ /oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga ti he tuM hUM phaT/ /oM ba tsa pa tsa sarba pra ta ka ga te he hUM phaT/ /oM ma tha ma tha sarba tir ya ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ /lha
214a6(rgyud 'grel): yi sngags la btags? te bya/ /rtsa ba'i sngags la 'di btags nas/ /de nas khrus kyis bkru bar bya/ /sarba bstan?/ sarba gra he/ sarba dzwe re/ sarba bya d+hi/ sarba u pa dra wa/ sarba a kA la mri tyu pra sha ma na ya/
214a7(rgyud 'grel): sarba durga swarba ? ma te bya ku ma tsha/ shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /nub phyogs bde gnas lam bstan bya/ /lam ni bar chad bsal te sbyang/ /zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ zhag bdun dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya/ /de bzhin
214b1(rgyud 'grel): bcug ste dbang bskur na/ /ngan song thams cad rnam grol te/ /bde 'gro mtho ris 'jig rten dang/ /sa rnams gong mar skye 'gyur te/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas su yang nges par 'grub/ /sder bzhin? las
214b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad byed/ /thams cad thogs pa med par 'gyur/ /byams pas rims nad gdon du sogs/ /thams cad kun las thar bar 'gyur de/ hUM brjod tsam gyis las rnams 'grub/ /chog zhir mo gzhan yang 'grub/ /lha
214b3(rgyud 'grel): klu gnod sbyin srin po sogs/ /ngan 'gro'i dbang du gyur ba yi/ /ro'am gzugs brnyan ming sogs bri/ /bzlas brjod sbyin bsreg dbang bskur grol/ /sku gzugs dri ba'i cho ga yang/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal bris//
214b4(rgyud 'grel): yang na dkyil 'khor tshul bris la/ /me tog la sogs mchod pa bya/ /spyan sngar bsnyen pa 'bum byas na/ /las rnams thams cad byed bar 'gyur/ /rdul mtshon tshur dor dbang yon dbul/ /ye shes gshegs la dam tshig
214b5(rgyud 'grel): bsdu/ /gtsug tor dgu ba'i cho ga 'di/ /sangs rgyas gsang bas phyi rabs don/ /ngan song sbyong ba'i rgyud las mdzad/ /'gro kun ngan song las grol shog /slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
214b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po sangs rgyas gsang ba dang/ many+dzu shI? barma dang/ bran ka mu tis bsgyur cod zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //ngan song thams cad yong su sbyong ba'i ro'i sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor gyi chog chos kyi
214b7(rgyud 'grel): grags bsam mdzad pa bzhugs so// */ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba du rga ti pa ri sho d+ha na ma ra tso? maN+Da lo pa yi ka /bod? du/ ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ro'i sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ /de bzhin gshegs
215a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bder gshegs gtso dang sras po dang po dang/ /rgyal sras lhag ma dang mi rigs kyi yul rnams
215a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /phyi nang lha mo sgo skyed bcas pa la/ /dngos po kun gyis dang pas phyag 'tshal 'dud rtsa ba'i rgyud las btus nas su/ /ngan song sems? cad sbyong mdzad ba'i/ /shi ba'i don du ro bsrag thabs/ /sangs rgyas gsang pa'i rim pa la
215a3(rgyud 'grel): brten de bdag gis bshad par bya/ /dang po bla ma rin po che mnyes par byas nas/ nges dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur ba dam tshig phog nas/ spyi dang khyad par gyi dam tshig la gnas pas sngar rang gi sgrub thabs kyi rim pas bsnyen
215a4(rgyud 'grel): pa byas pa dang/ bzlas brjod byas pas mtshan ma mthong bas/ bdag dang gzhan 'khor ba'i rgya mche las bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi bya pa la 'jug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor yo byad thams cad kyi rim bas bsnyen
215a5(rgyud 'grel): grangs bzang dang rgyu skar bzang po la/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi mtshan ma lta phyir grogs dang bcas pas de nyid brtag bya ste/ /lha khang chod? 'dus yul dang grong khyer khyams kyi shar dang byang du brtsam par bya/ /yang na bzang snum dang
215a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan chug rdu la sogs nyes med shar dang byang du gzhol/ /me tog chung ldan rang bzhin dag par bya'o/ /yang na sngags pa yid gang du dga' bar bya'o/ /de nas gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la lci bsel ma lhung bas maN+Dal bya//
215a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos? mchog gsum la phyi nang mchod pa bya zhing 'jig rtan skyong ba rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas sa gzhi gru bzhir bsam las bdag bsams te barko?/ /ston zla gsum la byang du bltas la barko/ /dgu na zla gsum la shar
215b1(rgyud 'grel): du ba las la barko/ /dbying zla gsum la lho ru bltas la bar ko/ /dbyar zla gsum la nub tu bltas la barko/ /mgo dang rgyab dang 'phongs bor ba'o/ /sa'i ro lnga la sogs pa bsal zhing yang ngo/ /dri zhim po dang sa bsras pa 'am/ dri zhim pa dang chu
215b2(rgyud 'grel): bsres pa la hUM bzlas pas bkang la 'thas par bcags la/ /lag mthil mnyam pa'i steng du gzhal yas khar rgyan dang bcas pa bsam/ /me tog phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan mang po dged/ /gtso bo'i bzlas ba byas pa'i sman? dang//
215b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dru dang rin po che dbus su bzhad de? zug rngu'i nyes pa thams cad ni/ /gal te dbyung bar mi nus ma /lag bas brdab ste sngags 'di bzlas/ /dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur/ /khang chen brag phub ba lang lhas/ /lha khang la sogs
215b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bab chu 'gram sngar? sbyang mi dngos/ /rang gtso bor bsgom zhing khro bo'i sngags kyis bgegs skrad chu dang yungs kar thal pa la bzlas ? ba'i rnam lngas byug cing di'i chab kyis gtor/ /khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas
215b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sman dang rin chen dbus su bzhug/ sa dag par byed pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas rnam dag mes pa yis/ gnang gi khrus gyis dag par bya'o/ /dang po sngags pa bdag gi dag/ dag par 'dod pas
215b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar bsam/ /lce la pi las skyes pa yi/ /pad+ma 'dab gcig bskyed bya ste/ /de steng yi ge a las ni/ /bskyed pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse ldang bskyed/ /rdo rje lce ste thim byas nas/ /rdo rje lce zhes bya ba ste/ /sngags
215b7(rgyud 'grel): bzlas mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/ /lag gnyis mthil du zla gnyis bsam/ /de yang yi ge a las so/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse lngar bskyed/ /shin tu dkar ba lag pa la/ /thim bas rdo rje lag par bshad/ /phyag rgya gang yin bcing bar
216a1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rdong dril g.yon blangs lag bzhag ste/ /rdo rje snying rje byang chub sems/ /dril bu stong pa'i bdag tu brtag/ de ltar bdag gis bsgom byas la/ /spyi por dkrel te ? sku? ? la phyogs
216a2(rgyud 'grel): bcur bsgrag /de nas lan gsum gyen phyang dgrol/ /de gnyis gcig gis gcig 'khyud de/ /rdo rje lan gsum gser byas te/ /thugs kar brtan pa spyan drang pa/ /dril bu'i sgras ni dgyes pa bskyod/ /de ltar byas na nus pa
216a3(rgyud 'grel): skyed/ /gza' skar sogs dus gzung bya ste/ /slob dpon rang lha'i rnal 'byor byas/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su 'du gnas su/ /bsgrub pa'i rim pas bgegs bskrad de/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs par bya/ /snying gnas byung
216a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sprul/ /'khor las 'phros sprul pa yis/ /nam mkha' i khams su khyab bsams te/ /de la 'di skad gsol ba gdab/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dang/
216a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad dang/ bcom ldan rangs kun rig rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dkyil 'khor
216a6(rgyud 'grel): du bcas pa/ /khyad rnams bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la byin gyi brlab cing srung ba'i phyir bzhugs su gsol/ /zhes bskul te/ /snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i dbus su bsdus nas gcig tu gyur par bsam/ /de nas ?
216a7(rgyud 'grel): lus lnga'i nga rgyal byas la langs mig gson Ta las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ /gnyis pa ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ 'bras bu gnyis la yi ge hUM/ 'bar ba'i lta bas me ltar 'bar bas rdo rje'i mig /a las sna tshogs rdo rje
216b1(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa'i 'og tu bsam/ /rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol/ /rgyan cha dang ldan gtso bo'i nga rgyal bskyed/ /rdo rje 'gros kyis bskor ba bya zhing dril bsil rdo rje bskor/ /bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i phyir ni mgo mig btud? la/ 'di brjod slob dpon
216b2(rgyud 'grel): ming 'di zhes bya bas/ slob ma che ge co bzhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang/ mdza' yas ba'i sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /sa phyogs 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po ros
216b3(rgyud 'grel): bsregs hoM kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba 'bri yis/ /lha dang lha ma yin dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ yi dags dang/ sha za dang/ rjed byed dang/ 'byung po dang/ ? gro mdag rnon po dang nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ rig sngags
216b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chang grub pa rgan po dang/ rgan mo dang/ 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dangs shing/ de ltar phyag na rdo rje'o bka' thos nas myur du dengs shig/ gang dag mi 'bro bar sems pa de dag ni/ phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba rab
216b5(rgyud 'grel): tu khros pa'i bzhin 'bar ba can gyi ya shes 'bar ba rab tu rdo rje chen po 'bar bas mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /hUM shes lan mang du brjod/ /rang las spral ba'i khro bo grangs med pa shin tu 'jigs pa byung ste/ bgegs
216b6(rgyud 'grel): chang bcad nas nam mkha' khyab par 'khyil cing bzhugs so/ /g.yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i stang stabs skabs 'dir bya'o/ /gom pa brgyad pa yang bya'o/ /hUM rgyun ma chad par bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu bskor ro/ /stang stabs bya'o/ /de
216b7(rgyud 'grel): nas dbang ldan nas brtsams te/ skor phyogs su phur pa rnams la bzlas shing gser gye sa bzhi la thug pa'i bar du btab par bsam/ /oM bai ro tsa Na hUM/ sarba big+hAn u tsa ya hUM phaT/ de nas rnam par snang mdzod kyi phyags 
217a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya bcas la/ hUM brjod cing nga rgyal bskyid sngags kyang brjod/ /de'i rnal 'byor bya ste/ nam mkha' la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gang bar nga rgyal bskyed la/ /grogs po rnams kyis
217a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid la gsol ba btab par bsam mo/ /de bzhin gshegs ba kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol//
217a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs/ /kun tu bzang bo sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i mchog mi chos las byung/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba
217a4(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /
217a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas langs la nam mkha' khyab ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA da ya banda naM ka ro mi / zhes pas zhabs la phyag bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bas bstong la/ /langs la da
217a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bskyed pa 'di brjod do/ /bdag nyid rang bzhin rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po bdag/ phyag na rdo rje ston pas
217a7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag/ byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu blangs la/ oM badzra ut+tiSh+Tha/ zhes pas ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol/ /yang stang stabs g.yas
217b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad? la sogs pa bya'o/ /sa gzhir rdo rje gyur par bsam mo /gzhal yas khang yang nam mkha' la dmigs la rdo rje mig gis bgegs med par mthong nas /sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo dbye ste/ sngags pa la rdo rje rgya'i gzugs lto
217b2(rgyud 'grel): bar che ba dbu bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa/ rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang/ pad+ma dang ral gri bsnams pa/ /sku mdog ser por bsgoms te/ de la 'khor lo btsud? la/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas bkub la/ /oM badzra maN+Da la hUM phaT ces? pas rgyu nyid
217b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur bas sa gzhi grub bar 'gyur te/ de nas 'dis byin gyis brlab par byas/ oM mahA badzri tsikra uTTi Sh+Tha bid+ha hUM/ /de nas khu tshur gnyis btsangs te/ /'khor lo bzhin du bskor bar bya/ /'khor lo byin gyis brlab ba'o/ /de nas tsan dan
217b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar po me tog dmar po/ /dar dmar pa'i rgyan dang bcas pa'i bur pa /lag ba g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis gzung la g.yas pa thob rgyan dang bcas pas brdud do/ /dbang ldan nas brdams? te/ oM badzra kro d+ha kI li kI la a sarba
217b5(rgyud 'grel): big+han hUM phaT/ phur pa gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra sung ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM/ tho ba'i sngags so/ /de nas rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgyas bgegs bsdad/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gsum gyis phyi rol tu/ 'khor lo dang/ pad+ma dang/ rdo rje
217b6(rgyud 'grel): ra ba dang/ sa gzhi yang rdo rjer bsam/ 'bur ba'i phreng ba 'od dang bcas par bsgom/ bgegs bskrad cing gtso bo'i sngags dang rdo rje bu tshur gyis sgo bcad bar bsam mo/ /de nas yi ge laM las byung ba'i sa'i lha sku mdog ser mo dum
217b7(rgyud 'grel): pa lag na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas/ mchod pa bya zhing tshogs su bcad pa 'dis sta gon du bya'o/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod ba'i tshul dang
218a1(rgyud 'grel): khyad par ni/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo byod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob ba shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /sa'i lha
218a2(rgyud 'grel): mo dga' ba'i mdangs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig zer nas 'og tu thim mo/ /de nas rdo rje bsdams pa dang sngags 'dis gzung bar bya'i/ /oM badzra b+ha ba hUM zhes brjod/ /oM badzra d+hi da uTa TiSh+Thi zhes pas byin gyis brlab pa'i tshog? pa
218a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas dri bzang po la sogs pas byugs la/ me tog sna tshogs pa chal bar dgram mo/ /dkyil 'khor du lha rnams ji ltar gnas pa'i ming brjod maN+Dal re rer bya'o/ /rab dang dra ba la sogs pas mtshams bcad nas/ rnam par snang
218a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ zhabs bsil dang/ zhal bsol dang/ yon chab dang/ mchod pa brgyad dang gzhan gyis kyang mchod/ bstod pa bya ste nam mkha' o/ /bdag rang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug nas sgrub thabs
218a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba bzhin du bgegs bsal nas/ /sems dpa' i skyil mo dkrung du 'dug la/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la nga rgyal bskyed de sems dag par bya zhing/ 'di brjod la/ deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag
218a6(rgyud 'grel): gi gson pa'i 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig gos mnyam par/ /'gyur bar bdag ni the tshom med/ /byang chub sems gtsig pas/ /mi ldeg par ni bdag 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni/ /deng bdag
218a7(rgyud 'grel): skye bar the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la/ sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /ma lus phyogs na
218b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /tshe 'das 'di yis don du ni/ /rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub de ni stsal du
218b2(rgyud 'grel): stsol zhes lan gsum brjod pa snga ma bzhin bsams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ /de'i steng du oM la sogs pa rang rang gi yi ge bkod la/ /lha 'khor dang bcas pa so so'i gnas su bzhugs par
218b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /de'i 'og tu nam mkha' i ye shes sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dbang du byas te/ dam tshig sems dpa' dang gcig tu bya'o/ /de nas zhabs bsil zhal bsil mchod yon
218b4(rgyud 'grel): lha so so'i 'khor bcas bzhugs su gsol te dbul so so'i sngags la/ /oM bai ro tsa na arb+haM pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ /mchod yon gyi sngags so/ /de la sogs pa'i mchod pa lnga phul la bstod pa dang phyag bya'o/ /de nas gser ram dngul lam zad
218b5(rgyud 'grel): la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa bya'o/ /ma 'byor na khams pa la bya'o/ /de nyid dngos po med par bsams la/ yi ge khams las byung ba nag po ra ri med pa mgrin pa ring ba/ /lto ba che ba mchu 'phyang ba bsgos la/ de'i nang du h+ri las pad+ma /de'i steng du
218b6(rgyud 'grel): a las zla ? dkyil 'khor de'i steng du ma las nye ma'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du lha'i 'khor lo bsams la/ de rnam par dag par gyur pa las bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar bsams te/ de nas dri chu blugs la /mar dang 'o ma la sogs
218b7(rgyud 'grel): pa stsal/ sman lnga dang 'bru lnga dang rin po che stsal/ de yang lung las/ bya g+hi saM tri kar Ni ka/ ha sa ha sa de ba ste/ /sman sna lnga zhes bya ba ste/ /las rnams kun la 'di dag bzung/ /'bras kyi so ba mon sran bre'u/ /nA dang gro dang tii dang
219a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga/ /las kun la ni 'di dag shis/ /shel dang dngul dung bya ru mu tig ste/ /rin chen lnga zhes bya ba yin/ /sman lnga byang chub sems kyi rtags/ /'bru lnga thugs kyi rang bzhin te/ /rin chen bder gshegs sku mdog rtags/
219a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'o/ /bum pa la 'khor lo'i bdag po lnga'i mtshan ma la sogs lnga dang ldan bar bya zhing/ dkar po dmar po ser po ljang gu sngon po'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i ras? mgul ba bcing bar bya'o/ /ma 'byor na sar ba zhig gis sbyir bcing
219a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /shing 'o ma can 'bras bu can gyis kha brgyan bya'o/ /gtso bo'i phyag rgya bstan/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya bstan/ /gtso bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ stong rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /yang na oM badzra u da ka Tha
219a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bzlas la bzhag go /me tog dkar po chal bar bkram ba ras bting ba'i steng du bzhag go /de nas mchod yon chu dang bcas ba la sogs pa bshams la/ mchod pa chen po'i zhag par du/ /nyin re la lan gsum du ting nge
219a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin dang mchod pa dang bzlas pa bya'o/ /bzlas pa ni bskyed ba la'o/ /de nas zhu bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor bskor la/ dang por dbus su/ /de nas so so'i gnas su bzhag go /bum pa'i grangs lha grangs ji tsam yod pa de
219a6(rgyud 'grel): tsam mo/ /ma 'byor na bcu drug las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad ba'i bum pa la bgegs bskrad pa'i sngags bzlas te/ sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa la mchod pa byas te/ phyi rol du byang shar mtshams su bzhag par bya'o
219a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad du gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ khyed kyis dkyil 'khor ma rdzogs bar du bgegs mi rungs pa rnams bsrung du gsol lo/ /bum pa sta gon gyi cho ga'o// //de nas phyi rol du song la rnam par snang mdzad
219b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnal 'byor du gnas la/ /phyogs skyong gi gtor ma gtad do/ /grub na zhi ba'i sbyin srig bya'o/ /de nas slar dkyil 'khor gyi sar zhugs nas/ snga ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ lce byin gyis brlab ste/ oM pad+mas ? sti a pa ra
219b2(rgyud 'grel): ha ya sho d+hA ya hUM ra d+hi/ des lce byin gyis brlabs nas/ lag tu bdug spos thogs la bus mo sa la btsug nas/ /'di skad gsol ba gdab bo/ /rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/
219b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag la rtse bar gyur nas su/ /tshe 'das 'di la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod ba'i phyir/ /sad mi dkyil 'khor 'bri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de bas gnang bar mdzad par rigs/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten
219b4(rgyud 'grel): mgon brtse dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang/ /gsang ba'i lha gzhan gang lhags dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang/ /gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang/ /gang su lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' 
219b5(rgyud 'grel): brtsems/? /bdag ming 'di la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sang ni dkyil 'khor bzang po'i ming/ /'di zhes bgyi ba ci nus kyis/ /cho ga bzhin du bris lags na/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /
219b6(rgyud 'grel): chogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /ye shes 'bar ba'i bsreg khang 'dir/ /tshe 'das sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ /'bras bu rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dam tshig rdzogs par mdzad 'chal?
219b7(rgyud 'grel): gyig sta don la ni gnas par mdzod/ /sems dpa' chen po phal rnams kyang/ /gtso bo'i dam tshig rjes dgongs te/ /ye shes 'bar ba'i bsrag khang 'dir/ /tshul bzhin du ni spyan 'dren gyis/ /sta gon la ni gnas par mdzod/ /sder bcas
220a1(rgyud 'grel): lha klu mthu chen rnams/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du/ /phyogs dang mtshams su spyan 'dren gyis/ /sta gon la ni gnas sar mdzod/ /rgya drug 'kho ba'i sems can rnams/ /ye shes 'bar ba'i bsreg khang ?
220a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa rgya chen gtod lags kyis/ /sta gon la ni gnas par mdzod/ /sngags mkhan dam tshig rdzogs pa dang/ /rdzas dang cho ga ma nyams par/ /tshul bzhin du ni bsags lags kyis/ /sta gon la ni gnas par mdzod/ /
220a3(rgyud 'grel): ces pa lan gsum gus pa dang bcas par brjod/ /de nas sems dag pa nas bstod pa dang phyag bya ste/ phyi rol tu byung nas slob ma ste gon la gnas par bya ste/ dam? por lus bkru ba dag pa dang/ gtsang ma 'gos la snyim pa me
220a4(rgyud 'grel): tog gis bkang nas/ slob dpon la phyag byas la/ gsol ba gdab bar bya'o/ /dga' chen khyo ni bdag ston pas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /

220a6(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyis/ /slob mtshan nyid dang dan pa la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin gyis/ /bu tsh+r theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags sbyor tshul cho ga ni/ /khyed la yang dag bstan bar bya ba rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas gang
220a7(rgyud 'grel): 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon pa/ /da ltar byud ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dang de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang po 'di mkyen das/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad

220b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /dus 'dzin ma ni sangs rgya'i bar/ /bla med bdag la gzigs su gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /de nyid bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa
220b7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar gyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /nam
221a1(rgyud 'grel): ? yang ni mi gtong ngo/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar dgye/ /slob dpon ngag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/
221a2(rgyud 'grel): nyin re zhing ni lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung/ /las kyi rigs mchog
221a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po yi/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan bar ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod ba'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung/ /mgrol ba ni dgrol bar dgyi/ /ma rgal
221a4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin rnams dbugs phyung bgyi/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la 'god/ /bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas myur bsgrubs nas/ /sems can 'khor ba'i rgya
221a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshor bying ba rnams/ /bla med byang chub nyid du bsgral bar bgyi/ /de nas gson po la byed na so shing sbyin ba 'am/ mchod pa bya ba dang/ so shing bor la pra brtag pa dang/ dri chus kha lag bkru zhing 'thor 'thung bya ba dang/ slob ma
221a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams dga' ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o/ /de nas rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i ku sha stan dang sngas byed du gzhug/ de nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ba'i bsrung skung dpung pa g.yon bar gdags /de nas bzhin bzang langs shig
221a7(rgyud 'grel): sang gnyin mo khyed rnams kyis/ /bar pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi/ /grong khyer chen po mthong 'gyur gyis/ /yang mchod pa lnga byas te gtor ma btang/ /yang na ni dkyil 'khor la phyi nang gi mchod pa rgyas par bya'o/ /gnas de
221b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid du ku sha stam pa seng ge'i nyal stabs su rmi lam blta ba'i phyir mi smra bar bsam gtan gyis nyal bar bya'o/ /nang par gab sbas med par rmi lam bstan par bya'o/ /bzang na rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /dngos grub 'os ba stan par bya'o
221b2(rgyud 'grel): dan na ba'i rnam lnga la khro bo'i sngags bzlas la thung du gzhug bsrung bar bya'o/ /grub na dgra po'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas snga ma bzhin du/ /phur bu dang ra ba dang 'dra ba dang phyogs bcing bar

221b6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs par gyur bar bsgom/ /mig g.yas g.yon gnyis la nyi ma dang zla ba bsams te/ oM dIb+h+ri driSh+Ta aM ku shi dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa bzlas pas lcags kyu 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin byung nas/ rnam par snang
221b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa 'gags ba ? te/ ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas gnas pa'i/ /'di skad ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /lha tshogs ma lus pa la gsol ba btab la/ /zhabs la kyi bcom ldan 'das rnams dkyil 'khor thig
222a1(rgyud 'grel): gdab rdo rje srang bu stsal du gsol/ de nas ye shes spyan gyis gzigs nas/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i thugs ka nas byung ste/ lcags kyu 'dra ba'i tshul gyis rang gi lag tu 'ongs par bsam mo/ /rnam
222a2(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad mdun du dmigs la/ a dza na ji ka swAhA zhes brjod la bsgril bar bya'o/ /de nas tsandan bzang po la sogs pas legs par bskus ba'i gser gyi snang la sogs par legs par bzhag la/ me tog la sogs
222a3(rgyud 'grel): bas yang dag par mchod de/ rdo rje mig byas la/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzung la 'di skad ces gsol ba gdab bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mdza' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po sems can rnams kyi
