238a7(rgyud 'grel): ? ces zlos shing dkyil 'khor phyis la/ dam ? la sogs pa chung dor bar bya'o/ /de nas phur ba yang gdon/ de nas ru ru sdu ru dzwa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa na sarba artha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ba'i ? mas phur bu dang/
238b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan thams cad bkru bar bya zhing/ khang bu yang dag bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga byas pa las/ /bdag gis dge ba gang bsags des/ /bad ba gnyis med dam ba de/ /'jig rten kun gyis rtogs dang shog /'phar?
238b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rdo rje gtsug tor rgyud las btus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon d+harma kA rtis? mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A sya d+harma pA la dang /zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong
238b3(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i blo gros kyis gtan la bab pa'o// //ngan por thams cad yongs su sbyod ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i bya ba mdor bsdus? ba slob dpon kun btab snying pos mdzad pa ?// */ /rgya gar skad du / sarba du rga ti pa ri sho d+ha
238b4(rgyud 'grel): ne saM k+Shista nA ma/ bod skad du/ ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i bya ba mdor bsdus pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
238b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i/ /shAkya seng+ge phyag 'tshal nas/ /ngan song thams cad spyod don du/ /lung gzhan cung zad bshad par bya/ /de la dang por rnal 'byor pa'i dbang phyug gis mi phyed bzhi rigs rnams gson pa'i bar chad du gyur pa'i du su rdo rje'i
238b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs can rnams 'chi ba'i dus byas ba'i ? song yongs su sbyong ba'i cho ga byed par 'dod pas ro dang nye ba'i gnas su stan pa skyil me krung bcas paS 'dug ste/ oM swa d+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+honyahaM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la
238b7(rgyud 'grel): mgrin bar yi ge h+ri yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma/ de'i steng du a las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje rnon par bsgoms te/ rdo rje'i lce rnam par bsams pas sngags zlos pa mthu dang ldan bar 'gyur ro/ /lag pa
239a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gan rgyal du byas pa'i lag pa'i mthil du a las byung ba'i zla ba la/ hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa kha dog dkar po sprul te/ lag ba'i mthil du thim par bsgoms la/ lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba bcings la/
239a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lag par rdo rje'i bar du sbyor bas phyag rgya bcir ba mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lci ba ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i tshong? du byugs la/ tsan dan dkar pos kyang byugs te ku shas chu dang ba'i rnam lngas gtor ?
239a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bru lnga dang sman lnga dang rin po che lnga nang du byugs pa mgrin pa ges sngon pos bcings pa'i bum pa ku shal nye bar bzhag par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed nas bzung ste rdo rje rtse mo mthar thug pa'i phyag rgyas bsrung ba'i 'khor
239a4(rgyud 'grel): le rnam par bsgom par bya ste/ ra ba dang gur bcings ba sgom la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor la me tog gi tshom bu sigs? gtor la/ 'khor lo'i chags dang bcas pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor nam mkhar bsgoM
239a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /me tog sogs kyis yang dag mchod/ /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya/ /lha dang lha min dri za dang/ /klu dang 'byung po lto 'phye che/ /gnod sbyin srin po yi dags kyis/ /nam mkha' bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /
239a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /yon tan brjod pa bsgom bya ste/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas yi sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas mdzad ba mchog mdzad legs/ /ngan song thams cad legs sbyangs nas/ /'gro rnams byang chub thob
239a7(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad/ /lha dang klu sogs thams cad kyis/ /thal mo rab tu sbyar byas te/ /shAkya seng+ge phyag 'tshal nas/ /de nyid du ni mi snang 'gyur/ /de rjes yi ge a las na/ /bskyed pa'i zla ba snying gar te/ /de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor
239b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor bkug nas ni/ /snying gar ru ni gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs kyis/ /dgug gzhug bcing la dbang du bya/ /dkyil 'khor rnam gnyis legs bsres te/ /ro gcig tu ni rnam par bsgom/ /
239b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ba ni thams cad du/ /rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba/ /de yi dbus su bdag gis dngos/ /shAkya seng+ger bsgom par bya/ /de nas shAkya thub pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags kha dog dkar po
239b3(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ sngags kyi 'od zer rnams kyis khams gsum po snang bar byas nas/ dmyal ba dang yi dwags dang byol song gi sems can ngan song ba rnams 'od zer gyis bkug par ldan par bltas la/ dkyil 'khor du bcug pa dang
239b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ba thams cad kyis de nas sems can thams cad la dbang bskur ba dang ldan par blta bar bya'o/ /de ltar dbang bskur tsam gyis ni/ /khams gsum pa'i sems can kun/ /sangs rgyas sras dang mnyam bkod nas/ /dri ma
239b5(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i khyad par gyis/ /de nas sems dga' ba yin/ /bstod ba'i tshig rnams brjod par byed/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa/ /khams gsum pa yi 'gro kun gyi/ /ngan song thams cad sbyong mdzad pa/ /shAkya seng ge phyag
239b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rang gi de nyid ston mdzad pa/ /rdo rje gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnyam pa'i ye shes bsgoms pa yis/ /khams gsum la gnas
239b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la/ /dbang bskur ? tu stsol mdzad pa/ /rin chen gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /so sor kun rtog rang bzhin las/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi char 'bebs pa/ /sems can dbugs 'byin mdzad pa'o/ /pad+ma gtsug tor phyag
240a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir/ ? bya ba rjes grub rang bzhin can/ /'phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa po/ /sna tshogs gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum 'od kyis gsol
240a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad nas/ /sems can kun la thugs brtse bas/ /bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa po/ /gtsug tor gzi brjid phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid bzhin nor bu rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /sbyin pas sems can thams cad kyi/ /bsam
240a3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /gtsug tor rgyal mtshan phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag /gcod cing bdud bzhi'i stobs bcom nas/ /sems can byang chub thob mdzad ba/ /gtsug tor rnon? po phyag 'tshal
240a4(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /khams gsum 'gro ba thams cad kyis/ /gdugs dkar gyis ni brgyan ba yi/ /chos kyi rgyal po thob mdzad pa/ /gtsug tor gdugs dkar phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu /gar ma lha mo bzhi bo dang/ /spos
240a5(rgyud 'grel): dang me tog mar me ma/ /dri yi lha mo phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dad sogs ngo bo las byung pa'i/ /sgo yi dbus na gang bzhugs pa/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /sgo bsrung rnams la phyag 'tshal bdud/ /sgo bzhi
240a6(rgyud 'grel): yi ni legs dag na/ /khyams la sogs par bzhugs mdzad cing/ /rab dga' la sogs gnas mdzad gang /byang chub sems dpa' phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /tshangs pa drag po zla ba sogs/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dag
240a7(rgyud 'grel): me dang srin bo rlung lha dang/ /'byung po'i bdag po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ces bya ba'i tshig 'dis bstod cing dril bu dkrol bar bya'o/ /sgros nas dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ste/ khams gsum po stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /
240b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas stong pa nyid las yaM raM baM laM las ? ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /suM las byung ba'i rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can gyi ri rab bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su 'brus las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang gru bzhi la sogs pa'i sems can dang
240b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'o/ /de'i dbus su 'khor lo rtse bas brgyad ba/ /de'i lte ba las gnas pa'i seng+ge'i gdan no/ /de'i steng du a las byung ba'i zla ba la thabS dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can gyi sngags bzlas te/ oM mu ne mu ne na hA mu ni swAhA/ gsang sngags
240b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni yongs su gyur pa las/ shAkya'i rgyal po rjes su dran par bya/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya 'dzin/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /rim gyis rnam par 'byed pa ni/ /rgya 'di chos kyi 'khor lo ste/ /
240b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba thams cad gcod byed yin/ /'di yi dbe ni 'di 'dra ste/ /ji ltar pad+ma la chags pa'i/ /bud ba la sogs bsdams pa bzhin/ /de bzhin pad+ma'i 'dab phye na/ /bcings pa'i sdug bsngal thar bar byed/ /de bzhin 'khor bar sems can
240b5(rgyud 'grel): ? /srid gsum 'khor bar bcings pa las/ /thugs rje'i bdag can shAkya yi/ /seng ges bcings ba las grol mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kar zla ba la sngags kyi yi ge bsgom par bya ste/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te sarba
240b6(rgyud 'grel): tu ? d+ha dzi rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arha te/ samya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tadya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ne sarba pA laM ? d+ha ne shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne swAhA/ /sngags 'dis rdo rje gtsug tor nas bzung nas
240b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lcags kyu'i bar du? rdzogs par bya'o/ /oM badzra hUM phaT ces brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas phyung ste/ sems can thams cad snang bar byas nas/ ngan song thams cad bzhi bar byas te/ shar gyi rtsibs kyi pad+ma dang 
241a1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la gnas pa'i hUM las skyes pa'i rdo rje gtsug tor sku mdog dkar pos gnon gyi phyag rgyas yang dag par bzhugs pa'o/ /oM ratnat+ta ma tAM gis lho'i rtsibs kyis pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rin chen gtsug tor sku
241a2(rgyud 'grel): mdog sngon po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa khams gsum pa la dbang bskur bar mdzad pa'o/ /oM pad+mat+ta ma tri:yis nub kyi rtsibs kyi pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i pad+mar gtsug tor sku mdog dmar po bsam gtan gyi phyag
241a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya 'dzin pa/ sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'o/ /oM bi shot+ta ma a zhes pas byang gi rtsibs kyi pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i sna tshogs gtsug tor sku mdog ljang gu mi 'jigs pa stsol bas sems can 'khor ba
241a4(rgyud 'grel): las sgrol bar mdzad pa'o/ /oM gyi sa bon las byung ba'i gtsug tor gzi brjid me ri mtshams kyi pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa/ sku mdog dkar dmar phyag g.yas na nyi ma bsnams pa g.yon dkur brten te bzhugs pa/ khams
241a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa snang bar mdzad pa'o/ /hUM gi sa bon las byung ba'i gtsug tor rgyal mtshan bden bral gyi rtsibs kyi pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa/ sku mdog dmar nag yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa ser sna sbyong
241a6(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad pa'o/ /d+hi'i? sa bon las byung ba'i gtsug tor rnon po rlung gi rtsibs? kyi pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa/ sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo ba phyag g.yas na ral gri g.yon na glegs bam bsnams pa/ nyon mongs pa dang nyi pa'i
241a7(rgyud 'grel): nyan mongs pa yang dag par gcod par mdzad pa'o/ /kriM gi sa bon las byung ba gtsug tor gdugs dkar po dbang ldan gyi rtsibs kyi pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa/ sku mdog dkar po gdugs bsnams pa chos kyi bdag po thob bar
241b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o/ /hUM twaM h+rI a'i sngags kyis sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi mtshams kyi cha'i pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa/ sku mdog rigs kyi rim pa bzhin no/ /me tog la sogs pa gra'i cha'i pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa/ sku mdog dang sngags de bzhin du sgro bar
241b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas oM sarba saM ? rab ri shud+d+ha d+harmA te ga ga na sa mung+ga te mahA yA na pA ri bA re swAhA zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis byams pa la sogs pa bcu drug spro bar bya ste/ shar gyi sgo'i logs gnyis su byams pa la sogs bzhi dgong
241b3(rgyud 'grel): de/ /byams pa mdog ser po pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba la sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas na klu shing me tog g.yon ni ril pa spyi blugs 'dzin pa byams pa'i thugs kyi bdag nyid can no/ /
241b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa mthong ba don yod ni mdog ser po pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba la bzhugs pa/ g.yas pan pad+ma spyan dang ldan pa/ /g.yon pa khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /gsum pa ngan song sbyor ba ni sku mdog dmar po/ /lcags kyu 'dzin
241b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /bzhi pa mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'jom pa'i blo gros ni mdog dmar ser / g.yas na dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /lho'i sgo'i logs su dang po spos kyi glang bo mdog dkar ljang/ phyag g.yas dri'i
241b6(rgyud 'grel): glang po'i/ /gnyis pa dpa' par 'gro ba ni shes dang zla ba'i mdog can g.yas na ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /gsum pa nam mkha' i mdzed ni mdog dkar ser g.yas pa ni pad+ma la gnas pa'i chos kyi mdzod do/ /bzhi pa ye shes tog ni mdog sngon
241b7(rgyud 'grel): po g.yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /nub kyi sgo logs su dang po ni 'od dpag tu med pa bla ba'i mdog can phyag g.yas pa na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /gnyis pa zla 'od ni mdog dkar po phyag g.yas pa na pad+ma
242a1(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i zla ba 'dzin pa'o/ /gsum pa bzang ? ni mdog dkar dmar phyag g.yas ma rin po che 'bar ba 'dzin pa'o/ /bzhi pa dra ba can gyi 'od ni mdog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje'i dra ba 'dzin
242a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nas byang gi sgo'i logs su rdo rje snying po mdog sngo zhing dkar ba la/ phyag g.yas pa na utpal rdo rje dang ldan pa'o/ /gnyis pa blo gros mi zad pa ni kun da dang zla ba ltar dkar ba phyag gnyis na ye shes kyis bum pa 'dzin pa
242a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa sbobs pa rtsegs pa ni zangs kyi mdog can phyag gnyis na pad+ma la gnas pa'i rin po che brtsegs pa 'dzin pa'o/ /bzhi pa kun tu bzang po ni mdog ser po phyag g.yas na rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa'o/ /byang chub sems
242a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' thams cad ni pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ g.yon pa khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /dza yi sa bon las byung ba/ /shar du rdo rje lcags kyu ni/ /zla ba dkar ltar mdog 'chang zhing/ /
242a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /hUM gi sa bon las byung ba'i/ /rdo rje zhags pa sngo? ru ste/ /sku mdog ser po 'dzin pas gnas/ /phyag na zhags pa yang dag bsnams/ /baM gi sa bon las byung ba'i/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog nub tu ste/ /sku
242a6(rgyud 'grel): ? legs par mdzes/ /phyag na lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): yi sa bon las byung ba'i/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa byang du ste/ /sna tshogs mdog ni 'dzin pas gnas/ /phyag na dril bu yang dag bsnams/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor
242a7(rgyud 'grel): bskyed nas so so'i sngags brjod par bya ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM na ma:sarba durka te pa ri sho d+ha ni rA dzA ya/ zhes bya ba la sags pa nas te sngags brjod par bya'o/ /sems ni rnam par g.yeng pa'i rlung?
242b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur pas phyi rol gyi phyag rgya bcing bar mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pas dkyil 'khor ba so so'i phyag rgya so sor ma brtan to/ /sarba bid sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne /mu ne hUM phaT shAkya thub pa'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bid sku hUM rdo rje gtsug tor gyi'o/
242b2(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba bid? trAT rin chen gtsug tor gyi'o/ /oM sarba bid h+ri h+ri pad+ma gtsug tor gyi'o/ /oM sarba bid a(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs gtsug tor gyi'o/ /oM sarba bid oM oM gtsug tor gzi brjid gyi'o/ /oM sarba bod hUM hUM gtsug tor rgyal mtshan
242b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi'o/ /oM sarba sid+d+hi? phaT gtsug tor rnon po yi'o/ /oM sarba bid kraM twaT gtsug tor gdugs dkar gyi'o/ /oM sarba bid mahA badzrod b+hA ba dA na par mi tA pu dze hU / sgeg mo yi'o/ /oM sarba bing mahA badzrod b+ha ba shI la ? ra mi tA pA dza twaM phreng
242b4(rgyud 'grel): pas yi'o/ /oM sarba bid mahA badzrod b+hA bak+Shan ti pA rim tA pU dze h+ri glu ma yi'o/ /oM sarba bir ma hA badzrod b+hA ba bIr ya pA ra mi tA pU dze a/ gar ma ya'o/ /oM sarb bid sarba ya pA ya / bi sho d+ha ni d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hu pA ya/ d+hyan pA ra
242b5(rgyud 'grel): miNA? hU? dze hUM phaT bdug pa ma'i'o/ /oM sarba bid sarwa du rba ti pa ri sho d+ha ni kle sha tshe da na duShpa bi lo ka ni pra dzthA bA ra mi tA pU dza traM hUM phaT me tog mi'i'o/ /oM sarba bid a pa ya bi sho d+ha midz+nyA? A lo ka ka ri pra Ni d+hi na pA ra mi tA pA dze hUM phaT mar
242b6(rgyud 'grel): me ya'i'o/ /oM sarba bid sarba a pa ya gand+ha be nA sha ni badzra gan/ u ba ya pA ra mi tA pU dza a hUM phaT/ dri ma'i'o/ oM sarba bid na ra ka ga ti A karSha Ni hUM dza:phaT rdo rje lcags kyu'o/ /oM sarba bid sarba na ra ka ut+ta ra Ni hUM hUM phaT(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zhags
242b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i'o/ /oM sarba bidr sarba a pa ya/ band+hu? na be mo tsa ni hUM? baM phaT rdo rje lcags sgrog gi'o/ /oM sarba bid sarba a pa ya ga ti ga ha na bi sho d+ha ni hUM ho phaT/ rdo rje 'babs pa yi'o/ /oM mai tri ha ra NA ya swAhA/ /oM a ma g+ha pa ra ? hUM/ oM
243a1(rgyud 'grel): sarba sho ka ta mo na ni te na ma ti hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pa ya dza ta sarba a pa ya bi sho d+ha ni hUM /oM gand+ha ha sti ni hUM / oM shu ri ga me hUM/ oM ga ga ne ga ga na mo tsa na hUM/ oM dz+nyA na ke tu dz+nyA na pa ti hUM
243a2(rgyud 'grel): oM a mri ta pra b+he a mrita lA nyi hUM/ oM tsan+d+re tsan+d+ra bya ba lo ki te swAhA/ oM b+ha dra ba ti b+ha dra pA le hUM/ oM dzA la ne mahA dzA la ni hUM/ oM badzra band+he hUM oM ak+Sha ya du du ak+Sha la karma A ba ra ? bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ /oM pri ti b+hA nas/
243a3(rgyud 'grel): pra ti b+hAn kU Te swAhA/ /oM sa man+ta b+ha de hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags lan re re de dag so sor brjod pa/ de nas phyis 'khor los myur? ba'i snying po'i 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam par yang dag par spros pa/ shi ba'i rnam par shes ba bkug la
243a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba ris drug kyang do/ /yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid nam mkha' la gnas par bya ste/ gos sngon pos mgul bcings byas pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis byin brlabS byas la de nyid kyi sngags bzlas la/ mkhas pas rtag tu mchod par bya'o
243a5(rgyud 'grel): shi ba'i rus pa'am ming yang rung ste skyes pa 'am bud med gson po gang yang rung ste/ shing ro kha ba la me sbar te phyir bzlog par bya ba ni/ nim pa dang yungs kar bsregs la sngags dang phyag rgyas bstan par bya'o/ /oM sarba pA baM
243a6(rgyud 'grel): da ha ra badzra che ge mo'i sarba pA paM dang/ sdig pa thams cad bsregs pa'i sngags de me'i dkyil 'khor du bsnun par bya'o/ /chad dang chur ldan pa'i bum pas de'i sdig pa bkru bar bya ste/ oM sarba A ba ra Na da ha na badzra hUM phaT/
243a7(rgyud 'grel): khrus kyi ljags kyis ngan song gi dri ma dag par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la zan dang chur bsres pa las sdig pa zhi bar rab brtags la/ de nas snod du gyur pa'i dri ma lhag ma gzhom par bya ste/ de nas phyir zlog pa bya ste/ yungs kar dang
243b1(rgyud 'grel): me tog kugs sgrib pa thams cad dag par bya'o/ /sngags dang ldan pa'i bla mas phyag rgyas brab par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la phyir bzlog ba bya ba ni yungs kar gyis bya ste/ yungs kar me tog dang ldan pas yang dag par brjod cing brang par
243b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /brab pa'i sngags ni oM sarba bA paM pi sho d+ha na badzra hUM phaT/ oM sarba karma A ba ra Na ni b+hasmi ku ru hUM phaT / oM bruM bi nA sha ya A ba ra Na ni dza:hUM phaT / oM druM bi sho d+ha ya A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM dzra la dzra la ? kA ha na
243b3(rgyud 'grel): ha na A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM sruM sha ra sha ra pra sha ra pra shar A pa ra na ni hUM phaT / oM hUM ha ra ha ra sarba A ba ra Ni na hUM phaT / oM bri ta bri ta sarba A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM traT traT sarba A ba ra Na ni hUM/ oM yin?
243b4(rgyud 'grel): tshinda sarba A ba ra N+Na? ni hUM/ oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ga / te te hu na hUM phaT / oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ga ti he hun hUM phaT / oM ma tha ma tha sarba tidya ka ga ti he tun h+rUM phaT/ ces bya ba'i sngags 'dis bsnun brangs la na mi khA
243b5(rgyud 'grel): la bzhag par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i thabs khung gi dbus su/ hUM las byung ba'i me lha mdog dkar po shes rab 'khyud pa phyag na ril pa spyi blugs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang dbyug pa dang/ bsrang? phreng
243b6(rgyud 'grel): can blta ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bkug nas bsad gtor dang mchod yon dang zhabs bsil phul te/ yongs su dag pa'i me la thim par blta'o/ /bsreg rdzas rnams so sor lan bdun phul te dgang blugs dbul bar bya'o
243b7(rgyud 'grel): de la nye rig phul te de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyi me ru yang dag par blta ste/ de'i thugs kar ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor gyi 'khor lo 'khor dang bcas pa zhugs par bsam mo/ /de nas 'khor los sgyur ba nas brtsams te/
244a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyi sngags kyi sbyin sreg dbul lo/ /de'i rjes nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid la oM sarba bid sarba A pa a bi sho d+ha na hUM phaT swAhA/ /zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis ngan song
244a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par sbyangs la/ 'khor los sbyar ba'i bkas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa spro pa'i sbyor pas ngan song nas dkug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing pa dbang du bya ba la/ 'gro ba laM yang dag par bstan ba'i sngags 'di brjod pa nyid kyis bcom ldan
244a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyi thugs kyi zla ba la yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid bzhugs par bltas te/ oM ratne ratne na tA ratne ratna sam d+ha be ratna ki ra Ne ratna mA lA bi shud+d+he sho d+ha ya sarba pa baM hUM phaT/ lam yang dag par bstan pa'i sngags so/ /de nas bcom
244a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das la yi ge gsum kyi bdag nyid ro gcig par gyur te/ spro ba'i sbyor bas rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur ba dang ldan par bltas la dril bu dkrol te/ dgang gzar mar gyis gang
244a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dbul bar bya ste/ oM padme padme pad+ma u da b+ha be su kha ba dyaM gats+tshan tu swAhA/ oM sarba bud+d+ha k+She tra gats+tshan tu swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dgangs blugs dbul lo/ /nyi rig dang so rtsil sogs pa phul dkyil 'khor ba ril
244a6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la thim pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du bzhugs par bya'o/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba byas nas dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol bar
244a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ oM khyed kyi sems can don kun mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pas gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas nyi ma gsum pa 'am bdun pa la snga ma bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms la 'o mas yongs su gang ba'i snod du rus pa
244b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bzhag ste/ ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags thams cad rims kyis brjod cing / yungs kar me tog dkar po dang ldan pas dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o/ /khrus byas nas kyang ngan song sbyong ba'i sngag smang po bzlas te/ de nas
244b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis 'khor lo'i bza' ba dang ston mo ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su sbyad la/ shis pa brjod la ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin par bya'o/ /gang zhig sems can bsam pa'i ? ni/ /mdo ru yang dag bsdus can byas pa la/ /bstan bcos mthar
244b3(rgyud 'grel): son mkhas pa yis/ /bdag la bzod pa mdzad par rigs/ /bsod nams 'di yi sbyor pa yis/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can kun/ /nyon mongs rgyan tsho las brgal nas/ /bde ba can du 'gro bar shog /ngan song thams
244b4(rgyud 'grel): cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i bya ba mdor bsdus ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a nan+ta pa ra he ta'i zhal snga nas kyis// //?/ /rgya gar skad
244b5(rgyud 'grel): du/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA h+ri da ya sA b+ha ni/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i sgrub thabs / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dus gsum rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis
244b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhi yin lam yin 'bras buAng de/ shes rab mi dmigs shes rab snying po gtso bo dbyer med pa/ /sku gsum dkon mchog gsul la dbyer med lus ngag yid btud nas/ /rgyal yum rig brgyud dang dang shes rab thob phyir bri//
244b7(rgyud 'grel): dad dang shes rab sngon 'gro skyabs dang sems bskyed cing/ /brtson pas grol 'dod bzod ldan sdug bsngal med spangs nas/ /'jig rten chos brgyad bsam btang nas ni cha mnyam ste/ /'dod yon mo chags khrims ldan ci 'byor
245a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod dang sbyin/ /shes rab sbyangs pas shes rab don shes shes rab spyod 'dod pas/ /rgyal ba'i gnas dang chos 'di gnas su shes rab snying po sgrub/ /gang la ma chags phyin drug ldan pas khrus byas la//
245a2(rgyud 'grel): rten la maN+Dal mchod bshams stan la mnyam 'dug ste/ /bdun brgya'i bsngags brjod sngags kyi bden pas bden/ /rten der phun sum tshogs pa sngar bsags spyan der drangs/ /shes rab pha rol phyin thob shes rab pha
245a3(rgyud 'grel): rol phyin/ /thal? mang gdul bya 'dul ba'i chos rnam pha rol phyin/ /rgyal ba'i yum gyur rgyal ba'i sras bcas la/ /bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum dang gus deng nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan gyi 'jig rten na//
245a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod par 'os pa'i gzugs sgro dri dag dang/ /ro dang reg bya thugs dang mi 'gal ba'i/ /gtsang dang ma nyams dman par ma gyur pa'i/ /chu gtsang bsil dang me tog khyad par can/ /dbyibs legs dri zhim kha dog sna tshogs
245a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes/ /tsan dan gur gum ga bur la sogs sbyar/ /so sor bsregs pa'i bdag pa ji snyed dang/ /nyi zla ltar gsal rin chen 'od 'bar ba'i/ /rin chen sgrol ma mar me mdzod pa'i 'od/ /gla rtsi tsandan hUM lu ga sogs legS
245a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar dri/ /sku mdzes don du byi dor byug ba rdzas rnams dang/ /sman dang 'bras chan shing tog tam bo la/ /yun ring 'tsho ba rnams kyang rim par dbul/ /sgra bsnyan dbyangs dang bril snyan rol mor bcas/ /rin chen bdun dang
245a7(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gzhan rnams dang/ bkra shis rdzas brgyad gnang yang bkra shis rdzas/ /bdag gis lus ngag yid bcas khyed la dbul/ /rgyal sras thugs rje can gyis bdag gzigs la/ /'gro gzugs bde bar bya phyir
245b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhes su gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta zhes de nyid bsdus pa'i sngags kyis dbul/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas la bdag re gnor/ /'khor bar ma rig lus ngag yid gsum gyis/ /mchams med la sogs sdig pa'i las bgyis dang/ /bgyid
245b2(rgyud 'grel): du stsal dang rjes su yi rang bshags/ /da ni 'jigs dang rgyal sras khyed dbang las/ /lus ngag yid sdig slan chad mi bgyid do/ /rgyal sras khyed dang 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag na/ /'gro rigs dge ba theg pa rim gyis sbyod byed pa'i//
245b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal 'bras bsreg so so'i dge la bdag yi rang/ /yi rang dge de zag med 'gro la so sor sngo/ /kun gyi skyabs chen rgyal sras skyabs dag la/ /deng nas bzung ste bdag kyang skyobs bar mdzod/ /skyabs gnas khyed ltar bdag kyang sems bskyed pas/ /khyod
245b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgod ltar bdag spyod 'gro ba'i don byang sog /rgyal sras khyod kyis sna tshogs sku sprul la/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i rim bar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /'gro ba so sor bde lam byang chub ma thob par/ /rgyal ba sas bcas mya ngan 'da' 
245b5(rgyud 'grel): btsugs? par gsol/ /phyag 'tshal mchod sogs byas pa'i dge ba rgya chen de/ /'gro la bsngos pas 'gro ba so sor bde ba dang/ /ma grol grol dang ma bsgral bsgral dang dbugs phyin dang/ /mya ngan ma 'das pa dag mya ngan 'da' 
245b6(rgyud 'grel): bar shog /rgyal sras dbang por rgyal sras lta bur bdag gis ni/ /tshad med bzhi bsgom rgyal ba sras bcas gnas su gshegs su gsol/ /shes rab pha rol phyin shes dngos po rnams stong pas/ /swa b+ha'i sngags kyis stong
245b7(rgyud 'grel): par bzlas pas dngos stong dang/ shAn+ya ta brjod gzung ba dang bral 'dzin med gnas pa med par blo mnyam bzhag /mnyam pa'i ngang las ri rgyal dmigs byas la/ /de las rims kyis byung bas gling rnams chags /ri
246a1(rgyud 'grel): steng ? bad a las zla ba dang/ /seng ge'i khri la rin po che'i khri/ /rin chen yon tan rgyan rnams legs gsal nas/ /khri steng pad+ma sna tshogs lte ba la/ /yi ge maM seng 'phros 'dus las/ /'og tu zla ba
246a2(rgyud 'grel): a li las/ /steng du lA? li nyi ma grub/ /de'i steng du 'phrong du las/ /lte bar zla ba mi gnas pa/ /thams cad gcig gyur bcom ldan 'das/ /shar du pi las yum nyid bzhengs/ /lho ru hUM las phyin rdo rje/ /nub du maM las
246a3(rgyud 'grel): shA ri'i bu/ /byang du h+ri las spyan ras gzigs/ /bcom ldan gser mdog chos 'chang phyag /rdo rje skyil krung gtsug tor bcas/ /spyan yangs mthing ga mdzod bur ldan/ /sku yi sgo nas 'od zer dgyes/ /yum ni longs spyod
246a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan can ?/ /gser mdog sku ni shin tu rgyas/ /pad zla rgyas pa'i gdan la bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis mnyam pa'i ting 'dzin bzhag /g.yas pa chos 'chad pa dang ldan/ /g.yon pa pu ti 'dzin pa'o/ /phyag na rdo rje zhal gcig
246a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sngon po g.yas na rdo rje bsam/ /g.yon na pad+ma 'dzin par byed/ /rin chen gyis rgyan skyil krung bcas/ /shA ri ser po dka' thub gzugs/ /chos gos gsum dang bsil byed g.yas/ /bus gtsugs g.yon na lhung bzed
246a6(rgyud 'grel): thogs/ /lus ngag bsdams nas gnas pa'o/ /mgon po byang sems spyan ras gzigs/ /rgyan mdzes sems dpa' i skyil mo krung/ /g.yas na pad+ma mchog sbyin dang/ /g.yon na pad+ma bu ti 'dzin/ /de rnams zla ba'i gdan
246a7(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs/ /gsal bar gyur nas phyogs kun tu/ /byang chub sems dang nyan thos gzugs/ /'gro ba so so'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ /steng 'og phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rang rang mdog dang mtshan mas bskyed/ /de nas bdag po'i
246b1(rgyud 'grel): mig sogs la/ /k+ShaM dzaM khaM gaM skaM saM rnams/ /zla ba pad+ma gdan spro bsdu/ /de nyid gsum yang gnas gsum du/ /sbyong bsdu mtshan ma gsum du bsgom/ /ye shes gzhug dang dbang bskur dang/ /mi bskyod? la sogs so sor bzhag/ shA ri'i spyi
246b2(rgyud 'grel): bor rgyal ba nyid/ /gsang dbang spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin/ /mgon la 'od dpag yum nyid la/ /mi bskyod gnas la mchod pa dbul/ /'o thug spro ba sdu mdun gyi yum/ /bdag la bsdus la snying po'i don/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos//
246b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bdag gis gsal bsgoms la/ /spyan ras gzigs dang der sems la/ /shA ris zhus dang lan btab pa'i/ /mdo don skabs shes don dam bsgom/ /skyo na bden pa'i sngags 'don te/ /ta dya thA dang oM spel nas/ /ga
246b4(rgyud 'grel): te ga te pa ra dang/ /ga te pa ra saM ga te/ /bo d+hi swA hA zhes brjod la/ /snying khar pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /maM ser dag la g.yas skor bgrang/ /bsaM gtan 'dod na 'khor rnams dang/ /bdag nyid yi ge maM la bsdu/ /de la rim bskyed 'khor rnams la//
246b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog don sngags kyi 'khor rnams kun/ /sgrib sbyang bdag 'drar gyur pa la/ /rgyal ba'i yum nyid bsten pa yi/ /dge ba bdag gis ci byas thams cad ni/ /sems can kun la byang chub phyir bsngo bas/ /bdag gzhan shes rab snying po
246b6(rgyud 'grel): thob par shog /rjes la sgyu ma'i blo yi langs/ /lha'i snang ba la gnas la/ /bya ba thams cad rgyal bas spyad/ /ci spyad mthar phyin lam yin pas/ /sems gnyis phyin drug sems kyis bya/ /'di bon shes rab snying po ste/ /rmi lam sgyu mas
246b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma a brjod bya/ /dka' bas klu'i la gnas blangs/ /yun ring mdo rnams legs sbyang la/ /rgyal yum 'di byas dge ba yis/ /'phro bas shes rab yum thob shog/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa snying po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po klu sgrub snying po
247a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bai ro tsa na dak+Shi ta dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba klan chung gse bsgyur pa'o/ /slang kyis stag lo tsa bas bcos pa'o// //
247a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du / pradz+nyA dA pa mi tA h+ri da ya sba d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig 
247a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon du byas gyur las/ ra? gzhi thams cad mkhyen mdzad pa'i/ /rgyal yum de la rab btud de/ /sgrub thabs chog dran par bya/ /dben zhing nyams dga' i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /snying gar pad+ma lte'i nyi stengs su//
247a4(rgyud 'grel): saM? las 'od 'phros phyogs bcu nas/ /rgyal bsras bcas spyan drangs te/ /nam mkha' i phyogs su gnas par bsam/ /mchod dang nyes pa bshags par bya/ /rjes su yi rang gsol ba gdab/ /sgrubs 'gro sems bskyed blang bya zhing/ /byang chub

247b2(rgyud 'grel): par bsam/ /d+ho'u? me las shA ri'i bu/ /dka' thub cha byang sku mdog ni/ /dmar skya pus btsugs thal mo sbyar/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i sku nyir bsam/ /byang du kun dga' ? las skyes/ /dmar po rgyal la gus pa'i tshul/ /padmo'i steng du

247b4(rgyud 'grel): ma bskyed rin 'byung ?/ /mdza' yas rgyal ba nyid kyi mtshan/ /yi ge gsuM gyis byin gyis brlab? g.yum? gyi thugs kar rgyal ba nyid/ /bsdus te ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs nas/ /dris dang lan gdab stong pa'i don/ /'khor rnams kun la
247b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin par bsam/ /'di ltar chos kun rab zhi las/ /spros pa'i 'khor kun yum la bsdu/ /mtshan bcas ting 'dzin yi ge la/ /dmigs te gsal la mi rtog bya/ /bzod nas zhi ba'i chos kun ni/ /rkyen dbang 'khrul par rab snang
247b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /de nyid che na zhi ba nyid/ /zhi tshe sgyu ma lta bur snang/ /mdza' bzhar? mi rtog bral par min/ /bying rgod mi gnas sems nyid ni/ /'od gsal cir yang ma bsgom pa/ /mtshan med rnal 'byor pha rol phyin/ /rgyal bas zhi bar
247b7(rgyud 'grel): rab gsungs dang/ /gcig dang du ? sogs pas/ /spros pa ? pas mi rtog shes/ /rnam par rtog dang yang dag rtogs/ /gal te skyon bzlas byas te/ /tadya thA/ oM ga te ga te/ pa re ga te/ pA ra sa pa te/ po d+hi swAhA//
248a1(rgyud 'grel): ma la rab bskor 'od zer ni/ /sgro sdus? don byas sngags kyi 'od/ /lte ba'i ? yi bar du bskor/ /ye shes sems dpa' mchod la gshegs/ /stong pa bco brgyad brjod bya ste/ /dam tshig ser sa dpa' thams cad
248a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /gzhal yas khang ni mi dmigs bya/ /rgyal ba'i bka' dang nA gArdzun yis/ /gsungs pa la brten mos rnams don dang ni/ /bdab nyid sbyang phyir cho ga thabs mchog byas/ /mkhas rnams blo yi dri ma bzod par mdzod//
248a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di la ngal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nges/ /'gro rnams rab sbyang snying po'i don shes nas/ /rgyal pa'i go 'phang rab tu thob gyur te/ /'gro rnams zhi ba'i lam la 'god par shog/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsgrub thabs/
