248b2(rgyud 'grel): par gyis/ /sems can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba dpal kam pa las mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pA?  bka' 
248b3(rgyud 'grel): sh+ri dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang por kyi sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis zhus pa// //#/ /rgya gar skad du/ ta tra tab+hA sA ka Na dI pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid
248b4(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar byed pa'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtog pa kun las nges grol gar/ /mtshan med stong pa'i ngo bo can/ /? ma de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /de nyid gsal
248b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bri bar bya/ /yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma 'di la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i sgo nas shes par byas nas/ de khong du chud par bya ba yin na yang phal che'i spyod yul ma yin pas kho mos ni sgra las 'das
248b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa 'di bstan te/ dang por sems mi g.yo par 'dug pa slob par 'dod pas lus sams ngal dub med par byas nas gnas bde bar gnas bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying dbus su/ /chu skyes dkar po 'dab bzhi'i dbus/ /praM?
248b7(rgyud 'grel): ni dkar po bsam par bya/ /btan gyur rim pas sgra la da ni gas/ /de nas pad+ma 'dab brgyad dang/ /brgya gi bar du spro bsdu bya/ /de nas mi g.yo brtan gyur nas/ /dmar rnamS la bsnyen bkur gyis/ /de kho na gsal bar byad pa'i sgrol ma
249a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ dpal kam+ba la'i yum gyis mdzad pa'i rim ba rdzogs so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor ? gzhel bya? so// //rgya gar skad du
249a2(rgyud 'grel): pra dz+nyA pa ra mi TA maN+Da lo ba yi ka/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spros pa'i mtshan ma las 'das pa/ /yum
249a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /bde gshegs kun 'byung dam pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya/ /dam tshig la sogs thob pa yis/ /dang por re shig bdag med par/ /mos pas nang gi khrus byas la/ /gnyis pa
249a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi yi khrus kyang byas/ /mgrin bar pad+ma bsam par bya/ /mdun gyi 'dab mar as skyes ba'i/ /zla bar rdo rje rtse lnga bar/ /bskyed de lce der thim par bya/ /rdo rje lcer ni bsam byas nas/ /sngags bzlas ba la nus par 'gyur/ /lag
249a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis la yi ge as/ /zla bar rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /yi ge hUM gis bskyed byas te/ /kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya/ /lag pa'i nang du thim byas nas/ /phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed nas brtsams
249a6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo thams cad kyang/ /rdo rje ri bo'i mthar thug par/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag slob dpon gyis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor bar ni/ /rdo rje rab dra ba sogs//
249a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs mtshams bcing bar bya ba'o/ /de nas de'i rjes thogs la/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /gsung mchog sras dang bcas pa rnams/ /mdun gyi nam mkhar bsam par bya/ /phyag byas na sni me tog dang/ /bdug pa dre
249b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas mchod/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa ltar/ /mchod pa nyi shus mchod par bya/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags bya zhing/ /rjes su yi rang bskul ba dang/ /de bzhin gsol ba gdab pa dang/ /sems can kun yi? thun mong bsngo
249b2(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa gzung dang sdig pa bral/ /ye shes dbab dang ngan song dgug /sdig pa dral bar bya ba'o/ /bdag nyid sems dpar bskyed nas kyang/ /byin gyis brlab bar bya ba'o/ /de nas de yis rdzas nyid la/ /sngags pa gzhan la phan brtsom ?
249b3(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid ni rab bsgoms nas/ /yi ge hUM las byung ba yis/ /rlung gis dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te/ /ri rab gling bzhi rab tu bskyed/ /de yi steng du mkhas pa yis/ /rdo rje rin chen las grub pa'i/ /gzhal yas khang ni sgrul par bya//
249b4(rgyud 'grel): de yi gnas su a siM as/ /seng+ge'i gdan ni bcu gcig bskyed/ /seng+ge'i gdan ni dbus ma la/ /pad+ma la gnas zla ba la/ /de steng bdag nyid 'dug nas kyang/ /stong pa nyid du rab bsgoms nas/ /de yi rjes thogs nyid la ni/ /bdag nyid kyi
249b5(rgyud 'grel): ni snying ga ru/ /d+hi las pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /de yi dbus su a las ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam/ /de dkyil yi ge d+hi bkod de/ /de yi 'od kyis bla ma dang/ /phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs rab tu mchod/ /de nas d+hi de las
249b6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba/ /pad+ma shes rab pha rol phyin/ /glegs baM dag gis mtshan pa 'am/ /'di dag yongs su gyur pa las/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i yum gyur pa/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i yum/ /rdo rje
249b7(rgyud 'grel): skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /sku mdog dung ltar dkar ba la/ /g.yas pa mchog rnams sbyin mdzad cing/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ni/ /pad+ma la gnas glegs bam ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /bsam gtan
250a1(rgyud 'grel): dag la rab gzhal ba/ /dri zhim me tog gis brgyan pa'i/ /ral pa'i cod pan brgyan pa'o/ /de lta bu yi yum mchog la lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya/ /snying ga lkog ma smin mtshan pa dang/ /spyi bo dag
250a2(rgyud 'grel): gi gnas su yang/ /dam tshig phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab/ /sbyor ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// //phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor dag tu ni/ /pad+ma la gnas zla dkyil du/ /d+hi mo bcu ?
250a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba las/ /rdzogs pa yin tshul nyid du/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gdon par bya/ shar phyogs par gnas zla dkyil du/ /bde gshegs dkon mchog 'byung gnas no/ /sku mdog dmar skyar gnas pa la/ /g.yas
250a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rin chen mchog sbyin mdzad/ /g.yon pa lte ba khung du brtan/ /de nas go rim bzhin du ni/ /bde gshegs mya ngan med pa ni/ /sku mdog nam mkha' lta bu la/ /phyag g.yas 'khor lo 'bar ba bsnams/ /g.yon pa lte ba khung du
250a5(rgyud 'grel): brten/ /bde bar gshegs pa gsum pa ni/ /rin chen gyi ni 'od 'phro ba/ /dung ltar dkar ba'i sku mdog la/ /g.yas pa mche ba gtsigs pa bsnams/ /g.yon pa lte bar brtan pa'i?/ /byang phyogs zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rgyal
250a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba /sku mdog ljang gu 'bar ba la/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /g.yon pa lte bar brten ba'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa lnga pa ni/ /ting 'dzin glang po dam ba'i dpal/ /bcom ldan 'das gser gyi
250a7(rgyud 'grel): mdog 'dra ba/ /phyag g.yas chos ni 'chang pa la/ /g.yon pa chos gis 'dzin pa'o/ /bde gshegs pad+ma dam pa'i dpal/ /sku mdog dkar ba nyid la ni/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /g.yon pa lte bar brten pa'o//
250b1(rgyud 'grel): bde pa gshegs pa bdun pa ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang pa'i dpal/ /s? dog rin chen mar gang la/ /phyag g.yas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams/ /g.yon pa lte bar brten pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i bde gshegs ni//
250b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas gdugs chen dam pa'i dpal/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od du 'bar/ /g.yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje la/ /g.yon pa lte bar brten pa'o/ /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas ni/ /dka' bar byed pa'i sems can la/ /sku mdog utpal
250b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon po la/ /phyag g.yas rin chen bum pa bsnams/ /g.yon pa dku ru brten pa'o/ /bde gshegs bcu pa zhes bya ba/ /pad+ma dam ba'i dpal zhes bya/ /sku mdog gser ltar 'bar ba la/ /g.yas pa pad+ma bsnams pa la//
250b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyis lte bar brten pa'o/ /bde gshegs 'khor gyi sems dpa' ni/ /g.yon pa pad+ma 'dzin pa la/ /g.yas pa rang gi mtshar ma 'dzin/ /rang gi rigs kyi mdog 'dzin pa'o/ /zla ba pad+ma ldan pa la/ /a yi sa bon las
250b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan sems dpa' che/ /mdog dkar chu srin rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /traM gi sa bon las byung ba/ /sems dpa' dbang phyug rgyal po ni/ /nam mkha' i mdog can lcags kyu bsnams/ /tri yi sa bon las
250b6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba/ /bkod pa'i rgyan gyi sems dpa' che/ /mdog dkar me tog utpal bsnams/ /rin chen 'od 'phro ljang gu mdog /rin chen 'ong 'bar bsnams pa'o/ /a yi sa bon las byung ba/ /sems dpa' snang mchog dkar ba ma/
250b7(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /hUM gi sa bon las byung ba/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ /sku mdog lde la mda' gzhu bsnams/ /traM gyi sa bon las byung ba/ /sems dpa' sbos kyi rgyal po ni/ /za ma tog bsnams dmar
251a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i?/ /o kyi sa bon las byung ba/ /sbobs pa brtsegs pa ljang gu la/ /gser g.yu can gyi tor bsnams pa'o/ /h+ri yi sa bon las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rgyal po dkar pa la/ /?  byed pad+ma bsnams
251a2(rgyud 'grel): ba yi sa bon las byung ba/ /pad+ma dam ba mdog sngon la/ /pad+ma bye ba bsnams pa'o/ /hUM gi sa bon las byung ba/ /sems dpa' rdo rje mi g.yo ba/ /mdog dmar po ti bsnams pa'o/ /a yi sa bon las byung ba thobs ma r rgyal
251a3(rgyud 'grel): po sems dpa' yang/ ljang gu'i mdog can lcags kyu bsnams/ /traM gi sa bon las byung ba/ /rin chen dbang phyug sems dpa' ni/ /dung ltar dkar ba'i sku mdog la/ /rin chen zur brgyad bsnams pa'o/ /traM gi sa bon las
251a4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba/ /grub pa'i las ni sems dpa' che/ /nam mkha' i mdog tu gnas pa la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /i yi sa bon las byung ba/ /dga' ba ston pa'i sems dpa' mi/ /dmar ba'i me tog la me long bsnams
251a5(rgyud 'grel): a yi sa bon las byung ba/ /mi g.yo'i sems dpa' bsam gtan tshul/ /sku mdog ljang dgu dag tu'o/ /ba yi sa bon las byung ba/ /sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje yang/ /sku mdog dud? ltar dkar pa la/ /phyag na rdo rje bsnams
251a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /h+ri ya sa bon las byung ba/ /byams dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /sku mdog nam mkha' mdog can la/ /pad+ma 'dzin par gnas pa'o/ /traM gi sa bon las byung ba/ /? ba'i snying po sems dpa' ni/ /sku mdog mar
251a7(rgyud 'grel): gang lta bu la/ /za ma tog gi phyag mtshan bsnams/ /k+Sha yi sa bon las byung ba/ /ga le snying po'i sems dpa' ni/ /ljang gu'i mdog tu 'dab pa/ /rin chen myu gu bsnams pa'o/ /? gi sa bon las byung ba/ /sems
251b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' kun tu bzang po yang/ /mdog dkar rin chen lte ma bsnams/ /mu yi sa bon las byung ba/ /sems can kun la 'jam ba'i dpal/ /nam mkha' i mdog ltar ral gri bsnams/ /a yi sa bon las byung ba/ /sems can kun gyi sgrib
251b2(rgyud 'grel): sel kyang/ /pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can la/ /utpal sngon po bsnams pa'o/ /me yi sa bon las byung ba/ /byams pa mchog tu 'dzin pa de/ /ljang gu'i mdog can 'gun d+he bsnams/ /pad+ma'i sa bon las byung ba/ /sems dpa' mthu chen
251b3(rgyud 'grel): thob pa yang/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i mdog can la/ /rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams ba'o/ /aM gi sa bon las byung ba/ /nyon mongs nang sel sems dpa' ni/ /sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ /nam mkha' i mdog tu gnas pa la/ /bdud rtsi bum
251b4(rgyud 'grel): ba bsnams pa'o/ /traM gi sa bon las byung ba/ /yon tan snying po sems dpa' ni/ /mar gang lta bu'i mdog can la/ /rin chen snye ma bsams pa'o/ /a yi sa bon las byung ba/ /mthong na dga' ba'i sems dpa' ni/ /in+d+ra
251b5(rgyud 'grel): ni la'i mdog can la/ /klu shing lo ma bsnams ba'o/ /a yi sa bon las byung ba/ /sems dpa' gzhon pa'i rgyan chags pa/ /ku mu da yi me tog bsnams/ /dung ltar dkar ba'i mdog tu'o/ /hUM gi sa bon las byung ba'i//
251b6(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu dam pa'i sems dpa' che/ /nam mkha' i mdog can ral gri bsnams/ /tri yi sa bon las byung ba/ /seng+ge 'dra bas seng+ge sgra/ /dmar ba'i mdog la dud bsnams pa'o/ /hUM gi sa bon las byung ba /rdo rje spyan gsal sems dpa' ni//
251b7(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu'i mdog la sbyan gnyis bsnams/ /haM gi sa bon las byung ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong ni/ /mdog dkar buM pa bsnams pa'o/ /traM gi sa bon las byung ba/ /sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas ni/ /nam mkha' i
252a1(rgyud 'grel): mdog can sdong bu bsnams/ /tri yi sa bon las byung ba/ /sems dpa' dpa' bar 'gro ba ni/ /dmar ba'i mdog la ral gri bsnams/ /a yi sa bon las byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu rgyal//
252a2(rgyud 'grel): ljang khu'i mdog can zla ba bsnams/ /traM gi sa bon las byung ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes tog /dung ltar dkar ba'i mdog can la/ /gser gyis rgyan pa'i tog bsnams pa'o/ /A yi sa bon las byung ba/ /mya ngan
252a3(rgyud 'grel): kun 'joms sems dpa' ni/ /nam mkha' i mdog can ral gri bsnams/ ta yi sa bon las byung ba/ /sems dpa' blo gros mi bzang pa/ /dmar ba'i mdog la pu ti bsnams/ /A yi sa bon las byung ba/ /ye shes 'od zer sems
252a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ni/ /'od dang bcas pa'i rdo rje bsnams/ /sku mdog ljang gur gnas pa'o/ /lA sye la sogs lha mo brgyad/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan gdan la sogs/ /sgo srungs bzhi dang bcas pa dag/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las byung bar bsams//
252a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// //'di dag gi phrin las ni sems can thams cad kyis byang chub rnam pa gsum thob par mdzad pas na las kyi rgyal mchog
252a6(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ /de nas rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcas la bsdu bar bya'o/ /'od zer gyi sgo las byon te/ de rnams kyi snying po 'di yin no/ /oM badz+nyE mahA pradz+nye hUM/ d+harmA d+hA tu ye swAhA/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ba yu ra ga ti swAhA
252a7(rgyud 'grel): oM d+harma ka tu swAhA/ /oM ke tu shwa ra dza swAhA/ /oM pad+ma la pad+ma? du swAhA/ /oM ratna pra brta ya swAhA/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ratna artsi pa ra Ni swAhA/ /oM a ka la ko pra brtan swAhA/ /oM a tsa ri mu ta pra brta swAhA/ /oM du ti ba ni ra dza No
252b1(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /oM du pe pa du na du pa nu de swAhA/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ratna driSh+Ti sha ga se ti bi sa ri swAhA/ /oM ka ma la rA dza pad+ma la d+ha ra swAhA/ /oM pad+ma ba la pad+ma rA dza swAhA/ /oM badzra a k+Sho d+hya(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /oM a mo g+ha rA dza pad+ma b+ha ra swAhA/ /oM sarba
252b2(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta bi? shi ratna san TTi swAhA/ /oM sh+ra ratna d+ha ra swAhA/ /oM karmA sid+d+hi d+harmA d+ha ra swAhA/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta b+ha ga ba te swAhA/ /oM bi sha ya ma sa ba be swAhA/ /oM tsan+d+ra mahA ro Sha na hUM swAhA/ /a sa ri ti ga na ma rA dza swAhA/ /oM traM A ka sha sarba
252b3(rgyud 'grel): satwa swAhA/ /oM k+ShaM ti garb+ha da na swAhA/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta du ru ma la gto ba ye swAhA/ /oM sa man+ta b+ha dra ratna da re swAhA/ /oM many+dzu sh+rI ku mA ra mu swAhA/ /oM sarba a pa ya bi sha ta ne raM pa ye swAhA/ /oM mai tri mai tri ma dri swAhA//
252b4(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi mug te margad sha ma ti swAhA/ /oM run ma ya dza swAhA/ /oM gu Na tri a raM na da ra swAhA/ /oM A lo ka ti ri ti ri swAhA/ /oM a mri ta tsa ra a mri tarSha ni swAhA/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta surya mi la ta swAhA/
252b5(rgyud 'grel): oM ku la ma pad+ma dar swAhA/ oM sarba artse nan tig sna dar swAhA/ /oM badzra tsak+Shur b+hya dar swAhA/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ti ra mi ti badzra swAhA/ /oM badzra gra ba le tra ba te swAhA/ /oM ratna saM b+ha ba ratna da ra swAhA/ /oM shu raM gi ma ti swAhA/
252b6(rgyud 'grel): oM tsandA pra barda shu raM ga me swAhA/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma ba la swAhA/ oM dz+nyA na ke tu bi da ra na swAhA/ /oM sarba shi ga ta mo ni ra ga ti swAhA/ /oM a k+Sho ka mo ni ra ga ti swAhA/ /oM a k+She ya su phu ba sha ni swAhA/ /oM dz+nyA na pra brta da ra
252b7(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /de nas bsdu bas byon pa'i yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang/ sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad oM sarba ta tha ga te ban da naM ka ro yA mi zhes brjod cing/ /e ma ho kun tu bza 
253a1(rgyud 'grel): po'i byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa'i mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /dbus na bde gshegs yum mdzes pa /ched du brjod par bsam par bya/ /de nas yum shes rab kyi pha rol
253a2(rgyud 'grel): tu phyin ma'i thugs kar zhugs nas blar byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas la sogs pa dang gcig tu gyur te/ yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rgya tshom? gdod
253a3(rgyud 'grel): nas skye ba med/ /rdul phran ji snyed thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur/ /de nas byams pa'i sgo nas gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing
253a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ dbang du bya ba nas phyag rgya chen po bzhis rgyas btab ste/ lag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam bsgreng/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i yum gyur pa'i/ /dam tshig phyag rgya yin par bshad
253a5(rgyud 'grel): gung mo rin chen 'dra ba ni/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas yin par bshad/ /gung mo 'khor lo 'dra ba ni/ /mya ngan med pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /ser mo thams cad bsdams byas nas/ /mdzub gnyis mche ba ltar byas pa/ /'od chen
253a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /gung mo pad+ma 'dra ba ni/ /sangs rgyas bzhi pa yin par bshad/ /ting 'dzin tshul du byas pa ni/ /ting 'dzin dpal gyi phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las pad+ma ltar byas pa/ /pad+ma dam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /sor mo rtsob
253a7(rgyud 'grel): bsnol ba ni/ /nyi ma dpal gyi phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las mdzub mo mthe'u chung gnyis/ /'od zer rtse sgrang cung zad bskyed/ /gdugs chen dam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams nas bum pa ltar bzhag pa/ /dga' ba'i dpal gyi phyag
253b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ /gung mo la sogs gsum byas nas/ /mdzub mo pad+ma 'dra ba ni/ /sangs rgyas bcu pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams pa srin lag mthe chung gnyis/ /'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las g.yas
253b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mdzub mo ni/ /lcags kyu 'dra bar byas pa la/ /g.yon pa rgyab nas bsgreng ba ni/ /dbang phyug rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa ting pa gnyis sprad nas/ /pad+ma phye ba lta bu ni/ /bkod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa 'am
253b3(rgyud 'grel): bcas nas/ /gung mo rin chen 'dra ba ni/ /rin chen 'od 'phro'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthil sbyar rtse mo bsnol ba ni/ /snang ba'i mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo ni/ /gzhu yi tshul du byas pa la/ /g.yas pa pad+ma
253b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar byas pa/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /rin chen sgrom ltar bya ba ni/ /spos kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthe'u chung srin lag gnyis bsdams nas/ /gung mo se gol gtogs pa ni/ /sbobs pa brtsegs pa'i phyag
253b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ /rting spyad pad+ma rgyas pa ltar/ /sor mo cung zad gdengs pa de/ /pad+ma rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /gong gi phyag rgya de nyid las/ /sor mo de bas gdengs pa ni/ /pad+ma dam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis sor mo rtse bsnol nas//
253b6(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin phyag rgyar bya ba ni/ /mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams nas gung mo gnyis phyung nas/ /mdzub gnyis dang po'i tshigs thog sprad/ /thogs med rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las mdzub mo mthe bong gnyis//
253b7(rgyud 'grel): rtse mor sprad pa byas pa ni/ /rin chen dbang phyug phyag rgya'o/ /bsnams pa'i gung mo gnyis byung ba/ /mthe bong mthe chung gzhibs te bskyed/ /grub pa'i las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /sor mo nang du bsnol nas kyang/ /mthe bong gnyis kyi gung mo
254a1(rgyud 'grel): mnan/ /mdzub gnyis bsgreng bar byas pa ni/ /dga' ba ston pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya bya ba ni/ /mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las gung mo gnyis phyung ste/ /mtheb mo mtheb chung so sor
254a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgreng/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams nas mdzub gnyis rtse sprad nas/ /pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni/ /spyan ras gzigs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rin chen sgom ltar bya ba ni/ /nam mkha' snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mtheb chung mdzub mo
254a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgreng pa la/ /lhag ma rnams ni bsnol byas pa/ /sa yi snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las mdzub gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng/ /mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol byas pa/ /kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las gung mo gnyis
254a4(rgyud 'grel): byung ste/ /gung mo gnyis ni sbyar byas pa/ /mthu chen thob pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang nas/ mthe bong gnyis ni rtse sprad pa/ /bdud rtsi rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las gung mo gnyis byung ste
254a5(rgyud 'grel): rin po che ltar bya ba ni/ /yon tan snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis cung zad bsnol byas nas/ /gung mo gzhibs te phyung ba ni/ /mthong na dga' ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis rdo rje bsnams byas te/ /gung mo pad+mar bya ba/
254a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /gzhon nu rgyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las gung mo gnyis phyung nas/ /ral gri lta bur bya ba ni/ /skyes bu dam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas pa las/ /mdzub gnyis gung mo'i tshigs su sbyar/ /mthe bong
254a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhibs la brkyang ba ni/ /seng ge'i sgra yi phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las mdzub mo mthe bo gnyis/ /rtse sprad cung zad gnas pa ni/ /rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo khong stong sbyar ba ni/ /skyes bu dam pa'i phyag rgya'o//
254b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdams nas gung mo gnyis phyung nas/ /mdzub mo gung mo'i rgyab tra? sbyar/ /dkon mchog 'byung gnas phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas nas/ /gung mo ral gri ltar byas pa/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams lus mdzub
254b2(rgyud 'grel): mo mthe bong gnyis/ /zla ba khams pa ltar byas pa/ /zla 'od gzhin nu yi phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba/ /gung mo mthe bo so sor sprad/ /ye shes tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las gung mo gnyis phyung ste/ gnyis
254b3(rgyud 'grel): gri lta bur byas pa ni/ /mya ngan kun 'joms phyag rgya'o/ /pu ti 'dzin ltar bsnams pa ni/ /blo gros mi zad phyag rgya'o/ /bsdams las gung mo gnyis phyung ste/ /mdzub mo rgyab nas sbyar ba ni/ /ye shes 'od zer phyag rgya'o/ /bde dag ni
254b4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bskyed la/ /sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod par bya'o/ de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni bde bar gshegs pa'i yum gyi ljags la/ badzra d+harmA? d+hi zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
254b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa ni badzra dz+nyA na zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o/ /snga ma bzhin du lce la rdo rje bsam par bya'o/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni sngar gyi 'byin pa'i sa bon ni chos kyi phyag
254b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ /byung nas ji ltar phyag mtshan med pa ni las kyi phyag rgyar shes par bya'o/ /las kyi phyag rgya la yang snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la bcing bar bya'o/ /rgyal po'i bka' rtags dang/ bzang mo'i dpung brgyan dang 'dra ba'i phyir
254b7(rgyud 'grel): de la?/ /nye? tshong mkhan gyi lag pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ste/ badzra satwa su saM gra ha da/ badzra ratna ma nut+ta raM/ badzra d+harmA ga ya ne/ badzra karma ka ro d+ha ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i glu blang zhing /sgeg
255a1(rgyud 'grel): mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod do/ /de ltar mchod pa brgyan kyis mchod nas /lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje dril bu blangs la/ lag pa g.yas pas rdo rje gsor zhing/ Tak+ki hA dza(rgyud 'grel): yang rdo rje ? de snying
255a2(rgyud 'grel): gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'jog cing/ Tak+ki dza ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod bar bya'o/ /de byas pa dang/ dag dang sems rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' 
255a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog /srid pa mchog tu byed par 'gyur/ /d+harma a zhes bya ba ni dril bu'i sa bon no/ /de nas dam tshig gsum gyi glus mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ oM nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/
255a4(rgyud 'grel): yum mchog shes rab pha rol phyin/ /bde bar shegs pa de grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag ba'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur? mchog tu dag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi
255a5(rgyud 'grel): mnga' rtag pa khyod/ /'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa/ /'dod pa chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdong nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po
255a6(rgyud 'grel): kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa/ /rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig /de nas phyag bzhi
255a7(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /oM badzra At+ma ko haM zhes bya ba 'dis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bsgom mo/ /de nas swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho nya haM zhes bya bas rang bzhin gyis dag par mos par byas la/ oM
255b1(rgyud 'grel): sarbas oM zhes bya bas bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la sogs pa lha thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje dbyings chen po'i yi ge brgya pa rdo rje tshig pa yid
255b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis bzlas la/ thams cad kyang bdag yin zhes bsgoms te/ lha thams cad kyi zhal nas sngags 'byung par bsams la/ bzlas pa la brtson par bya'o/ /de lta bu ni lha thams cad kyi bzlas par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du skyo bar? gyur pa
255b3(rgyud 'grel): de srid du bsgoms la/ skyo bar gyur na yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la/ mchod yon phul te phyag bzhi byas nas/ phyag rgya gang nas 'byung ba de nyid nas dkrol nas/ mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
255b4(rgyud 'grel): bsngo ste/ bdag gis cho ga ma tshang ba gang dag bgyis pa de bzod par mdzod cig ces gsol ba btab la/ mchod yon phul oM ka ta b+ha ba sarba sta tsa sid+d+he datwa tra ya tha nu ga ga tsa daM pu ta pi shi aM/ /bu na ra ga na ya tsa na zhes
255b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba thams cad gshegs pa'i phyir bskul bar bya zhing/ badzra satwa mu zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis/ rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya gyen du dgrol bar bya'o/ /de lta bus thams cad gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar sbrul ba'i
255b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams ni de bzhin du yid kyis rang gis lus la bcug la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis srung ba thams cad byas te/ dkyil 'khor las glegs bam bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de ltar dus
255b7(rgyud 'grel): pa? rang nyin re bzhin zla ba gcig gam zla drug gi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ lha rnams la gnang ba thob kyi bar du bya'o/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// //de ltar sngon du bsnyen ba byas nas/ gtsug
256a1(rgyud 'grel): lag khang dam/ kun dga' ra pa'am/ /grong khyer gyi shar ram/ byang phyogs kyi cha'am/ gang yid dga' bar dkyil 'khor bya'o/ /lha khang grong khyer skyed tshal gyi/ /byang shar phyogs mdze lta ?/ /a a'i cha
256a2(rgyud 'grel): ni yongs gzung la/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /yang na sngar ni brtags zin pa'i/ /gnas der sbyang ba bya mi dgos/ /pus mo rkang pa lte ba 'am/ /lkog ma nub tsams brkos la/ /legs par yongs su brtags nas ni//
256a3(rgyud 'grel): thal gsol ba gyo mo dang/ /gseg ma phub ma rus pa gsal/ /yum mchog nyid kyis bsngags bzlas shing/ /de bzhin bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi/ /sngags bzlas pa yi chu nyid kyis/ /sa ni kun la bsang gtor bya/ /dri zhim pa yis
256a4(rgyud 'grel): yis ni?/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni kun tu dgang/ /de lta bu yi dbus dag tu/ /zhi ba la sogs sbyin sreg bya/ /sa yi lha la gsol ba gdab/ /de nas med dang ldan pa ru/ /rgyal po'i khru ni brgyad nyid dam/ /de bzhin khru ni lnga bcu nyis/
256a5(rgyud 'grel): blon po tshong dpon ste dngos gyis/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am de yi phyed/ /khru de dag ni ma nus na/ /ci nus par ni bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor de yi sa gzhi ni/ /spos chas gsang gtor bya ba dang/ /ba yi rnam ldas skyed nul? bya/ /sa
256a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa du/ /thig gdab cho ga rdzogs par bya/ /sa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o// //legs par khrus byas lus dris phyug /ji snyed gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan/ /shin tu dmar ba'i gos
256a7(rgyud 'grel): byon? nas/ /yar gyi ngo? nas brtsams par bya/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi'i dbus song ste/ /bdag srung bgags gzhom la sogs bya/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yi/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du sprul/ /phyag 'tshal mchos
256b1(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa/ /sngon du song bas sdom pa bzung/ /khang pa gdan la sogs bskyed na/ /dbus su skyil krung gis 'dug ste/ /bdag nyid sgro ba bskyed par bya/ /deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas/ /lha
256b2(rgyud 'grel): dang dam tshig gis mnyam bar/ /gyur par bdag nyid the tshom med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig pas/ /mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni/ /deng bdag skye bar the tshom med/ /dang bdag nyi ma
256b3(rgyud 'grel): dam pa ste/ /bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /ding bdag 'dus ba'i mchog yin no/ /zhes bya'o/ /phyag byas bdug sbos thogs nas su/ /yum mchog sras dang bcas pa rnams/ /thams cad ma
256b4(rgyud 'grel): lus spyan drang ngo?/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi/ /rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor 'dri/ /ding 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub mchog ni
256b5(rgyud 'grel): stsal du gsol zhes brjod do/ /sbyor ba rnams gsum bsgoms nas ni/ /sgo rnams dbye ba byas nas su/ /byams ba'i sgo na gnas pa yis/ /yum mchog sngags bzlos brtson pa yi/ /rnal 'byor nga rgyal cher ldan pas/ /dkyil 'khor bri
256b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bsdod de gsol ba gdab par bya/ /ma zhig na bar gyur pa la/ /bu rnams rim gro byed pa ltar/ /yum mchog bsrung ba bya ba'i phyir/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /nam mkha' i khams kun gang
256b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur te/ /bdag gis lus de phyag byas nas/ /bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid/ /bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug che/ /phyag 
257a1(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje bdag brtan nyid/ /bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag/ byin gyi brlabs pa mi 'dor do/ /de nas badzra tiSh+Tha ma Ta/ /mig gnyis dag tu bkod nas kyang/ /rkang mthil gnyis su a las ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje
257a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed byas te/ /dam tshig phyag rgya rab bsrungs nas/ /badzra satwa badzra uta tiSh+Tha/ /de yi shes dkyil 'khor bdeg par bya'o/ /sngar bzhin byin gyis rlabs byas nas/ /phyag rgya chen po de bcings nas/ /g.yon pa dril bu legs bzung
257a3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /g.yon bas rdo rje gsor bar bya/ /yi ge hUM gi sgra sgrogs pas/ /cung zad gar byed goms stabs kyis/ /bskor ba'i tshul gyis song nas ni/ /dengs shig ces ni brjod bar bya/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bar gsungs pa ltar//
257a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang la sogs stang stabs bya/ /bskyid pa'i tshul gyis song nas ni/ /gdug pa'i bgegs rnams bskrad par bya/ /de nas phyag rgya 'di yis ni/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyis bcings nas/ /
257a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo mthe bong rdo rje byas/ /dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra maN+Dal la hUM/ /de nas rdo rje 'khor lo yi/ /phyag rgya dang ni sngags 'di yis/ /dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya/ /mahA badzra tsakra a tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha hUM//
257a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rgya yi las kyis ni/ /phyag rgya nyid ni bshad pa yin/ /de nas phur bu btab nas ni/ /'og gi phyogs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog /oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba bi g+haM band+ha hUM phaT/ /brgyin rtsa brgyad bzlas nas kyang/ /dkyil
257a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor de dbus dang grwa bzhin du/ /g.yon bas gzung ste g.yas bas brdab/ /ser ldeng phur bu lnga bskyed do/ /oM b+hA g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+Ta na hUM phaT/ kI la ya ki la la sarba pA baM phaT/ badzre? kA la ya badzra d+ha ri/ /A dz+nyA pa
257b1(rgyud 'grel): ya ti swAhA/ bdug pas bdugs te dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag byas nas/ /tsan dan gur gum la sogs pas/ /yum chen gyi ni gnas dag tu/ /rin chen zur brgyad thig le bya/ /de bzhin
257b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i gnas dag dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i gnas su ni/ /grwa bzhi zlum por bya ba'o/ /yum mchog ni sngags kyis ni/ /lan gsum dag tu bzlas pa'o/ /de nas nam mkha' i phyogs nas ni/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor dkug nas ni/ /
257b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug dang bcing dang dbang du bya/ /mchod pa lnga pos legs par mchod/ /de nas dbang bskur bum ba la/ /'bru sogs bcas par chu blugs la/ /yum mchog sngags ni brgya bzlas ba/ /mchod yon legs bar dbul bar bya/ /bdug bas bdug
257b4(rgyud 'grel): nas me tog dor/ /lhag par gnas par bya ba'o/ /thun gsum dag tu bzlas byas nas/ /des ni dbang nga bskur bya ba'o/ /lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas phyi rol byung nas kyang/ /dam tshig can la gtor ma sbyin/ /nye rag dag kyang byas nas
257b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan gcig bar du brjod par bgyi/ /de nas me tog la sogs dang/ /sgeg mo la sogs brgyad kyis mchod do/ /slob ma lhag bar gnas bar bya'o/ /re zhig dang por khrus byas la/ /shin tu gtsang ba'i gos
257b6(rgyud 'grel): gyon la/ /me tog thogs pa'i slob ma yis/ /slob dpon dag la phyag byas te/ /'di skad ces ni smra bar bya/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgong du gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul brtan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag
257b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid rtsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol/ /thar ba chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi'o/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed
258a1(rgyud 'grel): du gzhug ste/ rtog pa rnams ni shin tu bsdus nas ni/ /shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon/ /brjid des blo la rdo rje sems dpa' sogs/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi slob?/ /dbang med pa bdag
258a2(rgyud 'grel): gis mi dge bgyis pa dang/ /rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid rtsal gang/ /de dag thams cad byang chub mchog tu ni/ /sngar bshad da ltar ma lus so sor bshags/ /bde bar gshegs pa sras kyi lha rnams dang/ /rgya chen 'gro ba ma lus
258a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi don/ /sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan la'ang/ /rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo/ /thugs rjes khyab ba'i thugs dang ldan gyur cing/ /blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom/ /ma lus rigs kyi pad+ma'i nang bzhugs
258a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi/ /smra bsam brjod med shes rab pha rol phyin/ /mi skye ma 'gags nam mkha' i ngo bo nyid/ /so so rang rig ye shes spyod yul ba/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum la skyabs su mchi/ /
258a5(rgyud 'grel): blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' rab dang/ /dman bas 'jigs pa nyid kyi rgyal byed tshal/ /srid ba'i 'byor pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog /gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /'dod chags la sogs sprul gyi dug bcom
258a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /blo gros rnam rgyal thugs rje cher ldan ba'i/ /brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi/ /srid dang bral ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgya yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid/ /'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las
258a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal gyur ba'i?/ /snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cig yang dag rtogs/ /mnyam med byang chub yang dag gzung bar bgyi/ /sems can rnams ni yongs su smin pa'am/ /yang na yongs su bskyab bar bya ba 'am/ /rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i
258b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /'di dag thams cad rtsa sogs bzhin du btang/ /de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang/ /bsam gtan shes rab bla na med pa ni/ /bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /skad cig re re zhing ni bsgom par dgyi//
258b2(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa sngags la mkhas pa yis/ /chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni/ /'gro ba 'di yis thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /khyad par gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /bdag gis de skad brjod pa'i
258b3(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ /bdag gis lus thams cad yongs su btang bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang/ /thabs kyi bye brag
258b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis btul nas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das ba'i dbyings la rab tu bzhag bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das kyang sems can 'ga' yang mya ngan las 'das pa med do zhes sems bskyed
258b5(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis chos thams cad skye bo med pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis ma yengs ba'i sems dang/ /thams cad mkhyen ba'i ye shes kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gis ting 'dzin
258b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi rgyal po thob par bgyi ste/ /sems can thams cad byang chub rnam pa gsum la dgod par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
258b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa bdun la gnas ba so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brlab bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gis stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang/ /so so yang dar bar rig pa/ sang rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par
259a1(rgyud 'grel): brtson par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas gyi chos ma lus pa'i bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub ched?
259a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu yin te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi bo ste/ 'di nyid bcom
259a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'o/ /de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs bar byas pa'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod ba zhes bya ba sgo mdza' yas ba la gnas pa//
259a4(rgyud 'grel): mdza' med par 'gyur bar rdzogs par byas nas/ /gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la/ /spyod pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po bstan bas yang dag par mgu par bya ba dang/ yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang/ /yang dag par
259a5(rgyud 'grel): gzengs? bstod pa la des par sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /de nas sa ma ya a zhes bzlas pas/ /slob ma'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la/ de'i steng du rdo rje de bzhag la/ su ra ta sa ma ya stwaM ho/ /badzra sid+d+ha ya thA su khaM zhes bya ba'i
259a6(rgyud 'grel): snying po yang snying gar brlus? la/ spyi bor sngos? chus brlan pa 'am gsher ba'i lag pa bzhag la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas shing rdo rjer bsam bar bya'o/ /dpral ba dang/ /skog ma dang/ /spyi bor taM h+ri dang kaM las rdo rje dang rin po
259a7(rgyud 'grel): che dang pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rjer bsams la/ badzra satwa/ badzra ratna/ bdzra d+harma/ badzra karma/ zhes zlos shing snying ga la sogs par byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas a shwat+the? la sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gci gnyis pa'i tshad la rtse
259b1(rgyud 'grel): mor me tog bcings la/ rdo rje bzhad pa bzlas la sbyin no/ /de nas shar dam byang du bstsal te/ rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya'o/ /de nas ku sha sar pa la rdo rje rnon po bzlas te byin la/ /'di ni stan du gding zhing sngas su gyis la nyol cig ces bsgo'o
259b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas dbung ba g.yon bar ni/ /srung skud 'dud pa gsum ldan pa/ /bdag nyid kyis ni legs par bcing/ /de nas zab mo rgya che ba'i/ /chos ni ci nus phar bstan pas/ /thams cad la gzengs bstod par byas nas bzhin bzang rnams long zhig
259b3(rgyud 'grel): nang bar dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur zhes sgo'o/ /lhag par gnas ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas nyi ma 'char kha ru/ /dkyil 'khor nam mkhar brdeg par bya'o/ /de nas thig gdab par bya'o/ /dang por chen rtsi sngon po dang/ ser po dang ni dmar
259b4(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ /ljang gu dkar po dag la ni/ /dri zhi mtshon gyis so sor bsgyur/ /go rim gyis ni bzhag pa la/ /de la h+ruM dzi h+ri a oM/ /rang gi sa bon der dgod do/ /? driSh+Ti aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): mig gnyis dag tu rab dgod de/ /rab tu g.yo zhing
259b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i mig/ mig gis rjes su dran pa ni/ /'bar ba'i lta bas mi bskyod pa la sogs bskul zhing/ /bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo'i dkyil 'khor chen mo'i thig gdab par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i thig bdag la gsol cig ces bgyi bas kyang
259b6(rgyud 'grel): bskul bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis bskul bas/ /mi bskyod ba la sogs pa yis btang ba'i srad bu 'bar ba'i lcags kyus bkug ste/ rang gi lag na gnas pa la/ /srad bu des gang bar byas la/ /oM n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba
259b7(rgyud 'grel): d+harmA spa ra sba ra a nu dra biSh+Ta sarba d+harma/ a dya na Ta a nu bra biSh+Ta sarba d+harma/ oM badzra d+harmA d+hi zhes bsgril bar bya'o/ /bsgril nas mig g.yas dang g.yon du/ /ma dang Ta las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la/ badzra driSh+Ti ma Ta zhes bya bya bas
260a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan bar byas la/ srad bu de dris byugs pa'i rin po che'i snod du bzhag la/ dri dang ma tog dang bdug sngos kyis mchod do/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU traM ma tri kra ma hUM zhes rdo rje bsdams pas bzang ste/ lan brgya
260a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas dris nye bar byugs la/ /bar snang la bzhugs pa'i rigs thams cad la mchod yon phul te/ me tog la sogs pa lnga dang/ /sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod la phyag byas la/ dkyil
260a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyis gzhi brtag par bya'o/ /de la de zhig sngags bzlas ba'i bus mdza' ma dkar po dang ldan pas spangs la yid kyis badzra d+hA tu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas la/ rnam par snang mdzad du gyur par byas nas/ badzra
260a4(rgyud 'grel): karma zhes brjod bas bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog rang gi snying gnas rdo rje las kyis gzugs su sprul bar bya'o/ /de nas phrang bu de g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi gzung la/ dzdza(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rdo rje las
260a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi gzugs can gyi lag tu srang bu btang la/ phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid bsgom shing/ shang phyogs bltas te/ rdo rje srang bu gdab par bya'o/ /yang slob dpon lhor 'dug la byang du bltas te/ gnyis pa gdab par bya'o//
260a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas me'i phyogs kyi char gnas la byang du bltas te/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar du thig gdab par bya'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su gnas pa la lho'i phyogs su bltas te/ nub kyi thig gdab par bya'o/ /de nyid du 'dug te byang gi thi gdab bo//
260a7(rgyud 'grel): yang me'i phyogs su 'dug ste/ lho phyogs su thig gdab par bya'o/ /kha khyer gyi thig kyang gdab par bya'o/ /yang me'i mtshams su gnas te/ rlung gi phyogs kyi mtshams kyi thig kyang gdab pa dang/ yang bden bral gyi mtshams su gnas te/
260b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi bar kyi thig gdab par bya'o/ /slob dpon grogs mchog gnyis ni skor phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o/ /de la sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha'o/ /sgo khyud ni sgo'i tshang kyi phyed do/ /kha khyer ni sgo'i phyed do/ /chos sna lnga'i sa
260b2(rgyud 'grel): ni kha khyer gyi phyed do/ /rta babs ni sgo'i sum 'gyur du bya'o/ /da ni lud las 'byung ba'i thig gdab ste/ sar ba las ni bkal nus kyang/ /tshad mthun bar ni mdzad pa yi/ /thig ni mkhas pas mdzes pa yi/ /thig na mkhas ps
260b3(rgyud 'grel): ci nus kyis/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab bo/ /dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /yum gyur dam ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor dgu/ /dkyil 'khor dgu yi dkyil du ni/ /bde gshegs
260b4(rgyud 'grel): yum du gyur ba dgod/ /dud ltar sku mdog dkar ba la/ /g.yas pa rin chen mchog sbyin zhing/ /g.yon pa glags bam 'dzin pa ste/ /seng ge la gnas pad+ma'i gdan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod
260b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /bsam btan la sogs 'khor gyis bskor/ /phyi'i le'u tshe brgyad po la/ /phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa bcu/ /so so'i 'khor gyis bskor ba ni/ /seng ge la gnas pad+ma'i gdan/ /de steng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
260b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /go rim bzhin du dgod bar bya/ /phyogs bzhi'i zla ba bzhi po la/ /sems dpa' i rdo rje la sogs ni/ /pad gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /go rim bzhin du dgod par bya/ /de yi phyi rim dag tu ni/ /thugs rje 'od kyi
260b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ni/ /pad+ma brgya 'am stong dag tu/ /cho ga shes bas bri bar bya/ /rdo rje nyi mar yang dag ldan/ /grwa bzhi phyogs bzhi dag tu ni/ /lA sya la sogs lha mo brgyad/ /pad gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /legs pa
261a1(rgyud 'grel): dag tu bri bar bya/ /lha yi rnal du dgod bya ba/ /bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyi/ /sangs rgyas stong du bzhis ma tshang/ /pad gnas za ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rang rang mtshan ma bsnams pa'i/ /sgo khyad bzhi po dag
261a2(rgyud 'grel): la yang/ /sgo ba bzhi po bri bar bya/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas la/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /grwa bzhi phyogs bzhi thams cad dang/ /sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras pad ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim dri
261a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor lags bris nas/ /dang por bdag nyid 'dug par bya/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /zhes 'byung/ gal te gegs ni byung na ni/ /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas nas/ /de'i 'og a las rnam par
261a4(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad du gyur nas/ /rgyud las bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur yang nges par byas nas/ haM las 'phags pa mi g.yo ba thugs ka nas phyung ste/ badzra ban d+ha zhes yid la brjod la/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor du / rlung gi
261a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs dri'i thig le bdun byas te/ /thig le re re zhing pad+ma re re'i nang du chud par byas la dbus ma dang mdza' ma dang thig le bdun dang ldan par byas te/ thig le bdun po de dag dang/ rlung lha bdun pa ri dags la zhon pa'o/ /mdog
261a6(rgyud 'grel): nag po 'phags pa mi g.yo bas zhags pas kun nas bcings par bsams la/ /de rnams kyi dbus ma gcig ni gtso bo yin la/ lhag ma drug ni 'khor yin pas kun nas bskor bar bsams ba'o/ /de nas khams las ri
261a7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bsams la/ /de'i steng du a nyid las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rjes g.yogs la/ dbus rdo rje rtse lnga ba/ yi ge hUM gi sa bon las byung ba/ mtshams rnams su mdud rtse rnams bsams la/ de
261b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du badzra ban d+ha zhes brjod do/ /de kham bor de ji skad bshad pa'i thig le bdun gdab par bya'o/ /de nas kham phor dang ri rab kyi steng du oM las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams te/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba yang
261b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g.yon pa brkyang pas ri rab gzung nas/ ral gri dang zhags pas rlung lha rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad par bsams te /de lta bus ni rlung thams cad bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
261b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dbus na gnas pa'i phur bu h+ruM bzhis bton la/ 'od nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas bu ga bkag la mnyam par gzhog /de nas h+ri zhis bya bas mig g.yas dang g.yon du nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la/ khro bo'i lta bas
261b4(rgyud 'grel): kun bltas la sgo rnams dbye'o/ /de nas che na rtsi byin gyis brlab par bya ste /oM badzra rtsi tra sa ma ye hUM zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon rtsi thams cad la lan 'dun gyi bar du bzlas na rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /
261b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /phyag rgya gnyis las ni mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar bar byas nas/ tshon rtsi thams cad ni 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya/ /h+ra zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje nyi ma
261b6(rgyud 'grel): khro bo dam tshig phyag rgya dang ldan pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis mthar spar bar bya'o/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes zlos shing dgye bar bya'o/ /phyogs bzhir yang spos snod bzhi dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
261b7(rgyud 'grel): klog tu gzhug go /de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhag pas/ /rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po/ /yid kyi su ni dbye bar bya/ /oM badzra dg+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha hUM/ /rdo rje mdzun mo yang dag par
262a1(rgyud 'grel): spyad la bkan te bsdams nas su/ /rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni/ /sgo dbye ba'i mchog yin no/ /de nas rin po che las byas pa'i bum pa rtsa ba mi gnag la/ gsum pa cha ba/ mgrin pa ring ba/ mchu 'phang ba/
262a2(rgyud 'grel): byu ru dang/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ mu tig dang/ pad+ma rA ga ste / rin po che thams cad dang/ braM ha spyi dang/ kaN+ya ka ri dang/ ha sa de ba dang/ daN+Do twa la dang/ sh+re te a pa ra tsit+ta ste/ sman thams cad dang/ 'bras 'od/ nas
262a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ phro dang/ til dang/ ma sha ste 'bru thams cad dang/ spos chu dri zhim pa dang/ me tog dri zhim bas yongs bkang la/ dri kun tu byugs pa'i me tog gi phreng pas btags pa'o/ /mgul ba ras dkar po bzang pos
262a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ 'dab ma dang 'bras bu dri nam pas brgyan pa dang/ badzra d+hA tu badzrU? hUM zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ /brgya 'am/ stod ngam/ dpag tu med pa 'am/ bcu las lud? barmi bya'o/ /ras zung brgya 'am stong
262a5(rgyud 'grel): ngam/ lta bshos dang mar me yang brgya 'am stong dam/ bdug sbal brgya 'am stod ngam/ bcu las nyid bar mi bya'o/ /glang po che 'am rta la sogs ba'i tshogs kyang dgod do/ /rol mo'i tshogs 'di lta ste/ bi bang dang/
262a6(rgyud 'grel): gling bu dang/ cad te'u dang/ cha lang dang/ rdo rings dang/ rnga ba che dang/ kun dza dang/ ti mi la brdud ba ste/ de dag kyang dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mngon sum lta bur bsams la/ phyag bzhi sngon du
262a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bas me tog la sogs pas yang dag bar mchod la/ sdom pa gzud ba la sogs pa byas ba'i rjes la bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung/ /chos kyi dril bu dkril bar bya/ /dam tshig gis
262b1(rgyud 'grel): ni phyag rgya zer/ /byin gyis brlabs la snying po bzla/ /zhes bya ba'i sngar bshad pa'i chog byas la yi ge brgya pa brjod la/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa bya ste/ dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin/ /sngag? med rnams mchos sku gang
262b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyon rnams thams cad med gzigs mnga' / /rnam rtog mi mda' khyod la 'dud/ /gang gis yang dag nyid du khyod/ /nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa ni da/ /spros med yi ge med mthong na/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong/ /'phags pa dam
262b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams dang ni/ /yon tan phyug mo khyod dad ni/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i bla ma dang/ /khyad par ma mthong zla 'od bzhin/ /gus byas snying rje'i bdag nyis can/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'gro 'dren ma/ /khyod la brten bgyis nges par ni/ /bdag
262b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid chen po mnyam med 'thob/ /don yod gzigs ma gang yin ni/ /bsam pa dag pas lan 'ga' yang/ /tshul bzhin byed la blta bgyid pa/ /des kyang des par 'gyur pa 'thob/ /khyod ni dpa' mo gzhan don la/ /dga' ba'i bdag nyid
262b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis/ gso mdzad skyed par mdzad pa ste/ /byams shing gcugs ba'i yum la gso/ /dge ba gang sang khyod kyi sras/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla ma dang/ /thugs rje can lags de slad khyod/ /sems can kun gyi phyo mo lags/ /
262b6(rgyud 'grel): ma smad skar ma rnams kyis ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzas bzhin du/ /mi dmigs pha rol phyin kun gyis/ /khyod ni rab tu bskor ba lags/ /khyod ni nyag ma gcig lags kyang/ /de bzhin gshegs pas nga da der/ /skye bo 'dul ba'i
262b7(rgyud 'grel): rten mdzad nas/ /sna tshogs mtshan gyis rnam mar bstod/ /nyi ma'i 'od dang mdzul gyur na/ /zil ba'i chu thigs ji bzhin du/ /khyod dang mjal ba dag rnams kyis/ /skyon dang chig rnams rab 'jig 'byung/ /khyod nyid skrag bskyed pa ste/ /byis
263a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la 'jigs bar gdan/ /yang dag dbugs 'byin skyed pa ste/ /mkhas pa rnams la zhe bar gda' / /gang la mgon khyod dbye ba ste/ /khyod la mngon du chags mi mda'/ /gzhan la 'dod chags zhes
263a2(rgyud 'grel): sdang dang/ /ji lta bur ni 'byung 'gyur yum/ /khyod ni gang nas mi byon te/ /gang du gzhud par 'gyur ma lags/ /gang khyod de ltar mi mthob cing/ /yang dag nyid du rtogs 'gyur ba/ /rtogs nas nges bar 'grub 'byung der 'dir
263a3(rgyud 'grel): ngo mtshar shin tu che/ /khyod mthong na ni bcings 'gyur te/ /ma mthong na yang 'ching par 'gyur/ /khyod mthong na ni grol 'gyur te/ /ma mthong na yang grol bar 'gyur/ /kye ma ngo mtshar skyed mdzad ma zab mo lags so grags ldan ma//
263a4(rgyud 'grel): snang yang snang ba ma lags ma/ /shin tu rtogs dka' sgyu ma bzhin/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rang rgyal dang/ /nyan thos rnams la nges bstan pa'i/ /thar lam gcig tu khyod lags te/ /gzhan ma mchis bar nges par lags/ /
263a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgon po'i thugs rje yis/ /lus can rnams la bstan slad du/ /khyod brjod mdzad pa mdzad ma lags/ /mtshan nyid dang ni mtshan ma mod/ /tshig lam kun las 'das khyod la/ /su zhigs gis ni 'dir bstod nus/ /khyod ni
263a6(rgyud 'grel): gang la gnas mi mkha' / /khyod nyid bstod bya ma lags te/ /de ltar phun sum tshogs mnga' ba/ /de 'dra'i tshig gi lam dag gis/ /bstod ba rnams ni shin tu bde/ /rdzogs pa gang zhig rtogs 'dod pa/ /nyan thos zhi ba 'dod pa dag
263a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad shes pa nyid 'gyur zhing/ /gang zhig thub mchog sras dag ni/ /lam gyi rnam pa kun shes 'byung ba dang/ /gang gis mchog rnams rgyal ba'i yon tan tshogs/ /rnam kun mkhyen pa mnyes bar 'gyur ba yi/ /bde bar
263b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i yum mchog de la ni/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu 'jug bar gyis/ /ser sna nyon mongs dag pa yi/ /yid bzhin nor bu dam pa yis/ /khams gsum bsam pa rdzogs mdzad pa/ /dkon mchog 'byung gnas phyag
263b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod/ /nyon mongs mdza' dge rab bsal bas/ /dams gsum pa ni thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyis ma gos pa/ /mya ngan med la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gsang ba de nyid bsgom pa yis/ /'od cing brgya phag
263b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'gyed cing/ /'od kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /rin chen 'od 'phro phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong pa nyid la rab gnas pa/ /kham gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las/ /rab tu rgyal bar mdzad pa po/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po phyag 'tshal
263b4(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /khams gsum 'khor ba la gnas pa'i/ /'gro ba'i don rnams mdzad nas kyang/ /pad ltar skyon gyis ma gos pa/ /pad+ma dam pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum gti mug 'khyams pa la/ /nyi ma lta bu'i 'khor lo
263b5(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /'gro ba'i don rnams rab mdzad pa/ /phyag 'tshal nyi ma'i dkyil khyod la/ /nyi ma drod chen 'od lta bur/ /thabs kyi dam pa brnyes 'gyur ba'i/ /'gro ba'i don la rab brtson pa'i/ /phyag 'tshal gdugs chen dam pa la'o/ /
263b6(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi smon lam dam pa yis/ /glang chen lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /khams gsum 'khor ba las sgrol po/ /phyag 'tshal ting 'dzin glang po la'o/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad la/ /dga' ba'i dam bar 'gyur ba ni/
263b7(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rnam gsum thob mdzad pa/ /dga' ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba 'dab ltar sku mkhrungs kyang/ /srid ba'i nyes pas ma gos pas/ /'gro ba 'khor ba las sgrol ba/ /pad+ma'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
264a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnams kyi phyag rgya bcing ba/ /bstod pa ni rgyal po dang dmangs kyi tshul yin bas mi dgos so zhes slob dpon kha gcig 'chang ngo/ /de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang mchod do/ /dngos grub thams
264a2(rgyud 'grel): cad bsgrub ba'i phyir/ /sems can thams cad don mdzad ces/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas grogs mchog dam pa dkyil du bzhag ste /phyi rol tu gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /
264a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras yos bcas shing til dang bcas/ /'bras can gtor ma chu dang bcas/ /'bras chan bcas shing la du ba/ /sgyu ma khur la sogs bza' ba rnams/ /zhes bya ba'i gtor ma'i las bya'o/ /de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg
264a4(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni bdun bdun dbul te mnyes par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug bar bya ste/ /dang por slob dpon bdag nyid 'jug bar bya ste/ /de nas slob ma 'jug
264a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhug pa la
264a6(rgyud 'grel): snod du gyur pa dang ma gyur pa brtag par mi 'tshal lo/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can kha cig sdig pa chen po mchis kyang/ /yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong na/ /ngan song
264a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba'i 'od kyis phog pa tsam gyis kyang/ /yod pas gzugs mthong ba dang/ /'on pas sga thos pa la sogs pa'i bde ba rnyed na/ /dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa
264b1(rgyud 'grel): ngag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lo/ /de nas slob dpon gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces brjod bar bya'o/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon mo chen por bdag
264b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bstan du gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol/ /de nas slob ma la stod g.yogs dang/ /smad g.yogs dkon la phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go/ /lag tu me tog bskur te/ /bshags pa nas gsol ba gdab pa'i
264b3(rgyud 'grel): bar du bya ste/ /'di skad brjod bar bya'o/ /gtso bo bdag la sgom bstsol/ /thub pa nyi ma ma lus ba/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag la dgongs/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las
264b4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba/ /mi ldog pa'i 'khor los 'byor/ /thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer cher/ /gsang ba chen par 'jug bar bgyi/ /gsang ba thams cad bsdus par ni/ /slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod/ /mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba/ /bskal pa chen
264b5(rgyud 'grel): po bdag la stsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing/ /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni yid 'ong ba/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /dbang bskur chen po smad byung ba/ /sems can kun gyi don bgyi phyir
264b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /de nas slob dpon gyis/ /che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni/ /byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa/ /dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi/ /'khor lo 'dir yang 'jug
264b7(rgyud 'grel): bar 'tshal/ /yang slob dpon gyis/ /gsang ba chen po rigs dag ba'i/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /des kyang 'tshal lo zhes brjod bar bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /zhes
265a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pas sdom pa dpe? /sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed pa de lan dbang bskur ba yang ma bya'o/ /'jug pa tsam zhig byed du bzhug go /de ltar sdom pa 'dzin pa de la ni/ /dang por chu'i dbang bskor ro//
265a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i dbang dang / cod pan dang/ dar ? sbyangs dang /rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming gi dbang bskur nas / me tog la sogs pa dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas/ /slob dpon la
265a3(rgyud 'grel): yon gyi mchog phul te/ dbang phyi ma yang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas zhi pa'i sbyin sreg gis zhi bar bya'o/ /tshon rtsi chu bo chen po dor ro/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /yul mchog sngos? pa med pa yi/ /sprang?
265a4(rgyud 'grel): thub cung zhig sbyar ba las/ /kun gyis bde gshegs sku thob shog /yum gyur sgrub thabs legs sbyar ba/ /bsgyur bas bsod nams gang thob des/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis/ /byang chub rnam gsum thob
265a5(rgyud 'grel): par shog /slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon rin chen grags pas mdzad pa bzhugs so// //
265a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ pra dz+nyA? pA ra mi tA maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma / bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ spang dang blang ba'i gzhi rnams shes/ /gang zag gsum gyi lam rnams shes /thub
265a7(rgyud 'grel): pa yis ni rtogs pa'i yul/ /rten gsum gyi ni bdag nyid can/ /sangs rgyas nyan thos sems dpa' yi/ /tshogs kyis bskor pa'i yum de la/ /sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs lung bstan klu sgrub dang/ /
265b1(rgyud 'grel): de yi slob ma zla grags dang/ /mkhas pa yis ni b+ha bya dang/ /de sogs yum gyi sgrub thabs ni/ /lags pa nyid du bstan kyang ni/ /bla zhing dkyil 'khor rgyas par ni/ /mkhas pas de dag ma bstan te/ /de rgyas bdud gis bya bar ?
265b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan/ /bdag 'dra shin tu blun gyur kyang/ /bla ma yi dam phrin? dang ni/ /gzhung rnams kun nas bsdus nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor cha ga legs par bshad/ /snying rje dpal ldan rigs kyi bus?/ /sum brjod pa yi mjug tho gsu(rgyud 'grel): /dag ba rnamS
265b3(rgyud 'grel): ni bsdu ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bshad bya ste/ /de nas lhug gnas nang bar ni/ /tshangs dang zur dang logs thig rnams/ /gzhan dang mthun par gdab par bya/ /phyi dang nang gu dbye bar bya/ /phyi la sgo sogs rdzogs par gdag/
265b4(rgyud 'grel): nang la yang ni tshul bzhin gdab/ /nang gi le tshe ba ni la ni/ /pad+ma za 'bru ldan dgu bri/ /de phyi pe tshe bcu gnyis la/ /ze 'bru 'dab ldan bzhi rnams bri/ /de yi phyi yang gzhan dang mthun/ /dri dang bshad pa rim gyis bstan/ /dran bzhi brda
265b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan gdugs ba ni bri/ /sos gcig brda bstan 'khor lo bzhi/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa yi ni brdar/ /pad 'dab bzhi ni bri bar bye/ /des 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi'i brdar/ /bcu gcig rdo rje bcu drug bri/ /'phags lam yan lag
265b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyi brdar/ /de khA lnga dang dra ba phyin/ /rin chen phag dang 'dod yon rnams/ /de dag kyang ni rim bzhin bri/ /sa bcu pa yi brdar bstan pa/ /sgo yi nang yang legs par bri/ /de ltar pho brang nang dag na/ /yum chen 'khor dang
265b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bri/ /dbus kyi pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /sku mdog ser po phyag bzhi ma/ /g.yas kyi dang po pad+ma'i steng/ /shes rab kyi ni po ti'o/ /g.yon gyi dang po utpal ste/ /mi shigs pa yi rdo rje'o/ /dang po'i 'og ma mchog sbyin dang/ /
266a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa 'og ma mnyam bzhag ste/ /de lta bu yi du ma bri'o/ /phyos kyi pad+ma'i 'dab steng du/ /sems ma rdo rje rin chen ma /chos dang las kyi sems ma'o/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan rigs dang mthun//
266a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bzhi ? 'dab steng du / mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo/ /sangs rgyas spyan dang sgrol ma ste/ /sku mthun phyag mtshan rigs dang mthun/ /shar gyi pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /rin chen 'byung gnas sku mdog ser/ /sa gnon
266a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya can dgod do/ /phyogs bzhi? yi ni pad+ma la/ /sems dpa' 'od zer kun 'byung dang/ /rin chen 'od 'phro rin dbang phyug /rdo rje mi g.yo sems dpa' bzhi/ /pad+ma rdo rje dbyug tho dang/ /rin chen lcags kyu rim bzhin thoD//
266a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhu rin chen 'bar/ /rgyal mtshan rnams te rim bzhin thogs/ /nub kyi pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /rin? chen 'od 'phro sku mdog dmar/ /mnyam gzhag phyag rgya can dgod do/ /phyogs bzhi yi ni 'dab ma la/ /spyod pa'i blo gros snang ba

266a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin phyag rgya can dgong/ /phyogs bzhi yin pad ma la /rgyal pa byin dang grub pa'i kha/ /dga' ston dang ni mi g.yo ba/ /pad+ma rin chen pa tra dang/ /rgya gram mnyam gzhag ting 'dzin bsnams/ /byang shar pad+ma'i lte ba la//
266b1(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin glang po dmar ser bdag /chos 'khor bskor ba'i phyag rgya can/ /phyogs bzhi ? ma la/ /rgyal ba gnon dang kun tu bzang/ /'jam dpal sgrib ba sel ba ste/ /pad+ma rin chen gang dang/ /rdo rje me te bya rim bzhin thogs//

266b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni ral gri'o/ /de dag bsams te gtso la 'dud/ /lho nub pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba'i dpal/ /dmar ser mdog ldan chos 'chad tshul/ /phyogs bzhi yi ni 'dab ma la/ /nyi ma rab snas rdo rje can/ /gzhon nu

266b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldang pa dgos par bya/ /phyogs ? yi ni 'dab ma la/ /dga' sbyin dang ni bzang skyong dang/ /dkon mchog 'byung gnas zla 'od gnas/ /pad+ma dang ni me tog dang/ /nyi ma zla ba bsnam pa'i/ /phyogs mtshams kyi ni lte ba la/ /shog
266b7(rgyud 'grel): thungs ga? ni ? bcom bzhin/ /bdud btul ba yi tshul can no/ /phyogs bzhi yi ni 'dab ma la/ /byams pa na ma la'i snying po dang/ /sa yi snying dang sbyan ras gzigs/ /mod gal dang/ shA ri'i bu/ /kun dga' po dang 'od srungs te/
267a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang ni rin chen dang/ /bum pa khri snyan sa le rnams/ /go rim thogs te gtso la bdud/ /bzhi yi phyag mtshan lhung bzed do/ /nub kyi pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /mar me mdzad de mdog dmar po/ /kun snang phyag rgya
267a2(rgyud 'grel): can dgod do/ /phyogs bzhi yi ni 'dab ma la/ /nyi 'od dang ni zla 'od dang/ /byams pa mai tri skyes bu dam/ /kun kyang rin chen 'dzin pa'o/ /byang phyogs pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /pad+ma'i dpal te mdog sngo ba/ /skyabs sbyin ldan pa dgod par bya//

267b7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge ? sogs bgyis pa yi/ /yum chen dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir/ /rin chen pad+ma'i gdan steng du/ /snying rnga'i dbang gis spyan 'dren na/ /byang chub sems kyis gshegs su gsol/ /lho phyogs mya ngan med pa yi/ /dag pa yi ni zhing khaMs?

268b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bde gshegs phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lho phyogs mya ngan mang pa yi /dag pa yi ni zhir khams na/ /bde gshegs mya ngan med pa na/ /bya ba la sogs pa dang/ nub phyogs nye bar zhi ba yi/ /dag pa yi ni zhing khams na/ /bde 
269a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs rin chen 'od 'phro ni/ /bya ba sogs pa dang / byang phyogs rgyal ba can gyi ni/ /dag pa yi ni zhing khams na/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dbang be ni/ /bya ba la sogs pa dang/ byang shar ting

269a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams 'di ru/ /bya rgod spungs pa'i ri ba la/ /sprul sku shAkya seng+ge yis/ /dri med pha rol phyin pa la/ /chos sgra chen po sgrogs pa'i tshe/ /chos 'byung rtags chen brtan pa'i dus/ /sems dpa' chen po khyed rnamS
269b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /rang gis gtso la rtag zhus te/ /gtso bos tshul bzhin lung bstan dus/ /mdzes pa gser gyis pad 'dab stong/ /shAkya seng ge mchod pa dang/ /pha rol phyin chos mnyan pa'i med/ /mi mjed 'jig rten 'dir byin tshe/ /? chen ?
269b2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sems dpa' mya ngan med pa dang/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa rgyal/ /dbang phyug rgyal te sems dpa' bzhi/ /bya ba la sogs pa dang/ spyod pa'i blo gros snang mchog dang/ /phyag rgya rgyal dang spobs pa
269b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsegs/ /blo dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' bzhi/ /bya ba la sogs pa dang / rgyal ba byin dang grub pa'i lha/ /dga' ston dang ni mi g.yo ba/ /blo dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' bzhi/ /bya ba la sogs pa dang / rgyal ba mgon dang kun tu
269b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang/ /'jam dpal sgrib pa sel ba ste/ /blo dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' bzhi/ /bya ba la sogs pa dang / lag na pad+ma mthu chen thob/ /sman rgyal dang ni yon tan snying/ /blo dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' bzhi/ /bya ba la sogs
269b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / nyi ma rang snang rdo rje can/ /gzhon nu rgyan dang seng+ge'i sgra/ /blo dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' bzhi/ /bya ba la sogs pa dang / rin chen mchog dang padmo rgyal/ /pad+ma dam pa thogs med rgyal/ /blo dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' 
269b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin /bya ba la sogs pa dang/ /dga' sbyin dang ni bzang skyor dang/ /dkon mchog 'byung gnas zla 'od gzhon/ /blo dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' bzhi/ /bya ba la sogs pa dang/ pad+ma dam pa me tog dang/ /mya ngan kun tu 'jomS
269b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /bo gros mi zad sems dpa' bzhi/ /bya ba la sogs pa dang / byams pas snying nam mkha' snying/ /spyan ras gzigs te sems dpa' bzhi/ /'gro don brtson la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /maud gal dang shA ri'i bu/ /kun dga' 
270a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang 'ang srungs te/ mchog bzhi nyan thos phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nyi 'od dang ni zla 'od dang/ /byams pa mai tri skyes bu dam/ /thabs mkhas 'gro don brtson la bstod/ /nyams ? bde gshegs
270a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyes mdzes pa/ /nang gi lha mo bzhi la bstod/ /mchod pa yi ni las kyis ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa mnyes mdzad pa/ /phyi yi lha mo bzhi la bstod/ /bde gshegs sgo srungs rab tu grags/ /sgo srungs bzhi la phyag
270a3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod/ /bzhi gsum bcu gnyis chos rtogs pa/ /tshogs lam gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dbang po stobs kyis rab phye ba/ /nges 'byed rtogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sa rab dga' ba rtogs gyur pa/ /mtho
270a4(rgyud 'grel): lam gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sa brgyad rim gyis rtogs gyur pa/ /bsgom lam rtogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje lta bu la gnas nas/ /chos kyi sku yang rab tu gsal/ /sa bcu gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod//
270a5(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed la sogs rab ldan pa/ /rgyu dang 'bras bus rab phye pa/ /thams cad mkhyen gzhung de la bstod/ /gang zag gsum gyi lam yang bshad/ /lam shes gzhung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shes rab snying rje ldan la sogs/
270a6(rgyud 'grel): spang dang blang ba'i gzhi rnams shes/ /thams cad mkhyen gzhung da la bstod/ /rnam pa thams cad yongs bsdus pa/ /rnam kun mngon rdzogs gzhung la bstod/ /'phel ba la sogs rab ldan pa/ /rtse mo'i gzhung la phyag
270a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod/ /'og ma kun gyi mthar phyin pa/ /mthar gyis gzhung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skad cig bzhi dang rab ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu gsal/ /byang chub gshung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bde gshegs
270b1(rgyud 'grel): sku rnams kun dang ldan/ /sems can don phyir phrin las gzhung/ /chos sku'i gzhung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'ga' zhig don du rgyas pa dang/ /'ga' zhig don du 'bring dang ni/ /rgyas 'bring gzhung la phyag 'tshal bstod/
270b2(rgyud 'grel): don rnams don bsdus la yang bstod/ /gzhung? rnams rgyas par ma gyur kyang/ /don ni mi zhan ston gyur pa/ /don mi zhan la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de rnams gsal bang rab 'byed pa/ /mkhas pa yis ni mdzad pa gang/ /bstan
270b3(rgyud 'grel): bcos gzhung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad na/ /yum sras 'khor dang bcas pa yi/ /gzugs brnyan ji snyed yod pa la/ /spal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bstod/ /smon lam bya ba 'di skad do/ /dus gsuM
270b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba kun gyi yum/ /bklag pa dang ni kha ton pa gyis/ /bgyid du rtsal dang rjes yi rang/ /dge ba 'di yi stobs kyis ni/ /bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /zhing mchog gtsang mar skye bar shog/ dus gsum rgyal pa'i yum
270b5(rgyud 'grel): dag la/ /mchod bstod bskur sti bgyis da dang/ /bgyid du rtsal dang rjes yi rang/ /bden pa de yi stobs kyis ni/ /bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing du ni/ /bdag dang yon bdag skye bar
270b6(rgyud 'grel): shog /zhing de nyid du skyes nas kyang/ /bde gshegs bcu la mchod par shog/ pha rol phyin drug spyod par shog / lam la rim gyi bgrod par shog/ lam lnga rim gyis bgrod nas kyang/ /mngon par rtgos? par sangs rgyas
270b7(rgyud 'grel): shog/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ /rtog pa dag ni mi mda' yang/ /'gro bo'i don phyir sprul pa'i sku/ /rgyun mi chad par ston par shog /dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum kun la/ /bdag gis dge ba ci bsags dang/ /
271a1(rgyud 'grel): dge ba de yi stobs ma kyis ni/ /khams gsum thams cad thams cad kun/ /thar ba'i lam la 'jog par shog /bdag gis dge ba 'di dag la/ /bdud kyi bar du mi chod par/ /dge ba'i 'bras bu smin
271a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /ji ltar sngon gyi 'phags ba rtag tu dus/ /lus kyi tsha brang sdug bsngal mi lta bar/ /shes rab pha rol phyin don du/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs tshol ba ltar/ /bdag dag bams gsum sems can kyang/ /'od gsal ?
271a3(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu du bzhin du/ /shes rab pha rol phyin don du/ /sdug bsngal ci spyod der spyod shog /ji ltar sngon gyi 'phags pa rtag tu dus/ /shes rab pha rol phyin don tu/ /sha khrag rus rnams thogs med du/ /sdug bsngal
271a4(rgyud 'grel): me lta gtor ba ltar/ /bdag dang khams gsum sems can kyang/ /'phags pa rtag tu du bzhin du/ /shes rab pha rol phyin don du/ /sha khrag rus rnams gtod par shog/ sngon gyi dpags pa chos 'phags kyis/ /grong
271a5(rgyud 'grel): khyer chen po spos ldan du/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa la/ /phyin ci ma log spyod pa ltar/ /bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams/ /sngos ldan lta bu'i grong khyer du/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa la/ /phyin ci ma log spyod bar
271a6(rgyud 'grel): ?/ /sngen? gyi tsha yi tshong 'brus ni/ /mar me can gyi dbus su ni/ /sngon 'das bde gshegs mar me mdzad/ /sgral sku shAkya seng+ge la/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya lung bstan dang/ /sring mo go gA'i lha mo dang/ sems bskyed lung
271a7(rgyud 'grel): ? pa ltar/ /bdag dang khams gsum sems can la/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed cing/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya lung bston shog /mngon dga' phyogs bcu'i zhing khams su/
271b1(rgyud 'grel): mgon po bde gshegs bcu rnams kyis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa la/ /phyin ci ma log spyod ba ltar/ /bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams/ /mngon dga' phyogs bcu'i zhing khams su/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa la/ /phyin
271b2(rgyud 'grel): ci ma log spyod par shog /sngon? tsha shAkya seng ge yi/ /kun dga' bo ni thos ldan la/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ba ni/ /nan gyis yang nas yang dus?/ /sgo skur bral bdag tad pa bzhin/ /bdag dang khams gsum sems can ?/
271b3(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kun dga' bo la gtad bzhin du/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni/ /nan gyis yang nas yang du ni/ /sgro skur bral par gtor par shog /gal te bdag dang sems can rnams/ //me yis ?
271b4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa ni/ /yum chen pha rol phyin pa la/ /bklags dang kha ton byas pa dang/ /yi ge 'dri sogs bgyid pa dang/ /mchod dang bsnyen bskur ci bgyis pa/ /dge ba de yi stobs kyis ni/ /gnad gcod spug bsngal med bar ni/ /sangs
271b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs/ /sngon nas bsu zhing bden par shog /bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams/ /tshe rabs dag ni gar skyes kyang/ /thos pa'i shes rab ldan gyur nas/ /the tshom yul mchod par shog /bsaM
271b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ye shes rab ldan gyur nas/ /ma rtogs pa rnams rtogs bar shog /chos nyid don rnams rtogs gyur shog/ de ltar shes rab rnam gsum gyis/ /spos pa rnam gsum chod par shog/ gul ni mkhyen pa rnam gsum la/ /dge pa'i las ni
271b7(rgyud 'grel): ci bsams ba? /? bde yi stobs kyis ni/ /bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams/ /mkhyen pa gsum la skyod par shog /spang bya'i gzhi de spangs nas ni/ /blang bya'i bzhi la spyod bar shog/ lam gnyis tshul bzhin shes nas
272a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /nges 'byung lam la spyod par shog /rgyu'i mkhyen nyid rgyan la sbyar nas ni/ /'bras bu'i mkhyen nyid thob par shog/ yul ni mkhyen pa rnam gsum gyis/ /'jug tu bya ba'i cho ga'o// //
272a2(rgyud 'grel): da ni bar gsubs? gzhi yi ni/ /mjug tu bya ba'i cho ga bstan/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/ /dbus su le tshe dgu ldan bri/ /de phyir pad+ma 'dab ldan bri/ /pad+ma de yi phyi nyid du/ /le tshe khra bos bskor bar dri/ /de yi phyi yi khyams su?
272a3(rgyud 'grel): sgo sogs legs par bri bar bya/ /de nas lha ni dgod bya ba/ /dbus su yum ldan shAka ser bri/ /gyi yi la tshe brgyad la ni/ /bzang skyang dang ni rin 'byung gnas/ /dkon mchog gnas de dang ni/ /rin chen snying po rin chen ?/ /de dag
272a4(rgyud 'grel): dpon dam dang skyes bu byin/ /skyobs pa sngad pa de dang ni/ /chu bdag lha dang dbang po byin/ /bzang po stobs dang blo gros dam/ /tha mi bzhi ni go rim bzhin/ /shar nas bzung nas zla ga ma la'o/ /de phyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /'phags
272a5(rgyud 'grel): pa blo gros 'phel ba dang/ /blo gros mdza' yas don yod mthob sgrib pa med pa blo gros dang/ /rab tu zhugs pa de dang ni/ /rnam gzhan brtson 'grus mdza' yas dang/ /rtag tu brtson dang rtag tu sbyor/ /mi gtong brtson dang nyi ma'i
272a6(rgyud 'grel): snying/ /zla snying blo gros dpe ming dang/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mthu chen thob/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ /bdud kyi sgrub med blo gros dang/ /rd rje de ni blo gros dang/ /lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang/ /rtag tu lag brkyang
272a7(rgyud 'grel): de dang ni/ /snying rje cher sems can chen po/ /rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang/ /ri bo'i ? dang byams ba ste/ /pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma la'o/ /le tshe kha bo'i sner du ni/ /skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo sogs/ /lnga ? tsam yang
272b1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dmigs/ /khyams su mchod ldan nyan thos dang/ /de sogs lnga stong tsam yang dmigs dpe bsnyen pha dang dpe bsnyen ma/ /shin tu mang bar dmigs par bya/ /kun kyang yon tan ldan par ro/ /de nas sngon gyi ting 'dzin ni/ /
272b2(rgyud 'grel): sa bcu yi bar du bsgom/ /de nas spyan drang 'di skad do/ /yang dag don ldan mgon po yum/ /mdzes pa'i le tshe'i dbus su ni/ /dam chos glog dang kha ton dang/ /yi ge 'dri sogs bgyis pa yi/ /dge pa bsdu phyir spyan 'dren na/ /
272b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i dbang gis gshegs su gsol/ /gdan dang 'tshams par bzhugs su gsol/ /theg chen chos la long pa spyod pas/ /bden pa mthong zhing sa thob pa'i/ /'phags pa'i tshogs bcad de dag kyang/ /rin chen pad+ma'i gtan
272b4(rgyud 'grel): snying du/ /bya ba la sogs sngar bzhin no/ /de nas phyag bya mchod ba 'bul/ /de nas bstod pa 'di lta ste/ /yon tan bdus pa sku gsung thugs/ /ro gcig gyur pa gtso chen mchog /gtso chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dang po byang
272b5(rgyud 'grel): ? bskyed/ /mos ba gnas shing lam gnyis 'dzin/ /bden pa mthong zhing pags pa ste/ /sems dpa' i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sangs rgyas byin gyis theg chen spyod/ /nyan thos tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod//
272b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan thams sngon dang 'thun pa ste/ /lhag par bya ba 'di skad do/ /bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams/ /sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi po dag/ rgyud la tshul bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /sku de grogs med thob par shog/ bdag dang khams
272b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum sems can rams/ /rnam pa brgyad dang bdun cu gsum/ /sbyor ba dag ni bco brgyad dang/ /thar dang nges brgyad? cha 'thun dang/ /srid ? sin ba mnyam pa dang/ /slob dpon rdo rje lta bu yi//de yi ting nge 'dzin dang ni/ /kun kyang 
273a1(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin spyod par shog/ mtshan nyid dgu bcu rtsa gcig kyang/ /ma nor tshul bzhin sbyor bar shog /bdud las bzhi bcu rtsa drug gis/ /bar du mi chod thar bar shog /yon tan bcu bzhi thob par shog/
273a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags dang ni/ /tshul bzhin du ni ldan par shog /snod bcud spyod ba'i mthu dang ni/ /thabs mkhas bcu dang ldan par shog /bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams/ /sbyod dang mthong dang bsgom pa dang/
273a3(rgyud 'grel): bar chad med pa'i lam mchog dang/ /lam bzhi'i rtse mo 'god par shog /bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams/ /pha rol phyin drug rjes drang drug /ngo bo nyid ni dran ba ste/ /mthar gyis lam de bsgrod par shog/ bdag dang khams
273a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum sems can rnams/ /zag pa med dang rnam par smin/ /mtshan nyid med dang rnam par grol/ /dga' ba bzhi dang rab ldan te/ /chos kyi sku yang gsal bar shog /de ltar sbyor ba rnam bzhi yis/ /rang bzhin don la brtson par
273a5(rgyud 'grel): shog /sbyor ba rnam bzhi'i mjug thogs su/ /cho ga 'di ni shin tu shis/ /tha ma skabs kyi cho ga bstan/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dri ba ni/ /mdzes pa'i dra ba 'khor lo can/ /rin chen gdung gis gru bzhir bcas/ /dbus
273a6(rgyud 'grel): dang phyogs bzhir bri bar bya/ /zur? rnams kun tu rin chen 'bar/ /kun gyi phyi yang rin chen bskor/ /so sor lags par bri bar bya/ /de nas lha ni dgod bya ba/ /dbus su yum chen dgod par bya/ /shar du chos kyi
273a7(rgyud 'grel): sku yi yum/ /mdog dkar yum gyi mtshan nyid can/ /lho ru 'ongs spyod rdzogs pa'i yum/ /mdog ser yum gyi mtshan nyid can/ /nub tu ngo bo nyid kyi yum/ /mdog dmar yum gyi mtshan nyid dang/ /byang du sprul sku
273b1(rgyud 'grel): shAkya? sed/ /kun kyang legs par dgad par bya/ /de nas spyan drang 'di skad do/ /yum chen sku bzhi 'khor bcas kyang/ /rin chen dra ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dam chos klog dang kha ton dang/ /yi ge 'dri sogs dgyis pa yi/ /dge ba bsdu
273b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir spyan 'dren na/ /sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis ni/ /gnas 'dir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/ /gdan dang 'tsham par bzhugs su gsol /de nas phyag dang mchod ba bya/ /de nas bstong pa 'di lta ste/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas
273b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi/ /rtog pa yi ni sum gyur pa'i/ /skye med tsam las chos kyi skur/ /bza' ? tshon lta bur shar ba yi/ /yum mchog sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /yang dag don ldam chos kyi sku/ /longs spyod rdzogs? sku'i yul gyur
273b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /gnas byung ye shes ldan? phyag 'tshal /thun mong ma yin gnas chen bu/ /sems dpa' i tshogs kyis rab bskor ba'i/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rab ldan pa/ /gnas 'byung ye shes gnyis kyi bdag /longs spyod rdzogs sku
273b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bsam brjod yul 'das nyid kyi sku/ /rang bzhin mtshan ma rnams bral yang/ /sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis ni/ /'gro ba'i don phyir mtshan byad sku/ /kun gyi thun mong ma gyur pa'i/ /chos kyi sku yi yul byung pI/ /brjod
273b6(rgyud 'grel): la de nyid kyis/ /ngo bo nyid la? phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'gro ba'i mgon po shAkya seng/ /bdud bzhi 'khoms pa stabs kyi bdag /dang po byang chub chen po yis /'gyur med byang chub sems bskyed cing/ /bar du brtson 'grus drag po yis//
273b7(rgyud 'grel): mi bzad dka' ba sna tshogs spyad/ /gnas 'gyur ye shes bdag nyid can/ /gdul bya kun snar shAkya seng/ /mgon po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dkyil 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gzhan rnams sngar dang 'thun pa ste//
274a1(rgyud 'grel): lhag par bya ba 'di skad do/ /bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams/ /ngo bo nyid sku thong nas kyang/ /gzhan gyi don phyir sku gsum po/ /thogs pa med par 'byung bar shog/ bdag dang khams
274a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum sems can rnams/ /sku bzhi tshul bzhin thob nas kyang/ /mdzad pa nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis/ /gzhan gyi don la thogs med du/ /phyin ci ma log spyod par shog /chos kyi sku yi gsung? dag la/ /bklags dang yi ge 'di
274a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs dang/ /mchod bstod bsnyen bkur ci bsags pa/ /dge ba de yi stobs kyis ni/ /bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams/ /brjod bral sku de thob par shog /de nas bdag dang mchod mkhan dang/ /bsngo bar bya ba'i dge
274a4(rgyud 'grel): ba kun/ /thams cad mi dmigs pas bsgoms la/ /de la cung zhig gnas par bya'o/ /de nas chos skyong dang 'byung po'i tshogs tshim par bya ba'i phyir gtor ma yang gzhan bzhin du btang ngo/ /yi ge brgya pa gdon par bya/ /ye shes
274a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gshegs shing dam tshig pa bsdu'o/ /'di don rin chen grags pa yis/ /yum chen dge rtsa bsdu ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /cho ga 'di ni bstan pa yin/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi lum kun la/ /don
274a6(rgyud 'grel): bsdus cho ga de tsam gcig/ shes rab gsal bas shes bar bya/ /de ltar min na thams cad kyis/ /cho ga legs bar bstan pa min/ /de bas cho ga 'di dang gzhan/ /khyad par yod ba kho nar zad/ /kun dga' snying po'i
274a7(rgyud 'grel): don mthong nas/ /go ba sla phyir bstan pa yin/ /kun kyang 'di don 'jug par shog //slob dpon chen po ratna kIrt+ta sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
274b1(rgyud 'grel): pal mo mahA bA Nas bsgyur pa'o/ / */ /rgya gar skad du/ pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi sad k+She? ba/ /bod skad du/ rab gnas kyi cho ga mdor? bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ /dpal rdo rje
274b2(rgyud 'grel): sams dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dbyangs chen pos? yon tan ni/ /rin chen 'di kyis brgyan pa la/ /btud nas rab gnas cho ga ni/ /lhag spyir? dar bsdus brjod par bya/ /bdeng gshegs rtog med go 'phal brnyes? /dri med
274b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'dra'i sku mnga' zhing/ /brjod du med pa de dag la/ /rab gnas 'thad pa ma yin te/ /de dag sku ni kun rdzogs pa/ /brtse bzang ro las byung ba gang/ /de la brten nas dge ba ni/ /mdza' yas ster te mthad pa'ang
