274b4(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /rnal 'byor de nyid shes skyon bcom/ /brtse ba'i rang bzhin rigs su bskyed/ /mdangs ldan sgom ba shes rab can/ /kun la mkhas shing dad pa yis/ /chu klung chu dag btab pa yis/ /sems sbyangs mchog ni
274b5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon yin/ /bdag kun slob dpon la phul ba/ /slob ma de ni legs rnams bzhi/ /sku gzugs dang ni mchod rten dang/ /dam chos gtsug leg khang legs bzhengs/ /te bar 'tshe kun sel ba rnams/ /'dir ni bla mas
274b6(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas bya/ /gang? zhig 'jim pa rdo dbul rag cha gser dang shing brgad? las/ rgyal ba rgyal ba'i dang tshul mnga' ba'i sku gzugs byed pa de/ /yun ring dus su sa bdag bde longs spyad nas tha mar ni/ /skyob pa'i go 'phang mchog la
274b7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'zhug par 'gyur/ /gdan sku gzugs bzhengs zin cing/ /yun ring ma mchod bzhugs pa der/ /mi shis ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bla mas thog mar cha rkyen kun/ /ji ltar rnyed bzhin rab bzung nas/ /gos rgyan bdug pa la
275a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas/ /rnam bkra mchod ba'i khang par ni/ /zhag bzang po la cho ga bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor dag la bri bar bya/ /bgegs bsal nas ni der snags kyis/ /mgul rgyan rin chen shing thog la/ /sogs
275a2(rgyud 'grel): dang kha brgyan me tog gis/ /mtshan pa'i bum pa lhag gnas bya/ /sku gzugs la sogs pa dag la bsang gtor dang me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lnga la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /phyi nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa
275a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' la bzhugs pa rnams la mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod la/ spos snod thogs te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis gsol pa gdab par bya'o/ /sku gzugs
275a4(rgyud 'grel): mngon du phyogs byas te/ /rdo rje dril bzang legs bzung zhing/ /lus bsgoms gyur bas gus par ni/ /snyan gsan dbab pa'i tshigs gcad gdon/ /bcom ldan che ge rdo rje bzang/ /rig pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dus//
275a5(rgyud 'grel): mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed la mchod pa bgyid slad du/ /bdag ni rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal/ /de phyir gus pas bdag la ni/ /bcom ldan bka' drin mdzad par 'os/ /'jig rten
275a6(rgyud 'grel): mgon po thugs rje can/ /sangs rgyas dgra bcom byang chub sems/ /gsang sngags lha gzhan gang dag dang/ /lha dang 'jig rten skyong rnams dang/ /'byung po gang dag rdzu 'phrul che/ /bstan la mngon par dga' ba rnams
275a7(rgyud 'grel): gang dag la la lha mig par/ /ldan pa thams cad bdag la dgongs/ /rdo rje can bdag che ge mo/ /ci nus par ni mchod pa yis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rab tu gnas pa bgyid ba lags/ /de phyir thams
275b1(rgyud 'grel): bcad slob ma dang/ /bcas pa bdag la brtser dgongs te/ /rab tu gnas pa 'di la ni/ /nye ba nyid du mdzad pa'i rigs/ /sa ma ya stwaM sa ma ya stwaM/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kun dga' ldan dang/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul? lhums na ni/ /ji
275b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar rab tu bzhugs de bzhin/ /sku gzugs 'di la bzhugs su gsol/ /che ge mo yi don dang ni/ /byang chub sems rab bskyed slang du/ /mgon po rtag tu 'dir bzhugs nas/ /me tog la sogs 'di rnams bzhes/ /zheS
275b3(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum brjod la gus ba stan gsan dbab par bya'o// //slob dpon gnyis su mang ba yis/ /sbyor ba dang ldan mkhas pa yis/ /slob ma gso sbyong gcas pa la/ /sku khrus gsol bya 'geD?
275b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhi la dang/ /sa bon zla ba mtshan ma sogs/ /bsgom dang ye shes sems sku gzugs/ /dgong dang na bza' ser po yis/ /g.yogs dang gtor ma'i las rgyas pa/ /byas te da nas brjod par bya /yi ge brgya ba lan
275b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum gdon/ /oM hUM h+ri zhes bya sngags kyis/ /btsug lag khang ni lhag gnas bya/ /yi ge b+huM? gis rnam snang las byung ba'i/ /mchod rten dam chos glegs? paM rgyal yum mam/ /de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' rnams bsam
275b6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /lag par gnas ba bdag ni 'du bar bya/ /rmi lam dag la mchod ba yang/ /gus bas slob ma byed du gzhug /ji skad bshad ba'i so shid ni/ /lan bdun bsngags pa sbyin bar bya/ /oM sarba bA paM da ha na badzra ya/ a sya
275b7(rgyud 'grel): sarba pA paM da he na swAhA/ zhes bya bas so/ /oM badzra hUM zhes ba'i sngags kyis de la chu khyor ba gsum yang sbyin no/ /lag g.yon srad bu dang bcas shing/ /dag pa'i mal lhag gnas bcas to/ /de la bla mas rmi lam gyi mtshan ma rnams ni bstan
276a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bya/ /lhag par gnas pa'o// //de nas rab gnas nyen lar rnal 'byor can/ /rgyun du byas pa'i las ni yang dag bsgrubs/ /mchod phyir thogs dang
276a2(rgyud 'grel): bcings/ /lag pa g.yas pa gser gyi sor gdub mtshan/ /legs par khrus byas lus dri zhim/ /gtsang mar gyur pa'i dge ba bgos/ /byams dang snying rje rjes su 'grel/ /rtag sngags bsam gtan lhung len ngas/ /mchod khang
276a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ni rgyas pa yis/ /mdzes par yid du 'ong pa yi/ /stan pa 'dug ste bsrung ba yaM/ /'khor los phyogs sogs bgegs med bya/ /bum la rnams ni byin brlab dang/ /dkyil 'khor man ngag bsgom pa dang/ /mchod pa byas
276a4(rgyud 'grel): nas sngags rnams kyis/ /mda'? sogs mdzes par skyod? par bya/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ /tshon sna lnga ba'i skud pa yis/ /yongs su dkri bar yang bya'o/ /de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ /oM badzra shi kha ra du Ta ma Ta di shi bandA hUM zhes bya
276a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /bgegs gi byas nas na bzan ser/ /dpal byed de nas mkhas pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du sku? 'khrus gsol/ /gang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
276a6(rgyud 'grel): rig pa dang skabs? su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ mchod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sku
276a7(rgyud 'grel): khrus? 'di dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du gang bcom ldan 'das gang zhes bya bas kyang ngo/ /yon tan dam pa'i sku? mnga' zhing/ /lha dang mi yi mchod 'os pa/ /sku? byad blta bas mi chog la/ /bdag gis sku khrus gsol par bgyi/
276b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten rin chen chos sku pa'i bdag /yon tan dam pa'i gzugs brnyan ni/ /bdag gis dad bas sku khrus gsol/ bud med gzugs kyis 'dul rnams la/ /thugs rjes rgyal ba'i sku bzhugs pa/ /lha yi rnam pa de la ni/ /bdag
276b2(rgyud 'grel): gis sku khrus gsol bar bgyi/ /slob ba'i dge 'dun rnams kyi gnas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugs bzhi/ /gtsug lag khang 'di bdag gis ni/ /dad pas khrus 'di dbul bar bgyi/ /bdag gis rab tu gnas par bya?/ /zhes
276b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /gang? bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags pa/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis btun? pa/ dpe
276b4(rgyud 'grel): byad bzang po brgyad cus sku mnyes? pa/ /blta pas chog mi shes pa/ mi shes pa/ mi mthun pa med pa/ sku'i gzugs mthar phyin pa/ 'gro ba mdza' dag gis gnyan? sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rab tu gnas pa phyi'o//
276b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje che zhing zhi pa ste/ /dul zhang bsam gtan go 'phang gnas/ /thugs kar gnas pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /thugs su chud phyir sangs rgyas zhes/ /de yi mchan can de ltar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas ni/ /sku
276b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs 'di la spyan drang gyi/ /zhes bya ba di yis rgyal? ba'i sku?/ shin tu 'od gsal bkug byas te/ /sku gzugs la ni bzhugs par bya/ /de bzhin du/ na mo b+ha ga ba te ta thA ga tA ya arha te samyaga saM b+ha a?/ /tadya tA/ oM
276b7(rgyud 'grel): mu ne mu ne ma hA mu ne swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang/ tshigs su bcad pa yi ge'i bdag gis bris te/ de bzhin bsod nams mdza' yas gdud bkrus nas/ /gdan khri la sogs nang du bzhugs byas la/ /sngags kyis rdo rje'i zhal mang bya'o/ /de la
277a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs du? bcad pa ni 'di yin te/ ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha wa he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to bya ba de d+ha? ShAny+tsa? yo ni ro d+ha e baM wA dI mahA sh+ra ma Na:zhes bya'o/ /gzhan la rang rang snying po ni/ /yang dag bris te
277a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhug par bya/ /sngags gzhug pa dang rdo rje zhal gyi sngags ni/ /oM d+harma d+ha tu garb+he swAhA/ /zhes bya ba dang/ oM badzra d+ha tu garb+he ya swAhA/ zhes bya ba'o/ /rol cha rnam pa sna tshogs dkrol bas rgyal ba'i glu rgyan gyis
277a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar snying rgyas sim pas bud med rnams kyi gar dang ni/ /bkra shis sgra ni rnam par bde ba ster ba byung ba'i tshe/ /sngags pas rnam bar rgyal bum pas dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /sngags pas sku khrus tshul bzhin du/ /byas nas
277a4(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi thur mang gis/ /lta bshos bzang po sngon btang ste/ /spyan dag wal gyis dbye bar bya/ /oM tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shur bi sho d+ha swAhA/ /oM ri bya an na samA d+hi d+hya na brI Na ne swAhA/ /gos mchog dri zhim bkra dang nor bu ni/
277a5(rgyud 'grel): stags kyis dag rnams rab mchod nas/ /mchod pa'i sprin tshogs mang bor snang spros pas/ /snying ga'i sa bon gnas te gsang sngags brjod/ /oM su pra tiSh+Tha? ta badzra ya swAhA/ /oM hUM trAM h+rI a:rgyal ba'i chogs ni
277a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba rnams/ /sku gzugs dga' bzhugs par bya/ /badzra gI ta pA tyai(rgyud 'grel): bi sa bi sa zhes bya bas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas te/ hUM gis yang dag par mchod la/ /phyi'i mchod pa dang/ de
277a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du gtor ma dag gis tshal bar byas te/ mkhas pas bstod pa dang/ smon lam gdon bar bya'o/ /mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /'di ltar yin te/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+h+ruM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ da bzhin du yi ge 'bru? ?
277b1(rgyud 'grel): grub ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ oM pradz+nye pradz+nye sh+ru ti smi ti bi dza ye swAhA zhes bya ba'o/ /dam chos glegs bam la sogs gzhan/ /gang gis rab tu gnas bya na/ /bdag po de dang de 'am ni/ /yang na rdo rje 'chang dgod bya/ /de bzhin
277b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten gtsug lag khang/ /sa bon la sogs legs bsgom pa/ /sngags pas 'bad de bum pa yis/ /de bzhin rgya cher gsang bar bya/ /oM badzra u da? ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM hUM h+rI:de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi/ /rnam bas nag po chen po
277b3(rgyud 'grel): dgug /de la rgyal ba'i bka' dran bya/ /de la yun ring skyob byed 'gyur/ /kha cig las ni lus ngan la/ /gtor ma rgya chen sbyin zhes 'byung/ /b+huM khaM badzri b+ha ba ?Dha tiSh+Tha b+h+ruM? khaM/ /mtshad lhag pa zhi bya'i phyir/ /yi ge brgya ba gus par gdon
277b4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin du tsi nus par/ /sbyin sreg gi ni las kyang bya/ /'bras bu mdza' yas dge 'dun mchod bya zhing/ /skye bo phongs dang gzugs dbang ma tshang dang/ /sems can nu rgyus rgyu mkha' rgyu dang/ /'gro ba dag ni yongs su tshim par
277b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /sdig med gnyen ba shes ba bcas mtshan mo sad dga' ba /glu dbyangs rol mo'i sgra snyan gyis sad dga' ba yi/ /bdud rtsis sems dpa' i dngos po shas che'i gar ldan zhing/ /'khor ba'i mtshan mo zhi bar byed la gus par
277b6(rgyud 'grel): bdad?/ /nyi ma bdun gyi mtshan tsam gyis/ /dga' ston na cher bsgrubs rnal 'byor ba/ /mchod pas yang dag g.yengs pa yis/ /de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lha rnams dang/ /gang de'i sras dang changs la
277b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs /lha tshogs rnams dang 'byung po gang/ /mthu bo tshe rnams bzod pa mdzod/ /sbyin bdag la ni thams cad du/ /zhi dang bde legs char mjad de/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /gang na bskal
278a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'am bskal pa las/ /lhag par sku gzugs 'di bzhugs par/ /sa dang chu dang me rlung gi sa lha rnams kun gyis bsrung du gsol/ /shin tu dga' dang yid bde bar/ /gyur nas rab gnas bzang por gshegs
278a2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon slob thar bcas pa dang/ khu dang tsha bo 'ang bsrung du gsol/ /bla mas tshul bzhin rab tu gnas byas pa yis/ /mchod pa byas la lung bstan sbyin par bya/ /de tshe slob mas bka' 'di 'dod 'jo yaM/ /ba ltar rtag tu
278a3(rgyud 'grel): bsams te mchod las bya/ /de nas 'jigs pa ngag ni myur du ldog /de nas ngan 'gro ma lus chad bar 'gyur/ /de nas mngon 'dod 'bras bu rtag tu 'byin/ /de nas nam yang mngon mtho 'jig ba med/ /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga mdor
278a4(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa slob dpon dang ba'i 'byung gnas ga chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na kaShA rma dang /bod kyi lo tsa ba ba tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur pa'o// //
278a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul brgya lnga bcu ba'i 'grel pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA na ya da sha TI kA /bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa tshul brgya lnga bcu
278a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'gral ba/ gsung rab 'di'i lo rgyus bshad na/ sngon sangs rgyas mi yul na lo brgyad cu bzhugs pa'i tsha na sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga dang/ gu hya sa many+tsa la sogs pas 'dul zhing theg pa de dag gi snod du gyur pa 'dzam+bu'i
278a7(rgyud 'grel): gling gi mi yul na med pas rgyal chen rig bzhi dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ dga' ldan la sogs pa'i gnas na lha rnams dang bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs ba snod du gyur nas/ de'i tshe mdo ste de na bzhugs
278b1(rgyud 'grel): so/ /slad kyis sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu za hor gyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa ngo mtshar du chos la dad pa dag cig 'dug pa theg pa de'i 'dul bskal du gyur cing snod du gyur nas/ sarba dud+d+ha sa ma yo ga la sogs pa
278b2(rgyud 'grel): sde chen po bco brgyad phyag na rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis za hor gyi yul du gshegs pa dang/ za hor gyi rgyal po in+d+ra b+hu ti sa mdo sde dag bltas na brda ma gang nas sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis na mngon par shes pa thob pas
278b3(rgyud 'grel): bltas na yul gyi dbus yul ma la ba na AtsArya ku ku ru nyin zhing ? khyi stong tsam la chos 'chang/ /mtshan zhing ni khyi de dag la dam tshig longs spyod mdzad pa khyi'i slob dpon mdzad pa zhig bzhugs pa de theg pa'i snod du gyur la/ /
278b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi 'dul bskal du gyur pa yang 'dra nas rgyal ngos lo nya btang ste slob dpon gshegs su gsol ba dang/ slob dpon de yang sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis na mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan nas/ rgyal po de bdag gi 'dul
278b5(rgyud 'grel): sgal du 'ang ba dam mi 'bab mdo sde de dag gi snod du bdag gyur ram mgyur brtags na /bdag gi 'dul skal du yang 'bab bdag kyang mdo sde snod du yang 'gyur/ rgyal po'i the tshom yang sel bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang mdo
278b6(rgyud 'grel): sde dag sdor? ma bltas na brgyal rgyal po'i the tshom dag ma sal bar gyur na shin ? ma legs pas pho nya la glar spring ba/ /mdo sde dag kho bas sngar blta 'tshal gyis tshur bskur cig ces sprid pa dang/ de nas mdo sde dag pas
278b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs te bltas na mgo 'jug gar lta ba'i cha ma mchis nas de nyid du lus brdabs te mgon med do/ /skyabs med do zhes bos pa dang dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par gshegs te khyod ci 'dod ces dris pa dang/ bdag mdo
279a1(rgyud 'grel): sde 'di bltas pa tsam gyis shes par 'dod ces gsol pa dang/ de bzhin gnang do zhes nas de nas sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga la sogs pa'i glegs bam rnams pa phyi bar de dag gis don yid la mngon sum
279a2(rgyud 'grel): du gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas slob de za khor gyi yul du gshegs nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la d+harma de dag bshad de/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' yis lung bstan nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rdo rje
279a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ltar bsgom du sprul te/ dbus su rgyal po nyid btsun mo dam pa bzhi yum gyi sar bkod/ /blon po bzhi rigs bzhi'i sar bkod/ /sras mo rnams nang gi lha mo'i sar bkod/ btsun mo phal pa
279a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams phyi'i lha mo'i sar bkod /blon po phal pa rnams sgo bsrung bzhi dang/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' ltar bkod pa dang/ rgyal pos bsams pa bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rig 'dzin gyi gnas su grub
279a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'di mi nub par bya ba'i phyir sras? sha kra bu ti rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur nas/ AtsArya ku ku sa/ lung dang man ngag bstan pa rgyal bu de la bstan te bzhag nas bsgoms pa dang/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas
279a6(rgyud 'grel): pa stongs pa gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rig 'dzin du grub bo/ /de'i sras shakra pu tis kyang de bzhin du bsgoms pa dang/ 'khor bsgoms pa bdun brgya dang yang rig 'dzin gyi gnas su gra bo/ /yang rgyal bu sha kra bu?
279a7(rgyud 'grel): tis sras ni chung ste /sras mo mgo ba ? la? dpal dam pa'i nang nas tshul brgya lnga bcu pa bzod de bshams nas/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti'i lung de sras mo yul dang sa 'dzin du stsal pa de la bstan pa las sras mo de yang 'khor dang bcas
279b1(rgyud 'grel): pa brgya dang yang rig 'dzin du grub go /de nas sras mo des rgyal bu la lung dang man ngag bzhag pa las 'phel ba ni deng sang du 'di dag lags te/ mdo la ni de rnams bsgrubs te de tshun chad ni gsung rab 'di'i don khong du chud
279b2(rgyud 'grel): bar byas te/ bsgrubs pas sngan chad grub ba yang grangs med phyin chad kyang nan tan cher byas na gdon mi za bar 'grub par gzung 'di nyid kyi nang nas bshad pa yin no/ /gzhung las/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu
279b3(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes 'byung ba ni bdud bzhi bcoM ste yon tan drug dang ldan ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpal dam pa phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di yin no/ /yum smos
279b4(rgyud 'grel): pa las na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yab kyang smos dgos te gang zhe na/ yab ni tan tra tang twa sang gra ha zhes bya ba sngags kyi mdo sde zab mo yin par bstan to/ /de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal zhes
279b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /de yang mdo sde zab mo 'di la dang cing mos nas gsung rab la 'jug pa'i phyir bsnyen bkur byas te phyag 'tshal na bsod nams kyi tshogs su 'gyur zhing 'phags ba kun gyis byin gyis rlob bas nyan cing sgrub pa nan tan du byed pa la
279b6(rgyud 'grel): bgegs dang bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na zhes 'byung ba mdo sde'i tan tra mgo mdzug tshang ba ni ma yin na/ ci'i phyir 'di skad smos zhe na/ gsung rab 'di
279b7(rgyud 'grel): yang mnyan cing bzung sla par bya ba'i phyir tan tra chen po'i nang nas gud du phyung mod kyi/ tan tra de'i mgo las smos pa 'dir brjod pa 'gal pa med do/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pas gsungs pa'i
280a1(rgyud 'grel): don 'di skad dpal rdo rje sems dpas mngon sum du thos kyi/ gzhan las rgyud pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa grangs med mod kyi/ gzhung 'di gsungs pa thos pa de la
280a2(rgyud 'grel): dus gcig ces bya'o/ /gzhung las/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag gi ye shes dang ldan pa zhes 'byung ba ni bcom ldan
280a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshogs 'dus pa yang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing
280a4(rgyud 'grel): lus dang ngag dang yid gsum rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bdung dang bgegs la sogs pa bar chad du byed pa rnams thams cad du zil gyis mnan te rgal ba'i glags med pa'i phyir ro/ /spyi'i dam tshig ni byang chub kyi
280a5(rgyud 'grel): sems mi btang ba dang/ theg pa chen po'i chos mi gtang bdag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po mi gtang ba dang/ sngags dang phyag rgya dang rdo rje mi gtang ba dang/ rdo rje'i slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa' dang
280a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dra bar bsam ba dang/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyad pa la ngan sems mi bya ba dang/ dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa dang/ zhugs kyang dam tshig mi bsrung pa la sngags kyi gtam mi bya ba dang/ don med ba'i phyogs su lus
280a7(rgyud 'grel): chud mi gson cing nyon mi mongs pa la sogs pa'i rnam grangs kyang nang grong gyi/ slabs? 'dir shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing tshul 'di mi gtang ba dam tshig lta bu yin te/ dam tshig gi khyad par thams
280b1(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa dang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chos kyi dbyings rnam bar mi rtog pa ma nyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ me por lta bu'i ye shes dang/ chos so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes dang/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes lta bu rnam pa tha dad
280b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bye brag gi ye shes thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi tsang ga gyis khams gsum du chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob pa zhes 'byung ba dbang bskur pa'i dam tshig na
280b3(rgyud 'grel): ba che'i phreng bas dbang bskur bar byed de/ dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal thabs chen po dbang bskur na gling gzhi la dbang byed par 'gyur te/ de dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
280b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur te/ khams gsum thams cad la mnga' ba/ chos
280b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad le longs spyod pa/ phyogs bcu thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mthod? cig ces dbang chen po dbang bskur ba thob pa'i phyir ro/ /gnung? las/ de bzhin gsheD
280b6(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor pa dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya chen po thob pa zhes 'byung ba na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thamS
280b7(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa chos thams cad kyi dbyings stod pa nyid du mkhyen pas pa nob? ma 'khrul ba'i chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i phyir rdo rje'i ye shes zhes bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba la rgyad du
281a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po zhes kyang bya ste /'khor los sgyur? ba'i rgyal po man chad gyi longs spyod dang yang ldan la/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid las kyang ma gyur pa'i phyir chos
281a2(rgyud 'grel): so cog thams cad la dbang mdzad cing 'byor pa'i longs spyod chen po dang rang ldan pas na dbang phyug chen po zhes bya'o/ /yang rnams gcig tu na sku'i phyag rgya chen po dang rin po che'i cod pan la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig
281a3(rgyud 'grel): gi phyag rgya dang/ gsung thams cad du yongs su dag pas chos kyi phyag rgya dang / lus dang ngag dang yid thams cad rdo rje nyid kyi las mnyam pa nyid du spyod pas las kyi phyag rgya ste / 'di rnams kyi tshul du gnas pas
281a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa'i dbang phyug ces bya'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po dang ldan pa longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i phyag rgya dang/ lus gyi phyag rgya ni g.yon pa'i mdzub mo g.yas pa'i khu tshur
281a5(rgyud 'grel): nang du bcug? ste rdo rje dang pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyag rgya dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul du ? pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang/ lus las 'od zer mang po 'khros te/ /sangs rgyas
281a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi ? grang med par sprul te las kyi phyag rgya dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya chen po thob pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mnyam pa
281a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid thugs su chud cing sna tshogs mdzad pa ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i sems pa lus pa med pa dang / ngag sems thams cad rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhes 'byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya stong
281b1(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid gi ye shes kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du thub su chud cing rdo rje dang pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du sbyor ba'i don spyod pa sna tshogs ni sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pa yang sems can thams cad bla na
281b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i byang chub tu bsgral ba'i thabs sna tshogs grangs med de bsam gyis mi khyab mong kyi skabs 'dir ni chos mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa 'dul ba'i sems can ma lus pa ste lus pa med pa'i re ba thams cad yongs su bskad ba'i las mdzad
281b3(rgyud 'grel): pas thabs de lta bus 'dul ba'i thabs la bab pa'i sems can rnams smin par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba stong pa rnam par snang mdzad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku chen po ni chos kyi sku la bya'o/ /
281b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gcig tu na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul du sbyor ba yang rtag par dus gsum bu mnyam pa 'di la snyoms pa bzhugs te / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang sems can thams cad la 'khrul pa med
281b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyir na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhung las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags shing pa stong de zhes 'byung ba ni rnam par snang mdzad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis
281b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang/ rdo rje'i rigs dang /rin po che'i rigs dang /chos kyi rigs dang / /las kyi rings kyi gtso po sangs rgyas dang/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' phyogs phyogs
281b7(rgyud 'grel): na bkod pa'i tshe dam tshig la ma zhugs pa rnams la gsang ba'i tshad ni byams pa byang chub sems dpa' yang na 'od du mi gnang ngo/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa dang/ byams pas gsol ba bdag ni cho
282a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/ dus phyi ma la mngon par 'tshang rgya bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan na/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang/ de
282a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa da dag gis mthong ste/ sangs rgyas kis la dar las bsgribs pa tsam du bas te ci la yang gsang ba ma mi chos na / dkyil 'khor 'di mdzad
282a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la bdag la gsang du ci mchis zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod kyis thams cad mthong gis kyang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor 'di'i dam tshig tu sdang? bzhugs pas bstan du mi rung ngo
282a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bka' stsal nas / phyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yang dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du zhugs pa'i tshe phyogs bzhi dang /dbus kyi gtso bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' thamS cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis
282a5(rgyud 'grel): su med pa'i sbyor ba la gnas / 'dod pa rnam pa lnga sems kyis gtsang mar 'du shes te yon tan du blta ba dang / pany+tsa a mri tar yang khyad par med pa mnyam par spyod pa mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar du bzung ste / sdangs
282a6(rgyud 'grel): nas ye shes kyis brtags nas chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings stong ba nyid kyis khyab pas rnam pa sna tshogs su spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba yang med de/ rnam par dag pa'i stong yul la rdul tsam yang gyur pa med la /
282a7(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi longs spyod chen po dang yang ldan zhing shin tu rgya che zhing yangs pa'i chos shes ? thabs kyi spyod yul gyi sgo 'phags pa bzang bar mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams pa mgu rangs? te mod la bstod pa/ /
282b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub sems ni bsam mi khyab/ /chos mnyam pa nyid du sbyor pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste shin tu ngo mtshar che zhing dge'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par bstod de/ byams pa bcig bus bstong
282b2(rgyud 'grel): par yang ma grad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang shin tu rgya che zhing yangS pa'i chos don chud mi za ba ma nor ba'i chos nyid yin par rab tu bsdags shing bstod pa'i phyor? ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i sku'i tshul ?
282b3(rgyud 'grel): lam chen po 'di lta bu yin na/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i gnas khang ci 'dra zhe na/ gzhung las /bzhugs pa na nor bu rin po che chen pos rab tu spras pa/ dril bu sna tshogs brgyus shing dkrol ba/ kha dog sa chogs kyi lnga lnga bris?
282b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dar gyi ? ni mang po'i dril du rlung gis bskyod pa/ me tog gi phreng ba dang/ rnga yal dang / da shal dang/ /sen mo do dang zla? lta bus shin tu mthos par byas pa zhes 'byung ba ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi gnas khang gi yan
282b5(rgyud 'grel): tan ni 'di yin te /rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so so'i kha tog sna tshogs dang 'thun pa/ rgyan thams cad kyang zla ba'i 'od dang/ 'dra zhing mdzas pa'i phyir ro/ khang pa'i yon tan de dang/ 'dra na/
282b6(rgyud 'grel): yul gyi chugs gang zhe na/ gzhung las/ 'dod pa'i khams thams cad la gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na zhes 'byung ba ?/ /sems can gyi khams gsum ma gtogs pa ma yin gyi khams nyid na dkyil
282b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen pa mdzad pas sems can so so na dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba'i las yod pa rnams kyang zhugs shing dam tshig ma nor bas don grub cing thar pa yang grangs med pa'i phyir ro/ /dkyil 'khor de'i cho bcom ldan 'das rnam
283a1(rgyud 'grel): bar snang mdzad nyag gcig gam / 'khor byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas zhe na/ gzhung las / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
283a2(rgyud 'grel): dpang sems dpal chen po lag na rdo rje dang/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang/ nam mkha' i snying po dang/ rdo rje khu tshur par/ 'dzam dpal dpal dang/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ nam mkha' i
283a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzod dang/ bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa bye ba phrag brgyad stong rnams kyis bskor cing mdun gyis ba dar te/ zhes 'byung ba ste/ sangs rgyas nyag gcig ma yin gyi 'khor byang chub
283a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' de snyed yod par bstan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de snyed kyi nad nas nyung zad kyi ming smos pa/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdo rje rigs kyi gtso bo dang/ chos kyi rigs kyi gtso bo dang/ rin po che'i rigs kyi gtso bo
283a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ las kyi rigs kyi gtso bo nyi cho'i mtshan smos pa ste / gzhan ni grangs tsam du bzhag pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyang phyogs bzhir so so'i rigs rigs ma 'dres par snam bu snam bur bkod de/ nang dang
283a6(rgyud 'grel): phyi rim du dngar nas kun gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mdun du bdar te/ gral rim bzhin du gnas so/ /de'i tshe dkyil 'khor so so na bzhugs par zad dam chos kyang 'chad ce na/ gzhung las/ chos 'chang
283a7(rgyud 'grel): pa de thon mang dge bar ? yang dge tha mar yang dge /don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po / ma 'dres pa/ kun tu rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston cing
283b1(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /ces 'byung ba ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don gyi phyir dar ma mdo bsde? bcu gnyis la /
283b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa grangs med pa cig bshad mod kyi/ 'di skad du yang/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i don rgya cher ston pa dang/ kri ya'i gzhung gis brtags pa dang/ kha zas gtsang
283b3(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa dang/ /'dzom dus gsum du 'dzin pa lta bu ma yin gyi gnas la mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas 'das du med/ kha zas la gtsang mar mi 'dzin pas gtsang sme mi 'byed/ dus la mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas dus thams cad du mnyam
283b4(rgyud 'grel): par 'jog pas dus gsum du dbyer med/ thams cad du dge /shes rab dang thabs su 'brel pas gsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas don bzang ba/ mnyam pa nyid ma ? bar ston pas cig ? de ba/ don
283b5(rgyud 'grel): /bzang po'i chos dang kri ya'i cho ga mang po dang ma 'dres pas mnyam par spyod pa/ 'di la chos gzhan gang gis kyang bsnan mi dgos pas kun tu rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa'i chos nyid pas bkru bshal bya ba ma yin/ 'khrul pa med pas sgra'i
283b6(rgyud 'grel): par mi 'gyur te/ /yongs su byang ba ma yin/ gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba yang sems mnyam pa dang/ bsngo ba rgya che pas tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig ste/ 'di ltar yang dag pa'i chos rgya chen po ston cing chos so cog thams cad ngo bo
283b7(rgyud 'grel): dang rang bzhin gyis ston ste/ grub med pas rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba shes rab dang pha rol tu byin ba mnyam par sbyor ba'i don bshad pa'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ci yod ce na/ gzhung las 'di lta
284a1(rgyud 'grel): ste / rab tu dga' ba'i rnam par dag pa'i tshig ni 'di lta ste /byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go ces 'byung ste/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu ? bar dga' bI phyir nyan la sogs pa semS
284a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya chub du'i chos las 'phags pa dang /chos thams cad ltong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas shin tu grol zhing dag pa'i dga' ba dang /rdo rje padmo'i dkyil 'khor sbyor bas 'jig rten gyi dga' 
284a3(rgyud 'grel): ba phun sum tshogs pas bdag gi lha dang phyogs bcu'i 'phags pa thams cad la yongs su bsngos na/ 'phags pa thams cad la yang bdag dang gzhan zhes dbyer med pa mnyam pa rab tu dga' ba yang bdag dang bdag gir byang
284a4(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i mnyam pas 'phags pa ma lus pa la yang bsngos pas bsod nams kyis tshogs su 'gyur te/ 'di lta bur spyod pa la gnas pa ni byang sems dpa' i spyod pa'o/ /don ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' i tshig
284a5(rgyud 'grel): go /tshig gi rjes su 'bras zhing nan tan bsgrub pa ni byang chub tu 'gyur ro/ /gzhung las / 'dod chags kyi mda' rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni sems can thams cad la
284a6(rgyud 'grel): phan pa dang bskyab pa'i yid kyi mda' sngon du btang ste /rjes su bsgrub pa dang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor pa'i yid kyi mnga' sngon du btang ste/ rjes su spyod pa dang/ 'dod pa lnga'i
284a7(rgyud 'grel): yon tan dang bdud rtsi lnga la sogs te/ mtshungs par byed pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi mda' sngon du btang ste longs spyod du byed pa'i phyir/ /gzhung las/ sdug pa bcing pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' i
284b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po bsnyen par bya ba'i phyir ni sdug pa'o/ /mi btang ba'i phyir ni bcing ba ste/ bdag gi shes rab dang phrad nas mnyam pa nyid kyi gzugs bsngo ba dang dpyad pa ma nor bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir
284b2(rgyud 'grel): ro/ /gzhung las/ longs spyod thams cad kyi dbang phyug rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni 'jig rten gyi longs spyod thams cad dang ldan pa ni 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po ste /
284b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug che bas na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor zhing 'dod pa lnga la mtshungs par spyod pa ni 'jig rten gyi longs spyod thams cad yang ldan la nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur
284b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir rnam par dag pas na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyi yang mchog phul du byung pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ lta ba rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub semS
284b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor pas yang dag pa'i lta ba yin te/ rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i bcing bar mi 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i
284b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro/ /gzhung las dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni rtag tu bshad pa dang 'thun te / mdor na chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ro gcig pa'i lta ba dang bsngo ba ma nor
284b7(rgyud 'grel): pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ sred pa rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis shes ?  gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor pa'i song pa dang 
285a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi lnga dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mtshan mar mi 'dzin pa dbyer med par mnyam par spyod pa'i sreng pha dang/ /sems can thams cad bla na med par sgrol bar bya ba'i thabs la srang bas na rnam par dag pa'i
285a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro/ /gzhung las / nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang phyag rgya chen po dang ldan
285a3(rgyud 'grel): mod kyi / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam pa nyid pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las rgyan rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go
285a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes 'byung ba ni/ bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po'i sku mnyam pa nyid yin pas nor bu dang gos la sogs te/ bzang po'i bya ba'i rgyan thams cad kyang/ 'phags pa bdag gi lha nyi ? yon du phul ba dang/ bdag gi lha dang phyogs
285a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i sangs rgyas su yang khyad par dbyer med de/ 'phags pa thams cad la mnyam par bsngos bas bsod nams kyi tshogs su 'gyur gyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las / 'dod
285a6(rgyud 'grel): chags rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste /byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni / rtag tu 'dod chags kyi mda' bshad pa dang 'dra ste / mdor na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du
285a7(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa'i nus na 'dogs gsu snang ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs ? spyod kyang sems can gyi ma rig pa'i spyod pa dang 'dra ste / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /gzhung las / zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i tshig
285b1(rgyud 'grel): de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas mngon spyod byed pa'i tshe sems can ma rungs pa 'dus pa dang/
285b2(rgyud 'grel): sdug gsal gyi gnas na sdod cing bskyed pa'i bsgo bas zhe sdang du snang ba'i chos spyod kyis kyang sems can ma rig pa'i spyod pa dang mi 'dra ste / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ gti mug
285b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid du sbyor te / bdag dang gzhan du khyad par gyis mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas rnam pa sna tshogs su
285b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod kyang phyin ci log gi gti mug ma yin gyi mi shes pa'i tshul gyis shes pas na rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go /zhes 'byung ba ni
285b5(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na dbang po drug yul drug la sogs te/ thams cad la spyod kyis kyang /yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bsngo ba ma nor bas nyon
285b6(rgyud 'grel): mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ spyod do cog kyang bsod nams kyi tshigs su 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las /mngal rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/
285b7(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' de bzhing gshegs pa'i sku dang/ mchod pa sna tshogs 'od zer las bkye ste/ mchod pa bsngos pa dang/ dga' ba phul paS?
286a1(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te / rnam par dag pa'i dga' ba'i phyir ro/ /rnam pa gcig tu na tshul 'di ltar spyod pa'i 'bras bu yang btsun ba rig 'dzin byang chub kyi gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gzhung
286a2(rgyud 'grel): las / mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i dus na chos thams cad kyi ?
286a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid dang rang gi mtshan nyid ci la spyod kyang de nyid dbyer med par myam pa nyid bas mtshan mas bcings pa'i nyon mongs par mi 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ yid rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni
286a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba la phyag rgya chen po'i sku bas yid mgu ba dang dga' ba dang rangs pa kun kyang
286a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi lha nyid la mchod pa deng? yang 'dra/ bdag gi lha dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du yang dbyer med pas/ 'phags pa thams cad la yang mchod par bsngo/ /yid dga' ba dang mgu'i longs spyod sems can thams
286a6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis kyang myong? bar bsngos na bdag gi yid dga' ba dang nyon mongs pas bcing bar mi 'gyur bas su dga' bar byed ba rkyen po yang bsod nams thob bar 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ snang ba rnam par
286a7(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i tshig ngo? ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i sku bas gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang
286b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi lha'i gzugs mthong ba ste / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las / lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/
286b2(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na lus nyid bdag gi lha'i gzugs bas sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis med pas na lus shin tu bde ba yin te/ lus kyi
286b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyod par thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas bsgyur? bas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las / dag rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes
286b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba ni /stong ba nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i dus na dag gi rang bzhin thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i byin gyis smras? so cog thams cad sngags su gyur
286b5(rgyud 'grel): bas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ yid rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes
286b6(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ci byung yang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid pas bsngo ba ma nor na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te rnam par thar pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung laS/
286b7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs rnam par dag pa'i tshig don? 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshig zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na gzugs so cog thams cad rang bzhin
287a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis stong pa'i phyir gzugs dang kha dog dbyibs ji ltar mthong ba phyag rgya chen po'i sku nyid la mchod par bsngo ba ma nor bas sems can nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi/ rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/
287a2(rgyud 'grel): sgra rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na sgra bo cog rang bzhin med pas tshig dang ro kun ?
287a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med par thams cad rol mo'i sil snyan sna tshogs bdag nyid lha'i gzugs la mchod par bsngos na sgra thams cad kyi nang na spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ dri rnam par
287a4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na dri thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir dri zhim pa dang mi zhim
287a5(rgyud 'grel): pa khyad par du ni byed par dri mchog gis lha nyid la mchod par byed pas bsngos na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi bsod nams su 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ ro rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/
287a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go zhes 'byung ba ni stong pa ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i dus na ro thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pas na kha zas zhim po dang mi zhig pa dang
287a7(rgyud 'grel): gci? dag slob med de thams cad kyang zil dar bdud rtsi lta bu'i lha la mchod par bsngos na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ reg bya rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/
287b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i tshig /zhes 'byung ba ni / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i dus na bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal gnyi ga yin pa'i lus kyi reg pa thams cad
287b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis stong pas na bde mi bde'i khyad par ni dbye ba thams cad kyang bde ba'i mchog gis bdag gis lha nyid la mchod par bsngos na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi bsod nams su 'gyur pas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung
287b3(rgyud 'grel): lam/ chos rnam par dag pa'i tshig de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshig go /zhes 'byung ba ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i dus na chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis mi
287b4(rgyud 'grel): skye mi 'gag rang bzhin gyis stong ba yin pas chos thams cad du sbyor ba la 'jug gis byang chub kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du skye mched bcu gnyis
287b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa chos kun la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid la sbyor ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur/ chos rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod cing bsngo ba ma
287b6(rgyud 'grel): nor ni bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gsung las / ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pas ngo bo nyid rnam par dag ste / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis phyir shes
287b7(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /zhes 'byung ba ni / rtag tu spos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de la gtogs pa'i chos zhes bya ba gung na med de/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul dang byis pa ma rabs kyi spyod yul yang chos
288a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'di la spyod par zad de/ chos kyi mtshan? nyid shes pa dang ni shes pa'i khyad par gyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang rnam par dag par 'gyur bar zad do/ /de'i phyir na rtag tu smos pa'i chos so so thams cad ?
288a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ chos nyid kyis rnam par dag pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ji ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang stong pa'i mtshan nyid de rnam par
288a3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa zhes bya pa'i mtshan ma sna tshogs la spyod pa yang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pas shes rab dang thabs dbyer med pa'i 'brel bas spyod do cog kyang chung mi zos shing bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rtogs shing
288a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhung las/ lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po su la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par bsgrub pa'i sgo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di
288a5(rgyud 'grel): lan cig thos cha yang byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa dang /chod pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa la sogs pa sgrib pa chen po mang du bsags kyang sems can
288a6(rgyud 'grel): ? ba dang ngan song du skye bar nas yang mi 'gyur/ sdig pa yang byas na thag tu sdug bsngal med par 'gyur ro/ /zhes 'byung ba ni/ rdo rje rigs kyi gtso bo lag na rdo rje la bshad de/ /su la la zhig chos rgya chen po 'di la dad pas 'jug
288a7(rgyud 'grel): ? chos 'di ni rnam par dag pa'i chos/ 'di ni 'ching ba'i chos/ 'di ni spyod pa'i chos/ 'di ni mi spyod pa'o/ /zhes rnam par dbye ba med do/ /chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi dag pa ni stong pa nyid ye shes dang gnyis su med par mnyam
288b1(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor ba ni rnam par dag pa'i sko mo yin te /chos rgya chen po 'di lta cig zos na yang na ma byang chub kyi snying po'i par du nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ shes bya'i sgrib pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi bar du gcod pa la sogs
288b2(rgyud 'grel): te sgrib par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i chos thams cad kyi nang du zhugs te spyod kyis kyang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pas sgrib ces bya ba'i chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes
288b3(rgyud 'grel): par rang bzhin stong bas na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang/ 'bras bu med pas dmyal ba dang ngan song du nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /sdig pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pas spyod pa nyid kyi tshe na 'chid bar mi
288b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur / sdig pa byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang/ nan tan ji ltar byas na 'grub ce na /gzhung las/ gang 'dzin pa dang/ nyin re zhing klog pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/
288b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa na zhes 'byung ba ste / bcangs te mnyan nas gzungs su 'dzin pa dang/ 'dris par byed pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas nan tan du byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
288b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos sgrub pa'i don ji lta bu thob par 'gyur zhe na / gzhung las/ des tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas chos thams cad la rab tu dbang bar 'gyur/ mos
288b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' pa thams cad myong / byang chub sems dpa' i tshe bcu drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /hUM zhes 'byung ba ste /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ 
289a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba nyid du sbyor ba thams cad nan tan du byed pa ni thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting 'dzin rab tu 'dzin bas chos so cog thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings las tha? mi dad
289a2(rgyud 'grel): bas sems bskyed ba'i phyir dge ba dang sdig pa'i chos mtshungs bar spyod kyis kyang 'ching ba'i nyes par mi 'gyur bas chos thams cad la dbang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi long spyod thams cad myong bar gyur kyang 'ching pa gnyis? par mi 'gyur
289a3(rgyud 'grel): bas dus thams cad du gnod pa'i mi bde ba med pas tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am rdo rje 'dzin rab tu thob bar 'gyur ba yang cho? shin tu ring ba'i gnas nas sgrubs pa yin/ hUM zhes bya ba ni chos thams
289a4(rgyud 'grel): cad bsdus pa'i don te/ thog ma med pa tshun chad nyon mongs pa'i las kyi bag chags thams cad bsdus nas med bar bya ba'i don to/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po ste/ rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' thams
289a5(rgyud 'grel): cad sa bon 'di las bskyed ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad sdud pa'i phyir ro/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na rdo rje lta bu drag shul che ba'i snying po bas sems can 'dul dka' ba ma rungs pa thams cad bsdus nas
289a6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms shing 'jig bar byed ba'i don to/ /gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po zhes 'byung ba nas/ badzra hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ 'dir yang rdo rje rigs kyi
289a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi tshul ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam bar sbyor ba/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin sngon du thugs su chud pa/ gnyis su med pa'i skyor ba'i
289b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dang ldan pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad ma lus pa rdo rje 'dzin sems can kun las 'phags pa'i phyir mchog /'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/ semS
289b2(rgyud 'grel): can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par 'dul zhing mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i don la sems can thams cad btud nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rig 'dzin gyi gnas thob par byas pa dang/ bdag nyid sangs
289b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi ye shes thams cad dang ldan pas sgrib pa med ba'i phyir don thams cad grub pa ni lag na rdo rje ste/ dam tshig thams cad dang yang ldan pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po yang mi gtod ba'i tshul du bzhugs shing zha 'bring
289b4(rgyud 'grel): ba 'khor yang rdo rje gnod sbyin mang pos byas nas shes rab dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis don bstan las sems can yang de la mdzud par mdzad de/ sems can chos rgya chen po 'di la zhugs pa
289b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams don chung mi za bar thugs su chud pas shin tu dgyes pa'i tshul gyis zhal 'dzum ste/ rdo rje chen po de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs dang yum lnga'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa lag pa g.yon pas gsor te/ cis kyang mi 'jigs
289b6(rgyud 'grel): mi skrag pa'i bsnyems pas rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bsod nams dang ye shes chen po'i tshogs mnga' ba bde ba chen po'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i dam tshig sems can thamS
289b7(rgyud 'grel): cad yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i don yod pa'i chos thugs su chud nas rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying por gsungs te/ badzra hUM zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi snying po brtan par bya ba'i don bstan nas/ badzra sa bsnan to/ /gzhud las/ de nas
290a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /a zhes 'byung ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par sbyang
290a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyi zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par bstan te/ rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyong ba'i tshul du zhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul bshad do/ /rdo rje'i
290a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ rdo rje'i mtshan nyid ni sra ba'i phyir phyag mtshan rdo rje bsnams te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje rigs kyi gtso bo dang/ gtso mo'i mtshan nyid lta
290a4(rgyud 'grel): bu ste mnyam par gnas so/ /rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ rin po che'i don ni dbang bskur ba yin te/ phyag mtshan yang rin po che bsnams te/ chos stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par
290a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yang rin po che'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang gtso mo'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ste/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che lngas dbang bskur na gling bzhi la dbang byed pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dngos grub thamS
290a6(rgyud 'grel): cad sbyin pa'i dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rin po che'i cod pan la sogs pa dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig gi don mdzad cing mnyam bar rdzogs ba'i gnas so/ /chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad rnam
290a7(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa'i phyir pad+ma 'dam gyis ma gos pa bzhin te/ phyag mtshan pad+ma bsnams te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bar yang chos kyi gtso bo dang gtso mo'i mtshan nyid du ldan pa
290b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs par gnas so/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos so cog thams cad dbyings kyis khyab ste ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /dngos grub kyi bya ba sna tshogs mdzad pas phyag mtshan yang las kyi rdo rje rgya gram
290b2(rgyud 'grel): bsnams te /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba yang las kyi rigs kyi gtso bo dang gtso mo'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa gnas te/ de ltar so so'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor yang longs spyod kyi
290b3(rgyud 'grel): tshul 'di ltar zhugs /dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug 'dod pa rnams kyang chos stod pa nyid dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba la goms bar bya ste/ chos mngon par bsgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan thos la sogs pas nan tan
290b4(rgyud 'grel): du byas na chos so cog thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad sbyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i bcing bar mi 'gyur bas snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las 'das par 'gyur/ chos nyid la gnas pas rnam par dag
290b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i spyod yul te/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs shing bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshad rgya'o/ /a zhes bya ba ni de bzhin pa'i snying po ste/ chos thams cad ma skyes ba spros pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi
290b6(rgyud 'grel): don ston pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhung las/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal zhes bya ba nas/ badzra aM a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ zhes 'byung ba rtag tu brtan pa'i dkyil 'khor bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang ngag yid
290b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya bas chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa yang sems can yongs su smin pa'i don du 'gyur bas 'dzum dmul te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha
291a1(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin pa mnyan par sbyor ba nyid kyi phyir snying po/ /badzra aM a(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs te/ stong ba ma skyes pa'i don a(rgyud 'grel): 'di las brtan par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /aM zhes bya ba'i don lta ba'i tshig go/ gzhung las
291a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'dul ban? zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas kyang sems can gyi don gyi phyir stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab
291a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i don ni 'jig rten thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba bsod nams dang ye shes kyi chogs bsdu ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po yangs pa 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
291a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga yab yum lnga mnyam par gnas pa yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dod chags kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba med bas 'dod chags sbres pa med pa'i phyir bdag dang gzhan du lta ba med bar mnyaM
291a5(rgyud 'grel): pas na zhe sdang mi 'byung ba zhe sdang spros pa med do/ /rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ snying rje chen po'i gzugs kyis sems can ma rungs pa 'dul ba dang/ gnas bde bar bskyed par bya ba'i phyir mngon sbyor kyi dbang byed de/
291a6(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis steng pas na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas zhe sdang gi las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas zhe sdang spros pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /ci'i phyir
291a7(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ gti mug gis gzung ba med pa'i phyir spyod bas gti mug sbros pa med do/ /gti mug gis gzung ba'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang ni bcings par 'gyur gyi/ gti mug med pa'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi las sbyod ba ni rnam
291b1(rgyud 'grel): par grol par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par spyod de/ rnam par mi rtog pa nyid bas mi shes pa'i tshul gyis shes pa ste /gti
291b2(rgyud 'grel): mug gi rang bzhin med pas gti mug spros pa med pa'i phyir chos so cog thams cad spros pa med do/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos so cog thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab pas na gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa'i tshul du sbyor
291b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing dngos grub thams cad kyi las byed kyang/ nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba med pas chos/ thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ste/ de ltar chos so cog thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ste sbros pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
291b4(rgyud 'grel): pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang sgrib par mi 'gyur bas spros pa med bar rig par bya'o/ /'di ltar zhal nas gsungs dkyil 'khor 'di'i don la 'jug cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par spyod pa'i tshul 'di nyan ba la sogs pa nan tan
291b5(rgyud 'grel): du byed na de 'dul ba'i dbang giS phyir chos so cog thams cad stong pa nyid pas khams gsum du skyes ba'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du mi 'gro bar 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu mngon
291b6(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid kyis sdig pa rang bzhin yod la 'bras bu bsags na sems can gcig gsad ba'i sdig pa bzhin du mang du bsad pa chogs che bar yang mngon na/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes
291b7(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab pas sems can gyi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir sdig pa'i rang bzhin yang med de 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir sdig pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi bsod nams kyi tshogs rnam bar
292a1(rgyud 'grel): dag bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ hUM zhes bya ba'i don 'di lhag ma dang 'dra'o/ /gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas/ badzra hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rtag tu gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor
292a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi don bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos mnyam bar spyod pa'i don sems can bstan pa yan chud mi za zhing rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir zhal 'dzum ste/ 'jig rten gsum pas rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur
292a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas lus gzi brjid chen po gzhan thams cad skrag cing sba skod ba'i tshul du bsgyur te/ badzrA hUM zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /badzra hUM gi don ni rtag tu bshad pa dang 'dra/ /gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de
292a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa'i chos nyid ces ba nas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshad rgya'O/ /hUM zhes 'byung ba'i Shar du ste/ chos kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi gtso bo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bstan te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes
292a5(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos rgya chen po yangs ba ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di bstan to/ /rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor de stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
292a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na 'dod chags kyi spyod yul thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ba yin gyi 'dod chags kyi nyon mongs bas bcings par mi 'gyur te/ stong pa nyid dang mnyam bar sbyr ba'i chos dag pa'i mtshan nyid bas
292a7(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa'i bdud thams cad kyis gnod bar mi nus pa'i phyin rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te 'dod chags kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba'i phyir bdag gi phyogs mi 'dzin pas zhe
292b1(rgyud 'grel): sdang mi 'grub? mod kyi snying rje chen po'i gzugs kyi sems can ma rungs la 'dul ba dar/ sdug bsngal gyi gnas ngan pa las gnon pa'i dang ri mdzad mod kyi/ zhe sdang gi nyon mongs par mi 'gyur bas zhe sdang rnam par dag pa zhes rgya ste/ thams
292b2(rgyud 'grel): cad la dbang du sbyod pas na rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o/ /chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor yin te zhes sdang gi mtshan nyid rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ /nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bur mi 'byung bas sgrib pa med pas
292b3(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid stong pa nyid kyi dbyings pas dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /chos nyid kyi ngo bos chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid bstan to/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid de dri ma'i chos nyid ngo bo nyid kyis stong
292b4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ sdig pa'i tshogs su mi 'gyur bas sdig pa'i chos rnam par dag pa ste/ dngos grub kyi chos thams cad la sbyod cing grub pas las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o/ /rdo rje rigs kyi yum kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid sdig
292b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos thams cad chos nyid kyis stong ste nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas chos thams cad rnam par dag ces bya ste/ chos thams cad yongs su dag na nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba'i bdud thams cad las rgyal pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs kyi yum
292b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /rin po cha'i rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab ste/ rang bzhin gyis dag pas chos la sems can tha dad pa med de/ sems can thams cad rnam par dag pas 'gyur ro//
292b7(rgyud 'grel): chos stong pa nyid kyis sems can dag pa'i dbang du byed pa'i rin po che'i rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid de sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma grub ste/ /ngo bo nyid rnam par dag
293a1(rgyud 'grel): par na sems can dang/ ye shes stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du dbyer med pas ye shes rnam par dga' zhes bya ste/ chos thams cad dbyings su mnyam pas chos kyi rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor nas bya'o/ /laS
293a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor te / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang de ngo nyid kyid kyis dag pa ste/ 'ching ba med pas dngos grub thams cad grub par
293a3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i longs spyod pa'i phyir las kyi rigs kyi yum gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /de lta bas na chos thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin du grub pa med pa'i phyir ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i shes rab dang pha rol tu
293a4(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa mnyam bar sbyor ba nyid kyis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid du chud cing rnam par grol ba yang dag ba'i sbyod yul tu 'gyur ro/ /'di nyid kyang gcig gis gcig bskyed pa yin te/ chos kyi phyag rgya chen pos mnyam par? don 'di nyam
293a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs te /grub pa nan tan du byas na 'dod chags pa sogs pa chos sna tshogs kyi nang na 'dug kyang nyon mongs ba'i dri ma sogs par mi 'gyur te pad+ma 'dam gyis mi chags pa bzhin te/ de bas na stong pa nyid kyis ye shes gnyis
293a6(rgyud 'grel): mad par mnyam par sbyor ba'i dus na chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid shes pas nyon mongs pa gsum yang mi spang ba'i dam tshig tu blang zhes 'byung ngo/ /sna tshogs la spyod kyang sgrib bar mi 'gyur bas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
293a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /h+ri:? zhes bya ba pa ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi snying po ste/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sa bon 'di las skyes ba'i phyir te/ don mi skye mi 'gag spros pa med pa rang bzhin
293b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis stong pa'i mtshan nyid du blta'o/ /gzhung las / de nas byang chub sems dpa' i zhes bya ba nas badzra h+rI(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rtag tu gsungs pa'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir yang gsung
293b2(rgyud 'grel): te / chos rgya chen po'i spyod yul 'di sems can rnam par dag pa'i don du 'gyur bas 'dzum dmul te / pad+ma 'dam gyis mi chags pa bzhin du chos mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba la nyon mongs pa'i dri mas mi gos pad mkhyen te/ snying po badzra ha zhes
293b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so/ /gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas/ bde ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /trAM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rigs kyi gtso bos stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab kyi
293b4(rgyud 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas khams gsum thams cad kyis dbang pos dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan to/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
293b5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi khams chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob bas khams gsum thams cad kyi chos la mnga' mdzad pa/ log par lta ba thams cad kyi gnyen po ste/ mthu che ba'i phyir rdo rje dang 'dra bas rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /rin po che'i
293b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thams cad don dam pa man chad ci nas kyang phan pa dang bde ba thob par bya ba'i don sbyin pa'i dbang mdzad de/ sems can re ba thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa yid bzhin du thob par 'gyur bas rin po che'i
293b7(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa ma skyes pa'i don shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba'i sems can thams cad la ston to/ /chos kyi sbyin pas kun kyang dkyil
294a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dam pa 'di la gdug cing stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su med pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ /chos thams
294a2(rgyud 'grel): cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas dngos grub kyi las thams cad thob par byed pas yid bzhin gyi rin po che las nor rdzas sna tshogs 'byung zhing rdzas kyi spyi dang chen po zhes bya ste/ sems
294a3(rgyud 'grel): can dbul bongs pa thams cad lus dan dag dang sems bde ba thob par 'gyur bsan las kyi rigs? kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /so so'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams su zhugs shing stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang chos mnyam pa nyid du nan tan gyis
294a4(rgyud 'grel): spyad na dkyil 'khor gyi yon tan 'di rnams kyang thob cing dbang byed par 'gyur ro/ /trAM zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs kyi snying po ste/ 'di'i sa bon las rin po che'i rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir te/
294a5(rgyud 'grel): mi skye mi 'gag smos? pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi don to/ /gzhung las/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' i snying po zhes bya ba nas/ dam tshig rin po che'i snying pos smras so/ /badzra traM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rin po che'i rigs kyi
294a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi gtso bo nam mkha' i snying pos rtag tu bshad pa'i don 'di rtag tu ? dang 'di brtan par? bI phyir te? dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di bstan na don yod bar mkhyen pas bzhin 'dzum ste/ rang gi mgo ba la rin po che'i phreng ba 'ching ba yang gzhan
294a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ? dbang byed pa'i tha tshig ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bshad do/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te /chos thams cad stong par byas pas stong par gyur pa ma yin gyi/
294b1(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid kyi stong bas na yang dag par ma nor bas mtshan nyid la sus kyang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir rdo rje lta bu ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyod pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
294b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par byas bas mtshan ma med pa ma yin gyi chos nyid kyis mtshan ma med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par spyod pa'i dbang du byed pas rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi rigs
294b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad smon pa med par byas pas smon pa med pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyis smon pa med ste/ gnyis su med pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos nyid bas chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
294b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang yongs su dag pas chos nyid kyis dri ma med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku man chad dngos
294b5(rgyud 'grel): grub thub par byed pas na las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bya'o/ /a'i don ni rtag tu smos pa dang 'dra/ gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas zhes bya ba nas/ badzra a zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das
294b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di dpal gzhon nur gyur pas kyang rtag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rgya che ba'i phyir bzhin 'dzum bzhin du bstan te/ badzra a zhes gsungs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i sku'i mtshan nyid dang phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab chen pos ?
294b7(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad la gcod pa'i ral gri lta bu yin pas na shes rab zab mo'i don 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs shig gsungs shig pa'i skul ba'i tha tshig bas ral gris de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs
295a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /gzhung las/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor lo'i nang du chud pa zhes bya ba nas / dri zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ dkyil 'khor kyi nang du chud bI de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis stong
295a2(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzad pa la 'jug pa'i don te/ /rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid du mthong ba gnyis su med par sbyong ba la
295a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par 'jug pa ni cis kyang chugs bar mi 'gyur te / rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong ste/ gnyis su med pa'i
295a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas chos mnyam pas sems can ma lus pa'i don thams cad mi gtong ba'i dbang du byed pa ni rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la byed par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa gcig kun rin po cha ni dbang bskur ba'i las byed pas dbang bskur pa yang
295a5(rgyud 'grel): 'ga' tsam la ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la dbang bskur bas na mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de gnyis su med par mnyam bar sbyor ba dus thams cad du mnyam bas na
295a6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stob pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su med pa mnyam par sbyor bas mnyam pa nyid du dngos grub kyi las thams cad du 'jug
295a7(rgyud 'grel): pas dkyil 'khor ? nas cad du 'jug bar 'gyur ro/ /traM zhes bya ba ni rtag tu bshad pa'i don dang 'thun no/ /gzhung las/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu zhes bya ba nas/ badzra tsakra hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/
295b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pas rtag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi don shin tu rgya che bar mthong nas bzhin ? bzhin du 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i
295b2(rgyud 'grel): snying po gsungs pa yin no/ /badzra tsakra hUM zhes bya ba'i don rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du bsdus pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas/ mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /traM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/
295b3(rgyud 'grel): rig ba'i lha mo rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya ba'i phyir shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa ste/ gti?
295b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa mnyam par sbyor ba las byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang mchod pa sna tshogs de'i rgyud las 'byung ste/ byang chub kyi sems kyang shin tu rgya che la yangs te/ mthu che ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing 'jig rten
295b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zil gyis mnan ba'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa ste/ gnyis su med pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba las 'od zer dmar po phyogs bcur 'phros te/
295b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs kyi dbang du byed pa dang/ sems can ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul zhing gnas bde ba bskyed de/ snying rje chen po'i dbang du byed pas rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i chog rgyas pa'o/ /
295b7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod do/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam par sbyor bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa ste/
296a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam bar sbyor ba'i las byed pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge 'dri ba la sogs pa'i ni las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas ba'o/ /traM zhes
296a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i don ni rtag tu bstan pa'o/ /gzhung las/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba nas/ oM ga ga na sra b+ha ba badzra oM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ dkyil 'khor 'di lta bu bstan pa'i don 'di dang byang chub sems dpa' nam
296a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' mdzod kyi don de dang 'thun par bsnan te/ smras ba'o/ gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub ho ha ha zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de bzhin
296a4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pas sems can thams cad 'bul nus pa rdo rje'i khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i don 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thams cad rang bzhin
296a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis grub pa med do/ /stong bas mnyam pa'i phyir khro ba yang mnyam pa ste/ chos stong pa khro ba stong pa sems can stong pa bas chos nyid kyi don ma nor ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mthu che ba'i phyir rdo rje'i dkyil lta bus 'dul lo/ /rin po che'i
296a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thams cad chos kyis 'dul zhing bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsgrol ba'i dbang du byas pas khro ba 'dul te/ stong pa nyid gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyor ba'i phyir sems can sna tshogs kyi don gyi phyir
296a7(rgyud 'grel): khro ba spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thams cad stong pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir khro ba yang chos nyid de/ chos kyi don
296b1(rgyud 'grel): ji lta ba bzhin du ma nor ba'i mtshan nyid bsan na chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thamS cad kyang zad pa'i mu med pas rdo rje dang 'dra/ khro bas 'dul ba yang de bzhin du sems can rgya che bas khro
296b2(rgyud 'grel): ba yang rgya che ste/ sems can khro ba gnyis kyang dbyer med pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing sems can gyi don chu'i rgyun dang 'dra bar? du thams cad du byed pas las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /ha ha zhes bya ba'i don ni sems can
296b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad yongs su dag pa'i phyir spro ba'i las byed pas mgu ba 'am rangs pa'i tha tshig ste /rgod pa'i mtshan mas ha ha zhes bya'o/ /gzhung las/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba nas/ badzra kro d+ha ha ha zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/
296b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang sems can thams cad smin par 'gyur ba'i don pas lus chud mi za bar dga' bsnan pa'i phyir/ rdo je gnod sbyin gyi gzugs shin tu pha rol 'jigs skrag bar byed pa'i gzugs bsgyur nas
296b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba'i gang mo snying po 'di smras so/ /gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las su rig par bya'o/ /h+rI zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad
296b6(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba bshad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor de sems can thams cad ngo
296b7(rgyud 'grel): bo nyid kyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis mnyam pas shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang stong pa nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan nyid pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi
297a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor te/ chos cog thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dbyer med cing mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos por grub pa med pas stong pa'i mtshan nyid de/ mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing chos
297a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la spyod kyang nyon mongs ba'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/ bgegs thams cad las rgyal ba'i phyir rdo rje lta bur mthu che bas na rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ rin po che'i
297a3(rgyud 'grel): dreng bas dbang bskur te don byed pa yang sems can 'ga' la byed pa ma yin gyi/ dbri bkol med par sems can thams cad kyi don du byad pas na shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang sems can gyi don gyi
297a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir na rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos so cog thams cad kyi dbyings nyid las gzhan ma yin pas shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba yang chos kyi dbyings te chos
297a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid pas chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos thams cad stong pa'i phyir chos thams cad spyod do cog kyang las zhes bya ste/ she rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba yang dngos grub
297a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs te rnam pa sna tshogs 'grub kyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang sgrib par mi 'gyur bas las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /h+rI zhes bya ba'i don ni rtag tu bshad pa dang/ 'thun no/ /gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan
297a7(rgyud 'grel): 'das lag na? rdo rjes zhes bya ba nas/ badzra a mo g+ha hUM zhes bya ba'i ? du ste/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don 'dod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba stong pa nyid kyi ye
297b1(rgyud 'grel): shes dang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dam tshig mi gtong ba ste/ 'di lta bu'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs nas/ mnyam par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bdag dang gzhan zhes bya ba med pa'i snyoms par zhugs nas semS
297b2(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'i don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi snying po smras so/ /badzra a mo g+ha hUM zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i gdon mi za bar btus pa zhes bya'o/ /gzung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
297b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba nas traM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pas
297b4(rgyud 'grel): zhugs nas sems can thams cad la byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ sems can thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang thugs thams cad dang ldan pas stong pa nyid kyiye shes dang shes rab
