297b5(rgyud 'grel): dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyong ba la zhugs nas kun kyang bla na med par mngon par 'tshang rgya bas na sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang brlabs che bas rdo rje'i rigs
297b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ rin po che'i phreng bas khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas mnyam par sbyor pa'i rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur nas/
297b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyang de'i spyod lam la 'jug cing mnyam bar sbyor ba'i rdo rje'i snying pos dbang byed par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig rin po che'i dbang bskur ba yin te/ lag tu rdo rje byin nas las thams cad spyod du 'jug pa'i dbang sbyin par byed
298a1(rgyud 'grel): ba sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba ste/ rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab dang pha rol tu
298a2(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa'i don bstan pa la 'jug pas/ sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po ste/ chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zheS bya'o/ /laS kyi riM? kyi dkyil ? te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ sheS rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas sems can thams cad bya
298a3(rgyud 'grel): ba byed pa la rab tu sbyor gyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas/ sems can thams cad las kyi snying po ste/ dngos grub thams cad mngon par spyod pas na las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /trAM zhes bya ba'i don ni
298a4(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa'i sa bon te/ rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /gzhung las/ de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams zhes bya ba nas/ badzra h+rI b+hye swAhA
298a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim dang ra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang khyad par med de/ mtshungs shing 'dra bas rgya cher bstan nas snying po mchog sngags rnams byin te/ de yang gnyis su med pa mnyam par sbyor
298a6(rgyud 'grel): pas longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gi snying po gsungs so/ /gzhung las/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdza' yas mu med ces bya ba nas/ b+hyo badzra oM sarba d+harma ta/ a pra ba ni tsa/ hi li hi li/ sarba d+harma
298a7(rgyud 'grel): ta/ mi lI mi lI/ sarba d+harma ta/ a nu rA ga gi ni swAhA zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mdza' yas mu med thug pa med pa'i chos kyang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
298b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par sbyor ba'i longs spyod chen po dang ldan par mdzad pas cho ga 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa dang 'thun pa'i phyir cho ga 'di yang mdza' yas su med thug? pa med par yongs su byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid
298b2(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam par sbyor pas sbyod yul thams cad du rnam par dag pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba bsams gyis mi khyab mdza' yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thamS?
298b3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyang mdza' yas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs spyod chen po nyid yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa sku na bdud thams cad las rgyal ba'i phyir/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /rin po cha'i?
298b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos thams cad du mnyam ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i mthu dang 'dra mu med cing gzhan gyis zil gyis mi mnon to/ /dbang du grub pas rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
298b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam bar sbyor ba ni du ma'i don ma yin te/ mnyam pa nyid gcig tu zad bas chos thams cad kyang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid gcig
298b6(rgyud 'grel): tu zad de dbyer med pas na chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba chos mtshan ma sna tshogs kyi spyod
298b7(rgyud 'grel): yul la zhugs kyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang sgrib par mi 'gyur bas shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pas na chos thams cad kyang mthar thug pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba yin te/ dngos grub thams cad sbyin par
299a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pas las kyi riD kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /gzhung las/ gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba nas/ rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur/ /badzra b+hyo zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin par mnyaM?
299a2(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor ba'i tshul 'di nyan pa la sogs te bsgom pa'i bar du nan tan byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa dag pa'i mthar phyin te/ chos mtshan ma sna tshogs kyi sgor zhugs kyis kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi 'od gyis sgrib
299a3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no/ /gzhung las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni / de bzhin gshegs
299a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang rdo rje 'dzin pa ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad skyob pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin bas de dang nam du yang mi 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir gus ba zhes ri mor bya ba'i phyir phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba yin no/ /gzhung las/
299a5(rgyud 'grel): oM g+ha ga bAn na rod ba raM baMda shad+ha ya swAhA zhes bya ba nas/ oM zhes bya ba ste stags kyi yi ge 'dru drug? po 'di rnams ni dkyil 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' so so'i rigs kyi snying po 'di'i don mi spyod pa thamS
299a6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba'i don yin no/ /rig pa chen po'i snying po 'di bshad pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i don te/ ma nor bar ston pa'i dam
299a7(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi sga? dang sngags kyi snying po yi ge 'dru drug brjod pa bar snang la grag go/ sngags kyi snying po 'di rnams ni rig 'dzin thams cad kyis rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya zhing rjes su dran bar bya'o /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te chos
299b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnam grangs snying po bstan pa 'di dngos grub thams cad thob par byed pa'i don yod pas de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyang myur du 'grub par bya bar byin gyis brlabs nas legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /oM zhes bya ba'i don ni de gzhin gshegs
299b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku lta bu'o/ /bar ma ni ak+Sho b+hya dang/ ratna saM b+ha ba dang/ a me g+ha sid+d+hi 'dus pa'i sku lta bu'o/ /tha ma ni chos kyi sa a mi tA b+ha lta bur blta'o/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu mthon ma ni pha rol tu phyin pa tha ma ni rab
299b3(rgyud 'grel): bar ma ni byang chub kyi sems lta bu yin no/ /gzhung las/ sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba nas/ blo gros chen po legs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /rigs kyi yum rnams kyis mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor so so'i yon tan rdo
299b4(rgyud 'grel): rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la bsded pa ni sems dpa' chen po legs so zhes bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi slob dpon lta bu ste/ stong pa nyid dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor zhing 'dud la
299b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa log par blta ba thams cad zil gyis gnan par mdzad de ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i gnyen po bas de'i phyir rdo rje zhes bya ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mnyam pa las ma gyur par 'jig rten gyi chos dang longs spyod
299b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la yang mngon par stod pas yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas legs so zhes bya bas bstod do/ /rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa ni bde ba chen po legs so zhes bya ba yin no/ /chos kyi
299b7(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas don dam pa'i bden pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang ldan thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel te mnyam pas bsod naMs
300a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur pas theg pa chen po'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor ta/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab dus theg pa chen po legs so zhes bya ba yin no/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil
300a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la bstad pa ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas dngos grub kyi las sna tshogs mdzad kyis kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid las ma gyur bas ji ltar bsdos pa bzhin du yang?
300a3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub la/ shes rab dang thabs chen po chus mi zabs shin tu blo gros dang ldan pa yin pas yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir blo gros chen po legs so zhes bya ba yin no/ /gzhung las/ cho ga 'di ni dge bar smas? zhes
300a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba nas/ bshad pa la ni mngon par bstod cas bya ba'i bar du ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la 'jom pa med par spyod/ shes rab dang thabS
300a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi stong? yul yang ngo bo nyid kyis mnyam pa ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i sgo /sems can thams cad kyang mos shing dang bar 'gyur ba'i chos chen po yin pas dge bar smras so zhes bya'o/ /dkyil
300a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen po mdzad pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang phyag na rdo rje bsnams te/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa nyed du zhugs nas/ mdo sde zab mo 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pas dkyil
300a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mdzad pa'i tshul du bstan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya'o/ /chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin gyis kyang kun rdzob tu rgyu dang 'bras bur sbyar pa ste/ de bas na mdo
300b1(rgyud 'grel): sde'i don 'di bstan pas thos ba'i shes rab bskyed de chos nyid kyi rigs pa la brten nas bsam pa'i shes rab kyis don gang yin pa la lcigs par byas nas mnyam par sbyor ba'i don la bsgoms na/ 'bras bu byang chub kyi rigs 'dzin la
300b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs te bla na med pa'i sa man chad dngos grub ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu yod pas sems can kun kyang dam pa'i chos spyod pas 'di la 'jug cing sgom par 'gyur bas 'dul ba'i mchog ces bya'o/ /mnyam par sbyor
300b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgo yangs pa 'di la kun kyang mos? shing dad par 'gyur la/ longs spyod dang ldan bzhin du bla na med pa'i sa thob par 'gyur bas thob pa'i rgyal po ste/ shes rab dang thams gnyis mnyam bar spyod pas lhag pa'i chos gud na med pas
300b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi sa thob ba las thob pa'i sa che bar sgrub tu med pas bla na med pas bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can gang yang rung ste/ dam pa'i chos sbyod lam 'di la nyan pa dang sems pa dang bsgom pa la sogs te/ nan tan du byed pa
300b5(rgyud 'grel): la ni gdon dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang/ 'tshe bar byed mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i sa thob bar bya ba dang/ dngos grub dam pa ci 'dod pa thams cad sangs rgyas
300b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis ring por mi thogs par steng bar 'gyur ro? zhes gsungs pa yang mi 'gal bar myur du thob bar 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam pa'i chos chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang/ de bzhin
300b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor ba byin gyis brlabs pas gsang ba'i don 'di yang rdo rje can gyis grub par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po'i chos yangs shing rgya che la longs spyod dang ldan bzhin du 'grub pa'i chos
301a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa 'di la don chen po yod par mthong nas mngon par dga' zhing bstod do/ /gzhung las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mzad ce bya ba ns/ sta'aM badzra oM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan
301a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni khamS gsum thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba yin pas gsang ba'i chos nyid par na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su med par mnyaM par sbyor ba sbros pa med pa bde ba chen pO don yod?
301a3(rgyud 'grel): pa mnyam par sbyor ba mi gtong ba'i dam tshig dang ldan pa chos yangs shing rgya che ba'i sgo 'di thog ma dang pas rtsom pa nas zhugs nas 'jug bla na med pa thob kyi bar du nyon mongs pa med par sgrib pa thams cad spangs pas na
301a4(rgyud 'grel): thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus kyi khyad par med par dus thams cad du bde ba mnyam pa'i chos gsungs so/ /mur thug la sogs pa chos zang mo'i don ma mthong ba stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su med pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos nyid
301a5(rgyud 'grel): mi shes pa rnams kyis ni dga' thub pa nyon mongs pa spyad kyis kyang 'bras bu bde ba thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /nges na sbyor ba kun las 'phags pa'i chos kyang thugs rje can gyis bstan par zang ngo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi
301a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid kyi ye shes gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyor bas longs spyod dang ldan zhing/ bla na med pa'i dngos grub thob pa sems can thams cad kyang byang chub tu sgrol bar
301a7(rgyud 'grel): byed pas thogs dad pa la zhugs? nas tha ma bla na med pa la sgrol ba la thug gi bar du dus thams cad du bde bas 'dod chags chen po'i dngos grub kyi dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen pa'i dngos grub dam
301b1(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i? bsku'i spyod yul du bstan nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyaM?
301b2(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor ba las longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing bde ba 'di yang thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab ste/ don dam pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos kyi riD kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye sheS
301b3(rgyud 'grel): dang gnyis su mnyam par sbyor bas bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i dngos grub dam pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rin po che'i phreng bas khams gsum
301b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi rgyal por dbang bskur par byed pas na rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam par sbyor bas khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po byed pas sems can
301b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad dag pa'i spyod yul la dgod pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i nang na gnas shing sems can gyi don la brtson gyis kyang 'khor pa'i nyon mongS pas mchiD paS mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das te/ sems can thams cad
301b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi don chu'i? rgyun dang 'dra ba'i las 'jug cing dngos grub dam pa thams cad thob pa'i las spyod pas na las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yang/ dkyil 'khor la lar ni lngar gsungs la/ la lar ni
301b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhir gsungs/ la la rim? gsum du gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dkyil 'khor lngar gsungs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang/ rdo rje'i rigs dang/ rin po che'i rigs dang/ chos kyi rigs dang/ las kyi rigs te 'di rnamS
302a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi mtshan nyid dang yon tan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang yum lnga'i don bstan to/ /dkyil 'khor bzhir bstan pa ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi nang du de bzhin gshegs ba'i rigs bsdus te dkyil 'khor pa ni? bstan to/
302a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung rab kha cig lamdkyil 'khor gsum du bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi nang du rdo rje'i rigs ?/ las kyi rigs kyi nang du rin po che'i rigs bsdus pa dang/ chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ 'di ltar gsum ste?
302a3(rgyud 'grel): dpe ce dang 'dra zhe na/ phyin ci 'og gi dbang gsum dang dag yid gsum gyi spyod yul 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gsum byung ste/ sems can nyon mongs pas bcings dang? 'khor ba'i nang du sdug bsngal de yang cas? dang ?
302a4(rgyud 'grel): dang yid gsum 'khrul? ba'i dbang gis gyur to/ /byin ci log med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dag pas lus? rdo rje zhes bya de/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku phyag rgya chen po dkyil 'khor zhes
302a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /ngag rdo rje ste? don dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang 'thun? pas de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /'di rdo rje zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yan bas na sems can
302a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi don bya ba sna tshogs? mdzad? pa dngos grub kyi las thams cad mngon bar spyod ba'i dbang du byed cing las rnams la spyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rigs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa las kyi rigs gcig tu bsdus pa'i
302a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste /lus dang ngag dang yid gsum rdo rjer 'gyur bas 'dod chags ni de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur/ zhe sdang ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang las kyi rigs kyi
302b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor kyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur/ gti mug ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur pas na 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid du bshad pas nyon mongs pa'i chos zhes
302b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gung na med bas sogs? cod? thams cad rnam dag pa'i rang bzhin yin bar mngon no/ /dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi? dbus lnga dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i ye shes dang spyod yul sngar sngar so sor 'gyur te/ gcig tu
302b3(rgyud 'grel): na spong yul gcig las med ba ma yin gyi/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la yang rigs kyi lnga char kyi mtshan nyid yon tan dang spyod yul dang tshogs shing dang ldan pas ming cam du dkyil 'khor yang lnga'i mtshan nyid du dbye bar zad do/ /dkyil 'khor
302b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ste chos kyi dbyings nyid yin/ rigs kyi yum dang gtso bo nyid las sprul te/ /mchod pa'i lha mo bcu drug kyang rigs kyi yum las gzhan ma yin/ /swAM? badzra oM zhes bya ba'i sA? ni? dpal dang ldan pa 'am bkra
302b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab? mtshan? nyid badzra ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid/ oM? ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba nas swAM? zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab
302b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyar ba'i bde ba chen mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tha mi dad pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos don ji lta bzhin du mkhyen ba'i chos so/ /chos thams cad kyi dbyings las tha mi dad ba'i phyir don thamS
302b7(rgyud 'grel): cad bsgrub bar gsungs te swAhA? zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang bkra shis kyi don yin/ hUM dang phaT ces bya ba ni mngon spyod dang bzhug? pa dang 'jigs par bya ba'i don yin te/ 'di rigs kyi yum gyi chos thams cad dge zhing bkra shis
303a1(rgyud 'grel): par gsungs pa'i phyir zhes brjod do/ /gzhung las/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni zhes bya ba nas dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rigs kyi yum? gyiS?
303a2(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab dang pha rol tu byin pa mnyam par sbyor ba la mkhas pa'i mchog thob par 'gyur zhing/ sems can 'khor ba'i mdza' med pa de srid du don mdzad pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub
303a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' ma gtogs bar shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i rgya chen po 'di la don chung mi za bar mkhyen nas tshigs bcad du bstod pa yin no/ /'khor ba'i thog ma dang mdza' med pa'i phyir mdza' i mdza' yang
303a4(rgyud 'grel): med de/ ji tsam du 'khor ba'i mdza' med pa'i bar du stong pa nyid dang nyan thos dang yang? sangs rgyas kyi sa ni d dang mnyam par sbyor ba ma yin no/ /de ltar 'khor ba mdza' med pa'i don la sems dang po skyed pa nas zhugs pas bla na med
303a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyis kyang thog ma snying rje chen po dang smon lam chen pos sems can gyi don la 'jug par bya ba'i shugs kyis sems can gyi don chu'i rgyun dang 'dra bar mdzad bas nyan thos dad rang sangs rgyas bzhin du
303a6(rgyud 'grel): phung po'i ltag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bar mi mdzad do/ /shes rab ces bya ba ni chos thams cad stong pa mnyam pa nyid du shes pa yin/ pha rol tu byin zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid de/ de shes rab dang
303a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs gnyis su sbyor te mnyam par gyur ba'i dus na/ shes rab dang yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /thabs ni shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid la byang chub kyi sems skyes te/
303b1(rgyud 'grel): sems de las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa bskyed pa dang/ dngos grub dam pa thams cad bskyed pa dang/ sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byas
303b2(rgyud 'grel): pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs su 'brel na thabs kyis gzung ba'i shes rab pas shes rab kyang thabs shes rab kyis gzung ba'i thabs pas na thabs kyang shes rab ste/ de ltar shes rab dang thabs dus thams cad du mnyam pa'i dus
303b3(rgyud 'grel): na ye shes kyi byin brlabs pa'i sa pas chos so cog thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas na rang bzhin med pas dag par gyur/ ji srid du sems can 'khor ba'i mdza' red ba'i bar du 'jig rten gyi sdig pa'i chos thams cad dang/ 'dod
303b4(rgyud 'grel): chags kyi nang na spyod kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyi rnam par dag pa'i sbyor yul du gyur pas na de bas na sems can thams cad kyang mnyam par sbyor ba la 'dzud cing sgrib pa med par byed pa'i phyir/ ji srid 'khor ba de tsam gyi bar du semS
303b5(rgyud 'grel): can 'dul zhing dag ba'i bshes gnyen byed do/ /chos thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid dang mtshung pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa med ci la yang mi gnas pa'o/ /nam mkha' zhes bya ba yang sems can gyi phyin ci log gis las kyi 'bras bu la nam
303b6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' yang dngos po mi snang ba'i phyir med par 'dzin gyis/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ste mnyam ba'i dus ni nam mkha' la ci zhig med na med ces bya ste/ med par lta ba yang mi 'byung pa na de bas na nam mkha' la yang mtshan
303b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid grub pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos so cog? thams cad kyang nam mkha' bzhin te grub pa med pas mnyam/ rang bzhin gyis dag ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i 'chid bar mi 'gyur bas na kun gyis mchog mngon pa nyid rdzogs zhes bya'o// //
304a1(rgyud 'grel): dper na pad+ma tshon gyis sgyur kyang man gyi kha dog gis mi 'grub ba bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su med pa'i mnyam par sbyor bas 'gro la phan pa'i don byed kyis nyes pas 'ching bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shes
304a2(rgyud 'grel): rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas longs spyod chen po'i nang du bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i don byed kyang rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul du gyur pas na longs spyod chen po dang yang mi 'bral ba'i
304a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir na don che/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ mnyam par sbyo ba la gnas pas sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir na bd ba che ba ste/ de ltar spyod pa na bsod nams dang ye shes kyi chogs yongs su rdzogs te/ sku gsum
304a4(rgyud 'grel): lhun gyis grub pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pas na sems can gyi hA zhes bya ba ni chos rgya chen po 'dis sems can smin par
304a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bas dga' ste rgod ba'i tha tshig go / //stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos ni de nyan ba la sogs de /bsgom pa'i nang tan chen bor byas na bde ba thams cad thob pa dang
304a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i don ni rtag tu bshad pa dang mthun no/ /gzhung las/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub
304a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dam pa rdo rje 'dzin chen po dang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid du byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gyi mig chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par
304b1(rgyud 'grel): dag pa yongs su ston bas na/ oM ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir thog mar 'gro zhes bya'o/ /de man chad ni tshig gi mjug rgyan te/ yi ge'i nang nas dngos su zer bar zad do/ /zhal nas gsungs pa'i dgongs pa ni ma rabs? ? pa
304b2(rgyud 'grel): dka' yis ? tshig? cog gi don de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab pa yin na bar gzhung las/ mngon sum du gsungs pa'i phyir sems can gyi phyir bstan pa rnams nor ba tsam/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
304b3(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa tshul? brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'brel pa// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //yi ge brgya pa'i chog? pad+ma? rdo rje lcags kyur? mdzad pa la zhugs so// */ /rgya gar
304b4(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ sha hA? kA ra bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor dang/ /de bzhin rnam par snang mdzad dang/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal nyid dang ni/ /
304b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du? nangs? gzigs dbang phyug /mkha' snying rdo rje khu tshur dang/ /'jam dbyangs chos kyi 'khor lo can/ /mkha' mdzod de bzhin gnod sbyin dang/ /bsdus pa dag tu yongs su bsgrags/ /zhi ba mdung gi mtshan dkyil
304b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor/ /na mo ming po'i dkyil 'khor dang/ /sring mo rnams kyis bshad pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor bcu dang lnga rnams ni/ /pha rol phyin du ma la bshed/ /pha rol phyin pa'i sgo nas gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje can gyi nyid/ /
304b7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin bde bar gshegs pa'i dang/ /rdo rje me ltar 'bar nyid dang/ /'jig rten dbang dang mkha' snying po/ /bsdus dang ming po'i? gang yin dang/ /srid mo lha dang klu dag go /lha mo'i dkyil 'hor gzhan dag kyang/ /de bzhin mchog
305a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje can dang rgyal nyid dang/ /rdo rje me 'bar pad+ma gnyis/ /rin chen ming po sring mo dang/ /klu dang sdug bsngal grags bsdus pa/ /'di rnams nyid kyis ras ris rnams/ /bde nas
305a2(rgyud 'grel): gong du bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje can dang bde gshegs nyid/ /phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten dbang/ /mkha' snying bsdus par bshad pa ste/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag tu bshad/ /dpal mchog dang po'i gsum ba las/ /de ni dkyil
305a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bshad bya ste/ /rdo rje can bde gshegs pad+ma/ /mkha' ? snying ming po'i dkyil 'khor dang/ /sring mo klu dang sdug bsngal grags/ /gsum pa bcu par bshad pa yin/ /ras ris lnga pa gnang bar grags/ /lha mo lnga yi dkyil
305a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnams/ /bsdus pa nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /dpal mchog dang por bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje rnam snang nyi ma dang/ /'jig rten dbang dang mkha' snying dang/ /ming po rnams dang sring mo klu/ sdug bsngal gdon dang bsdus pa'o/ /ras ros
305a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lnga rnams dang/ /bzhi pa dag tu yongs su bsgrags/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni 'byung ba yi/ /rdo rje rnam snang nyi ma dang/ /'jig rten dbang dang mkha' snying dang/ /ming po rnams dang sring mo klu/ sdug bsngal gdon dang bsdus pa'o/ /ras ros
305a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos? byas nas/ /da ni da lta nyid du yang/ /phyag rgya'i dum bu bsdus pa dang/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /dang po phyag rgya chen po nyid/ /de bzhin gnyis pa dam tshig ste/ /gsum pa chos kyi rgyar grags ? /bzhi
305a7(rgyud 'grel): pa las kyi rgya nyid do/ /? dum bu bsdus pa can/ /skye med nyid du shes bya ste/ /gang gi mchog tu gtsor gyur gang/ /phyi nang thams cad yang dag 'dus/ /'di yi legs sbyor gtso bo yang/ /da ni ma lus bshad par bya/ /
305b1(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig gang dang yang dag sbyor/ /phyag rgya rim bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya cher ? las grags/ /yang dag sbyor bar bshad pa yin/ /dam tshig rgya dang chos kyang ni/ /'debs pa sbyor ba yin par 'dod/ /'di bdag nyid kyi sdus pa dag/
305b2(rgyud 'grel): ci 'dra ci phyed bshad bya ste/ /phyag rgya cha dang yang dge sbyor/ /las kyi rgya zhes pa yin/ /gang phyir bsnams pa med pa na ni/ /nga rgyal 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ /nga rgyal med pa nyid kyis na/ /phyag rgya chen po brtan mi 'gyur/ /
305b3(rgyud 'grel): chos mang bar ni bsgrub bya yi/ /dam tshig phyag ? na med pas/ /gang zhig bsgrub par bya sngags la/ /sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod bya/ /lus ni gnas pa med pa dang/ /dngos po med cing mtshan med la/ /skye ba med pa'i sbyor ba yi/ /phyag
305b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya 'di ni 'byung par 'gyur/ /dang po zla pa byung ba la/ /de 'og yi ge'i gzugs can te/ /yi ge las ni mtshan ma byung/ /mtshan las rdo rje 'dzin rang nyid/ /me long mnyam nyid ye shes dang/ /so sor rtog dang bya pa'i bzhi/ /
305b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag par ngan mkha' ? ste/ /dangs? med gnas pa lnga pa yin/ /phyag rgya chen po sar gyur cing/ /chu nyid dam tshig yin par bshad/ /chos kyi phyag rgya me ting nge/ /rlung ni las la rnam bar gnas/ /'byung dang 'byu? par gyur yang dag
305b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor/ /de bzhin khams dang skye mched dang/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu sna tshogs dang/ /de bzhin sa dang pha rol phyir/ /'di dag thams cad stong pa ste/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba rnam pa zhing/ /mdor bsdus na ni 'byung 'gyur bas/ /de bas de
305b7(rgyud 'grel): dag nyid du dbrol/ /las ni chos la dgrol par bya/ /chos kyang de bzhin dam tshig la/ /dam tshig kyang ni rgya chen la/ /rgya chen zla ba stong pa la'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' snying rdo rje/ /lce la yang ni rtse gsum pa/ /bzhi pa'ang
306a1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /phyag rgya'i dam tshig yin par bshad/ /gang gis bzhi po 'di dag gi /sbyor ba yang dag mi shes par/ /spro ba dang ni sdud pa nyid/ /de las dngos grub rgyab kyis phyogs/ /dam tshig ye shes
306a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags rnams kyi/ /chos kyi dbyings ni mtshan ma nyid/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /bzlas brjod kyang ni 'di ltar bya/ /nyon mongs thams cad zlog byed pa'i/ /yi ge brgya pa dang por brjod/ /thog ma dbus dang tha mar yang//
306a3(rgyud 'grel): byin rlob byed pas bzlas par bya/ /bdag la byin brlob byed nyid dang/ /tshe yang ring bar 'phel byed cing/ /rgya rnams brtan por byed pa dang/ /sku gsung thugs rnams sgrub pa po/ /oM badzra satwa zhes brjod pa/ /gsang sngags rgyal po mchog
306a4(rgyud 'grel): gis bstod/ /theg chen mngon du phyogs rnams la'ang/ /khyab bdag ye shes lnga rang bzhin/ /gzugs dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang / mchod rten dkyil 'khor rtag pa yang/ /yi ge brgya sngags gcig 'dra ba/ /de 'dra'i bsod
306a5(rgyud 'grel): nams yod ma yin/ /yi ge brgya pa brjod pa las/ /bsod nams gang zhig legs gsungs pa/ /rdul phran gyi ni gangs snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis brgyan pa yin/ /gang zhig sa ma ya dang ni/ /mnu? pa lA la ya zhes brjod
306a6(rgyud 'grel): rjes su bdag bsrungs shes pa ni/ /thams cad kyi ni thun mong gis/ /lha rnams nye bar ston pa yin/ /badzra satwa twa no dang?/ /pa Sh+Thira? zhes bya ba dang/ /dri Dho me b+ha pa dang ni/ /su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba nyid/ /a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ /su po?
306a7(rgyud 'grel): ? b+ha ba dang/ /khams gsum sarba sid+d+hime/ /pra yats+tsha sarba karma su/ /tsa zhes legs par brjod pa dang/ /me tsit+taM sher ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru/ /hUM dang ho'i thog mdza' can/ /yi ge ha ha bzhi po brjod/ /b+ha ga ban bdag gam
306b1(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /sarba ta thA ga ta nyid/ /badzra mA me muny+tsa dang/ /badzra b+hi ba bzhi pa yin/ /mahA sa ma ya satwa/ /A(rgyud 'grel): nyid kun gyi thug la gnas/ /de bas kun tu khyab pa nyid/ /gsang sngangs rgyal 'di bla med pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ni/ /
306b2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge brgya zhes bshad pa yin/ /ji srid dpal mchog dang po dang/ /dpal ldan de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud/ /rnal 'byor rgyud dang bya ba nyid/ /mdo dang rtog pa gnyi ga las/ /dngos grub bsgrub pr brtson pa la/ /gsang sngags rgyal po dbus
306b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams/ /der ni bzlas pa'i bsod nams gang/ /de 'dir yi ge brgya pa yin/ /'dir bshad pa/ /badzra satwa rdo rje can/ /sa ma ya rdo rje rgyal po nyid/ /ma nu pA la chags pa ste/ /tiSh+Tha? badzra dag legs pa/ /dri d+ho me b+ha ba rin chen/ /
306b4(rgyud 'grel): su to Sh+yo mad+he ba gzi/ /a nu rak+to rgyal mtshan no/ /su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba bzhad/ /sarba sid+d+hime pra yats+tsha rdo rje chos/ /sarba karma su tsa me rdo rje rnon po/ /tsit+taM sh+re ya:ku ru rgyu/ /hUM dang ha bzhi rdo rje smra/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga ngan ni rdo rje las/ /badzri
306b5(rgyud 'grel): d+ha ba rdo rje srung ba/ /ma hA sa ma ya gnod sbyin/ /A:ni khu tshur shes par bya/ /'dir bshad pa/ /oM ni rig pa'i b+ha ga ste/ /hUM ni rdo rje gyur pa yin/ /ha bzhi dang/ ni ye shes te/ /nam mkha' rnam dag lnga pa'o/ /shug ral twa tse
306b6(rgyud 'grel): pi sha na/ /tsi ti nyid ni lnga pa'o/ /shes rab thabs dang ldan par ni/ /'di dag nyid kyis shes par bya/ /byang chub sems ni gnas med pa/ /de ni bskul ba nyid du bya/ /yi ge brgya pa brjod nas su/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni spro bar bya/ /
306b7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab thabs dang bor ldan pa/ /ru d+hi rar bcas blangs nas ni/ /yi ge brgya pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /bcu drug rtsibs can rim gsum bri/ /lte bar rdo rje rgya gram bri/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu ha bzhi bri/ /bsgrub b dngos su chung byas la//
307a1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid gsum ni bri bar bya/ /rtsibs la yi ge brgya la yi /bcu drug rkang par byas pa bri/ /dang po skor ba'i nang du ni/ /yi ge ma mo lnga bcus bkor/ /gnyis pa la ni 'dod rgyal bri/ /gsum par
307a2(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo gnod mdzes bri/ /bro ga'i gzhi 'am ras la ni//'gi wang dag gam snag tsha yis/ /bcu bzhi dag la bris nas ni/ /gser gyi legs par g.yog par bya/ /gal te bdag nyid dpal 'dod na/ /mchod cing rtog tu cang
307a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /gang zhig yi ge brgya pa 'chang/ /dus min 'chi ba nyid dang ni/ /nad dang mya ngan 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig yi ge brgya pa 'chang/ /dbul dang sdug bsngal sogs mi 'byung/ /rgyal po'i sgor ni cher mchod cing
307a4(rgyud 'grel): dgra rnams kyang ni zad par 'gyur/ /'dod pa thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /yi ge brgya pa gang zhig 'chang//bu 'dod pas ni bu rnyed cing/ /nor 'dod pas ne nor thob 'gyur/ /yul med pa ni yul thob cing/ /bu mos khyo ni dam
307a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnyed/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas la rab? dang/ /de bzhin gzhan gyis mi thub la/ /gal te che 'di ring 'dod na/ /yi ge brgya ba bcad bar bya/ /som nyi yid gnyis rnam spangs nas/ /gang zhig yi ge brgya 'char pa/ /tshe 'dir
307a6(rgyud 'grel): bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ /shi 'phos bde ba can du 'gro/ gang zhig don ni rgyas pa dang/ /dad dang ldan zhing dbang po thul/ /blo ma la gus phul ba dang/ /phrag dog chags pa spangs la sbyin/ /gal te tshe ni ring 'dod na/ /chad lta
307a7(rgyud 'grel): khro bcas sgyu can ?/ /phra ma can dang gzhug pa dang/ /sngags pas sbyin par mi bya'o/ /mi gtsang thams cad za ba 'am/ /dgra yi nang du phyin na yang/ /gtsang mar gyur pas rab mchod la/ /yi ge brgya ba bcad par bya//
307b1(rgyud 'grel): gnod mdzes mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /dum pa la brgyar bzlas nas su/ /dang dang ldan la byin na ni/ /tshe dang nad med 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal 'phrog cing dpal bskyed la/ /sdig ba thams cad bzlog pa ste/ /ngan 'gro thams cad
307b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhig pa'i phyir/ /yi ge brgya ba bcang par bya/ /gang zhig yi ge brgya pa 'chang/ /dag phyed bkra shis dpal dang ldan/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig par byed/ /lha rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob/ /zas dang de bzhin chang
307b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang/ /yi ge brgya ba bzlas nas ni/ /bdud rtsir byed pa'i mchog yin te/ dug rnams ma lus sel bar byed/ /gang zhig yi ge brgya ba 'dzin/ /mkha' 'khro 'byung po ro langs dang/ /gring gnon dang ni rje byed kyis/ /'tshe bar byed
307b4(rgyud 'grel): par mi nus so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis ni/ /yi ge brgya ba'i sngags gsungs te/ /bdud rtsir byed pa nyid dang ni/ /rga dang na dang 'jig byed pa'i/ /yi ge brgya pa brjod nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas sngags zlos pa/ /ltung ba
307b5(rgyud 'grel): che dang ldan rnams kyang/ /sangs rgyas nges par ma thob par 'gyur/ /g.yul du rgyal mtshan la btags te/ /yi ge brgya ba mchod pa byas na ni/ /rgyal po'i mdun du bzung na ni/ /dgra las rgyal zhing pha rol thug /g.yul sogs 'jig
307b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ? brgad la/ /mtshon gyi char 'bab 'khrug pa ru/ /pha rol gnad pa byas na ni/ /rgyal 'gyur 'di la the tsom med/ /yi ge brgya pa bzlas pa yis/ /mtshon cha gzhon pa lam 'jug dang/ /rtsed mo glu gar dga' ston cher/ /
307b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byer ba bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gsang sngags yi ge brgya bzlas na/ /blun po blo ni 'phel 'gyur ma/ /skal dan rnams kyang skal ldan 'gyur/ /byur dang sdug bsngal rnam par 'jig /gal te dngos grub sgrub 'dod na/ /
308a1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig spyod pa la gnas shing/ /gsang sngags yi ge brgya bzlas pa/ /sngags pa yis ni rtag tu bya/ /dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dus dag par/ /sgrub pa ras ris 'bri ba dang/ /rkang bsku mig sman sa 'og la/ /gus
308a2(rgyud 'grel): pas yi ge brgya pa bzlas/ /gsang sngagS yi ge brgya bzlas pas/ /tshul 'chal brtul zhugs can 'gyur zhing/ /bcings pa 'ching ba las grol 'gyur/ /bud med nyid kyang bskyed bar 'gyur/ /yi ge brgya pa zhes bya ba/ /rang bzhin gyis

308a5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra ba yi/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyan ni 'bab par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid na/ /mngon sum yi ge brgya nyid de/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa mdzad pa'i phyir/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis bzhugs pa yin/ /tshe dang mdog dang gzi bskyed cing/
308a6(rgyud 'grel): lus ni zhi dang rgyas par 'gyur/ /ji srid nyi zla skar ma gnas/ /de srid lus ni brtan par byed/ /gang zhig yi ge brgya ba sgrub/ /srog chags bsad par mi bya zhing/ /dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang/ /lha gzhan dag pa phyag mi bya//
308a7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par mthu/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin dang/ /'dra ba ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /nad ni chen por 'byung ba dang/ ? ge dgra dang thab pa dang/ /'tsho dang gnod byed grib mas phag
308b1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge brgya ba bzlas par bya/ /bdud kyi las nyid byung ba na/ /yi ge brgya ba bris nas ni/ /rgyal mtshan la ni btags nas su/ /phyogs kun tu ni bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin bskur/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsams nas ni/ /rnga chen dag
308b2(rgyud 'grel): ni brdungs nas su/ /gu gul gyis ni bdug par bya/ /gang du spyod pa'i gnas la ni/ /dgra bo nges par 'byung ba dang/ /der ni bdud rnams 'jig 'gyur ba'i/ /dngos grub yi ge brgya pas bya/ /lcags las khru gang tsam gyis ni/ /zhi
308b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i spos khang byas nas su/ /yu ba rin chen rdo rjes brgyan/ /kha ni sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan/ /snod nyid kyi ni nang dag tu/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i pad+ma bya/ /de yi dbus su bri ba ni/ /rdo rje rtse gsum pa nyid de/ /drag cing 'bar ba'i bde? bas 'khrigs/
308b4(rgyud 'grel): bsreg pa'i bskal pa lta bur mchog /ha ha zhes bya'i sgra yis 'khrug / pa yi mar dang yang dag ldan/ /sa ni legs par brdungs nas su/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i pad+ma ni/ /bris nas sngags bas 'dab brgyad dang/ /dbus su sna tshogs
308b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bi/ /spos dang me tog rnams dang ni/ /zho dang bu ram kha ras mchod/ /ba yi rnam lngas bsang bya zhing/ /sha ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /'bru rnams kun dang ldan pa dang/ /til dang ma sha yang dag ldan/ /'byung po thams cad tshim
308b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa/ /phyogs rnams kun tu gtor bar bya/ /gang zhig khyim der gnas pa yi/ /'byung po ring du bong nas ni/ /dpag tshad brgyar ni byin nas su/ /ha ha zer zhing sems med gnas/ /ji srid nyi zla gnas kyi bar/ /khyim dang grong
308b7(rgyud 'grel): rnal? rnams su/ /nor dang 'khru rnams 'byor pa dang/ /bya ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i bsnyems pa yis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu song nas ni/ /skad gdangs che ba dag gis ni/ /yi ge brgya ba'i sngags zlos
309a1(rgyud 'grel): shing/ /g.yas kyis rdo rje gsor byas la/ /g.yon gyis de bzhin dril bu bzung/ /a mri ta hUM zhes brjod cing/ /rtag par phyags su tsham dam bya/ /de 'og rdo rje bsdams pa yi/ /yu ba nas ni bzung nas su/ /rdo
309a2(rgyud 'grel): rje sems dpa' i bsgyings pa yis/ /gsang sngags yi ge brgya pa bzlas/ /rigs 'dzin 'dis ni zhi ba la/ /'byung po bzlog pa'i phyag bya zhing/ /gdon rnams ma lus rnam 'jig phyir/ /zhi ba'i mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /gtso bor
309a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa brgya nyid ni/ /lus nyid la ni brtan byed pas/ /des na 'di yi ming gi gtso/ /rgyud 'dir yi ge brgya par bshad/ /mtshams med lnga dang ldan pa yang/ /yi ge brgya ba zhes bya ba'i/ /mtshan mchog gang gis thos gyur
309a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /ngan 'gro kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /gang la dmigs te gsang sngags ni/ /yi ge brgya zhes bya baS? bri/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rang nyid ni/ /'chi bdag sgor bzhung bsnams nas byon/ /glegs bam la ni bris nas su/ /de bzhin brgya rtsa
309a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa ni/ /dbus su ga bur bcug nas bcang/ /khyim du dus gsum dag tu mchod/ /de ni dbul por mi 'gyur la/ /nad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /yams dang gnod byed nyid dang ni/ /'chi bdag la ni rgyab kyis phyogs/ /
309a6(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig gsang sngags rgyal po ba'i//lus dang dag sems dad pa yis/ /mos pas mnyam bzhag bzlas na ni/ /sangs rgyas mchod nyid thob par 'gyur/ /de ni dus byed gyur pa na/ /dur khrod kyi ni sems can rnams/ /gang
309a7(rgyud 'grel): zhig dri ni sngon byin pa/ /bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs can 'gyur/ /mthar ni thar bar gzhol 'gyur zhing/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni thob par 'gyur ro/ /las rnams thams cad byed
309b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid/ /bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed/ /zhi dang rgyas par byed pa dang/ /tshe ring mngon par 'phel bar byed/ /gro ga'i gzhi la bris nas ni/ /gang zhig 'phral la 'chang byed pa/ /che brang gyur ba 'ang bde bar ni/ /lo ni sum? brgya bco? bar 'gyur//
309b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dir bshad pa/ oM badzra satwa rdo rje sems dpa' i sgo nas/ /sa ma ya rdo rje rgyal po'i sgo nas so/ /ma nu pA la ya rdo rje chags pa'i sgo nas so/ /badzra ba twa te no ba tiSh+Tha rdo rje legs pa'i sgo nas so/ /dri Dho me b+ha ba rdo rje rin chen gyi sgo nas so//
309b3(rgyud 'grel): su toSh+ya me b+ha ba rdo rje gzi brjid kyi sgo nas so/ /ma nu rak+to me b+ha ba rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi sgo nas so/ /su bo Sh+yo me b+ha ba rdo rje bzhad pa'i sgo nas/ /sarba sid+d+hi mme pra yats+tsha rdo rje chos kyi sgo nas so/ /sarba karma su tsa me rdo rje rnon po'i sgo nas so/ /tsit+ta sh+ra ya:
309b4(rgyud 'grel): ku ru rdo rje rgyu'i sgo nas so/ /hUM ha ha ha ha rdo rje smra ba'i sgo nas so/ /ho b+ha ga ban sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rdo rje las kyi sgo nas so/ /ma me muny+tsa badzra b+ha rdo rje srung ba'i sgo nas so/ /mahA sa ma ya satwa rdo rje gnod kyi sgo nas/ /A:rdo rje khu tshur gyi
309b5(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas/ /yi ge brgya ba bshad pa las/ bsod nams legs par gang bsags pa/ des ni 'jig rten ma lus pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid gyur cig /yi ge brgya pa'i bshad pa/ slob dpon brla'i rdo rje lcags kyus/ stong phrag brgya
309b6(rgyud 'grel): ba las ji snyed pa rnams brjed du dogs nas bris pa yin no// //sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po'i sngags/ yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //
309b7(rgyud 'grel): ? chog bzhugs so// */ /rgya gar skad du/ sha tA k+Sha ra bi d+hi/ bod skad du / yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga/ 'jam dpal bzhon nur rgyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por sems dpa' i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ sa phyogS
310a1(rgyud 'grel): der sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdun gyi bar snang la dmigs te/ de rnams la dang por mchod pa dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ /sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams
310a2(rgyud 'grel): la rjes yi rang ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ lam la gnas pa la sogs pa byas nas /de'i 'og tu bdag dang dngos po thams cad mi sngar bar byas shing / sngags 'dis stod pa nyid du bsgom/ /oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha
310a3(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma(rgyud 'grel): swa b+ha ba shud+d+honya haM de nas oM tsit+ta pra ti b+hya b+hi kA ro mi zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis a yongs su gyur ba las / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs can bsdud par bya'o/ /de nas oM po d+hi tsit+ta utwa dA ya mi zhes bya ba'i
310a4(rgyud 'grel): sdags 'dis de nyid spro? bar bya'o/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra zhes bya ba / hUM las byung ba nam mkha' i khams thams cad dang mnyam par gnas pa'i rdo rje bsams la de nas rdo rje'i gzugs de las / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs
310a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa dang/ rdo rje dang zla ba yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams par sngags 'dis bdag nyid bsam par bya'o/ /satwa sarba ta thA ga ta
310a6(rgyud 'grel): thA ma haM// //de'i 'og tu hUM las byung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bsams la / de'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje de'i lte ba la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' / sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du
310a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs par bsam mo/ /shar phyogs su mi bskyod pa/ ltor rin chen 'gyur ldan /nub tu 'od dpag med pa / byang du don yong grub pa'o/ /shar lhor rdo rje sems ma/ phyag gnyis pa sku mdog nag po/ phyag g.yon pa skur brtem ?
310b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag ? rdog pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /lho nb tu rdo rje rin chen ma sku mdog ser pa/ phyag gnyis pa phyag g.yon pa bkur brten pa/ phyag g.yas na rin po che bsnams pa'o/ /chub byang du rdo rje chos ma sku mdog dmar ba/
310b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yon pa bkur brten pa/ phyag g.yas na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /byang shar du rdo rje las ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yon pa bkur brten pa/ phyag g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /
310b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i dbang ldan gyi phyags nas brtsams te / skor phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rtsibs bcu drug la bsam par bya ste/ de la rtsibs kyi dbus su thams cad kyang sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par
310b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de la dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog ljang gu g.yon pa bsnyems pas bkur brten pa/ phyag g.yas na rang gi zugs khar rdo rje bstad pa'i tshul gyi bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje rgyal po sku mdog ser ba rdo rje lcags/
310b5(rgyud 'grel): kyus 'gugs pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje chags pa sku mdog dmar po phyag na mda' bzhu bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje legs pa sku mdog mar ka ta lta bu / phyag gnyis kyis legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par byed pa'o/ /rdo rje rin chen
310b6(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog ser po ral gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su phyogs gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i phreng pa 'ching ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma sku mdog dmar po phyag gnyis kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje rgyal
310b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sdo? sangs/ phyag gnyis kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyas mtshan 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje bzhad pa sku mdog pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar po/ /phyag gnyis kyi so'i phreng ba gnyi ga dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnyis
311a1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje chas sku mdog dmar skya phyag g.yon pas brla'i sdong bu 'dzin cing phyag g.yas pas pad+ma'i 'dab ma dbyed pa'o/ /rdo rje rnon po sku mdog gur gum gyi mdog gan/ phyag g.yon pas thugs kar
311a2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa / phyag g.yas kyis ral gri 'phyar ba'o/ /rdo rje rgya gser gyi mdog can chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dpal? ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje sma ba sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yon pa ? bsnams
311a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ phyag g.yas pa lce'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje las sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams nas spyo por 'jog cing gar mdzad pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje srung ba sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje go cha bsnam?
311a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin sku nag po phyag gnyis kyi mche ba gnyis kyi rang gi zhal gyi thad kar bsnams nas gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje bsnams pa
311a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan par bsam// //de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya haM zhes bya bas bdag nyid la bltas la / sa ma ya sto zhes bya ba 'dis mdun du ye shes sems dpa' zla
311a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bsgoms la sa ma ya sti ma haM zhes bya ba 'dis snying gar bcug ste / bdag dang mi gnyis pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom mo/ /de nas yi ge hUM las byung pa'i rdo rje 'od dang ldan pa'i tshul can gyi lce
311a7(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams kyis bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang cod pan gyi dbang dang/ phreng ba'i dbang dang/ rdo rje'i dbang la sogs pa rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa/ sum rnams kyis
311b1(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bsam mo/ /yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid bzhugs so// #/ /rgya gar skad du/ ak+Sha pu tra lak+Sha Na/ bod skad du/ bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mchan ?
311b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la lha mo sangs rgyas sbyin mas stsal? pa/ bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i don ci mgas/ /mchog gi dbang phyug gis gsung du gsol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gsum pa/ lha mo nyon cig rab tu bshad
311b3(rgyud 'grel): do/ /khyod kyis zhus pa de brjod par bya'o/ /de thams cad kyi gtam bshad de/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du'o/ /mi spong ba'i sems kyi sdom pa de bzhin du bsod nams dang ye shes mi spong ba thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i bzlas
311b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phreng ba 'di'o/ /gang la bzlas pa'i phreng ba la dad pa mos pas gus paS bzung ngo/ /sdig pa thams cad spong to/ /sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gang du gzung na mgrin pa dang lag par rtsa bar ro/ /nges ni bya ba thams cad
311b5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par nges so/ /bzlas par byas pas lha mo dang dpa' o nges par grub pa rab tu ster ro/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi sa thob pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam par 'byung ngo/ /byis pa gzhon nu rnams kyis sdig pa mang po byas ba dang thams cad
311b6(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa 'gyur par 'gyur ro/ /rkang pa gcig pa'i bzlas pa'i skud pa 'dzin pa yis/ /bzlas na lha'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /phyed kyi tshad kyis bzlas na ngos lha dang lha mo'i sde mthong ngo/ /gang pa yis bzlas na brdzun pa'i dag spangs pa'o//
311b7(rgyud 'grel): phung gi la bzlas pas yon tan bcig 'byung ngo/ /lung tang la bzlas pas yon tan gnyis 'byung ngo/ /lcags la bzlas pas yon tan gsum 'byung ngo/ /te la bzlas pas yon tan bzhi'o/ /nor bu mu tig byu ru'i? la bzlas pas yon tan
312a1(rgyud 'grel): bcu dran no/ /dbang po'i dmigs la bzlas pas yon tan 'byung ngo/ /pad+ma la bzlas pas yon tan byi pa'o/ /yon tan bye ba phrag bye ba ru drak+Sha? la'o?/ /bo de ci la bzlas pas bcu drug dang 'dra bar dus ? yon
312a2(rgyud 'grel): tan dpag tu med pa 'byung ngo/ /bzlas pas phreng ba'i yon tan 'di dag rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'o/ /mkhas pas lhag pa dang chad par bya'o/ /lhag pa chad pa la 'gegs chen po 'jug go /dang na mnyam par bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i
312a3(rgyud 'grel): dus song nas sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /sdig mdzub snying gar byas te/ mdzub mos bzlas nas? bgegs bkug nas tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /gung mos bgrangs pas the tshom med par dngos grub 'byung ngo/ /srin lag dang bgrangs pas
312a4(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbin gyi dngos grub 'grub bo/ /mi? chung dang bgrangs pas sha tha dgug ba dang bskrad pa 'grub bo/ /mdo 'dzin la bskor zhing bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so// //
312a5(rgyud 'grel): de ni Di ta pa ra he ta dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sna kru bi por ba'i me tog bdug pa mar me dri mchog zhal bas dang na ? phyag
312a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dang po rnal 'byor pa man ngag thob pas rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas / rang dang gzhan gyi ngo bo thob pa'i bsod nams 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas la sku khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /de la 'di'i cho ga ni/ ci 'byor cing dang
312a7(rgyud 'grel): por ba'i me tog bdug pa mar me dri mchog zhal bas dang na bza' ? rgyan mchod yon bum par 'bru lnga'o/ /? gro so ba til sran na/ /bo ga'i nga dang rungs kar ? sh+ra pa ya go yu dzA ti ba la la sogs ba dang/ sman lnga ni ha sa de ba
312b1(rgyud 'grel): kaN+Na? ka yig ha de ba b+ha la /mu dra la sogs ba dang /dri zhim po'i sman dang dri zhim po'i mar khu mar zho dang som dang/ ma su ra'i phye ma da 'gro'i bar che dang/ ngar kha dog lta pa'i 'ban sbyangs la bum pa byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bya'o/ /?
312b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di'o/ /mdun du gang ba'i kha dog la sogs pas maN+Dal bya'o/ /g.yas su ci 'byor pa'i rdzas bzhag la/ de nas maN+Dal sngon du sum? pa bcu 'am gcig gi nang du / srog chags med pa'i dri zhim po'i zhes yongs su gang 'bru dang gri nyo ? sogs
312b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gos srog can gyis mgrin pa bcings la /g.yon du snod gcig yang dag par bzhag go /mchod yon gyi snod dri zhim po'i chu dang zho dang po ga ling dang sman bde yungs dang ko su ma dang go yu rnams yang dag par bshams la / yi dam
312b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi lha'i sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la / de nas las thams cad pa'i snod g.yas su dri zhim pa'i chus yongs su gang ba bzhag go /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyang bzlas te'o/ /de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum par zla ba rdo rje la sogs pa'am/
312b5(rgyud 'grel): skad cig mas bsgoms pa'i rim ba rdzogs par bya'o/ /pad+ma lnga la hUM gyur pa las rdo rje hUM gis mtshan ma las 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs bar bya'o/ /de zhu bas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa dkar po zhal cig phyag gnyis pa/
312b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril du 'bying ras 'dzin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ snying gar zla ba rdo rje hUM gi rnam pa'o/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab bo/ /mi bskyed pa'i dbu rgyan bsam gtan bya'o/ /de bzhin du bum par rnam par snang mdzad rin
312b7(rgyud 'grel): chen dpal? ldan/ /snang ba mdza' yas don yod grub pa/ ? ma mA ma kI/ gos dkar mo/ /sgrol ma bdud rtsi 'khyil pa mdza' mar rdzogs pa ni phyag gnyis pa zhal gcig pa rang gi mtshan 'dzin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rang gis
313a1(rgyud 'grel): bon dang mtshan ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la g.yon brkyang ba'i bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sdigs gzub? dang/ rdo rje gsong ba bsgom mo/ /yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod cing sor mo'i rdo rje dang/ yi ge gsum gyis me
313a2(rgyud 'grel): tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod do/ /de nas dril bu'i sngags kyis mchod/ de la sngags ni/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra g+haN+De ratna ratna? pra ratNa/ pra ratNa saM/ pra tar+Na saM pra ratNa/ sarba durb+ha k+Sha tra pra tsa le ta ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra e?
313a3(rgyud 'grel): tA swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra h+ri da ya san+to Sha ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nyid g.yas pa'i sor mo yis rdo rje nang spos khang gzung la g.yon bas d? dkro?/ /yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod do/ /oM badzra d+h+ri ka A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ oM
313a4(rgyud 'grel): badzra dzi na dza ka A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ oM ratna d+h+rika A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ oM A ro li ka A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ oM pra dz+nyA d+h+rika A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ oM ru ru sku ru dzwa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba artha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ oM shA ra ka ri shan+ti ka ra ga tra ni gro tra
313a5(rgyud 'grel): ni ga te ga te shu tra ni swAhA/ oM ka Te bi ka Ta ni ka Te ka Te ka to ti bi ri swAhA/ oM ta re tut+ta re tu re swA/ rnam(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta sA ya bA ka tsat+ta badzra NI na mo/ badzra kro d+ha ya mahA da daSh+Ta u da b+ha b+hai ra ba ya a si mu sa khA hi taShA band+ha band+ha / ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa
313a6(rgyud 'grel): sha tasta ya/ oM badzra a mri ta kunda li kha khA ti khA hi tish+na band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ bardza bardza/ bi sbo Ta ya sarba bi g+h+naMbi nA ya kaM mahA ga Na pa ti dza be tan+ta ka ra ya hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ /'di ni
313a7(rgyud 'grel): spyan drang pa'i sngags so/ /de nas sngags 'di rim pa ji lta bar rnam par rgyal ba la sogs ba'i bum bar mchod yon me tog la sogs pa sbyin no/ /sngon du brjod pa'i dril bu dkrol zhing sbyin no/ /snang gsal mar me dri mchog zhal zas
313b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis gang ba'i sbyin no/ /de nas g.yon pa'i dril bu bkur brten la g.yas ba'i sor mo rdo rje dang bcas ba'i rtse gsum ba'i phyag rgya bum pa'i steng du yang dag par bzhag la yang me tog la sogs bas mchod do/ /zhu ba'i bsam
313b2(rgyud 'grel): gtan gyi dum par byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas thad sku la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das ma'i yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs par bsam mo/ /khrus kyi las kyi yo byad dang/ shis pa'i cho ga ni snod kyi stengs du gru gsum pa'i shing bzhag
313b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ de'i gru la changs ba gnyis dang me'i snod dang mar mi gsum bzhag la sngon du g.yas pas/ yungs kar las bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags te/ oM sarba pA baM da ha na badzra ya swAhA/ sngags 'dis me'i nas?
313b4(rgyud 'grel): blugs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis rten la lan gsum bskor te phyi rol du dor do/ /bsang gtor gyis khrus bya ba'i thabs ni/ de bzhin du me tog la sogs pa la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bsang gtor gyis gtor te/ bsang gtor gyi me
313b5(rgyud 'grel): long legs par gyis la/ oM 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen/ /bla na med pa'i skyes bu dang/ /'dul ba'i
313b6(rgyud 'grel): kha lo sgyur ba dang/ /lha dang mi yi ston pa ni/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid do/ /de dag la 'dir mchod pa'i rdzas rnams dang/ khrus kyi yo byad thams cad thogs te/ sngon du mchod pa lngas mchod do/ /rim pas 'dag pa'i 'chal dang
313b7(rgyud 'grel): po? shing dang bum pa'i chus ?O/ /zho dang 'o ma dang 'bru lnga dang po ga ling dang star ka la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ sman lnga dang de bzhin du sman thams cad dang/ rin po che dang gur gum dang dri bzang thams cad do/ /der rdzas rnams
314a1(rgyud 'grel): te bum pa'i chus bkru'o/ /mo rang gi rdza dang sna na pU dza me b+ha sa mu dra ? ra Na sa ma ye h+ri ye be hUM zhes pa'i sngags kyis so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga te kA ya be sha b+ha na swAhA/ /chus bkru pa'i sngags so//
314a2(rgyud 'grel): las thams cad pa'i bum pas bya'o/ /de nas lha la dbang bskur chen po bya ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phreng sngags dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo'i sngags brjod cing ngo/ /de bzhin bltam pa tsam dus su/ /lha rnams kyis ni
314a3(rgyud 'grel): khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /bdag gi de bzhin khrus bya'o/ /ces bas so/ /yang dag par rgyal ba'i bum pa la me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ yi ge brgya pa dang de bzhin du badzra d+h+ri ka la sogs pa dang
314a4(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She na sa ma ye h+ri bi hUM ces pas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dri zhim po'i bdug pa la ras dag pas bdug ste/ me long gi chu dag par bya'o/ /dri zhim pa'i rdzas kyi me long la maN+Dal lnga'i mtshan ma byas
314a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ des me tog bzhag ste bzhag par bya'o/ /dril bu dang bdug spos? thogs te/ sngon du brjod pa'i bdug pa dang/ me tog la sogs pas mchod pa bya ste/ lta bshos kyi snod dbul lo/ /pi dam gyi lha'i dkyil 'khor
314a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi rim pa la zhal zas pa sogs pa'i mchod pa bul la gtor ma sbyin no/ /bstod pas bstod do/ /me tog dor te bzhag go /sems can gyi don du bsod nams bsngo'o/ /de nas gshegs su gsol lo//
314a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od ni 'brus kyi tshe ga'o// //paN+Di ta ba ra he ta dang/ lo tsA ba nag tsho dag slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
314b1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon zhi ba snying pos mdzad pa'i mchod rten bsgrub pa'i cho ga bzhugs// */ /rgya gar skad du/ /tse tu pA bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ mchod rten sgrub pa'i cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis
314b2(rgyud 'grel): sku gsum brnyen? te 'gro don mthar phyin pa/ /de la phyag 'tshal nas ni de nyid bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /rang gis brtag pa gtsor byas lung kun tshul mi 'gal/ /rnal 'byor gzhung lugs mchod rten bshad par bya/ /de la
314b3(rgyud 'grel): dang por gnas dben pa yid du 'od par ji skad bshad pa'isa sbyar ba la sogs chag byas te/ der stegs bu ji ltar mas ba byas la/ de'i lci ba dang tsan dan dang bur bum la sogs pa ci 'byor ba'i dri zhim bo'i chus skyad
314b4(rgyud 'grel): nul byas te/ me tog gi sil ma bkram/ nye 'khor spos chus chag chag gdab/ bla'o dang 'phan la sogs pa dag dang/ rol mo'i rnam pa dag dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mchan la sogs pa dag dang/ mchod pa'i
314b5(rgyud 'grel): bye brag rnams 'byor tshad bshams la bzhag /gzhan yang mchod rten nam tsha tsha'i yo byad skor phor dang/ sku gdud dang/ rtsa ba'i snying po 'am rten 'brel gyi snying po dang/ gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzugs dang/
314b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bru mar ga bur la sogs pa'i dri zhim pos 'gyur ba dang/ phag ze dang gang gi don du bya ba'i ming dang/ me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lnga dang/ 'khor lo la sogs pa dag kyang bshams te bzhag/ tsha tsha 'debs pa'i slob
314b7(rgyud 'grel): dpon la sogs pa kun kyang ji skad bsrungs pa'i khrus dag byas te/ gos gtsang bgo ba dang rgyan gyis brgyan te/ shar dang nub gang bde bar stan bde bar bting ste/ sdig pa bshad sa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang
315a1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang ba dang/ sdom pa brgyad? ba dang phyag bzhi bas phyag bya ste/ cho ga'i rim pa rang gi lugs bzhin byas la mnyam par bzhag nas rtag tu byams pa rang ldan pa'i sems gyis mchod
315a2(rgyud 'grel): rten gdab pa bya'o/ /mchod rten gdab pa'i sa gar bskor ba'i gnas der brtag cing byin gyis brlabs te/ bgegs bskrad pa dang/ gtor ma byin te tshon skud la sngags oM badzra sA tra sa ma ya tsUM phaT ces bya ba dang/ rdo
315a3(rgyud 'grel): rje'i skad par bsams la/ sa byon cidan tsam cing tshon skud kyis bskor te/ seng ger? pa'am lcags phur byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa dang sngags bzlas te gdab bo/ /oM badzra kA yi kI li ya sarba duSh? hUM phaT/ /phur bu'i
315a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags de lan bdun bzlas la dbus dang phyogs bzhir gdab bo/ /yungs kar dang spos chu bsres la sngags bzlas la phyogs der gtor/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags rgya bya'o/ /de nas ci tsam 'dod par sa de nas bda'/ /sngags la oM
315a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdo kha na kha dA ya hUM phaT ces brjod do/ /ya gzhi de nyid rin po cher gyur par bsam ma/ /de nas brkos te chog pa dang hUM bzhis phur bu thams cad bton la/ /oM ru ru spha ru dzra la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni/ sarba arba sA d+ha me swAhA zhes lan
315a6(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsa brgya bzlas pa'i 'o mas phur bu bklas te bu bar blugs so/ /sa blangs pa rnams kyang phyogs gcig tu snod gtsang ma'i steng du bzhag ste/ sa brdung ba'i tho ba'i tho bo la rdo rje ? ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags/ oM ra ? mud gA rA A
315a7(rgyud 'grel): sarba a sa te/ ya hUM phaT cig? de nas 'jim pa skya ba'i tshe sngos chus oM a mri te hUM phaT ces bdun nam nyi shu rtsa la cig bzlas te byin gyis brlabs la sbos chu de a dkar po la zla ba'i dkyil ' hor ku gyur te/ de'i 'od
315b1(rgyud 'grel): zer gyis spos chu nyid khyab par 'khyil nas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsams pa sma'o/ /sngags la oM badzra bram rnga nA ya swAhA zhes pas so/ /de nas 'jim pa de la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya lag pa g.yon pa la thal mo
315b2(rgyud 'grel): phar bar bkan las? ?U chung gi sen mo mthe bos mnan te/ sor mo gsum nas re cam phye ste bzhag pa'isteng du lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo kha sbab la/ g.yon pa ltar byas te 'jim pa'i steng du bzhag la rig pa chen mo'i
315b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags so/ /oM suk+She sukshme sukshma a nu ga te/ nir ku le ni ra ba Na sarba bud+d+ha yA nu ga te ya sho ba nyi ye sho dzi ni d+harma d+h+ra tu garb+he/ d+harmA ? dza ba shi te/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hishpa'i te swAhA zhes lam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la byin gyis
315b4(rgyud 'grel): rlabs pas de las ye shes kyi 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas sems can gyi don byas te slar bsdus pas 'jam pa de nyid rin po che sna lnga'i gong bu'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsam/ de nas 'bi 'di bya ba'i sngags la oM badzrad
315b5(rgyud 'grel): d+harma swAhA/ zhes lan bdun bzlas pas ye shes lnga'i 'od zer gyis sbyin phyogs bcu mdza' yas par 'phros shing khengs nye 'gro ba mang po'i don byas nas slar 'dus pa 'bi 'bi'i nang du zhugs te thim par gyur pas/ ye shes lnga
315b6(rgyud 'grel): ces te she la slob dag pa ltar bsam mo/ /rang rang gi sa bon gyi seng+ge la sogs pa dang/ rin po che'i gdan dang nyi zla dang pad+ma'i gang du/ bring phyogs phyogs su gang na bshams la/ de rnams kyi dbus su la bon gyi yi ge dang 'jim pa'i
315b7(rgyud 'grel): yi? sa rang rang gi sgrub thabs las ji skad gsungs ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa dang/ rnal 'byor gsum gyi lus rtsogs pa phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rim pa bzhin du rang rang gi sgrub thabs
316a1(rgyud 'grel): las bstan pa ji bzhin du bya ste/ tsan dan gyi lde gus thig le zlam por byas la byin gyis brlab pa ni snu dmar po las ye shes kyi me dbung rab tu 'bar bas de dag nyid du rab tu sbyangs te/ gon?
316a2(rgyud 'grel): de yang rin po che sna ? las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsam mo/ /de nas re re'i gdan du pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa'i steng du a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam mo/ /de'i dbus su gong du bshad pa ltar lha re re nas rang
316a3(rgyud 'grel): gi rtog pa las 'byung ba ltar bzhugs su gsol te/ dam tshig sems dpa' byas la/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dbang du
316a4(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ sgrub par bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyang phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje dkar po rtsi lnga pa las ye shes lnga'i 'od zer p'phro bar bsams la/ ba sku'i gseb thams cad nas
316a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang/ 'di bar gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa sbyin phur ldar mu 'byam bar 'phro zhing/ sems can gyi sems thams cad kyi don mdzad par byin gyis brlabs nas slad 'dus te/ dam
316a6(rgyud 'grel): tshig sems dpa' de nyid la thim par bsam so/ /de nas mchod pa lnga la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod nas lha so so'i bstod ba re re nas byas la so so'i phrin las dang dam tshig gi sgo nas smon lam
316a7(rgyud 'grel): gdab bo/ /de lta ? che ba'i rims ni 'di yin te/ 'bi? 'di nang du lha so so'i snying bo/ oM hUM traM tri a zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang snying po gong sa gnyis bzhug la/ sngags bdzra d+harmA d+ha tu gande twa la swAhA zhes
316b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod? bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes de de'i nang du zhugs par bsams mo/ /de nas skor por du yungs mar daM tili mar gyis bsku ba'i sngags oM a ra dze 'di ?  swAhA/ zhes gsum brjod bas byang chub kyi sems kyis
316b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgos par bsam mo/ /de nas skor bor du gzhug pa'i sngags oM badzra d+ha tu gu? swAhA zhes brjod pas thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las chos kyi dbyings su bsam mo/ /de nas brdul ba ni oM badzra mud ga nga A ka Te a A ko Ta ya
316b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM gong ma'i snying po gnyis kyang brjod la/ dbyung ba'i sngags oM d+harmA ra ti swAhA zhes brjod pas /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las chos kyi skur grub par bsams te/ oM
316b4(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta d+harmA kA ya mahA su ka hu ra ta sa ma ya stuM/ de las gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis byung bas 'gro ba'i don bsam gyis mi khyab par bsams te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+ho ga kA ya sa ma ya staM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta nid
316b5(rgyud 'grel): ma Na kA ya sa ma ya staM/ de la dang por mchod rten ni chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan zhes smos te/ sa dang rdo rje dang shing dang gser dngul la sogs pa dag las sems can gyi rtsol bas bsgrubs te/ dbyibs kyi bye brag tu byas ba de dag ni
316b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan zhes gdags te/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhug ngag las chos kyi sku ni sku med nam mkha' 'dra zhes 'byung ste/ brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin yang chos thams cad kyi rgya dang 'bras bu'i don gyis mchod rten gyi dbyibs lta
316b7(rgyud 'grel): bur grub pas des mchos kyi skur? ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos thams cad yongs su sogs pa de la chos kyi sku zhes 'dod do/ /de bas na 'di ltar snang ba ni gzugs brnyan yin par shes par bya'o/ /yang na gzugs 'di ltar grub pa ni sku
317a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi tshul yin te/ rmad dge ba bcu dang/ bar rim dang po nas kha khyer gyi bar du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / srog shing shes rab? bcu'i bar du rgya'i chos bsod nams kyi tshogs
317a2(rgyud 'grel): yin te sprul pa'i sku yin pa dang/ 'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu dang / ma 'dres ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / char khabs thugs rje chen po dang / zla chos byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa dang / me long
317a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bzhi dang / tog mngon par shes pa drug dang / dar gyi cod pan dang/ gdugs kyi chos kyi skur mnga' gsol te/ chos kyi rgyal por gyur pa dang/ chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan thun mong ma yin ba'i rin? chen po ste/ nam mkha' lding
317a4(rgyud 'grel): gi kha nas byung ba ni thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs dang ye shes kyi shugs mnga' ba dang/ ba dan chos kyi grags ba chen po dang/ dril bu snyan pas phyogs bcur khyab pa dang/ rdo reng mi 'jigs pa bzhi brnyes pa dang/
317a5(rgyud 'grel): them skas bsrung ba med pa gsum mam/ so so yang dag par rigs bzhi 'am/ rnam par thar ba bzhi ste stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ chos thams cad rang bzhis kyi 'od gsal zhing rnam par
317a6(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i lam mkhyen pa dang/ dril bu tshangs ba'i dbyangs sa ma gsung lam lag drug cu dang ldan pas de dag ni 'bras bu'i chos ye shes kyi tshogs yin pas chos kyi skur bstan pa dang/ a ma las rin po che'i phreng ba dang/
317a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang rin po che ? dogs? kyi rgyan kyis spras ba mdzas pa dang blta bas chog mi shes pa sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tshim bar byed pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste/ de dag ni rgyu dang 'brag bu'i chos te/ nyan thos dang rang rgyal
317b1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa spyi la bstan pa'i chos shin tu rgya che'o/ /de bas na 'di ni sku gsum gyi dam tshig gi sems dbang byas la dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dam/ dkyil 'khor gang
317b2(rgyud 'grel): la mos ? lha rnams sku gsum brnyes pa 'am/ ldan? pa de dag gi sku gsum ye shes kyi sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings nas spyan drangs te bstim nas bsgrub pa ni lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya gong du bstan pa'i sku
317b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi snying pos bya'o/ /srog shing gi sngags la oM badzra a yu She swAhA/ sems can thams cad shes pa bcu dang ldan bar gyur cig /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos yun ring du mi nub bar gyur cig/ semS
317b4(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la 'jug par gyur cig/ 'khor lo'i sngags pa oM pra ma? na ye swAhA/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ma 'dres pa'i
317b5(rgyud 'grel): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum thob par gyur cig /rnam par thar pa brgyad thob par gyur cig/ ye shes bzhi dang ldan par gyur cig/ dar gyi cod pan gyi sngags la oM pra kaM pa la swAhA/ sems can thams cad dus dang rnam pa thamS
317b6(rgyud 'grel): cad du dar gyi lhab lhub la sogs pa mchod pa dang bsnyem bkur gi rnam pa mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ de dag gi mchod rten dang sku gzugs dang gsung rab la sogs pa yang dag pa la mchod pa byed bar gyur cig
317b7(rgyud 'grel): gdan gyi sngags la oM A ta ka swAhA/ sems can thams cad chos kyi grags pa snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig /chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi sngags la/ oM kuM bi ra b+ha? ? swAhA/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba
318a1(rgyud 'grel): mi spong ba'i bdud bzhi las rgyal zhing chos mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig /gdugs kyi sngags la oM bra ma na ye swAhA/ /sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i skyabs dang ldan zhing chos kyi rgyal
318a2(rgyud 'grel): po chen por gyur cig /me tog gi phreng ba'i sngags la/ oM ratna ma le traM zhes bya ba 'am/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sh+re ya d+ha nu ga ta pra tiSh+Tha ta/ puShpe ke ta ba ta thA ga tA ya/ arha te samyaksaM bud+d+ha la/ tadya thA/ oM puShpe swAhA/
318a3(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan te blta bas chog mi shes pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par gyur cig /gdan dbul ba'i sngags la oM su na da ra dzaM ye swAhA/ sems can thams cad gdan gyi khyad par stobs bcu dang
318a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan la kla ? che'i gdan dang/ mi 'jigs pa la ni dang ldan pa seng+ge'i gdan dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa rta'i gdan dang/ dbang bcu dang ldan barma bya'i gdan dang/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i shugs dang ldan pa'i
318a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' lding gi gdan dang/ dgos 'dod re ba yid bzhin du byung ba rin po che'i gdan dang/ chags pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa pad+ma'i gdan dang/ thams cad du rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal pa nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdan thob par gyur
318a6(rgyud 'grel): cig /de nas mchod rten la na bza' gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba baM shud+d+he d+harmA te swAhA/ /gzhal yas khang du gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags la oM b+ha ra d+ha ra kA Ta ga ra ya swAhA/ bzhugs su gsol
318a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags la/ oM su pra ta? badzra swAhA/ zhes brjod pas/ rin po che'i gzhal med khang chos kyi dbyangs zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs par bsams/ de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya bcings la dbus
318b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag ste dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /sngags la oM badzra d+ha tu a b+hi tiSh+Tha hUM/ de ltar dbang bskur bas de'i ngo bo nyid du brtan par gyur ba yin no/ /de ltar mchod rten gdab pa yang sngar bshad pa ltar rim pa bzhin ba ste / dang por ma'i?
318b2(rgyud 'grel): par bzhag ste/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas 'gro ba mdza' i dag dang gang gis don du bya ba de la byams pa dang snying rje 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /ngo mtshar chen po grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus
318b3(rgyud 'grel): fdrang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag la dgongs sku gsol/ bdag gis sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung de/ /bdud la sogs pa phas kyis rgol ba bgegs thung log 'don thams cad pham par bgyi'o/ /mtshan
318b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa bsal? par bgyi'o/ /nga rgyal gyi ri bo bsnyel bar bgyi'o/ /skye ba'i ljon shing rtsa nas bcad do/ /'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye bar brlag go /ma tig pa'i mun pa bsal bar bgyi'o/ /ma dang pha nga bye
318b5(rgyud 'grel): rol bdag dang lha ba? phyin ci log pa dag yang dag pa'i lta ba la gzung cing dad bar bgyi'o/ /las kyi chu bo zlog par bgyi'o/ /srid ba'i rgya mtsho bsgom par bgyi'o/ /chos kyi sgrol ma rab tu sngar bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub kyi lam
318b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan dkyil 'khor/ /bzog ba dang des pa la gzud par bgyi'o/ /bsam gtan gyi bde ba la rtser stsal te/ /'dod chags kyi me dbung zhi bar bgyi'o/ /zhe sdang gi mtshon rnon po ba ?/ /bde ba la gzung ngo/ /
318b7(rgyud 'grel): khrag gi tshub ma? zhi bar bgyi'o/ /ser sna'i 'dud pa dgrol bar bgyi'o/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /bde ba chen po'i grong khyer du 'jug cing gnas par bgyi'o/ /de bas na bdag
319a1(rgyud 'grel): la las kyi dngos grub mchog stsal nas/ snang ba dam pa mdzad du gsol/ de nas gang du bshad ba ji bzhin du byas la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad pa sogs pa dag dang  'khor 
319a2(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs pa dang bces te/ chul bzhin du so so'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang/ sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga'i go rim ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/ /yang na ye shes la las grub pa'i mchod rten rang bzhin gyis
319a3(rgyud 'grel): dag cing gsal ba de dag gi bum pa'i dbus su gong du smos pa'i snying po gang yang rung ba bcug la de dag las ye shes kyi 'od zer grangs med pa 'bros pas de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku grangs med ba'i sbyin phung gis
319a4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' mdza' klas shing chos kyi dbyings mur thug bar brgyan cing klas par gyur nas 'jig rten thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ 'gro ba thams cad don mdzad cing re ba bskangs nas slar 'dus de nyid kyi dbu'i spyi btsug
319a5(rgyud 'grel): dang thugs kar thams pas sgrub par bya ba de'i las la nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag ste?/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par bsams la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ? a
319a6(rgyud 'grel): bA k+tsatamahA sa ma ya staM zhes brjod do/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas bya ba 'am/ phyag rgya bzhis brtan par byas te/ bung phor gyi nang du dri sbos sna tshogs dang 'bras yos
319a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' o? man ldan pa'i mchod yon gsol te/ arga'i phyag rgya'i steng du dung phor bzhag la yon chab kyi nang du a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i 'od zer gyis yon chab nyid bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par
319b1(rgyud 'grel): bsams la so so'i rigs kyi snying po bzlas la dbul lo/ /oM a mri te arg+haM d+hu pe pra tits+tsha swAhA/ zhes lan gsum spyi bor bzhag ste sbyong? ngo/ /'phags pa thams cad ?  par gyur cig /phyag rgya rgya mtsho'i sdin nyid kyi
319b2(rgyud 'grel): dbu'i gtsug tu gri ste ye shes kyi 'od zer 'dus ba'i sku nang du thim zhing phun sum tshogs ba'i dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /de nas mchod pa lnga dang mchod pa nyi shu dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyi mchod
319b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ mchod pa thams cad rnam par sbyang zhing dag bar bya ba'i sngags /oM sarba pU dza a yu She swAhA zhes bya ba dang/ oM las byung ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyang sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas te dbul lo//
319b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje dang dril bu blangs la bstod pa bya'o/ /'gro ba rgyud lnga'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gyis gzir 'gro gzigs nas/ /thugs rjes sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor 'joms mdzad pa//
319b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can smin cing grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ /sems can khams na bzhugs shing sbyod gyur kyang/ /chags pas mi gos pad+ma ltar dag pa/ /'dod chags dag pa'i bdag nyi
319b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod la 'dud/ /sems can bkra shis pa chos kyis phongs gyur bas/ /ma rig thibs po'i nang du sor ba rnams/ /'phags pa'i nor bdun dag gis tshim mdzad pa/ /ye shes sgron ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can 'khor ba'i
319b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtshor nub ba la/ /thugs rjes thabs dang shes rab gur zhugs nas/ /zhi ba rin chen mtsho gling skyel mdzad ba/ /kun gyi ded dpon khyed la rnam par 'dud/ /sems can las kyi chu bos 'das pa rnams/ /dam chos
320a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i zas? pas sgro ba mdzod cing/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad la sbyor mdzad pa/ /gsung gis mnga' bdag khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas smon lam rgya cher gdab do?/ /?
320a2(rgyud 'grel): ge'i don du chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bzhin sum? sol te/ mchod cing bstod de bsgrubs pa la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis che ge mo la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i mtshams sbyor ba'i bag chags
320a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rtsa nas bcad de sku gsum yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /mchod rten gcig byas pas kyang che ge mo la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi tshe rab bye bar bsags pa'i sdig pa thams cad byal par gyur cig /la
320a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa smon lam gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bya'o/ /de ltar mchod rten grub pa'i rtags gsungs pa/ /de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam/ /yang na gzugs kyi zhal 'dzum mam/ /dri dang dud pa 'od kyang rung/ /snang dam yang
320a5(rgyud 'grel): na dang ldang ngam/ /lha la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni/ /sna tshogs bar snang snang gyur tam/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ /me tog la sogs 'bab pa dang/ /dung dang rda? la sogs pa'i sgra/ /dril bu pi wang la
320a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnams/ /ci sde mtshan ma de dag ni/ /sdig pa'i blos ni ma mthong na/ /'bum gyi phrag ni brgya stong tam/ /ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas
320a7(rgyud 'grel): ? pa bya/ /de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang/ /mtshan gcig mi nyal thog mar bzlas/ /de nas de yi sdig pa ni/ /dag pa nyid du ngas par mthong zhes smos so/ /mchod rten cho ga bdag gis cung zad tsam/ /byas
320b1(rgyud 'grel): la bsod nams rnam bci yod pa/ /des ni 'gro kun skye shi rgyun bcad de/ /bla med sku gsum rdzogs te sangs rgyas shog// //bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs las/ /mchod rten sgrub
320b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang sdebs te/ slob dpon zhi ba'i snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa'i me 'khyags pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs// */ /rgya gar skad du/ /aM k+Sho
320b3(rgyud 'grel): b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sA? b+ha naM nA ma:/ bod skad du/ mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal te/ de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya/ /dal 'byor theg chen
320b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs can dang/ /snying rje shes rab yon tan can/ /byams dang snying rje ldan pa dang/ /dad cing bla ma la gus pas/ /skyabs su song zhing sems bskyed pa/ /dam tshig sde ma ldan dbang thob pas/ /las dang cho ge shes
320b5(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /dgon pa'i gnas dang kro? gi mthar/ las bya bde ba'i stan 'dug nas/ /khrus byas gtsang ma'i gos can gyis/ /rang ltar gsal ba'i thugs ka ru/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng du hUM/ /de las 'od zer 'phros pa yis//
320b6(rgyud 'grel): bla na ? ni mi bskyod pa/ /spyan drangs mdun du bzhugs pa la/ /bdun po rnam par dag bar bya/ /tshad med bzhi dang ldan par bsgom/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med par/ /sems kyis bsgom par byas nas ni//
320b7(rgyud 'grel): bru? dang paM las sna tshogs bsgom mo/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /rang gi sa bon dbus bsams nas/ /dam tshig dag dang phyag rgya dag/ bsam zhing de bzhin nyid du sbyar/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bsgrub par
321a1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo/ /g.yon pa mnyam gzhag rdo rje dang/ /g.yas pa sa gnon tshul can no/ /rgyan dang ldan par rang nyid bsgom/ /thugs kar
321a2(rgyud 'grel): par sgra'i steng du ni/ /de steng rang gi sa bon dang/ /phyag 'tshan phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab/ /rang nyid mi 'khrugs par bsgoms nas/ /sangs rgyas bzhi po phyogs dang bstan/ /rang rang phyag rgya ldan par bsgom/ /hUM las 'od 'phreng
