321a3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma yi/ /'dab ma brgyad la lha mo brgyad/ /phyag mtshan brgyad las sku bskyed de/ /rtsa sngags brgyad po brjod pa la/ /dri za'i phyogs su pad+ma can/ /sku mdog dkar mo dpral pe'u bsnams/ /me yi phyogs su 'jigs byed ma/ /
321a4(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dkar mo 'khor lo bsnams/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su rnam rgyal ma /sku mdog sngon mo rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /bden bral phyogs su mdangs ldan ma/ /sku mdog sngon ma gdugs bsnams pa/ /klu yi phyogs su 'od ldan ma/ /
321a5(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dmar skya pad+ma bsnams/ /rlung gi phyogs su dkar sham ma/ /sku mdog dmar skya bum pa bsnams/ /gnod sbyin phyogs su dri med pa/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'bud dung bsnams/ /dbang ldan phyogs su yid gzhungs ma/ /sku
321a6(rgyud 'grel): mdog ljang gu nya bsnams pa'o/ /sgro? ma bzhi po 'dod sta? ste/ /phyogs dang bstun zhing phyogs bskyed dang/ /gzhal yas rim par bsgoms par bya/ /de ltar dam tshig lha bskyed de/ /thugs ka'i rdo rje'i hUM las ni/ /
321a7(rgyud 'grel): 'og min gnas su 'od 'phros pas/ /mi 'khrugs mdun nam spyi por bsam/ /rang lus mi 'khrugs bsgom stem ma la/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /lha yi go rim ji bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur
321b1(rgyud 'grel): ro/ /yang na rang nyid ltar bsgoms la/ /mi 'khrugs mdun du bsgom par bya/ /gzungs bgrang ba yi ting 'dzin ni/ /thugs las 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /de nyid sum brtseg rang rang gzhan/ /lha dang bum pa mchod rten gtor//
321b2(rgyud 'grel): bum pa mchod rten la sogs nang/ /rgya mtsho zla ba pad+ma la/ /lha bskyed ye shes bstim par bya/ /dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /bdag la rab tu dgyes par mdzod/ /oM ak+Sho b+hya dza A big+h+nan ta krit hUM phaT (rgyud 'grel): / thal sbyar sor
321b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis phyir bkyed de/ /ta thA ga tod+d+ha bA ya swAhA/ /dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): de nyid gdan la bzhugs pa la/ /mchod bstod la sogs dbul bya ste/ /oM arg+haM pra tits+tsha puShpe/ d+hya? be/ A lo ke /gand+he/ nai bi dya/ shapda/ ba li
321b4(rgyud 'grel): ta/ pu tsa khA hi khA hi/ chos nyid mnyam pa'i dang las ma g.yos kyang/ /thugs rjes rtag tu mya ngan mi 'da' zhing/ /phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtor na
321b5(rgyud 'grel): mgron du dmigs la bsngo?/ /sgra dang sems dang bzhi la gzhol/ /yan lag bzhi dang dmigs pa gsum/ /rang don bsnyen pa yin/ /grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma'o/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i bzlas pa ni/ /ngag dang shub bu
321b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i bzlas/ /yid kyi bcas pa byas pa bzhin/ /me dang sgra mthar gsungs?/ /brjod pa med pa'i bsam gtan te/ /thun gsum dag tu bzlas pa bya/ /gtod na mchod bstod gtong ma gtal/ /ye shes gshegs dang dam
321b7(rgyud 'grel): ? /de ltar thun gsum stong ba yis/ /bstan pa sngon du song pa dang/ /rang 'dod dngos grub ? pa'i phyir/ /de nas las la sbyar bar bya/ /bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gi sbar/ /brtson 'grus chen po'i me lces sdig sgrib
322a1(rgyud 'grel): sreg /pad+ma'i drod la char ? yi/ /? ? 'od kyis 'byed pa dang/ /nyi ma me shel me 'byung zhing/ /mi yi lus la dngos grub steng/ /mi gnas bsod nams steng? bar byed/ /sgra yis grang? pa steng bar
322a2(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /'di ni yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar /spyi bo'i gtsug tu kun gyis bkur bar bos/ /ngan song rnams la thar lam 'dis sgrub bo/ /rang gzhan mdun du bsgoms kyang dngos grub ster/ /mgon po mi 'khrubs ba yeS
322a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /sgrub pa'i thabs mchog 'di bris pa'i/ /bdag gi dge ba'i las 'di yis/ /bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad ni/ /myur pa nyid du sangs rgyas nas/ /'gro la phan phyir chos ston dang/ /sems can sdug bsngal
322a4(rgyud 'grel): las grol shog /bcom ldan 'das ni 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas ba slob dpon dI paM ka ra shI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang/ 'od kyi lo tsa
322a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas brgyad zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrub po dam tshig ldan pa yis/ /dgon pa 'am grong
322a6(rgyud 'grel): mdza' la sogs par/ /khrus byas gtsang mar yongs byas te/ /bde pa'i lhan la 'dug byas nas/ /rang lhar gsal pa'i thugs ka ru/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng du hUM/ /de las 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /bla ma dang ni mi
322a7(rgyud 'grel): bskyod ba/ /spyan drangs mdun du bzhugs pa las/ /bdun po rnam par dag pa bya/ /tshad med dang ldan par ni/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med par/ /sems kyis bsgom par bya ba yin/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil
322b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'brom?/ /rang rigs sa bo de dbus su/ /bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya bca' / /de nas rang gi sa bon dang/ /phyg mtshan phyag rgyas de byin brlab/ /de rnams gyur pa mi 'khrugs pa/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sto/ /
322b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa pang? bzhag rdo rje dang/ /g.yas pa sa gnon tshul can bsgom/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /rang nyid rang lhur bsgoms nas ni/ /mi 'khrugs mdun nam spyi bor sgrom/ /
322b3(rgyud 'grel): rang lus mi 'khrags bsgoms la bstim/ /thugs khar pad zla hUM las ni/ /dbus su ni 'khrugs rab nyid sgom/ /phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas bzhi bsgom bya/ /mchod dang bstod dang bzlas pa dang/ /gnyis su mchod bstod gtor
322b4(rgyud 'grel): ma sbyin/ /da ltar thun bzhi'i rim pa ni/ bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis/ /gang 'dod pa yi don du ni/ /sgrub pa las la sbyar bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs dpal mar me mdzad ye
322b5(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/
322b6(rgyud 'grel): sarba karma'a yA ? bi sho d+ha ni maMDal bi d+hi / bod skad du/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spyod pa zhes bya bar dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden par gsungs la phyag
322b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal to/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga khri bar bya/ /gang du las ni yong? gyur na/ /las ni cho ga rnams med pa/ /de ni spyi yi rgyud dag las/ /gsungs pa'i cho ga mkhas pas bsten/ /dkyil 'khor sum stong dag dang ni/ /lnga brgyar gsungs
323a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gang yin pa'i/ /spyi yi cho ga bshad par bya/ /yid dang 'thun pa'i gnas dag tu/ /sngags mkhan gzhan la phan brtson pa/ /snying rje ldan pas dbang bskur ro/ /grangs sam dus sam mtshan ma 'am/ /bsten pa
323a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin byas pa yis/ /sa yi cho ga tshul bzhin bya/ /lha dang bum pa lhag gnas dang/ /gson gshin sob ma gang rung pas/ /bdun po rnam par dag pa dang/ /skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sbyin par bya/ /so shing srung skud ku
323a3(rgyud 'grel): sha dang/ /chos bshad pa ni byas kyang rung/ /? dang drag po'i las dang ni/ /sbyang dang byin brlabs bya mi dgos/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi thig btab la/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa khru do bri/ /dkyil 'khor lhag
323a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i tshad rab ni/ /ci 'dod pa ni nyid du draM/ /yo lang chung du dag gi kyang/ /bzlas brjod byas bas dkyil 'khor bri/ /phyi nas gcig nyid kyis kyang ni/ /tshig kyang du ni bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu zlum por bya//
323a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas phyogs mchams spyod pa dang/ /'dod pa'i lha rnams bri par bya/ /so so'i sngags kyi rim pa bzhin/ /de nas spyan yang drang bar bya/ /bdag so rnams kyi snying po yis/ /de yi 'og tu mchod par bya/ /bum pa gang ba de star
323a6(rgyud 'grel): du/ /cho ga bzhin du rdzas bzhag go /las kun byed pa'i dkyil 'khor de/ /gsang ba gsang pa'i bdag po gsung/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni kun bris nas/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa dang/ /sgrub pa po ni dbang bskur ba/ /dkyil
323a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'di dag nyid du bya/ /mchod pa la sogs thams cad kyang/ /rgyud las bshad pa bzhin du bya/ /zhes bshad pas/ 'dir khyad par ni/ 'dab ma ba brgyad dbus su ni/ /rdo rje chen po bri bar bya/ /'dab ma brgyad la bkris
323b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad/ /shar du dpal te'u 'khor lo ste/ /lho ru pad+ma rgyal mchan gnyis/ /nub tu gdugs dang sum pa ste/ /byas chu? dung dang nya bri'o/ /phur par pa dra ba gzhan/ /bsrung ba rtsa pa'i sngags sam ni/ /yang na de yi snying pos bya/ /
323b2(rgyud 'grel): bla re ba dan sku gzugs sogs/ /mchod dang gtor ma la sogs dgram/ /'bru sman rin chen lnga ldan pa'i/ /bum pa de yi dbus su bzhag /khrus dang chos gos ldan pa yi/ /rdo rje slab dpon mnyam bzhag pas/ /bdag dang
323b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang rnal 'byor bsrung/ /shaM gis thams cad stong pa las/ /baM dam bru las gzhal yas khang/ /de nang pad+ma zla dbus su/ /bcom ldan mi 'khrugs bskyed pa la/ /pad 'dab brgyad la lha mo brgyad/ /pad+ma can dang 'od can ma//
323b4(rgyud 'grel): mdangs ldan ma dang dri med ma/ /dkar dang dmar dang sngo dang ljang/ /dpal pe pad+ma gdugs dang dung/ /dbang po shin rje chu bdag dang/ /gnod sbyin phyogs su bsgom par bya/ /'jigs byed ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dkar sham ma
323b5(rgyud 'grel): dang yid gsungs ma/ /dkar sngo dmar skya ljang ba'i mdog /'khor lo rgyal mtshan bus pa nya/ /me dang srin po rlung lha dang/ /dbang ldan ngos su rnam par bsam/ /kun kyang sems dpa' skyil mo krung/ /zla ba'i rgyab rten rin chen brgyan/ /
323b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa thams cad dgu la btad/ /bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyi sngags/ /oM maM ga sh+rI ja da ma ? swA hA/ /oM mig la pad+ma swAhA/ /oM maM gal tsha ja swAhA/ /oM ma ga la shaM kha swAhA/ /oM maM ga la tsakra swAhA/ /oM maM ga la
323b7(rgyud 'grel): ? dza swAhA/ /oM maM ga la ka? la sha swAhA/ /oM mi ga la ma ? swAhA/ /spyan drang bstim dang mchod bstod bya/ /de yi snying ga'i zla ba la/ /gsang sngags dmigs te ci nus bzlas/ /mchod dang bstod dang gtor ma gtang/ /khrus byas rtsom
324a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i slob ma rnams?/ /dkyil 'khor de yi mdun nyid du/ /'dun po rnam par dag pa dang/ /skyabs 'gro sems bskyed de la sbyin/ /gshin la ? dang brab pa dang/ /'byor pa yang na sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas
324a2(rgyud 'grel): bum pa'i dbang bskur sbyin/ /'di ni sbyin pa'i rang bzhin chu/ /ser sna'i dri ma skyong mdzad cing/ /sbyin? pa'i dri yis legs bsgom pas/ /khrus legs mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar pha rol phyin drug la/ /gson po
324a3(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis rdzas brgyad bri/ /rak+Sha zhes pas bsrung ba bya/ /a pa ni yas bya ba par bya/ /mchod rten rab gnas tsha tsha ? /ran pa zlog la las 'di bya/ /yid ni yid pa'i na nor bu ltar/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu bskur
324a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'ong/ /chos bka' rgya chen zab mo 'di/ /rgya po bzhin du mnyes par dka' / /mnyes par gyur na de bzhin du/ /yon tan mchog gi nor sbyin byed/ /'di bris pa yi dge pa yis/ /ngan song rnam spyong thal lam
324a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub/ /kun gyis bzang po mthong bar shog /slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis mdzad ba/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //pa ti ta de nyid dang/ lo tsa ba rin chen bzang ps
324a6(rgyud 'grel): de sgyur ba'o/ //mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bum pa la/ /brdeg? dang bdug dang mtshan ma dgod/ /nang du bcud rnams blugs la yang/ /mgul chings kha
324a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyun la sogs bcas/ /maN+Dal me tog bcas pa'i steng/ /bzhag la mchod sogs rim bzhin bsham/ /bdag dang gnas sogs bsrung byas la/ /mchod pa pas zhing byin gyis brlab/ /bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar pas ?
324b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rang bzhin dag ba'i sngags brjod pas/ /bum pa sbyangs te baM las skyed/ /rgya mtsho pad+ma zla stengs su/ /mi 'khrugs rgyal po spyan drangs la/ /bgegs bskrad rgyas btab mchod yon sogs/ /phul te dza:hUM baM ho:sa
324b2(rgyud 'grel): dgug /gdan la bzhugs gsol? mchod bstod bya/ /'phro 'du tshul gyis bzlas brjod bya/ /brgya stong la sogs ci nus pas/ /byas te mchod bstod gtor ma gtang/ /de ltar thun dang sbyor ba yis/ /ji srid yid kyi bar du
324b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /khrus kyi chus su bum nang lha/ /mchod bstong byas te mkha' la bzhugs/ /de yis dbang bskur bar ? la bkru/ /rang nyid lha yi sbyor ldan pas/ /rgyun gcod sngags la che ge mo/ /sarba pA baM zhes sogs pa/ /brjod cing bum
324b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chu rgyad gyis/ /dkru zhing de nas rma bya yi/ /sgro yis bya ba cing a pa na/ /zhes sogs brjod pas mi mthun phyogs/ /bsal bar bsams la slob ma de/ /mdun du gnas pas maN+Da bya/ /bla ma la phul bla ma yis/
324b5(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ? bsrng 'khor gdags pa dang/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas bsrung/ /lha la mchod bstod bzod par gsol/ /gtor ma byin la phrin las gzhol/ /smon lam btab la gshegs su gsol/ /a kA ro
324b6(rgyud 'grel): yi sngags brjod cing/ /maN+Dal mchod pa me tog bsdu/ /'di yis yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/ /mi mthun phyogs sel 'dod pa 'grub/ /slob dpon dpa' po rdo rjes mdzad pa'o/ /rdzogs so// //
324b7(rgyud 'grel): mi 'khrugs? pa la ? 'tshal te/ /de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya/ /rgyud las rigs kyi bu zhes pa/ /sgrub pa po yi mtshan nyid de/ /dal 'byor theg chen rigs can no/ /snying rje shes rab yon tan ldan/ /byams 
325a1(rgyud 'grel): dang snying rje ldan pa dang/ /dad cing bla ma la gus dang/ /skyabs su song zhing sems bskyed pa/ /dam tshig sdom ldan dbang thob pas/ /las kyi cho ga shes nas ni/ /dgon pa'i gnas sam
325a2(rgyud 'grel): gong gi 'bar?/ /las byas bde ba'i stan la 'dug /khrus byas gtsang ma'i gos can gyis/ /bdun po rnam par dag pa dang/ /tshad med bzhi sogs ldan par bsgom/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med par/ /semS
325a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi bsgom par byas nas ni/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /rang gi sa bon dbus bsams nas/ /dam tshig dag dang phyag rgya dang/ /bsam zhing de bzhin nyid du bya/ /rnal 'byor pas mi bsgyur bar bya//
325a4(rgyud 'grel): lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur/ /de nas rang gi sa bon dang/ /phyag rgya phyag rgyas de byin brlab/ /lha yi go rim ji bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /rang nyid rang gi ltar bsgoms nas/ /mi 'khrugs?
325a5(rgyud 'grel): mdun ? spyi bor bsam/ /bdag nyid mi 'khrugs? par bsgoms nas/ /de nyid gsum sogs rang dang gzhan/ /bum pa mchod rten la sogs nang/ /rgya mi tsho pad+ma zla pa la/ /dang pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur
325a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'dir/ /bdag gi mchod pa bzhes nas kyang/ /mchod pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad/ /oM bag+h+rin? ta krod hUM phaT / thal sbyar son mo gnyis phyir bskyed/ /ta tha ga to d+d+ha pA
325a7(rgyud 'grel): ya swAhA?/ dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): de nyid gdan la bzhugs pa la/ /mchod dang bstong dang bzlas pa bya/ /ska dang sems dang gzhi la gzhol/ /yan lag bzhi dang dmigs ba gsum/ /gzhan don bsnyen pa byed pa ni/ /
325b1(rgyud 'grel): grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma'o/ /dngos grub sgrub? brgya'i bzlas pa ni/ /dag dang thub bu rdo rje bzlas/ /yid ki bzlas brjod bcas pa bzhi/ /me dang sgra dang sgra mdza' gsum/ /brjod pa med pa'i bsam gtan te/ /thun gsum
325b2(rgyud 'grel): ngag tu bzlas pa dang/ /gtong na mchod dang gtor ma gtang/ /ye shes gshegs rang dam tshig bsdu/ /mi gnas bsod nams ster par byed/ /sgra mthar thar pa ster bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa byon nas zhes
325b3(rgyud 'grel): pas rang lhar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pas spyan drang ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ bzlas pa dang/ bsgom pa byas pas dngos grub gsol par gyur pa'o/ /chos nyid mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos kyang/ thugS
325b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzas gtan du mya ngan mi mda' zhing/ 'phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro pa'i don mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bzlas brjod mel tshul khrims rlung gis sbar/ /brtson 'grus chen po'i
325b5(rgyud 'grel): me lces sdig bsreg /nye? ma me shel zhugs la mai 'byung ltar/ /mi yi lus la dngos grub stsol par mdzad/ /'di ni yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu kun gyis bkur par thos/ /ngan song rnam
325b6(rgyud 'grel): sel thar lam 'dis 'grub pa/ /rang bzhin mdun du bsgoms kyang dngos grub ste/ /mgon po mi 'khrugs pa sgrub pa'i thabs/ /slob dpon dza tA ris mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
325b7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma gnyan gnyan gyis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrub po dam tshig ldan pa yis/ /dgon pa 'am grong mdza' la sogs par?/ /
326a1(rgyud 'grel): khrus byas gtsang mar byas pa ye shes/ /las byas bde ba'i d+han? la 'dug /rang lhar? gsal ba'i thugs ka ru/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng du hUM/ /de las 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /bla ma dang ni mi bskyod pa/ /
326a2(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs mdun du bzhugs pa la/ /bdun po rnam par dag pa bya/ /tshad med bzhi dang ldan par ni/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med par/ /sems kyis bsgom par byas nas ni/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsaM
326a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sa bon de dbus su/ /bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya bca' / /de nas rang gi sa bon dang/ /phyag mtshan phyag rgya de byin brlab/ /de rnams gyur pas mi 'khrugs pa/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sto?/ /
326a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa pang? bzhag rdo rje dang/ /g.yas pas sa gnon tshul can bsgom/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /rang nyid rang lhar bsgoms la ni/ /mi 'khrugs mdun nam spyi bor
326a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /rang lus mi 'khrugs bsgoms la bstim/ /thugs ka'i pad zla'i hUM las ni/ /dbus su mi bskyod pa nyid bsgom/ /phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas bzhi bsgom bya/ /mchod dang bstod pa bzlos par bya/ /sgra rang
326a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dang gzhi la gzhal/ /yan lag bzhi dang dmigs pa gsum/ /gzhan dang rang don bsnyen pa ni/ /grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma'o/ /dngos grub bzlas pa'i rim pa ni/ /ngag dang shub? bu rdo rje bzlas/ /yid de
326a7(rgyud 'grel): brjod dang bcas pa bzhi/ /me dang sgra dang sa? mthar gsum/ /thun gsum dag tu bzlas par bya/ /gnyis ni mchod bstod gtor ma sbyin/ /de ltar thun gsum sbyor ba yis/ /bsnyen pa sngon du rab song bas/ /gang 'dod
326b1(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub sgrub pa'i phyir/ /de ni las la sbyar bar bya/ /padmo'i 'ong la char chu yis/ kha zum 'ong kyis 'byed pa yis/ /nyi ma me shel me 'byung bzhin/ /mi yi lus la dngos grub ster/ /bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/
326b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas shog /'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston byed cing/ /sems can sdug bsngal gzir las sgrol bar shog /bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //
326b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ho ma bi d+hi / bod skad du/ sbyin sreg gi chog /bcom ldan 'das mi gzugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin sreg chen po'i rim pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su ni/ /thabs khung
326b4(rgyud 'grel): zlum pa khru da bya/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs pri/ /yang na ma bris pa yang rung/ /bud shing brtsigs te sreg rdzas gsog/ mchod dang gtor ma la sogs dgram/ /bla re bres pa'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste
326b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /rab na? rdzas la brab rdeg bya/ /mi spar me lha bskyed pa nas/ /raM las me lha drang srong ni/ /bgrang phreng ril ba phyag na 'dzin/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che/ /me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /dga' blug
326b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal zas bzhes slad du/ /'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ /oM a gA ye dzwa la ya dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med par bstims pa la/ /oM badzra ya DA hUM zhes/ /bsangs te mar gyi dgang blugs dbul/ /mchod bstod bsrab/
326b7(rgyud 'grel): ? ris bar dbul/ /de nas mchod bsngor me lha ni/ /gshegs pa 'am 'bar ba'i rnam par ro/ /de nas pad+ma zla ba dang/ /dang pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'dir/ /bdag la mchod yon
327a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhes nas kyang/ /mchod pas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /oM bag+h+nin ta kring hUM phaT/ /thal mo sbyar la mdzub gnyis dgyes/ /oM ta thA ga tod b+hA? bA ya swAhA/ /dza/hUM baM ho? mchod dang
327a2(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa byas nas ni/ /mar dang gro dang sran ma dang/ /zho dang sman dad dUr? ba dang/ /ku sha yaM shing me tog dang/ /til dang yungs kar la sogS bsreg/ thams cad rgyud? gcod sngags kyi bya/ /khyad par las su bya ba ni/ /
327a3(rgyud 'grel): til dang yungs kar dag la ni/ /brgya 'am stong dam khyi ru sreg sdig sgrib sbyang ba'i las su bstan/ /de nas mchod bstod gtor ma gtang/ /bsngo dang bzod par gsol te gshegs/ /rdzes? lhag me yi lha la dbul/ /
327a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod bstod bzod par gsol te bshags/ /khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su 'thun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /sngar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /dman ma bstu
327a5(rgyud 'grel): ? klad bzlas/ /ji ltar gra bas pa'i bkra shis brjod/ /me yi sbyangs pa'i nor bu bzhin/ /rang gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu bkur/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga dI baM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs// //
327a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas ba rdo rje chos kyi rnal 'byor dbang ba'i sgrub thabs pas bya ba bzhugs so// 'phags pa rdo rje chos kyi ni/ /rnal 'byor gcig pa sgom pa'i thabs/ /kun dgang? snying po'i rjes 'brang nas/ /rang la phan phyir 'dir brtsams so/ /de la rnal 'byor
327a7(rgyud 'grel): ? gang zhig byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs zhing dbang thob pa/ rig pa'i sdom pa yongs su gzung ba/ ri bo 'am/ nags sam / chu 'gram mam / skyed mos tshal lam / gtsug
327b1(rgyud 'grel): lags? pa la sogs pa yid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i ? bde ba'i sten la 'dug nas / dang por re zhig bdag med pa la lhag par mos pas nang gi ? ti da can gyi khrus byas la lkog pa'i phyogs su yi ge h+ri(rgyud 'grel): las pad 'dab ma brgyad
327b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bsams ba'i lce'i pad+ma'i 'dab mar hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bskyed la/ /badzra ji hA zhes bya ba 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis su yang a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re bsams la/ de gnyis kyi steng du hUM gnyid?
327b3(rgyud 'grel): lam rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis bsam zhing lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyang rtse mor bsams la bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas ye ge hUM las rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bdag nyid bsams te/ /khro bo te rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la /
327b4(rgyud 'grel): oM grih+na badzra sa ma ya hUM baM ? brjod la/ oM badzra dzwa la an larka hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje bsdams ba nang du bcings mthe bong gnyis gshibs te/ bsgreng bar sor mo'i steng nas dgab pa'i tshul du bzhag pa 'di ni
327b5(rgyud 'grel): ? rin te bo'i? phyag rgya ste ? 'dis sti? bo nas brtsams nas phyogs bzhir? rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blangs nas/ oM DruM? zhes pa'i yi ge gnyis kyi tshogs go bgos la/ oM badzra dzwa la a na lArka hUM zhes brjod cing g.yon pa'i
327b6(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur snying par bzhag nas g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gsor zhing bgegs thams cad la bsnur par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas bgegs bsreg par bya ste/ hUM badzra a na la ha na da ha bcom ldan 'das? ra Na
327b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT ces brjod par bya bo/ /rdo rje ? ba nang du bcings la sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba lta bur byas te/ mthe bo rdo rje 'phreng ba 'di ni me'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol te mthe
328a1(rgyud 'grel): chung gnyis lcags kyur sbrel la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya pa'i 'dzub mo gnyis bsdigs mdzub tu bsdeng ba ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag dang/ oM kuM b+ha ni suM b+ha ni hUM/ ? grih+na hUM/
328a2(rgyud 'grel): grih+Na pa ya grih+Na pa ya hUM/ a na ya ho b+ha ga bA na bidya rA dza hUM phaT ces bya ba'i sngags dang bcas pas rdo rje'i ra ba dang 'dra ba rnams bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang/ oM badzra tsakra hUM zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor
328a3(rgyud 'grel): sprul par bya ste / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /mdzub mo mthe bong rdo rjer mdud/ /rdo rje 'khor lo zhes grags te/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sdub byed yin/ /'dis phyogs thams cad du g.yas phyogs nas bskor bas
328a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor thams cad sprul par bya'o/ /'di ? gar bzhag la lta bzhin du rdo rje 'khor lo'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor blos mngon sum lta bur dmigs
328a5(rgyud 'grel): la me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ oM sarba ta tra ga ta kA wak tsit+ta pra Na me na badzra band+ha ni ka ro ma/ de nas phyag bzhi bya ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs nas rdo rje thal mo brkyang ba la lus thams cad phab ste/ oM sarba
328a6(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta pU rdzo? pa hA nA ya At+ma ne nirya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi taSh+Tha mAM zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin du gnas pa las rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyar te/ dpral ba sa la reg
328a7(rgyud 'grel): par byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi She kA ya at+ma naM niryA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ra ya b+hai Shiny+tsa mAM zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas 'di skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag ste/ khas la dag pa dang /
328b1(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba te ? ka na bU? dza pra warta nA ya at+ma naM niryA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra warta ya mAM zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas byang phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa las rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab nas snying gar sbyar la spyi pos la reg pas
328b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karmA Ne? Ata naM nirya ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru ? zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ bskal ba dang/ gsol pa gdab pa rang/ mchod
328b3(rgyud 'grel): pa nyi shus yang dag par mchod pa dang bdag dbul bdag semS bskyed pa dang/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang/ sdom pa la gnas pa'i bar du byas la/ de nas lag pa g.yas pa'i gung mo la oM mdzub mo la ?/ srin lag la ?/ mthe'u chung
328b4(rgyud 'grel): la h+ri(rgyud 'grel): mthe bo la a bsam zhing/ g.yon pa'i sor mo rnams la yang de bzhin du bkod de/ g.yas par gnas pa'i sa bon rnams la ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i skur bsam mo/ /g.yon pa la gnas pa'i sa bon la ni
328b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbyis? kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i skur bsams nas phan tshun thabs dang shes rab dag bcas pa'i mngon par 'dod pas thal mo mngon du phyogs par byas te/ /a n+yoM? n+ya a nu ga tA(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma:zhes brjod do/ /de nas
328b6(rgyud 'grel): ? rnams shin tu gang? bcer te / lhe de rnams lha mo de dag gi thugs kar zhugs par bsams la / a tyan ta a nu pa biSh+Ta(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma (rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de/ /de nas thal mo dam du bsdams pa las/ sor mo
328b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsnol ba ni/ /rdo rje thal mo bka' stsal te/ /rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje brdams/ /badzra any+tsa li zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so/ /badzri band+ha zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa ste/ /badzra band+ha tra Ta ces brjod cing 
329a1(rgyud 'grel): snying gar lan gsum phral bar bya'o/ /badzra a ye? sha zhes bya bas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings tsal a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o/ /dbab pa'i yang 'dis brtan
329a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /tiSh+Tha badzra di Dho me b+ha ba shA shwa to me b+ha ba h+ri da yi me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba sid+d+hi? mme pra ya tsts+tsha hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ /badzra? muSh+Ti? zhes bya bas dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /oM badzra many+dzu?
329a3(rgyud 'grel): bar/? de yi rjes la/ oM sarba a bA la A karSha Na pe sho d+ha nA badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT ces bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas ngan 'go thams cad dgug par bya'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du/ /'dzub mo gnyis ni bcings nas su//
329a4(rgyud 'grel): de? las? par gyen du 'phang ba ni/ /ltung ba slob ba'i dam pa'o/ /oM badzra pU Ni bi sphoT ya bcu? na? ni pra mok+Sha la/ sarba a bA ya ga ti d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba satwAM? sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ya traD? ces brjod cing sdig pa dral pa'i phyag rgya 'cingS
329a5(rgyud 'grel): la sdig pa thams cad dal par bya'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa bsdams byas te/ bud mo gnyis ka sbyar nas ni/ /tha ma bzhi yi rtse mor sbyar/ /sdig pa 'joms par grag pa yin/ /de nas mdun gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha
329a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams badzra mu:zhes brjod nas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus du rang gi snying bo badzra d+h+ramA zhes dam tshig gis bris la chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nyid byangs
329a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi yi ge bcu sngags? bcas pa thA pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur par bsams la/ yang de'i steng du de nyid dang/ /yige ka la sogs pa skar ma'i rnam pa lta bu yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
329b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i gzugs can gnyis pa nyid du bsam mo/ /de las 'gyur ba gang yin ba'i la ni yang de'i tshe snying po dang bcas bya las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer gyi dreng pa dang bcas pa bsam mo/ /de nas de las byung ba mi rang gi phyag rgya padmo'o/ /de nas
329b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi phyag rgyal dbus su rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal du bsgom par bya ste padmo h+ri ? brjod do/ /rang gi snying po yang bzlas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings phyag rgya la zhugs par bsangs la
329b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing badzra satwo haM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi sngags badzra d+harma zhes brjod pas rang gi lha rdo rje chs sku mdog dmar skya sangs rgyas thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ stong dang/ smad pa ti'i
329b4(rgyud 'grel): cha gu mnabs pa/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis thugs kar pad+ma'i sngor bu 'dzin cing phyag g.yaS paS kha 'byed pa'i tshul du mdzad pa sna tshogs pa sma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par rang nyid bsams la 'di skad ches?
329b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o/ /nu hA? sa ma ya satwo haM/ rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la ba'i skad ces kyang brjod par bya'o/ /sa ma ya haM/ de nyid kyis snying ga dang/ dbral ba dang/ lkog ma dang/ spyi bor byin gyis brlabs par bya'o/ /
329b6(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiShthe swa NAM/ de nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la rang gi snying po badzra d+harma dang sngags/ oM badzra d+harma h+ri(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba yang bzlas par bya'o/ /d nas sa ma ya a(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod/ mdun du zla
329b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor sprul la badzra d+harma a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'dis de'i steng du pad+mar bdag nyid dbab thar bya'o/ /de nas padmo haM zhes pad+ma'i nga rgyal du rnam par bsgoms la/ pad+ma de nyid badzra Ne tro haM zhes bzlos shing rdo rje chos su
330a1(rgyud 'grel): bsngon par bya'o/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog dang/ 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya dang/ snying po de rnams kyis gnyid dpung? pa dang/
330a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhug pa dang/ bcing pa dang/ dbang du bya'o/ /badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): badzra pA shahUM/ badzra spho Ta baM/ badzra g+ha Na ho(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni/ mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni/ /mthe'u chung ?
330a3(rgyud 'grel): kyu che/ /'khrig ma mdud pa mdzub gdub/ /tung gnyis kyang ni bsngams te mchen/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje bsdams pa las/ mthe bo gnyis gshings? ta mdzub? mo gnyis?
330a4(rgyud 'grel): bkug la pad+ma lA Tu? dang/ badzra d+harma dri sh+ya zhes bya ba 'dis blte bar bya'o/ /ye shes semS dpa' de mthong nas/ rang gi lus la rab tu bsgom/ /yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes?
330a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas rang gi lus la dgug ba dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing? ba dang/ dbang du bya'o/ /sa ma yastaM zhes brjod bas/ /rgyab tu zla ba drug nas ni/ /sa ma ya stwaM oM taM brjod/ /der bdag sems dpa' i?
330a6(rgyud 'grel): lung? bsgom?/ /badzra d+harma zhes bya ba'i snying po dang/ oM badzra d+hadma h+rI(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i ljags kyang brjod bar bya'o/ /de nas lce la rdo rje bsams la sarba gA ri zhes chos kyi phyag rgya dgod bar bya'o/ /de nas snying gar
330a7(rgyud 'grel): thA ta la rdo rje sna tshogs bsams la/ /las kyi phyag rgya cing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings te gang byas nas/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshu gyis/ pad+ma'i? sdong bu 'dzin cing phyag g.yas pas pad+ma la 'byed pa'i
330b1(rgyud 'grel): chu tu mdzad ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ni rang gi snying gar sems dpa' i rdo rje bsams la sku mdog dang/ phyag mtshan dang/ gzhugs tshul la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom mo/ /
330b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig ga phyag rgya bcing ba la ni su ra ta stwaM zhes brjod bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi lus la rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ dza:hUM baM ho/ zhes brjod/ yid kyis legs par spy+d ba yis/ /sangs rgyas thams
330b3(rgyud 'grel): cad gzhugs par bya'o/ /de nas sbyor ba 'dis de rnams kyis rang gi dam tshig dang/ chos dang/ las dang phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab dang bya'o/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ badzra
330b4(rgyud 'grel): d+ha tu dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma la stwaM sa ma la stwaM a haM zhes brjod do/ /de nas badzra d+hA tu/ zhes lan gsum brjod la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA yo gI? shwa ra hUM zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
330b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyi sngags lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de bzhin du mi bskyong ba dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ 'od dpag tu med pa dang/ don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ 'di skad ces brjod do/ /badzra d+ha tu dri sh+ya
330b6(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:sa ma yadzA? sa ma ya staM a pi zhe bya ba dang/ badzra d+ha? tu zhes bya ba'i spyi'i snying po lan gsum brjod par bya zhing/ oM badzra sadwa hUM zhes bya ba mi bsgod pa'i snying po dang/ oM badzra ratna TaM? zhes bya ba rin
330b7(rgyud 'grel): chen 'gyur lngar? gyi snying po dang/ oM badzra d+harma hI:zhes bya ba 'od dang ba tu med pa'i snying po dang/ oM badzra karma a zhes bya ba don yod grub pa'i snying po yang lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag
331a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya ni/ rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /bud mo myu gu ltar mnyam bsgreng/ /gung mo nang du gshibs pa ni/ /sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i yin par bshad/ /lung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang/ gyong mo padmo
331a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dra bar dgug /sangs rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni/ de bzhin mdzub gnyis bkug pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba la ni/ sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams?
331a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi ljags la chos kyi phyag rgya dgod par bya ste/ badzra dz+nyA na zhe bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya yin no/ /snga ma bzhin du ljags la rdo rje bsams la sngar ro/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni//
331a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khu tshur ma bcings te/ mnyam par bzhag pas gnyis su dbye/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /de nas bcing bar rab tu bshad/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni/ /g.yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar
331a5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o/ /mi g.yo ba yi sa reg pa/ /rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o/ /tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs
331a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ni snying dar sems? dpa' i rdo rje bsgoms te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni sku? mdog dkar po seng ge'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ byang chub
331a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni? phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa bsnams ba/ nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba/ ngar sku'i? stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs mnabs pa/ rin po che'i cod pan dang/ dar dbyengs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa/ zhal
331b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ba/ zhal dkar po shar phyogs su gzigs ba'o/ /de bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang/ rin chen bcung ldan dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pa yang sdku mdog sngon po ang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu'o/ /gdan
331b2(rgyud 'grel): ni glang po che dang/ rta dang rma bya dang/ nam mkha' lding la go rim bzhin du rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ sna chogs rdo rje bsnams pa/ nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i cod pan? dang/ dar?
331b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig pa'o/ /d la rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas ni spyi gtsug yin no/ /mi bskyod pa dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pa'i gnas ni/ snying ga?
331b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dpral ba dang/ lkog? ma dang/ spyi bo rnams? yin no/ /de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya dang/ sat+ma? badzri? a d+hi tiSh+Tha A? mi/ zhes bya bas snying gar byin gyis brlabs la/ snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su de bsam par
331b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /rdo rje rin chen ma'i phyag rgya dang/ ratna badzra ma d+hye? tiSh+Tha sw mI/ zhes bya bas rdo rje rin chen ma ni dbang bskur ba'i gnas su rdo rje rin po che'i rnam par ro/ /rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgya dang/ d+harma badzri a d+hi tiSh+Tha sa mAM/ zhes bya ba dang/
331b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chs la ni lkog ma'i phyogs su rdo rje pad+ma'i rnam par ro/ /rdo rje las ma'i phyag rgya dang/ karma badzya a ti tiSh+Tha swa mAM zhes bya bas rdo rje las ma ni spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang ldan par bsky+d par bya'o/ /de dal? oM badzre d+harma sa ma
331b7(rgyud 'grel): ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra d+harma ya tre na pa tiSh+Tha/ dri Dho me b+ha ga su to Sh+yo? me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha/ sarba sid+hi mme? pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM/ sh+re ya:ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn/
332a1(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA g ata badzra mA me muny+tsa/ badzrI b+ha ba/ ma ha sa ma ya satwa A:zhes bya ba yi ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas pas brtan par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor sprul pa/ sa ma
332a2(rgyud 'grel): ya stwaM zhes brjod de/ rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ de nyid kyi gung mo gnyis kyis phreng ba blangs te/ sa ma ya hUM/ zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi snying gar gnas ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug bab? bya zhing/ phreng ba de yang/
332a3(rgyud 'grel): pra tIts+tsha badzra ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi spyi bor dor bar bya'o/ /de nas phreng ba des/ oM pra ti grih+na twa mi maM satwa mahA ba la zhe bya ba 'dis rang gi mgo la bcing ba rbya'o/ /de nas oM satwa sa yan te tsakshu ga Ta na/ ta da pa re ud
332a4(rgyud 'grel): g+ha Ta ya ti sarba k+Sho/ badzra tsak+Sha ra nu ta ta ra/ /hi badzra pi sh+ya zhe bya ba 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje lcag kyu nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor blta ba bya'o/ /yang rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings te/ tiSh+Tha
332a5(rgyud 'grel): badzra zhes zlos shing snying gar dprol? bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa las/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis mu blangs la/ badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes bya ba 'dis chu'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o/ /d nas sangs rgyas lnga'i cad
332a6(rgyud 'grel): pan dang/ /ngar dbyangs kyi dbang bskur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sog pas blang bar bya'o/ /rdo rje dbying kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ spyi gtsug tu oM las rnam par snang mdzad bskyed la 'di skad ces brjod
332a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /oM badzra d+hA tI shwa ri hUM a b+hi Shishtsa mAM?/ sa bskyod ba'i phyag rgya bcings ba/ /yi ge hUM las dpral ba'i steng du mi bskyod pa ste/ oM badzra badzri Ni a b+ho Shiny+tsa mAM/ rin chen 'bung ldan gyi phyag rgya bcings la/ yi ge trAM las
332b1(rgyud 'grel): rna ba g.yas pa'i steng du rin chen 'byung yin no/ /oM ratna badzri Ni a d+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ 'od dpag tu med pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ yi ge h+rI:las rgyab tu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o/ /oM d+harma' badzri Ni hUM a d+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ don yod grub pa'i phyag
332b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya bcings la/ yi ge a las don yod par grub pa bskyed la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /oM karmA badzr Ni hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rdo rje thal mo bcings la/ /mthe bong gnys ni bsnol byas la/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug nas ni/ /gung ma
332b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyams ba'i tshigs su sbyar/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ /de nyid gung mo gnyis ni rin chen 'dra/ /padmor srin lag mthe'u chung gung/ /lag ba'i sor mo rab tu brkyang/ zhes bya'o/ /de'i rjes la oM TuM?/ zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje khu
332b4(rgyud 'grel): tshur gnyis kyis snying gar mdud pa bcing ba'i tshul gyi go bgo bar bya zhing/ de bzhin du mgrn ba dang/ lhag pa dang/ yang snying ga dang/ nu ma'i bar dang/ yang snying ga dang/ mgrin pa dang/ rgyab dang/ dpal ba'i steng bdud la/ /
332b5(rgyud 'grel): dar dbyangs bcings ba'i tshul du byas te/ s+thos? pa dang bcas pas mdza' ma la sogs pa nas bkrol te/ badzra tu Sh+ya ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa bas mnyes par byas te/ de nas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar
332b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /sangs rgyas kun tu rab 'grub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long/ /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti stwaM a b+haM Shiny+tsa maM tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya stwaM zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o/ /rdo rjes rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba/ /yang
332b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje de rang gi mgo la bzhag la/ oM badra satwa trAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba 'dis blang bar bya ste/ rang gi ming yang gang yin pa de la kye zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas/ 'di de 
333a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang na rtag tu bcad/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brten/ /oM sarba tA thA ga ta sid+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha trwI? d+ha ra yA mi badzra swAtwa hi hi
333a2(rgyud 'grel): hi hi hUM/ zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o/ /o badzra satwa su sa gra had/ badzra ratna ma nud tA raM/ badzra d+harma g+ha la naM badzra karmA ka ror b+hA ba/ zhes bya ba dang glur blang zhing/ re re zhing rdo rje'i gar byas la/ rdo rje sgad mo
333a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs ba'i mchod pa brgyad gyi las kyi phyag rgyas yang dag par mchod de/ lag ba gson pas bril bu blangs la/ g.yas pas rdo rje gsor zhing/ rdo rje'i tshig tu 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /Tik+ka hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): yang rdo rje de rang gi snying gar
333a4(rgyud 'grel): bstod ba'i tshul gyis 'jog cing/ Tak+ki dza(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod bar bya'o/ /yi ge hUM nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' bsams la/ de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya'o/ /thog mdza' med ba'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' pa che/
333a5(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje sdoms? bdag bdag po'i bdag /chos kyi dril bu dkrol par bya'o/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral bas?/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /sid pa'i mchog ni mdzad
333a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yin/ /d+harma a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni dril bu'i sa bon no/ /srid ba'i bde ba shin tu chung/ /sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bar ba dam pa'i thabs/ /dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed/ /'dod ba'i long spyod thams cad ni/ /
333a7(rgyud 'grel): ci 'dod pa ni bsten bzhin du/ /rang gi lha rnams sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya'o/ /de nas dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa bya ba ni 'di yin te/ oM ni mkha' skye ba'i mtshan nyid? phyir/ /thog
333b1(rgyud 'grel): ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dba' nged? grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos po chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag byas? mdzod/ /
333b2(rgyud 'grel): nyes ba mi mnga' rtag par? khyod/ /'dod chags kun gyis rjes chags la/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de ny+d kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang
333b3(rgyud 'grel): po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa/ /rdo rje snyems pa bdag mdzod cig /de nas rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya chen por

333b5(rgyud 'grel): srid du thun bzhir rim bas bsgom? par bya'o/ /bsgom bas skyo na snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la kun nas 'khor ba'i tshul du/ yid kyis gnas pa'i sngags bris la/ /bsam gtan gyis ni gsang sngags bzla/ /myur ches pa dang
333b6(rgyud 'grel): bu la chos dang/ /mi gsal gug skyed nyams ba dang/ /rnam rtog spangs te bzla bar bya/ /zhe bya ba'i tshul gyis ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du brjod par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po'am sngags gtong 'dod na yi ge brgya
333b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dro? ce'i ? gam yid kyi bzla'o/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' yid kyis mdun du bzhugs par bsams la/ me tog la sogs pa dang/ sgeg mo la sogs bas tshul bzhin du mchod la bzod par gsol nas/ oM khyod kyis
334a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can don zhun mdzad/ /rjes su dun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /slang yang gshegs par mdang du gsol/ /badzra mu:zhes brjod rdo rje sems ?
334a2(rgyud 'grel): du bkol bas gshegs su gsol lo/ /srung ba byas nas mdo sde zab mo bklag pa la sogs ba bya'o/ /bdag 'dra rmongs pa gang dag gis/ /'di 'dra legs par ga la 'gyur/ /mkhas ba'i rjes su 'brangs ba'i bya'o?/ /'de? la
334a3(rgyud 'grel): the tshom mi bya'o/ /'phags ba rdo rje chos kyi rnal 'byor gcig pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgyan dam pa sna mo'i mngar? phye ba bkod? pa zhes bya ba slob dpon brtan pas mdzad pa bzhugs so/ /rgyun dam pa sna tshogs pa rim par bya ba

334a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa sta gon gnas par bya/ /nub gsum pa la gzhugs pa'o/ /las rnams thams cad bdag bsgoms la/ /sa stegs zla gam tshon sngon bsku/ /thig le bdun bris rlung rgyal dud/ /sha la non?  ba dan dgug
334b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs bya/ /kham po lam dang h+ri yis bcad/ /yogs pa bal mig dong gzhugs bcing/ /phur bus btab phyung phoms? bkru/ /zhag bdun bdun nas bya par ba shad/ /? sa'i dpyad las 'byung ba bzhin/ /brtag dang bslang bar?
334b2(rgyud 'grel): gzung phur rin/ /bskra dang bsrung zhing sbyang dangbdun/ /de bdun ldan na las rnams 'grub/ /phyi nang brtag pa rung mi rung/ /bslang ba mngan nyo mi mdon nya'o/ /te dus dang nga?  bcom spran bar bya/ /gzung pa rnam rgyal khro bo gyur?/ /
334b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa skyong pa'i bdag po lnga/ /rin chen la sogs nyi shu lnga/ /gus bcas rin du sbyin par bya/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje drag /bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bskrad par shis/ /hUM? swA? AM hA gsum du ni/ /phyogs bzhir mtshan bsgyur rtsa

334b5(rgyud 'grel): rig pa mang pos bsten pa'i lha mo de/ /bzlas ba tsam gyis bgegs rnams phung ba dang/ /rdam pa 'thon cing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur/ /ral gri sbu gri nags tshal gtams pa yis/ /lcags bsregs sa gzhi rdo rjer nges shes pas
334b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs 'di nas ni? myung du 'bres bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mgon po 'jig rten phan phyir gshegs/ /ngas ni gnas mchog 'di dag kun bsrungs pas/ /gnong byed bgegs kun 'di na ma gnas shig /hUM hUM hUM na ma:sa man+ta
334b7(rgyud 'grel): badzra NAM sarba ta thA ga te/ a nu ga te/ band+ha si na/ mahA sa ma ya naM ra dzA he/ sma ra Ni/ a pra ti ta ta/ ka Ta ka Ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ band+ha band+ha/ da shi ti da sha na/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a nu gan te/ pra ba d+harma la ma ta pi dzA
335a1(rgyud 'grel): ya/ b+ha ga ba ti ku ru bi shu ye/ ye? lu pu?  re swAhA/ de yis bdud srin ngod? yod bor/ /rigs lnga'i 'dra?  men g.yog bcas kun/ /ci bgyi zhes su brjed pa dang/ /khyed kyis bgegs bskrad tshar gcod? dang

335a3(rgyud 'grel): badzra pA NA ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na ba ta ye/ na mo badzra kro d+ha ya/ mahA diSh+To? TA? Ta b+he ra bA sa/ u si mu sa la pra shu pA sha tAstwa ya/ /tadya thA/ oM a mri te/ kun li/ /kha khA/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha

336b7(rgyud 'grel): rdzas/ /? sum phur bu gtun? shing ni/ /so so'i shing la bya bya ba'o/ /zlum po gru bzhi zla gam dang/ /gru gsum por ni bya bar bshad/ /zhi rtse rgyas par dbang gi sbon/ /drag po brdungs? pa ngas gi'o/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag

337a2(rgyud 'grel): yang phyogs phyogs khro bo la'o/ /sbyin sreg dum rgyan ldan bzhi yum/ /dpal rtse rtse gsum mda' gzhu sogs/ /kha dog chas gos g.yab dar dang/ /zhal khab la sogs byang phyogs gsog gzhan yang las bzhi nyom

337a4(rgyud 'grel): sor phran can/ /dkar gnag dmar ser leb rgan dud/ /khra bo ljang ser brgyan pa'o/ /khru brgyad dbangs la khru bzhi lce/ /yu ba drang po ring po la/ /btags pa brgyad ni rgyal mtshon tshul/ /kha dogs so ci 'dra'o/ /kha
337a5(rgyud 'grel): dog sna tshogs nas 'bras tshul/ /bcus bcag rtsibs su 'brel pa'o/ /dkar po dmar po de bzhin ser/ /sngon po dang ni gnag dang lnga/ /mtshon sna lnga po de la ni/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor gang yin bsgom/ /
