347b5(rgyud 'grel): ba pos nas ni/ /gzugs brnyan shar g.yas sam dpral pa'i/ /rnam rgyal de yi lus gnyis gcig /de nyid ni na bzhugs par bsam/ /dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs khams gsum rnam rgyal gtso/
347b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs nas ni/ /bsregs blugs zhal zas bzhes me skyongs/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): e tye hi/ oM trai lokya bi dza ya sa ma ti mu tra hUM phaT/ A gats+tsha/ de ltar spyan drang de nyid kyis/ /gdan mchog
347b7(rgyud 'grel): pam pa bstab pa ni/ /me tog lag tu thogs nas ni/ /mya ngan mi mnga' thugs rje'i dang/ /nyon mongs mi ? gos ba med/ /ma chags rang bzhin dgar sa na/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ /pad+ma sa ma ye stwaM/
348a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar gdan la bzhugs pa yang/ /yang dag nyid du dag mor kyi/ /dri ma'i mtshan ma med mong kyang/ 'jig rten sring zhu'i tshul gyis su/ /phyag dar zhal ni bsil mdzod cig /a ha ra bi shud+d+ha sra d+ha
348a2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /de nas mchod pa dbul ba ni/ /khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal gyis/ /cheg? mo yi sdigs bshegs nas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbang bskur te/ /yang dag nyid du sgrub pa la/ /bar chad byed pa'i log rtogs na/
348a3(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin skar mda' gdong la sogs/ /chad pas bcad cing bka' phab ste/ /bka' 'am sngags kyi tshig tsam kyis/ /zhi ba la sogs rnam bzhi ni/ /bran bzhin du mi byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir dang po khro bo mchod/ /
348a4(rgyud 'grel): de phyir rnam par rgyal sogs la/ /mar khu shag ti'u shu rtsi'u 'di/ /yon bdag don du 'bul lags na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /snying ga'i thang nas dbul bar bya/ /oM trai lokya bi dza ya
348a5(rgyud 'grel): swa? d+hA? ya di bya di byon pU dza ye swAhA/ lag g.yas mtheb srin nyi ma a/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /blangs te sku gsung thugs mnyes phyir/ /mchod pa'i gnas dang mchod rdzas dang/ /mchod
348a6(rgyud 'grel): ma kho na nyid laS? byang chub sems/ /dkar po shel dag byung pa yis/ /gang la dmigs pa der bstims pas/ /las dang nyon mongs bag chags zhi/ /khro rgyal khams gsum rnam rgyal la/ /mngar gsum 'o thug
348a7(rgyud 'grel): nas kyi thug /'bras bu lag pan 'bras yos dang/ /'bru sna lnga la sogs pa 'brul/ /bdug spos me tog me dri bshos/ /oM tre lo kya bi dza ya kro d+ha ya d+hu pe puShpe A lo ke gand+he a ha ra sarba d+harma bu dza pany+tsa swAhA/ /
348b1(rgyud 'grel): a dI bya dI bya ti ye swAhA/ /de nas bstod pa'i mchod pa ni/ /rdo rje dril bu dbyangs ldan la/ /sku yi 'gying 'gyur dang bcas par/ /zhi rgyas gnyis las rdor dril nang/ /dbang drag rdor dril phyi bskor bsil/ /ye shes bskal
348b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i me ltar yang ba'i 'od/ /ma rig 'dod pa'i bdud khams thong sreg /sprin gnyis 'thabs bzhir khro gnyer brjid pa'i zhal/ /zhe sdang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad 'joms/ /dpa' po chen po dpa' mtshan stag lpags
348b3(rgyud 'grel): can/ /'og 'dren srin po bgegs kyi mdza' gzhon pa'i/ /khro bo'i rgyal po dug gsum 'joms mdzad pa/ /khams gsum sems can ngan 'gro las sgrol ba/ /mdog sngo rdo rje pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /khams gsum
348b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyal che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khro po khams gsum rnam rgyal sogs/ /me nyid sbyang ba'i las mdzod bzhugs/ /tiSh+Tha badzra khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal gyis/ /bdud rtsi 'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma'i ming du bcas par
348b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /bkug nas rdo rje phur pas gdab/ /dum bur byas la tshogs la bltabs oM trai lo kya bi dza ya ki li a mri ta pany+tsa pU dza swAhA/ /bde gshegs khro chen rnam par rgyal/ /thugs rje che rang bdag 'brel bas/ /gzhal
348b6(rgyud 'grel): yas nyid du bzhugs mas kyang/ me nyid sbyar ba'i las bcol pa'o/ /de nas lag g.yas kha par bstan/ /g.yon pa tshur bstan mkhrig ma bsnol/ /mtheb gnyis mthil gzhag song brgyad bskyod/ /oM kI kI ki la badzra bi ma la ro'u tri bra
348b7(rgyud 'grel): kri ti/ mahA gro d+ha badzra ya na dza ha gri grah+na? ta hUM phaT/ sbyang ba'i las ni lha tshogs kyi/ /mdun du bya bar yang dag bshad/ /de nas don mchog gsum pa ste/ /sbyar dang spyan drang gdan dag dang/ /mchod pa la sogs rnam rgyal
349a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /mgon po thugs rje me ldan pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa po/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho yon tan gzhi/ /de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dag pa 'dod chags bral pa'i
349a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu/ /dge bas ngan 'gro las sgrol zhing/ /gcig tu don dam mchog byung pa/ /zhi gyur chos la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /grol nas grol ba'i lam yang ston/ /bslab pa dag la rab tu gus/ /zhing gi dam pa yon tan ?
349a3(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bla med dkon mchog gsum po yis/ /zhi pa la sogs grub par gsol/ /bde bar gshegs so dkon mchog gsum/ /khyod kyis byams pa'i las kun mdzad/ /dang pa'i yid
349a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskyed pa yi/ /gzhal yas nyid du gshegs su gsol/ /oM badzra be ga a kra ma ya hi ga dza/ me lha gnyis min spyan drang ba'i/ /mdun du ki lis me nyid sbyang/ /de nas g.yas pa'i mthe bo yi/ /mthe ba chung mdung
349a5(rgyud 'grel): tshug g.yabs nas ni/ /dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshud?  gshegs zhes ni bos nas ni/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): e hye hi/ mahA bud+ha de ba raM Shi/ /ta ta dzwa la ni hi twa u ti ma hA raM/ a mri san h+ri do b+ha ba/ agna ye
349a6(rgyud 'grel): A gats+tsha/ ta bya ka bya ba ha na ya swAhA/ de nas bzhugs par bya ba ni/ /lha yi drang srong kun dang ni/ /sreg sbyin btab par khas 'ches pa/ /thugs rje dam tshig brtan pa ni/ /pad+ma'i gdan la gzhugs su gsol/ /
349a7(rgyud 'grel): agna ya sa ma ya ste taSh+Thi/ swa b+ha ba bi ga ta ba dza la hi ta A ka sha dI ba ya shud+d+he swAhA// //phyag zhal bsil ba byas nas ni/ /gnyis min drang srong me lha la/ /
349b1(rgyud 'grel): shag ti'u la sogs bdun gsum dbul/ /oM raM raM agna yi hA bya kA byA dpyi dbyin ya pU dza swAhA/ /d+hu pe puShpe a lo ke gand+he bu dza pany+tsa swAhA/ /de nas rdo rje dril bur bcas/ /'gying 'gyur bcas la bsted pa ni/ /tshangs pa
349b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgon gyi sras/ /me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /'byung po yongs la bskyab pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje'i dbang gis sku sbrul la/ rig par grub pa'i drang srong mchog /nyon mongs sreg pa'i shes rab 'ong/ /bskal ba'i
349b3(rgyud 'grel): me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar/ /mngon shes rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan/ /thabs kyis sprul pa'i theg pa bcibs/ /bgrang phreng 'dzin cing rig sngags gsung/ /bdud rtsi bcung ldan g+hun d+he bsnams/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi yongs
349b4(rgyud 'grel): la gsil/ /nyes pa'i sbyon bral tshangs par spyid/ /'jig rten gnas kyang mya ngan 'das/ /zhi ba brnyes byar thugs rje che/ /de la bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal/ /a ? ne chen po'i thugs dam bzhin/ /me gnyis ye shes
349b5(rgyud 'grel): mer byin rlobs/ /las kyi lha rnams mchod pa ni/ /sreg rdzas stobs pa'i las mdzod bzhugs/ /shing rta gcig la gzhug gsol la/ /phyogs mchams lha la bskor zhing mchod/ /agna ye kiM ka ra bu dza tiSh+Tha/ las
349b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi lha rnams mchod pa yi/ /me sbyad spyan drang ba dam dbul gsil/ /las brtan phyag mchod bstod dang dgu/ snang ston mchod rten chos nyid mkha' / /chos dbyings ye shes rnam dag sku/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad//
349b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal rnam par snang mdzad la'o/ /sra brtan rdo rje gzugs brnyan ma/ /me long ye shes thugs kyi sku/ /sa gnon chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal sems dpa' mi bskyod la'o/ /sreg byed rin chen yig 'brum/
350a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid ye shes yon tan sku/ /'chod? sbyin chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal 'byung gnas dpal khyed la'o/ /dgyes 'dzeg? pad+ma phyag 'tshal chu/ /kun rtog ye shes gsung gi sku//
350a2(rgyud 'grel): chos sgrogs chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal snang be? mdza' yas la'o/ /shugs bskyod rgya gram sku ste rlung/ /nan tan ye shes 'drin las sku/ /skyabs mdzad chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad/ /? phyag 'tshal de ni
350a3(rgyud 'grel): yod grub pa la'o/ /? tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du 'brel bsdams bskyed/ /bcing ma 'gyur bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo/ /thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur/ /shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/
350a4(rgyud 'grel): dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la/ /mgo bo brgya mdung rtse zlum bo/ /ngos su lha rnams 'khor bcas bsgom/ /btab na gdug rtsa bzhi bar 'gyur/ /kI li kI li shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ /lha mo rnams kyi dkyil
350a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du/ /lha yi grub pa bsgom bya ste/ /byams bcas zhi pa'i tho ba yis/ /brdungs pas gdug rtsub zhi bar 'gyur/ /sham pa ta shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ /dngul phye 'bas can dkar po la/ /'o mas sbyar
350a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gtor ma yis/ /thams cad ma lus zhi bsgoms nas/ /gtor mas gdul rtsu bzhi bar 'gyur/ /sA? ra Na shan+ti ku ru swAhA/ las rnams bya ba'i don bstan pa'i/ /bdag nyid byams pa chen po can/ /
350a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor hoM? khuM mchod ? tshogs / dkar po nyid du bsgom par bya/ /lha rnams thams cad dkar po ste?/ /sku yi ? ? 'bar yon tan brjid/ /thams cad kun kyang 'tsher zhing zhi/ /byams par bcas
350b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lag pa nas/ /gtong ba thams cad byang chub sems/ rgyun mi chad pa bkun khyab bsgom/ /drang ba zhi 'gyur phur bu rgyas/ brdungs bas dbang mdzad gtor ma drag /de ni spyi yi las su gsungs/ /phyogs bcu gdug pa ma
350b2(rgyud 'grel): lus kun/ /gdug pa'i sems ni rab por te/ /lhan ne dkar po'i 'og tu 'gyur/ /bde? ldan byang chub 'od 'phro 'bar/ /'jig rten gsum dang 'das gtum la/ /'bru lnga byams ldan byas nas ni/ /gsol ba gdab par
350b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dri za brul/ /lto 'phye dang ni nam mkha' lding 'dab/ /lus srul srin po gdon gyi rig rnams dang/ /sa 'am mkha' la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bud med g.yog 'khor tshogs dang bcas ba rnamS//
350b4(rgyud 'grel): de rnams sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /dang byams yid kyis lta rnams mchod byas te/ /lha yis byin gdabs sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis/ /las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi gyur cig /na ma:sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ oM A:
350b5(rgyud 'grel): pa hA shAn+ti ku ru shAn+ti ku ru bra sha ma d+harmA ni rdza ta/ a b+ha ba swa b+ha ba d+harmA swAhA/ dra ba ta shan+tiM ku ru/ ? baM ku ru swAhA/ /de ba shan+tiM ku ru swAhA/ nA gA shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /rak+Sha shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /yak+Sha shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /
350b6(rgyud 'grel): kri nyer shAstiM? ku mu swAhA/ /sya tsi mye tse shAndaM ku ru swAhA/ /puM oM guM i shan+ti ku ru swAhA/ /ra taM ra taM/ pra tAM pra ti shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ /ka ra lan bi ra lan shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/ /bi ha sa nan shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /i bar shAn+tiM ku
350b7(rgyud 'grel): ru swAhA/ /na ro ba shAn+tiM? ku ru swA hA/ /a nri mu du pra tri shan+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /kaM ka ri kaM ka ri shan+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /myi pa? myi tsa ra ra sri sraM/ gaM gaM guM guM/ aM aM iM iM a ra len shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /shi dur na mye tre shIn+taM ku ru swAhA//
351a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas las sbyar rnam rgyal thabs/ /phyag mtshan nam mkhar phyar nas kyang/ /gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/ /skad cig yud la zhi mdzad de/ /zhi bar gyur pas
351a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings su rol/ /bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das/ /dang pa'i yid kyis bskyed pa yi/ /gzhal yas nyid du re zhig gshegs/ /slar yang 'gro ba'i don la dgongs/ /de bzhin lha tshogs mang po kun/ /
351a3(rgyud 'grel): go rim de bzhin las bya'o/ /mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /snying rje dga' pas mchod byas na/ /las rnams brtsam pa byas nas ni/ /tshe dang longs spyod dpal 'phel
351a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /puSh+TiM? ku ru swAhA/ /ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ka'i gzi brjid 'cher ba la/ /dga' chags yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /las rnam brtsam pa byas nas ni/ /thams cad ma lus dbang
351a5(rgyud 'grel): du 'gyur oM la tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i garba? brjid 'chod? ba la/ /btang snyoms khros pas mchod sbyin bya/ /las rnams brtsams pa byas nas ni/ /thams cad ma lus brlag par 'gyur/ /
351a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang rgyud las 'byung ba'i las/ /sdig pa sreg dang tshe 'phel ho ma/ /srung ngang ro sreg sgrub ba kun/ /cha shas tsam du bstan pa ni/ /hUM gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /ye shes tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
351a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog /hi gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /raM gyis tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /dkyil 'khor ho ma tshad bstan pa/ /gsang gsum dkyil 'khor tha ma 'bring/ /rab ni bcu gnyis dgu dang bdun/ /
351b1(rgyud 'grel): khru gang thams cad sgo gang bya/ /yan lag thams cad tshad bstan pa/ /de khru gang nas brtsams nas ni/ /ji srid dpag tshad thug gi bar/ /'dul ba'i dbang gi khyad par gyis/ /yang na tshang la nges pa med/ /hom khung tha ma 'bring deng rang
351b2(rgyud 'grel): khru gang khru bo khru gsum ni/ /'byor pa'i dbang bya pad zla kham/ /gru gsum dang ni 'khor lo brtsigs/ /brgyad pa'i steng du zla ba'i 'od/ /dkar po dgod de dbus rdo rje/ /rtse lnga shar ro rin chen lho/ /nub tu pad+ma byang rgya gram//
351b3(rgyud 'grel): de steng kha 'khor sor bzhi rdo rjer/ /sems dpa' sems dpa' pad+ma dang khong yon/ /'jig rten pa ni ci rigs mdzes par bya/ /nub phyogs 'dug ste zhi ba las/ /bram ze'i khyim du yang dag bshad/ /lho phyogs rgyas
351b4(rgyud 'grel): pa nub tu dbang/ /byang du drag po o ma du bshad/ /dkyil 'khor drug gam yang na ni/ /grong khyer phyir rol rje'u rigs dang/ /rgyal rigs smad 'tshong dmangs ma'i 'khyim/ /sngags pa nub dang lho shar byang/ /'dug la mchod
351b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don dag ni/ /gang gi gtso dang thabs dang ni/ /shes rab tshul tu ldan pa'i don/ /he ma khung dag gi bye brag kyang/ /de ci rigs par bya bar bshad/ /de la sogs pa'i gtso yum ni/ /khung gi mthil du lhag par dgong
351b6(rgyud 'grel): me 'od ngos la rdo rje kha/ /'khor rnams phyi rol yang dag dgod/ /ro sreg maN+Dal khru bcu gnyis/ /khru bzhi pa na khru ngo zabs/ /brkos pa'i dbus su 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad sna la'ang byang chub kyi/ /mchod rten kun rig phyag
351b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya sogs/ /rigs bzhi dang ni yum bzhi'o/ /de mdza' rdo rje rtse lngas bskor/ /kha la me 'ong bri par bya/ /de mdza' pad+ma pad+ma la/ /sems dpa' bskal bzang la sogs rnams/ /bri bya gA?  la lha mo bri/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnamS
352a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /phyi rim phyogs phyogs dag du bri/ /gzhung dang 'gal byas nyes sdig bshad/ /sdig pa chen po skur btab yin/ /ston pa'i bstan dang? dge ba'i las/ /pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang//
352a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod? dang lcam dral rnam lnga yin/ /dge ba mi dge mi dag dge /rgyal ba'i chos la skur btab yin/ /sdig can de ni? mi thar zhes/ /rnam par 'byed pa'i thub pa gsung/ /dkyil 'khor 'jug 'gyur byed pa'i phyir//
352a3(rgyud 'grel): ri mo 'am yang ni de bzhin gzhan ? gyi tshad med bzhi bsgoms te/ /sha dang chang dang sgog bcing dang/ /rku dang bud med spyad byas na/ /de ni yan lag skur btab yin/ /de las bshegs ba byar yod thabs/ /
352a4(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin dam la gnas byas sam/ /ther chen sde la mchod byed na/ /sdig can de ni myur du sgrol/ /pha ma bsad dang phrogs bcom dang/ /chos kyi mkhan po bsad pa dang/ /dam tshig lung dang shes rab rgyud/ /
352a5(rgyud 'grel): man ngag dbang gi slob dpon gsum/ /snying nas smad cing bsad pa dang/ /theg chen spel gnas pa yi/ /mched dang lcam dral dbyen bas shing/ /dam las log cing mkhas pa ni/ /de ni mtshams med lnga
352a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya/ /de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra bar/ /las bzhi sdig sreg byas bcug na/ /sdig can de yang myur du sgrol/ /sngags dang phyag rgya yig 'bru rnams/ /lhag dang chang bar byas pa ni/ /de dang nye ba'i sdig pa
352a7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /ci phyir dbyings dang rnam thar gyis/ /sgo rnams gzhan du gyur pas na/ /bskal par brjod kyang dngos grub ni/ /thob par mi 'gyur dpa' bos gsungs/ /shes bya'i sdig pa thams cad ni/ /mi shes
352b1(rgyud 'grel): sdig las bcur 'gyur che/ /shes bya'i sdig bshags thams cad la/ /? lnga dag gis 'byor zhes/ /cha tsha skor ba phyag dang ni/ /srog 'don mdo sde lnga dag las/ /'bum 'bum dag tu gsungs pa yin/ /de nas
352b2(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa gnas pa yi/ /mtshams med lnga la sogs pa yi/ /sdig can de dag rnams dang ni/ /skad cig yud tsam smra mi bya/ /shes nas dam tshig gang nyams pa'i/ /de yi sdig pa brjod mi lang/ /gsol nye bar mi brtson
352b3(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /de dag dang yang smra mi bya/ /skad cig yud tsam smras pas kyang//don gyi dngos po gang yin spangs/ /dmags la sogs don gcig pa bzhin/ /de yi bshags pa rgyud lngas so/ /bus 'gros thal 'brud? tshed lcag dag
352b4(rgyud 'grel): 'greng phyag srog sdom dag gis so/ /lhag dang chad pa'i kha skong ni/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po mnyes pa dang/ /tshe rab slob dpon pha ma dang/ /slob ma'i sdig zhi dban bskur dang/ /mdza' mas sems can don byas pas/ /de yi
352b5(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa de yi 'byang ngo/ /ho ma bzhi yi gtso bo gang/ /bsreg rdzas bdun gsum nyi shu gcig /mnyes par bya phyir dbul bar bya/ /de nas tshe rabs slob dpon don/ /dkon mchog gsum la bdun gsum gsum/ /
352b6(rgyud 'grel): dbul? ba nyid du bya bar bshad/ /tshe rabs pha ma'i don gyi phyir/ /rigs kyi gtso bo rnams la'o/ /de nas slob ma rim gyis ni/ /bgegs bsal phyir ni spos chus bkru/ /de nas g.yon phyogs tsog pur bzhag /lag g.yas
352b7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon lag g.yon gyi/ /byams par bcas pas bzung nas ni/ /gtso po dag gi sngags bdun bzlas/ /de nas sdig pa zad bya'i phyir/ /rigs yum lnga la bdun bdun?/ /de yi dbang bskur bsrung bar 'gyur/ /mdza' /
353a1(rgyud 'grel): yas sems can kun don du/ /lha rnams kun la dbul bar bya/ /de dag bkra shis bya ba'i phyir/ /yum bzhi gzungs kyi bya ba ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni tshim byed ma/ /dbang po zhi ba zla ba 'dra//
353a2(rgyud 'grel): bstod tshig gis bskul bsngags brjod bya/ /de nas bshags pa gus par bya/ /de nas sngags pas phyogs phyogs nas/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya ma nu ? la ya badzra satwa te no pa tiSh+Tha dri Dho mo b+ha ba/ /su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/
353a3(rgyud 'grel): a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su bo Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+himme pra yats+tsha sarba karma su tsa me tsit+ti sh+ri ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga ban sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra mA ma muny+tsa badzri b+ha ba/ mahA sa ma ya sAtwa A(rgyud 'grel): rigs
353a4(rgyud 'grel): lngar dbye zhing brjod nas ni/ /skar ma rab rib mar me dang/ /skyu ma zil ba chu bur dang/ /rmi lam glog dang sbrin lta bur/ /'dus byas chos kyang de ltar lnga/ /de ltar bsdu ba byas nas bzhag/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po ?//
353a5(rgyud 'grel): bltas te lhag pa'i mchod pa dbul/ /e ma bdag nyid slobs bcas ba'i/ /dri zhim ngo bo thams cad kun/ /sngon 'das dpyid kyi d+hu per ni/ /byin rlobs mchod 'bul bzhes su gsol/ /de bi buShpe pu dza ho/ /e ma
353a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid blob? bcas pa'i/ /gsal dro ngo bo thams cad kun/ /byon ma reg ston A lo ker/ /byin rlobs mchod 'bul bzhes su gsol/ /da bi A lo ? pu dza ho:/ /e ma bdag nyid slob bcas pa'i/ /brlan
353a7(rgyud 'grel): bcas dri ni ma thams cad kun/ /ma byon kun gyi gnas der ni/ /byin rlobs mchod 'bul bzhes su gsol/ /de be gaN+Dhe? pU dza hO/ /de ltar mchod nas skyabs gsol ba /dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rten nyid da/ /rnam dag
353b1(rgyud 'grel): sku las ting 'dzin dag pa'i sku/ sprul sku phyag rgya mtshon ba'i lha tshogs kyi/ /grags bas 'jig rten gsum bkang lha me ba/ /mgon po mchog 'di la ni skyabs su mchi/ /smra bsam brjod med gsung gi sprul pa'i tshogs//
353b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid so so ye shes kun stan pa/ /dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed ba'i yum/ /dam chos mdo sde bzhi la skyabs su mchi/ /rab tu lam stor 'khor bar mig zum ba'i/ /'gro ba skyabs med kun gyi pha ma mdzad//
353b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las bzhi yis rtse gcig don mdzad gtso/ /theg chen dge 'dun tshogs la skyas su mchi/ /da nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la/ /gus dang bcas pas phyag byas mchod/ /gtsang zhing gtsang mar bshams pa'i/
353b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzas/ /khrus byas gdugs tog me dri bshos/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la 'bul/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas pa zhes su gsol/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ ga ga na sa ma ye swAhA/ /oM bi shwa bi shud+d+he
353b5(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ d+harmA tat twa nu ga te swAhA/ /nA ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+ha nAM/ mahA me trai byung ka Ti swAhA/ nA ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ da rtse spha ra Na a ga sa ge ne'u d+harma ya swAhA/ na ma/ sa man+ta bu d+d+ha nAM/
353b6(rgyud 'grel): ba shud+d+he gand+hota? b+ha ma a swA hA/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ a ra ra swa ra ra ka ra ra ba liM te ma ni swAhA/ snang ston mchod rten chos nyid mkha' / /chos dbyings ye shes rnam dag sku/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya
353b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal rnam par snang mdzad la'o/ /de lha'i yon tan bcas pa la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' byams pa'i mchod/ /spos kyi sprin lding bdug pa 'phro/ /gtsug tor rgyal ba gdugs kyi khabs/ /byams pa'i
354a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bder gshegs gtso dang sras po dang po dang/ /rgyal sras lhag ma dang ni rogs kyi yul rnams
354a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /phyi nang lha mo sgo skyed bcas pa la/ /dngos po kun gyis dang pas phyag 'tshal 'dud/ rtsa ba'i rgyud las btus nas su/ /ngan song thams cad sbyong mdzad pa'i/ /shi ba'i don du ro bsrag thabs/ /sangs rgyas bsad pa'i rin po la
354a3(rgyud 'grel): brten de bdag gis bshad par bya/ /dang po bla ma rin po che mnyes par byas nas/ des dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur ba dam tshig phog nas/ spyi dang khyad par gyi dam tshig la gnas pas sngar rang gi sgrub thabs kyi rim pas bsnyen
354a4(rgyud 'grel): pa byas pa dang/ bzlas brjod byas pas mtshan ma mthong bas/ bdag dang gzhan 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba la 'jug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor yo byang thams cad bsdas nas/ /chos
354a5(rgyud 'grel): grangs bzang dang rgyu skad bzang po la/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi mtshan ma lta phyir gro bas dang bcas pas de nyid brtag bya ste/ /lha khang tsher 'dus yul dang grong khyer khyams kyi shar dang byang du brtsam par bya/ /yang na bzang snum dang
354a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan zub rdul sogs nyes med shar dang byang du gzhol/ /me tog chur ldan rang bzhin dag par bya'o/ /yang na sngags pa yid gang du dga' bar bya'o/ /de nas gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la lcib sal ma lhung bas maN+Dal bya//
354a7(rgyud 'grel): ? mchod gsum la phyi nang mchod pa bya zhing 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas sa gzha gru bzhir bsam las bdag bsams te barko?/ /ston zla gsum la byang du bltas la barke/ /dgun zla gsum la shar
354b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rigs bzhi tshad med bsdu ba bzhis/ /mchod phyir dpal gyis gsungs pa'o/ /sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags/ /byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba rnams dag la/ /badzra aM gu sha yi mchod pas
354b2(rgyud 'grel): rol/ /don mthun phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags/ /snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid/ /rin chen phyag rgya shes pa la/ /ratna pA sha'i mchod pas rol/ /don spyod phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags/ /dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid//
354b3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab sgron ma mdzad pa la/ /pad+ma sgo Ta'i mchod pas rol/ /snyan pa phun sum tshogs ba'i rtags/ /btang snyoms chen bo'i ngo bo nyid/ /mchod ston chen mo kun rig la/ /karma gand+he'i mchod bas rol/ /de ltar tshad
354b4(rgyud 'grel): med mchod byas nas/ /rigs rnams byin gyis rlob pas mchod/ /zhe sdang ma skyes rdo rje dam tshig ma/ /ye shes me long pha rol phyin pa'i dang/ /gnyis med rgyas 'debs drin lan phyag rgya ma/ /satwa badzra dbyings chag mchod
354b5(rgyud 'grel): bas rol/ /nga rgyal bdag med rin chen dam tshig ma/ /ye shes mnyam nyid pha rol phyin pa'i dang/ /mi 'gyur rmongs med drin lan phyag rgya ma/ /ratna badzri dbyings phyug mchod pas rol/ /'dod chags mi dmigs chos
354b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi dam tshig la/ /ye shes kun rtogs pha rol phyin ba'i dang/ /mi rtog za byed drin lan phyag rgya ma/ /pad+ma badzra dbyings phyug mchod pas rol/ /phrag dog ma grub rgya gram dam tshig ma/ /ye shes nan tan pha rol phyin
354b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dang/ /mi skye tshe 'phel drin lan phyag rgya ma/ /karma badzri dbyings phyug mchod pas rol/ /de ltar byin rlobs mchod byas nas/ /rgyan gyi mchod par gsungs pa ni/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba 'khor bcas ni//
355a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod gnas daM? ba dpal gyis zhing/ /yid du 'os ba'i mchod sprin dang/ /rol mo sil snyan 'phan gdugs dang/ /bla'i rgya' mtshan lhab lhum dang/ /me tog phyed dang bdu sdos sogs/
355a2(rgyud 'grel): mar me byug pa la sogs pa'i/ mchod sprin sna tshogs phyogs bcur sbrul /mchod sprin ris sngags bden pa dang/ /nam mkha' mdzod sngags ting 'dzin mthus sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byam du/ /mchod sprin sna tshogs lhub gyur
355a3(rgyud 'grel): cig /na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te?/ badzra sa ra bra ma d+ha ni ta tha ga ta ya/ arha te saM myag saM bu d+d+ha ya/ ta dya mA/ oM badzrai badzro mahA badzro/ mahA te dza badzra/ mahA birya badzre/ mahA ba d+hi
355a4(rgyud 'grel): tsit+ta badzre/ mahA bo d+hi sa man+to pa saM gra ma Na badzra/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni badzro swAhA/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo/ bi shwa mu khe b+hya/ sarba tatkhaM ud+ga te spha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM
355a5(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ de nas yum lnga las brtan mchod/ /shes rab dbyings phyug rig yum lnga/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs la byin rlob cing/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhir gyur mas/ /'gro ba'i don rnams
355a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol/ /shes rab dbyings ma rigs kyi yum lnga ste/ /chos dbyings ye shes mkha' sogs gsal ba la/ /gsad chen bde ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dang/ /thabs ltar rol
355a7(rgyud 'grel): cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ /yum rnams dag la mchod thabs ni/ /sgrub mchod bcu drug bzhung bzhin bya/ /bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad chen gyi/ /chos dbyings ye shes chen po'i yul
355b1(rgyud 'grel): yum chen bud+ha lo tsa na/ thams cad zad par khas dbang bskur/ /bde gshegs kun gyi yum chen mo/ /phyag 'tshal kun tu bzang mo la'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /me long ye shes chen
355b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i yul/ /yum chen badzra lo tsa na/ /thams cad zad par sas dbang bskur/ /rdo rje rigs gtso mang po'i yum/ /phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas spyan khyod la'o/ /bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan
355b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ /mnyam nyid ye shes chen po'i yul/ /yum chen ratna lo tsa na/ /thams cad zad bar mes dbang bskur/ /rin chen rigs gtso mang po'i yum/ /phyag 'tshal na bza' dkar mo la'o/ /bcom ldan
355b4(rgyud 'grel): snang ba mdza' yas kyi/ /kun rtog ye shes chen po'i yul/ /yum chen pad+ma lo tsa na/ /thams cad zad par chus dbang bskur/ /pad+ma rigs gtso mang po'i yum/ /phyag 'tshal ma ma kI la'o//
355b5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan don yod grub pa ya/ /nan tan ye shes chen bo'i yul/ /yum chen karma lo tsa na/ /thams cad zad bar rlung dbang bskur/ /las kyi rigs gtso mang po'i yum/ /phyag 'tshal dam tshig sgro ma la'o//
355b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas sems dpa' bcu drug kyang/ /ci rigs pa 'am yang na ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa yi mchod/ /de nas lA sye la sogs brgyad/ /phyi nang gnyis kyi lha mo dam tshig ma/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi ye shes
355b7(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba la/ /rol pa chen po'i mchod pas gtso bo yis/ /dgongs pa skongs la 'gro ba'i don rnams mdzod/ /ye shes dus bzhi gzungs nye gzungs/ /sprul sku 'khor bar mi ldeg cing/ /mya
356a1(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das la mi chags pa'i/ /don rnams mdzad cing brtan por bzhugs/ /rdo rje sgeg mo byang chub sems kyi dang/ /mchog sbyin ston byed gzi brjid 'bad cing sdang/ /mdog dkar
356a2(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi khu tshur dkur brten te/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje smon byed sgeg mo la'o/ /rin chen dpal phreng gzhung dang ting nge 'dzin/ /yid bzhin mchog 'byung gzi brjid 'bar cing bskor/ /sngo bsangs
356a3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen phreng bas re 'dod skong/ /phyag 'tshal bdud rtsi cher 'babs phreng ba la'o/ /pad+ma dbyangs mkhan gsung rab rgya mtshor sgrags/ /snyan pas yid 'phog gzi brjid 'bar ldan skor/ /mdog
356a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar gser gyi bi bang phyag na bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal thabs kyi yid 'phrag gi ti la'o/ /las kyi gar mkhan phrin las rgya mtsho sgrol?/ /gzugs mdzes bskyod pas rol mo phyogs bcur mdzad//
356a5(rgyud 'grel): mdog ljang sna tshogs skur ston gzi brjid 'bar/ /phyag 'tshal yid 'ong mdzes bskyod nir te la'o/ /sbos kyi sbrin lding bdug pa 'phro/ /kun tu tshim byed dri bsung chim/ /mthon skya gser gyi spos pher bsnamS
356a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal rnam dag gdug pa la'o/ /lta mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro/ /byang chub yan lag me tog rgyan/ /mthon mthing me tog gzhod bu bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal skyon med me tog ma la'o/ /'od gsal
356a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bas kun tu khyab/ /gti mug thibs be sel mdzad pa/ /dmar skye chos kyi mar me bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal sgrol 'bar mar me la'o/ /tsan dan bdud rtsi 'char 'babs na/ /bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i
356b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyings/ /ljang sngon dung bar phyag na bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal reg bya dri chu la'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba'i bskal bzang dang/ /phyogs skyod bcu dang bkra shis brgyad/ /rdo rje lcags kyu 'gugs byed dang/ /rin chen zhags
356b2(rgyud 'grel): pa gsol ka dang/ /pad+ma lcags sgrogs pho nya'i las/ /rgya gram dril bu shes rab mchog/ dpe med rgyal sras rang rgyal dang/ /dgra bcom rgyal tshen lha chen dang/ /lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang/ /lha ma yin
356b3(rgyud 'grel): dang nam mkha' lding/ /mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /sa bdag gza' skar rig 'dzin dang/ /srin po log 'dren sha za dang/ /rgyud drug ngag gi mthu can sogs/ /thams cad ci rigs pa yis
356b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /dkyil 'khor bdag bo dra? nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor lha yi ting 'dzin zhugs/ /lce thogs a las zla dkyil steng/ /oM sgom sa rdo rje ye shes bsam/ /rdo rje ljags su bsgoms nas ni/ /chos
356b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag rgya can gyis ni/ /slob ma de la bshad par bye/ /oM d+harmA hUM d+harmA traM d+harmA h+ra d+harmA a d+harmA sa ma yastsaM/ d+harmA a na ya sa d+harmA a ho su khaM d+harmA/ /sa d+hu sa d+hu d+ha rmA/ su pa ha swa d+harmA/ ru bu ho te
356b6(rgyud 'grel): d+harmA/ a tha pra ba ti d+harmA/ ha ha hUM ha d+harmA/ /sarba ka ri d+harmA/ du(rgyud 'grel): kha ts+tsha da d+harmA/ bu d+d+ha bro d+hi d+harmA/ pra ti shad+da d+harmA/ su ba shi stwaM d+harmA/ n+ni ba ya d+harmA/ sha truM b+ha k+Sha d+harmA/
356b7(rgyud 'grel): sarba sid+d+hi d+harmA/ ma hA ra ti d+harmA/ /ru ga sha be d+harmA/ /shu rod tra be'u d+harmA/ sarba pu dze d+harmA/ pra ha da naM d+harmA/ bu te d+harmA/ tsa kri d+harma/ su gaN+DA ni d+harmA/ a ya hi dza dza d+harmA/ a ya 
357a1(rgyud 'grel): hai hUM hUM d+harmA/ te spho Ta baM baM d+harmA/ g+hanTa a a d+harmA/ de ltar lha tshogs sku gsung thugs/ /dkyil 'khor gang yin thams cad kyi/ /so so'i snying po tha mar ni/ /d+harma sa bdag?
357a2(rgyud 'grel): la brjod pas ni/ /lha rnams thugs dgongs dngos grub stsol/ /kun rdzobs dang ni don dam gyi/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya/ /sdom ba yi ni dam tshig dang/ /dge ba'i chos rnams sdud pa dang/ /sems
357a3(rgyud 'grel): can don byed bcas pa yi/ /rnam pa gsum dang ldan par bshad/ /rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya bcas/ /oM badzra ka ba tsa rak+Sha a d+ha? tiSh+Tha haM/ de nas sku gsung thugs byin brlab/ /kA ya oM ba ka A(rgyud 'grel): tsit+ta hUM/
357a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la phyag rgya ting 'dzin sngags/ /bar du gcod pa gsal bar bya/ /oM dz+nya na tsakra phaT/ /nga yis bshad phog thams cad ni/ /dam pas gsungs pa'i tshig yin pas/ /khyod kyang de las ma 'da' 
357a5(rgyud 'grel): zhig /oM badzra sa ma ya ha tha/ byang chub rigs can nyid du ni/ /sngags 'di brjod pas gyur pa'o/ /oM po d+hi tsit+ta a sa me tri sa me mahA sa ma ya swAhA/ /hUM hUM hUM/ gsum pa dkyil 'khor 'jug
357a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhug pa/ /slob dpon zhugs dang slob ma 'jug bshags pa lhag chang kha bkang ba/ /mthun par slar gshegs gsol dang lnga/ /las bzhi mchod nas bdag nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor sems
357a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis nam mkha' la/ /btags nas byang chub sems kyis ni/ /zhugs pa nyid du thub pas gsungs/ /bdug spos lag tu thogs nas su/ /blo gros ldan pas lha rnams la/ /gus pas gsol ba legs par
357b1(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ /de phog sgo bzhi dbye bar bshad/ /zhugs la gnyis su med bsgoms la/ /'gro ba dran pa'i las bya'o/ /bcom ldan nam mkha' i sangs rgyas kun/ /thugs rje chen po mthur ldan lags/ /bdag nyid
357b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir/ /rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan lhas/ /bdag la dbang mchog dang stsol cig/ dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lo bshad/ /de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad/ /sangs rgyas
357b3(rgyud 'grel): bka' yi dkyil 'khor du/ /bdag nyid dang pas 'jug lags na/ /dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das/
357b4(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams can du bdag nyid gyur/ /sngon gyi las kyi 'brel pa lags/ /thugs rjes sras su dgongs par mdzod/ /At+ma ko haM maN+Da la sarba A be sha ya swa b+ha ba/ rdo rje mdzub sogs legs par
357b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /sbyar la bkan te bsdoms nas su/ /khros nas rab tu dbye ba ni/ /sgo dbye ba yi mtshan nyid do/ /gnas rab sgo bzhi zhe sdang dang/ /nga rgyal 'dod chags phrag dog bzhis/ sngon med dus nas
357b6(rgyud 'grel): bcad lags na/ /tshad med bsdu brgyad rigs bzhi yi/ /thugs rje thabs las sprul pa yi/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang/ /dril bu phyag rgya mchog nyid kyis/ /ding nyid thar sgo dbye ru gsol//
357b7(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra ratna pad+ma karma kro d+ha ga doM sa ma ya tsa tu ra/ /pra be sha shi kran sma ra Na sa ma ya hUM phaT/ /de nas bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen dang/ /pad+ma rgya grim shugs kyis ni/ /rab tu brgal te zhugs nas ni/ /gnyis su
358a1(rgyud 'grel): med par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /snying rje slob ma la sogs pa/ /lha mo sbrul sras sgoms byas dang/ /de nas sngags g.yog dag gis ni/ /slob ma'i las rnams brtson bya ba/ /phyag 'tshal
358a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol 'jug khrus bkra shis/ /dam bca' me tog dor mig dbye/ /slob dpon lan stsal lhas dbang bskur/ /dam tshig dpog dang dbang bskur dang/ /smon lam lha bo bstan yul dbul/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba'o//
358a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas shar sgo dag tu ni/ /bdug spos lag tu thogs nas ni/ /shar phyogs mngon dga' i pho brang 'dir/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems sogs la/ /skal ldan rgyal sras dag ba zhig /dag yid dang bas gus phyag
358a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ / lho phyogs dpal ldan pho brang 'di'i/ /bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan sogs/ /nub phyogs bde ldan pho brang 'di'i/ /bcom ldan snang ba mdza' yas sogs/ /byang phyogs rnam dag pho brang
358a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i/ /bcom ldan don yod grub pa sogs/ /bcom ldan snying po'i pho brang 'di'i/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la /skal ldan rgyal sras dag ba zhig /dag yid dang bas gus phyag 'tshal/ /bdag ni dam
358a6(rgyud 'grel): tshig rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje bla na med pa'i 'di/ /de ring bdag la dbab tu gsol/ /bdag ni dam tshig rin chen te/ /bdag ni dam tshig pad+ma ste/ /bdag ni dam tshig rgya gram ste//
358a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni dam tshig 'khor lo ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad yin par grags/ /'khor lo bla na med pa 'di/ /de ring bdag la dbab tu gsol/ /shar phyogs mngon dga' i pho brang 'dir/ /bla med byang chub sems bskyed de/
358b1(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub dam pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis dang pas 'jug par bgyi/ /lho phyogs dpal ldan pho brang 'dir/ /nub phyogs bde ldan pho brang 'dir/ /byang phyogs rnam dag pho brang 'dir/ /bcom ldan snying pa'i pho brang
358b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dir/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /phyogs su blta ba dgrol ba'i phyir/ /mdza' las 'das pa gnas par bgyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i mai long yul/ /kun bzang phyag rgya'i bum pa ste/ /gnyis
358b3(rgyud 'grel): min byang chub sems rtags chus/ /zhe sdang rnam smin dag gyur cig/ rin chen 'byung ldan mnyam shes yul/ /na bza' i phyag rgya'i bum pa ste/ /gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus/ /nga rgyal rnam smin
358b4(rgyud 'grel): dag gyur cig /snang ba mdza' yas kun rtog yul/ /ma ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/ /gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus/ /'dod chags rnam smin dag gyur cig/ don grub nan tan ye shes yul//
358b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/ /gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus/ /phrag dog rnam smin dag gyur cig /rnam snang chos dbyings ye shes yul/ /spyan gyi phyag rgya bum pa ste/ /gnyis min byang chub sems
358b6(rgyud 'grel): rtags chus/ /gti mug rnam snang dag gyur cig /mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam sbyong ba/ /mgon po yon tan mdza' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis dang/ dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra/
358b7(rgyud 'grel): shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni dang 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan rgyan gyis brgyan byas shing/ /yang dag 'byor pa'i sbyin pas sbyin mdzad mi bslu ba/ /rin chen
359a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ldan zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig /bsam gtan dam pa ting 'dzin pha rol phyin pa'i gnas/ /ye shes pad+ma'i steng bzhugs dpag
359a2(rgyud 'grel): med tshe ldan zhing/ /tshe grangs med bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig /sems can don phyir las la thugs ni sbyor mdzad cing/ /'gro ba
359a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bcings pa bcings las grol gyur ba/ /thub mchog don yod grub ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig /rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan//
359a4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba nya 'dra sku mthar? 'phyin pa?(rgyud 'grel): mthar 'byin pa/ /dgongs pa mdza' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur shog yan maM ga lan/ /shu b+ha sha man to/ /sa ya dzan tu
359a5(rgyud 'grel): ka sha sye a k+Sho? b+hya rA dza/ bi shi na ta sya/ sarba ku na/ maM ga la sya/ naM maM ga la da/ b+ha b+ha du shAn+te/ ka sa pra dz+nyA sta ban tu dya/ ya maM ga lan/ ma ni ku lan hi na bu ha ra/ ba ba shu sha sha ci na se
359a6(rgyud 'grel): ta/ no to la?/ kha la na bi bi bu ti na/ taM maM ga lan/ tan maM ga lan/ b+ha b+ha du shAn+te/ ka ra na bad hyaM/ yan maM ga lan/ a ga ni/ a yur byid te sa syo/ ma ne bu ra ta la yas sye/
359a7(rgyud 'grel): kArSha? badzra/ pa ri ga te sye/ ta thA ga te spyi/ taM maM gA lan/ b+ha b+ha du shan+ta/ ka ra na rya phaT traM/ yan maM ga lan/ ma ma mu ne bar sha sye/ a mo g+ha sid+d+hi swatwa ta ra ga ra ma na ne/ b+hu na
359b1(rgyud 'grel): sha ban/ sha ta le sye yo tsi ta man sa sa sye/ mu na sa sye/ b+hand+ha b+ha b+ha mye bya/ tan maM ga la na/ b+ha b+ha ru shan+te/ rna ta dyaM/ yan mi ga laM/ sa ga laM/ ma to ra ta sa sye/ bi to tsa na sye be ra ta nyi?/ mahA ra
359b2(rgyud 'grel): rna ba sya/ mahA rarna ra b+hu ra rarna/ tsa tra b+hu she te ban ta ka sye taM maM ga la na/ b+he b+ha du tsan te kar ta ban tyaM/ de la de bzhin gshegs gtso dang/ /chos rnams kun la dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje rigs gtso chen
359b3(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ /khams gsum bdag por dbang bskur ro/ /rin chen rigs gtso chen po dang/ /lha mis mchod bar dbang bskur ro/ /padmo? rigs gtso chen po dang/ /chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskr ro/ /las kyi
359b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs gtso chen po dang/ /las bzhi gzhan don sbyod dbang bskur/ /bkra shis brjod pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /'jig rten ngag tu mi rnams kun/ /grags pa rnams spel bgegs kyang med/ /sems nyid bde
359b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro nges byed la/ /mthar yang nges pa kho nar ni/ /zhi ba'i 'bras bu thob bar 'gyur/ /de nas dam bca' bya ba ni/ /dpa' bo chen po rgyud dag ba'i/ /sdom pa legs par blang bar bya/ /de la sdom pa'i yon tan
359b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /dang po sdom las rgyud gnyis sbyor/ /tha ma'i sdom pas lha min sbyor/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma yi/ /sdom pa yis ni ngan 'gro sbyod/ /de bas sdom pa gdos pa mchog /de 'og dam bca' yang dag bya/ /sangs rgyas rnal
359b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed brtan bar bzung/ /de ni spyi yi tshul khrims so/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang//
360a1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin ni lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin//
360a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog ngag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan bar ni/ /yang
360a3(rgyud 'grel): dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchad pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spong ngo/ /sems can
360a4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung/ /de nas shar sgor gnas pa de/ /na bza' stong smad dar dmar dkri/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyar 'char/ /bcug la lag tu rin chen dang/ /me tog
360a5(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba la sogs thogs/ /gdong g.yogs dar dkar gyis g.yogs nas/ /a sa me tri sa me mahA sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra a ba tiSh+Tha hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ sngon gyi tshe rabs grangs med nas//
360a6(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i las kyis bsnyen pa'i lha/ /lhag pa'o lha ni gang yin la/ /da lta nyid du 'bab bar shog /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir/ /bdag la thugs rtse dgongs nas kyang/ /'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis/ /sman
360a7(rgyud 'grel): par dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra pra ti grah+Na hUM / oM badzra pra tits+tsha sa ma ya stwaM/ bo d+hi tsit+ta pu dza ho(rgyud 'grel): me tog ri mtshan la sogs pa/ /gang la bab pa rigs kyi lha/ /gtso bo rigs te sgrubs na ni/ /dngos
360b1(rgyud 'grel): grub skur? sar the tshom med/ /de nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /rin chen ltar bcas blangs nas ni/ /slob ma'i sbyir bzhag thim gyur nas/ /mi gnyis gcig pa'i lhar bsams nas/ oM sa ma ya h+ri da ya me/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ a
360b2(rgyud 'grel): b+hi Shiny+tsa A/ nga ni dad ba rab tu bskyed/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'od la ltos/ /khyod ni theg chen 'di nyid la/ /gsang ba chen po'i snod du gyur/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /thob pa mnyam med de ring thob/ /dam tshig gang 'og
360b3(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dab zhig /bla med byang chub chen po 'thob/ /oM badzra ha syong? g+ha Ta ya hUM/ oM badzra pra be sha hUM phaT/ /slob dpon lan gnyis dbyangs sbyar te/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya legs bcas la/ /nga ni dam tshig rdo rje
360b4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di/ /de ring khyod la sbyin par bya/ oM badzra sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ da ni dam tshig rin chen te/ de ni de tshig pad+ma ste/ /nga ni dam tshig rgya gram ste//
360b5(rgyud 'grel): nga ni dam tshig 'khor lo ste/ /snying po 'khor lo yin par grags/ /'khor lo ye shes bla med 'di/ /de ring khyod la sbyin bar bya/ /oM ratna pad+ma karma tsakra/ a b+hi Shany+tsa a a sa ma ya h+ri tha/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i
360b6(rgyud 'grel): chu/ /dam las 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dis 'grub/ /ci ste dam tshig 'das ? ni/ /de ma thag tu bkas nas gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas
360b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /bdun rgyud rigs ni brlag bar mdzad/ /de bas rtag tu bu khyod kyis/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang/ /sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka' / /shin tu mos bas bsrung bar bya/ /khyod kyi srog chags 
361a1(rgyud 'grel): bsad mi bya/ /mi byin par yang blang mi bya/ /rdzun dang 'dod la spyod pa rnams/ /dngos grub 'dod bas bya ba min/ /chad ni btud bar mi bya zhing/ /sha la sogs pa bzang mi bya/ /
361a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can gnod par sbyor ba ni/ /nam yang bya ba ma yin te/ /dkon mchog gsum ni yod mi spang/ /dus kun tu ni byang chub sems/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang/ /lha dang bla ma de bzhin no/ /? la
361a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa gang yin dang/ /bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /lha la phul ba'i snying po dang/ /de yi dri ma 'gom mi bya/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin no/ /sngags dang lha la snang mi bya/ /gdon gyi la
361a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs bya ba min/ /mu stegs can la'ang snang mi bya/ /mdor na yid gnyis dog mi bya/ /bdag gi de nyid sngags dang ni/ /thams cad 'dra bas de bzhin no/ /de nas dbang mchog bskur ba ni/ /? ?
361a5(rgyud 'grel): dag tu/ /khru ? yi dkyil 'khor la/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dri/ /tshon ni dmar pos legs par bri/ /bkra shis brgyad kyi phyag rgya dgong/ /dbu rgyan cod pan me tog srang/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang rin chen bdun
361a6(rgyud 'grel): gser byas ? thur ma 'khor me long/ /dung dang bkra shis ras thogs bzhag /bdug spos ras sar gdugs sham can/ /rnga yab gsal yab zho ? gang/ /bum pa bzhi sogs ma rig bzung/ /mchod
361a7(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs bkra shis brjod/ /oM pra ti pri ta sarba a pa ra Na naM hUM phaT/ /oM twa Ta tra Ta sarba A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ /bi tra ba bi tra ba / sarba a pa ya ta ta ? hUM phaT/ sku gsung thugs su byin gyis
361b1(rgyud 'grel): brlab/ /de nas thur ma me long du/ /'khor lo rtsa ba'i yig 'brus bskur/ /phreng ba bum la nyan pa dang/ /gsang sngags phyag rgya cod pan dang/ /'khor sbyar ming dbang dbu rgyan dang/ /las dbang ? bzungs rje'o/?
361b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gsum sa ni nor dbang bskur/ /'khor lo rin chen bstangs pas ni/ /sa bcu kun la dbang ba dang/ /theg pa mdza' dag ston pa yi/ /chos kyi rgyal po chen por shog /blang po rin chen bstangs? pas ni/ /
361b3(rgyud 'grel): theg pa kun gyis don rtogs nas/ /stobs bcu kun la dbang thob cing/ /byang chub 'bras bu thob par shog /rta mchog rin chen bstabs pas ni/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi'i dbang thob nas/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho ?
361b4(rgyud 'grel): ba yi/ /thar ba'i 'bras bu thob bar shog /nor bu rin chen bsdabs pas ni/ /'jig rten dag tu de bzhin gshegs/ dpe byang mtshan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /gser gyi sku mdog thob par shog /dmag mi rin chen bstabS

361b6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyi/ /? yi rgyal po thob par shog /btsun mo rin chen bstabs pas ni/ /shes rab yum gyi dbang thob cing/ /skye 'gag med pa'i don rtogs nas/ /bla med 'brs bu thob par shog /de bzhin gshegs
361b7(rgyud 'grel): pas byin gyis brlabs pa yi/ /nyon mongs sel ba'i grub rdzas dpa' bo 'dis/ /bar cod bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rnam 'jig cing/ /skye 'grub mchog thob dang 'dir bkra shis shog / ji ltar lha yi dbang po brgya
362a1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i ? mchog bu ngan /dur ba'i gdan la rdzogs nas bzung? btul star/ /deng 'dir bkra shis phun sum tshogs par shog /ji ltar sngon gyi drang srong a ga tis/
362a2(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs ba'i phyugs kyi dngos grub 'di/ /khyim bdag dbang phyug che la byin pa yis/ /skyed gu'i bcos gyur bcud ldan bkra shis shog /rdo rje dang ni rin chen chu skyes dang/ /de bzhin las kyi sems dpa' 
362a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'i/ /li khris 'jig rten gsum po dbang bsdus shing/ /dngos grub mchog thob dang 'dir bkra shis shog /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dung/ /nar a nar dung sgra
362a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrags pa ltar/ /bu khyod dam pa'i chos sgra rab sgrogs shing/ /'gro ba 'dren mdzad deng 'dir bkra shis shog /chos rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /smig rgyu lta bur yang dag rtogs

362a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du khyod tshe srog 'dzin gyur nas/ /dngos grub mchog thob der 'dir bkra shis shog /ji ltar rgyu dang sa bon chung ba las/ /'bras bu cher smin shing thog bil ba ltar/ /de bzhin bsod nams rgyu
362a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs nus du las/ /'bras bu bla med byang chub thob par shog /gtsug tor spyan ljags go chas bskur/ /lag gnyis bcings te gung gzhibs bsgreng/ /mdzub gnyis bkug sbyar gtsug tor ro/ /

362b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /blo dang ldan pas smon lam bdag /shar phyogs sgo la pA rdzas bsdu/ /sngon dang thog ma phur pas bsdu/ /de mthun rdo rje sems la sogs/ /sgrib gnyis byed bas tshogs gnyis rdzogs/ /de bzhin slob ma tshogs rdzogs
362b6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /me long ye shes thob par shog /lho sgo ba k+Shi na bsdu'o/ /sbyin gnas la yang dak+Shi Na bsdu'o/ /nub sgo pa shI ma bsdu'o/ /phyi ma ma 'ongs pa shtsi? bsdu/ /byang sgo ut+ta ra yi bsdu/ /thugs rje gzung la utA ra bsdu/
362b7(rgyud 'grel): gong gi rig dang ye shes drang/ /sngon gyi smon lam ston bstan po/ /dri ma med pa'i dpe bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor rang bzhin lha dag kyang/ /ci rigs bar ni bstan par bya/ /tan tra rgya mtsho dbyings kyi gting rum nas/ /

363a2(rgyud 'grel): mthong shog /rgya gar gyi mkhan po s+thi ra ma tis yo la'i gzhung rgyud phyi nang las des don mdor bsdus te mdzad pa /rgyan dam pa'i le'u bam bo gcig tu byas pa
363a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //cog gru glu'i rgyal mtshan gyis skad phyi mo dang thugs ro// //
363a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa kho na lhar bcas 'gro ba yi/ /bde legs kun gyi rtsa bar yid ches nas/ /lus srog yal bas gyur kyang mi gtong ba'i snying stobs chen pos dam chos 'dzin gyur cig/ //
